tika-abh05t0:5_2: iminā vibhaṅgānantaraṃ dhātukathā desitāti tassā desanākālo apadiṭṭho hoti. Ye pana
tika-abh05t0:5_3: “vibhaṅgānantaraṃ kathāvatthupakaraṇaṃ desita”nti vadanti, tesaṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipanto
tika-abh05t0:6_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādivacanato kilesaviddhaṃsanampi devaputtamārassa balavidhamananti
tika-abh05t0:6_4: pahānābhisamayapariññābhisamayānaṃ vasena. Nanu cetaṃ pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ bhañjanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:6_5: sāvakesupi labbhatevāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “parūpanissayarahita”ntiādi. Vīrassa
tika-abh05t0:6_6: bhāvo vīriyanti katvā vuttaṃ “mahāvīriyoti mahāvīro”ti. Mahāvīriyatā ca paripuṇṇavīriyapāramitāya
tika-abh05t0:6_8: ca veditabbā. Tato eva hissa vīriyāhānisiddhipīti.
tika-abh05t0:7_0: Khandhādike dhamme adhiṭṭhāya nissāya visayaṃ katvā abhidhammakathā pavattāti āha
tika-abh05t0:7_1: “abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā”ti. Tesaṃ kathanatoti tesaṃ khandhādīnaṃ kathābhāvato.
tika-abh05t0:7_2: Etena atthavisesasannissayo byañjanasamudāyo pakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā dhātuyo
tika-abh05t0:7_3: kathīyanti ettha, etena vāti dhātukathā, tathāpavatto byañjanatthasamudāyo. Yadi
tika-abh05t0:7_4: evaṃ sattannampi pakaraṇānaṃ dhātukathābhāvo āpajjatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yadipī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:7_5: Tattha sātisayanti savisesaṃ vicittātirekavasena anavasesato ca desanāya pavattattā.
tika-abh05t0:7_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti. Tenevāha “ekadesakathanameva
tika-abh05t0:8_0: Idāni sāsane yesu dhātu-saddo niruḷho, tesaṃ vasena aññehipi asādhāraṇaṃ imassa pakaraṇassa
tika-abh05t0:8_1: dhātukathābhāvaṃ dassento “khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti khandhāyatanadhātūsu.
tika-abh05t0:8_2: Mahanto pabhedānugato visayo etāsanti mahāvisayā, dhātuyo, na khandhāyatanāni appatarapadattā.
tika-abh05t0:8_3: Yena vā sabhāvena dhammā saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogehi uddesaniddese labhanti,
tika-abh05t0:8_4: so sabhāvo dhātu. Sā dhātu idha sātisayaṃ desitāti savisesaṃ dhātuyā kathanato idaṃ
tika-abh05t0:8_5: pakaraṇaṃ “dhātukathā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabhāvattho hi ayaṃ dhātu-saddo “dhātuso, bhikkhave,
tika-abh05t0:8_6: sattā saṃsandantī”tiādīsu viya. Dhātubhedanti dhātuvibhāgaṃ. Pakaraṇanti vacanaseso.
tika-abh05t0:8_7: Kuto pakaraṇa-saddo labbhatīti āha “sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:8_8: Tena yojanaṃ katvāti tena pakaraṇa-saddena “dhātukathāva pakaraṇaṃ dhātukathāpakaraṇa”nti
tika-abh05t0:8_9: yojanaṃ katvā. Taṃ dīpananti taṃ dhātukathāpakaraṇassa atthadīpanaṃ, atthadīpanākārena
tika-abh05t0:8_10: pavattaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ. “Atthaṃ dīpayissāmī”ti vatvā “taṃ suṇāthā”ti vadanto sotadvārānusārena
tika-abh05t0:8_11: tattha upadhāraṇe niyojetīti āha “taṃdīpanavacanasavanena upadhārethāti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t0:12_0: 1. Cuddasavidhenāti cuddasappakārena, cuddasahi padehīti attho. Tattha “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti
tika-abh05t0:12_1: idamekaṃ padaṃ, tathā “sampayogo vippayogo”ti. “Saṅgahitena sampayuttaṃ vippayutta”ntiādīni
tika-abh05t0:12_2: pana tīṇi tīṇi padāni ekekaṃ padaṃ. Itaresu padavibhāgo suviññeyyova. Etehīti saṅgahādippakārehi.
tika-abh05t0:12_3: Nayanaṃ pāpanaṃ, taṃ pana pavattanaṃ ñāpanañca hotīti “pavattīyati ñāyantī”ti ca
tika-abh05t0:12_4: dvidhāpi attho vutto. Nayā eva uddisiyamānā mātikā. Atthadvayepi pavattanañāṇakiriyānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:12_5: karaṇabhāvena saṅgahādippakārā nayāti vuttā. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iminā saṅgahādikena
tika-abh05t0:12_6: nayenā”ti. Padānanti atthadīpakānaṃ vacanānaṃ. Pajjati etena atthoti hi padaṃ. Padānanti
tika-abh05t0:12_7: ca saṃsāmisambandhe sāmivacanaṃ, pakaraṇassāti pana avayavāvayavīsambandhe.
tika-abh05t0:14_0: 2. Tadatthānīti paṭiccasamuppādatthāni. Paṭicca samuppajjati saṅkhārādikaṃ etasmāti
tika-abh05t0:14_1: hi paṭiccasamuppādo, paccekaṃ avijjādiko paccayadhammo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ saṅkhārapiṭake
tika-abh05t0:14_2: “dvādasa paccayā, dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā”ti. Tesanti khandhādīnaṃ. Tathādassitānanti
tika-abh05t0:14_3: gaṇanuddesavibhāgamattena dassitānaṃ. Kasmā panettha paṭiccasamuppādo dvādasabhāveneva
tika-abh05t0:14_4: gahito, nanu tattha bhavo kammabhavādibhedena, sokādayo ca sarūpatoyeva idha pāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:14_5: gahitāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tatthā”tiādi. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ “pañcavīsādhikena
tika-abh05t0:14_6: padasatenā”ti evaṃ vutte aṭṭhakathāvacane. Kammabhavassa bhāvanabhāvena, upapattibhavassa
tika-abh05t0:14_7: bhavanabhāvena. Padatthato pana kammabhavo bhavati etasmāti bhavo, itaro bhavati,
tika-abh05t0:15_0: “Sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti idampi dhātukathāya mātikākittanamevāti
tika-abh05t0:15_1: “sabbāpi…pe… mātikāti ayaṃ dhātukathāmātikāto bahiddhā vuttā”ti vacanaṃ asambhāvento
tika-abh05t0:15_2: “atha vā”tiādimāha. Pakaraṇantaragatā vuttā dhātukathāya mātikābhāvenāti attho. Kāmañcettha
tika-abh05t0:15_3: mātikābhāvena vuttā, pakaraṇantaragatattā pana aññato gahetabbarūpā ito bahibhūtā
tika-abh05t0:15_4: nāma honti, sarūpato gahitāva pañcakkhandhātiādikā abbhantarā. Tenāha “sarūpato dassetvā
tika-abh05t0:15_5: ṭhapitattā”ti. Mātikāya asaṅgahitattāti mātikāya sarūpena asaṅgahitattā, na aññathā.
tika-abh05t0:15_6: Na hi mātikāya asaṅgahito koci padattho atthi. Vikiṇṇabhāvenāti khandhavibhaṅgādīsu
tika-abh05t0:17_0: 3. Nayānaṃ saṅgahādippakāravisesānaṃ pavatti desanā, tassā viniggamaṭṭhānatāya dvāraṃ.
tika-abh05t0:17_1: Yathāvuttadhammā yathārahaṃ khandhāyatanadhātuyo arūpino ca khandhāti tesaṃ uddeso
tika-abh05t0:17_2: nayamukhamātikā. Tenāha “nayāna”ntiādi. Viyujjanasīlā, viyogo vā etesaṃ atthīti viyogino,
tika-abh05t0:17_3: tathā sahayogino, saṅgahāsaṅgahadhammā ca viyogīsahayogīdhammā ca saṅgahā…pe… dhammā,
tika-abh05t0:17_5: Cuddasapītiādinā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Yehīti yehi khandhādīhi arūpakkhandhehi
tika-abh05t0:17_6: ca. Te cattāroti te saṅgahādayo cattāro. Saccādīhipīti saccaindriyapaṭiccasamuppādādīhipi
tika-abh05t0:17_7: saha. Yathāsambhavanti sambhavānurūpaṃ, yaṃ yaṃ padaṃ saṅgahito asaṅgahitoti ca vattuṃ
tika-abh05t0:18_0: So panāti saṅgahāsaṅgaho. Saṅgāhakabhūtehīti saṅgahaṇakiriyāya kattubhūtehi. Tehīti
tika-abh05t0:18_1: saccādīhi. Na saṅgahabhūtehīti saṅgahaṇakiriyāya karaṇabhūtehi saccādīhi saṅgahāsaṅgaho
tika-abh05t0:18_2: na vutto. Tatthāpi hi khandhāyatanadhātuyo eva karaṇabhūtāti dasseti. Khandhādīheva
tika-abh05t0:18_4: āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā catūhi khandhehi,
tika-abh05t0:18_5: dvīhāyatanehi, aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti saṅgahāsaṅgaho niyametvā vutto. Tasmāti
tika-abh05t0:18_6: yasmā saccādīni saṅgāhakabhāvena vuttāni, na saṅgahabhāvena, khandhādīniyeva ca saṅgahabhāvena vuttāni, tasmā.
tika-abh05t0:19_0: Kasmā panettha saccādayo saṅgahavasena na vuttāti? Tathādesanāya asambhavato. Na
tika-abh05t0:19_1: hi sakkā rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ samudayasaccādīhi, saññādīnaṃ vā indriyādīhi saṅgahanayena
tika-abh05t0:19_2: pucchituṃ vissajjituṃ vāti. Tathā ariyaphalādīsu uppannavedanādīnaṃ saccavinimuttatāya
tika-abh05t0:19_3: “vedanākkhandho katihi saccehi saṅgahito”ti pucchitvāpi “ekena saccena saṅgahito”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:19_4: niyametvā saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ na sakkāti. Yathāsambhavanti yehi sampayogo, yehi ca
tika-abh05t0:20_0: Rūpaṃ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṃ na hoti, nibbānaṃ vā rūpena. Kasmā? Sampayuttanti
tika-abh05t0:20_2: so atthi natthī”ti siyā āsaṅkā, tasmā tesaṃ itarehi, itaresañca tehi vippayogo vuccati,
tika-abh05t0:20_3: na pana rūpassa rūpena, nibbānena vā, nibbānassa vā rūpena katthaci sampayogo atthīti
tika-abh05t0:20_4: tadāsaṅkābhāvato vippayogopi rūpassa rūpanibbānehi, nibbānassa vā tena na vuccati,
tika-abh05t0:20_5: arūpakkhandhehiyeva pana vuccatīti āha “catūhevā”tiādi. Anārammaṇassa cakkhāyatanādikassa.
tika-abh05t0:20_8: hotīti yojetabbaṃ. Yesaṃ pana yehi hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “anārammaṇassa panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:20_9: Yathā hi sārammaṇassa anārammaṇena anārammaṇamissakena ca vippayogo hoti, evaṃ sārammaṇenapi
tika-abh05t0:20_10: so hotiyeva. Tena viya anārammaṇassa anārammaṇamissakassa cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:22_0: 4. Visuṃ yojanā kātabbāti yo tīhi saṅgaho catūhi ca sampayogo vutto, taṃ sabhāgo
tika-abh05t0:22_1: bhāvo payojeti, yo ca tīhi asaṅgaho catūhi ca vippayogo vutto, taṃ visabhāgo bhāvoti
tika-abh05t0:22_2: imamatthaṃ dassento “saṅgaho…pe… viññāyatī”ti āha. Yassa saṅgaho, so dhammo khandhādiko
tika-abh05t0:22_3: sabhāgo. Yassa asaṅgaho, so visabhāgo. Tathā sampayogesupi veditabbaṃ. Idāni yathāvuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:22_4: sabhāgataṃ sarūpato niddhāretvā dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha samānabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:22_5: saṅgahe sabhāgatā, ekuppādādiko sampayogeti iminā ruppanādividhuro asamānasabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:22_6: asaṅgahe visabhāgatā, nānuppādādiko vippayogeti ayamattho atthasiddhoti na vuttoti.
tika-abh05t0:24_0: 5. Etena ṭhapanākārenāti sarūpena aggahetvā yathāvuttena pakaraṇantaramātikāya idha
tika-abh05t0:24_2: pacchato gahaṇaṃ bahi ṭhapananti āha “bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattā”ti. Idha aṭṭhapetvāti
tika-abh05t0:24_3: imissā dhātukathāya sarūpena avatvā. Tathā pakāsitattāti mātikābhāvena jotitattā.
tika-abh05t0:24_4: Dhammasaṅgaṇīsīsena hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ āgatamātikāva gahitāti. Yehi nayehi dhātukathāya
tika-abh05t0:24_5: niddeso, tesu nayesu, tehi vibhajitabbesu khandhādīsu, tesaṃ nayānaṃ pavattidvāralakkhaṇesu
tika-abh05t0:24_6: ca uddiṭṭhesu dhātukathāya uddesavasena vattabbaṃ vuttameva hotīti yaṃ uddesavasena
tika-abh05t0:24_7: vattabbaṃ, taṃ vatvā puna yathāvuttānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ kusalādivibhāgadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:24_8: “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti vuttanti evamettha mātikāya nikkhepavidhi veditabbo.
tika-abh05t0:25_0: “Gāvīti ayamāhā”ti ettha gāvī-saddo viya “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti ettha padatthavipallāsakārinā
tika-abh05t0:25_1: iti-saddena atthapadatthako saṅgahāsaṅgaha-saddo saddapadatthako jāyatīti adhippāyenāha
tika-abh05t0:25_2: “aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā”ti. Tena atthuddhārato saṅgahasaddaṃ saṃvaṇṇetīti
tika-abh05t0:25_4: saṅgahasaddābhidheyyatāsāmaññena viññāyamāno vuccamāno vā. Na cettha sāmaññañca ekarūpamevāti
tika-abh05t0:25_5: codanā kātabbā bhedāpekkhattā tassa. Yattakā hi tassa visesā, tadapekkhameva tanti.
tika-abh05t0:25_6: “Attano jātiyā”ti viññāyati yathā “matteyyā”ti vutte attano mātu hitāti.
tika-abh05t0:26_1: akatvā. Sāmaññenāti avisesena. Dhammānanti khandhādidhammānaṃ. Avasesā niddhāretvāti
tika-abh05t0:26_3: niddhāretvā dhammānaṃ pucchanavissajjananayauddesāti yojanā. Nanu ca “saṅgahitena
tika-abh05t0:26_4: asaṅgahita”ntiādayopi yathāvuttavisesaṃ aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṃ pucchanavissajjananayuddesāti
tika-abh05t0:26_5: codanaṃ sandhāyāha “saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”ntiādi. Yassa attho ñāyati, saddo ca na
tika-abh05t0:26_6: payujjati, so lopoti veditabbo, āvuttiādivasena vā ayamattho dīpetabbo. Tenāti luttaniddiṭṭhena
tika-abh05t0:26_8: tena sotāyatanādibhāvena asaṅgahito sotapasādādiko yo ruppanasabhāvo dhammaviseso.
tika-abh05t0:26_9: Tannissito taṃ dhammavisesaṃ nissāya labbhamāno. “Te dhammā katihi khandhehi…pe…
tika-abh05t0:26_10: catūhi khandhehi asaṅgahitā”tiādinā asaṅgahitatāsaṅkhāto pucchāvissajjananayo parato
tika-abh05t0:26_11: pucchitvā vissajjiyamāno idha uddiṭṭho hoti. Visesane karaṇavacananti iminā tassa
tika-abh05t0:27_0: Nanu ca “saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”nti ettāvatāpi ayamattho labbhatīti? Na labbhati
tika-abh05t0:27_1: tassa dhammamattadīpanato. Nayuddeso heso, na dhammuddeso. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese
tika-abh05t0:27_2: “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatana…pe… dhātusaṅgahena
tika-abh05t0:27_3: asaṅgahitā”ti vatvā “te dhammā katihi khandhehi…pe… asaṅgahitā”ti pucchitvā “te dhammā
tika-abh05t0:27_4: catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti dutiyaṃ asaṅgahitapadaṃ
tika-abh05t0:27_5: gahitaṃ. Aññathā “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā
tika-abh05t0:27_6: āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Te katame”icceva niddisitabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh05t0:28_0: Esa nayoti atidesena dassitamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “tesupī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatiyapadenāti
tika-abh05t0:28_1: luttaniddesena gahetabbanti vuttapadaṃ sandhāyāha. Kattuatthe karaṇaniddeso saṅgahitāsaṅgahitehi
tika-abh05t0:28_2: tehi dhammehi dhammānaṃ saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatāya vuttattā. Tathā hi tattha pāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:28_3: “tehi dhammehi ye dhammā”ti dhammamukheneva saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatā vuttā. Dutiyatatiyesu
tika-abh05t0:28_5: vuttāti tattha “visesane karaṇavacana”nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “tattha hi…pe… dhammantarassā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:28_8: Dhammantarenāti aññadhammena. Dhammantarassāti tato aññassa dhammassa visesanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh05t0:28_9: Tattha hi antarena pakāravisesāmasanaṃ dhammeneva dhammo visesitoti. Ādipadenevāti
tika-abh05t0:28_11: vuttehi dutiyatatiyapadehi. Etthāti ekādasamādīsu catūsu. Dutiyatatiyesu viya visesane
tika-abh05t0:28_12: eva karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na catutthapañcamesu viya kattuattheti adhippāyo. Pucchāvissajjanānantiādinā
tika-abh05t0:29_0: Vividhakappanatoti vividhaṃ bahudhā kappanato, saṅgahāsaṅgahānaṃ visuṃ saha ca visesanavisesitabbabhāvakappanatoti
tika-abh05t0:29_1: attho. Taṃ pana vikappanaṃ vuttākārena vibhajanaṃ hotīti āha “vibhāgatoti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t0:29_2: Sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇena adhimokkhena sampayuttadhammā ārammaṇe nicchayanākārena pavattiyā
tika-abh05t0:29_3: sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttadhammā. Te ca tehi saddhiṃ tadavasiṭṭhe dvipañcaviññāṇavicikicchāsahagatadhamme
tika-abh05t0:29_4: ca saṅgahetvā āha “sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh05t0:29_5: vuttasabbacittuppādā”ti. Itareti phassādayo. Sabbesanti ekūnanavutiyā cittuppādānaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:29_6: Pariggahetabbāti saṅgahādivasena pariggaṇhitabbā. Mahāvisayena adhimokkhena. Aññesanti
tika-abh05t0:29_7: vitakkādīnaṃ. Vacanaṃ sandhāyāti “adhimuccanaṃ adhimokkho, so sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo”ti
tika-abh05t0:29_9: ca āgataṃ vacanaṃ sandhāya. Atthe satīti “sanniṭṭhāna…pe… sādhāraṇato”ti evamatthe
tika-abh05t0:29_10: vuccamāne. Vattabbesūti saṅgahādipariggahatthaṃ vattabbesu. Vuttā phassādayo manasikārapariyosānā.
tika-abh05t0:29_11: Tādisassāti phassādisadisassa sādhāraṇassa adhimokkhasadisassa asādhāraṇassa aññassa dhammassa abhāvā.
tika-abh05t0:30_0: Nanu jīvitindriyacittaṭṭhitiyopi sādhāraṇāti? Saccaṃ sādhāraṇā, atthi pana visesoti
tika-abh05t0:30_1: dassento āha “jīvitindriyaṃ panā”tiādi. Asamādhisabhāvā balabhāvaṃ appattā sāmaññasaddeneva
tika-abh05t0:30_2: vattabbāti yojanā. Sāmaññavisesasaddehi cāti sāmaññavisesasaddehi vattabbā ca samādhisabhāvā
tika-abh05t0:30_3: cittekaggatā. Visesasaddavacanīyaṃ aññanti balappattasamādhito aññaṃ sāmaññasaddena
tika-abh05t0:30_4: byāpetabbaṃ, visesasaddena ca nivattetabbaṃ natthi samādhisabhāvāya eva cittekaggatāya
tika-abh05t0:30_5: gahitattā. Na aññabyāpakanivattako sāmaññaviseso anañña…pe… viseso, tassa dīpanato.
tika-abh05t0:30_6: Tasseva dhammassāti tasseva balappattasamādhidhammassa. Bhedadīpakehīti visesadīpakehi
tika-abh05t0:30_8: saddā. Tato viparītehi aññaṃ byāpetabbaṃ nivattetabbañca gahetvā pavattehi sāmaññavisesasaddeheva
tika-abh05t0:30_9: na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vattabbā. Tasmāti yasmā asamādhisabhāvā samādhisabhāvāti
tika-abh05t0:30_10: dvedhā bhinditvā gahitā cittekaggatā, tasmā. Asamādhisabhāvameva pakāseyya visesasaddanirapekkhaṃ
tika-abh05t0:30_11: pavattamānattā. Itaroti samādhibalādiko visesasaddo. Idhāti imasmiṃ abbhantaramātikuddese,
tika-abh05t0:30_12: sādhāraṇe phassādike, mahāvisaye vā adhimokkhe uddisiyamāne. Nanu ca abhinditvā gayhamānā
tika-abh05t0:30_13: cittekaggatā vedanā viya sādhāraṇā hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “abhinnāpi vā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:30_14: “Cittassa ṭhiti cittekaggatā avisāhaṭamānasatā. Arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhitī”ti vacanato
tika-abh05t0:30_15: samādhijīvitindriyānaṃ aññadhammanissayena vattabbatā veditabbā. Na arahatīti idha
tika-abh05t0:30_16: uddesaṃ na arahati samukheneva vattabbesu phassādīsu uddisiyamānesūti attho.
tika-abh05t0:35_1: ca abhiññātalakkhaṇavisayāti āha “sabhāvato abhiññātāna”nti. Pariññeyyatādīti ādi-saddena
tika-abh05t0:35_3: Saccādiviseso viyāti dukkhasaccādipariyāyo abhiññeyyapīḷanaṭṭhādiviseso viya. Evañca
tika-abh05t0:35_4: katvāti nayamukhamātikāya abhiññeyyanissayena vuccamānattā eva. Tesaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:35_5: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ khandhabhāvena viya rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hoti, na vedanākkhandhādibhāvenāti
tika-abh05t0:35_6: saṅgahalakkhaṇamāha. Itīti tasmā, yasmā rūpadhammā aññamaññaṃ rūpakkhandhabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:35_7: sabhāgā, tasmāti attho. Rūpakkhandhabhāvasaṅkhātena rūpakkhandhabhāvena atthamukheneva
tika-abh05t0:35_8: gahaṇe. Saddadvārena pana gahaṇe rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā rūpakkhandhavacanavacanīyatāsaṅkhātena.
tika-abh05t0:35_9: Idāni tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “rūpakkhandhoti hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:36_1: ānetvā yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Abhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanaṃ khandhapadaniddese
tika-abh05t0:38_0: 40. Yadipi ekakepi sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ vissajjanaṃ samudayamaggasaccānaṃ “samudayasaccaṃ
tika-abh05t0:38_1: ekena khandhena…pe… maggasaccaṃ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:38_2: catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahita”nti niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-abh05t0:38_5: ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṃ, catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi
tika-abh05t0:38_6: dhātūhi asaṅgahita”nti ekake sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Cakkhusotindriyadukassa pana “cakkhundriyañca
tika-abh05t0:38_7: sotindriyañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, catūhi khandhehi
tika-abh05t0:38_8: dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti, “cakkhundriyañca sukhindriyañca dvīhi
tika-abh05t0:38_9: khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi
tika-abh05t0:38_10: dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti cakkhusukhindriyadukassa ca asadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Nāpi dukehi
tika-abh05t0:38_12: sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Idhāti saccapadaniddese. Tikena cāti dukkhasamudayamaggāditikena
tika-abh05t0:38_13: ca. “Pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, na kehici
tika-abh05t0:38_14: khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:40_1: na kattabbaṃ, “sabbampi viññāṇa”nti vattabbanti adhippāyo. Tattha kāraṇamāha “kusalādīnampī”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t0:40_2: Vissajjanāsadisena sabbaviññāṇādisaṅgahaṇato. Tesanti viññāṇādipadānaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ
tika-abh05t0:40_3: paṭhamanaye. Akammajānampi saṅgahitatā viññāyati saddāyatanassapi gahitattā.
tika-abh05t0:41_4: Tato “rūpakkhandhassa sabhāgāni, arūpānaṃ pana jātijarāmaraṇānī”ti ānetvā yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:41_5: Ekekabhūtānīti yathā ekasmiṃ rūpakalāpe jātiādīni ekekāniyeva honti, evaṃ ekasmiṃ
tika-abh05t0:41_7: vedanādīnaṃ nibbattiādibhūtānipi jātiādīni tathā na gayhantīti āha “vediyana…pe…
tika-abh05t0:41_8: agayhamānānī”ti. Tena vedanākkhandhādīhi jātiādīnaṃ saṅgahābhāvamāha. “Jāti, bhikkhave,
tika-abh05t0:41_9: aniccā saṅkhatā”tiādivacanato jātiādīnampi saṅkhatapariyāyo atthīti saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccena
tika-abh05t0:41_10: saṅkhārakkhandhena tesaṃ saṅgahoti vuttaṃ “saṅkhatā…pe… sabhāgānī”ti. Teneva ca saṅkhārakkhandhassa
tika-abh05t0:41_11: anekantaparamatthakiccatā veditabbā. Tathā duvidhānīti vuttappakārena rūpārūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:41_12: nibbattiādibhāvena dvippakārāni. Tenāti yathāvuttasabhāgatthena. Tehi khandhādīhīti
tika-abh05t0:44_1: gahetabbā visesanavisesitabbatāya icchitattā. Yo hi dhammo saṅgahitatāvisesavisiṭṭho
tika-abh05t0:44_2: asaṅgahito heṭṭhā uddiṭṭho, sveva idha asaṅgahitabhāvena pucchitvā vissajjīyatīti
tika-abh05t0:44_3: dassento “yaṃ taṃ…pe… tadeva dassento”ti āha. Ye hi dhammā cakkhāyatanena khandhasaṅgahena
tika-abh05t0:44_4: saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena ca asaṅgahitā, tesaṃyeva puna khandhādīhi asaṅgaho
tika-abh05t0:44_5: pucchitvā vissajjito. Tena vuttaṃ “cakkhāyatanena…pe… āhā”ti. Sabbatthāti sabbesu
tika-abh05t0:44_7: vuttānaṃ khandhādisaṅgahānaṃ. “Sāmaññajotanā visese avatiṭṭhatī”ti āha “niccaṃ visesāpekkhattā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:44_10: savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā, khandhādinā saṅgahoti attho. Suddhāti kevalā anavasesā,
tika-abh05t0:45_0: Tatthāti yathādhikate dutiyanaye. Sāmaññajotanāya visesaniddiṭṭhattā āha “saṅgahi…pe…
tika-abh05t0:45_1: niddhāritattā”ti. Tīsu saṅgahesūti khandhādisaṅgahesu tīsu. Aññehīti vuttāvasesehi
tika-abh05t0:45_2: dvīhi ekena vā. Ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṃ tāvatāpi saṅgahitena asaṅgahitabhāvassa
tika-abh05t0:45_5: niddisituṃ asambhavā. Saṅgahādinayadassanamattaṃ nayamātikāya byāpāro, yattha pana
tika-abh05t0:45_6: saṅgahādayo, te khandhādayo kusalādayo ca tesaṃ visayabhūtāti tehi vinā saṅgahādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:45_8: asaṅgāhakañcāti vattabbaṃ. Yo hi idha saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto dhammo asaṅgāhakabhāvenapi vuttoyevāti.
tika-abh05t0:46_0: “Ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti, “ye dhammā
tika-abh05t0:46_1: khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti ca yattha pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:46_2: natthi, tattha paṭhamanaye chaṭṭhanaye ca “rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi saṅgahito?
tika-abh05t0:46_3: Ekena khandhenā”ti, “rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi sampayuttoti? Natthi. Catūhi khandhehi
tika-abh05t0:46_4: vippayutto”ti ca evaṃ pucchitabbavissajjitabbabhāvena. Itaresūti dutiyādinayesu.
tika-abh05t0:46_5: Tassa tassāti yaṃ pucchitabbaṃ vissajjitabbañca “ye dhammā”ti aniyamitarūpena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:47_0: Etthāti etasmiṃ pakaraṇe. Yena yena cakkhāyatanādinā saṅgāhakena. Khandhādisaṅgahesūti
tika-abh05t0:47_1: khandhāyatanadhātusaṅgahesu. Tena tenāti khandhādisaṅgahena. Aññanti tato tato saṅgāhakato
tika-abh05t0:47_2: aññaṃ. Tabbinimuttaṃ saṅgahetabbāsaṅgahetabbaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ atthi, taṃ tadeva
tika-abh05t0:47_3: “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti
tika-abh05t0:47_4: saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakabhāvena uddhaṭaṃ. Añño dhammo natthi tassa sabhāgabhāvena saṅgāhakasseva
tika-abh05t0:47_5: abhāvato. Siyā panetaṃ sabhāgena ekadesena saṅgahoti, taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha “na ca
tika-abh05t0:48_0: Yadi cātiādināpi tasseva tena saṅgahābhāvaṃ pāṭhābhāvadassanena vibhāveti. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:48_1: so evāti yo rūpādikkhandho saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto, so eva tena rūpādikkhandhena saṅgayheyya
tika-abh05t0:48_2: saṅgahetabbo bhaveyya, teneva tassa saṅgahābhāve lakkhaṇaṃ dassento āha “na hi so
tika-abh05t0:48_3: eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cā”ti. Ekadesā viya cakkhāyatanādayo samudāyassa rūpakkhandhādikassa.
tika-abh05t0:48_4: Rūpakkhandho cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ na saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca sabhāgavisabhāgabhāvābhāvato.
tika-abh05t0:48_5: Esa nayo sesesupi. Samudāyantogadhānantiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
tika-abh05t0:48_6: Tattha yenāti vibhāgena. Teti ekadesā. Tesanti ekadesānaṃ. Ettha tadantogadhatāya
tika-abh05t0:49_0: Yathā sabbena sabbaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgābhāvena ekadesānaṃ samudāyo saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako
tika-abh05t0:49_1: ca na hoti, evaṃ ekadesasabhāgavisabhāgānanti dassento “tathā”tiādimāha. Tattha yathātiādi
tika-abh05t0:49_2: udāharaṇadassanena yathāvuttassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Khandhasaṅgahena saṅgāhakaṃ
tika-abh05t0:49_3: asaṅgāhakañcāti yojanā. Tathā sesesupi. Na hi ekadesa…pe… visabhāgaṃ yena samudāyo
tika-abh05t0:49_4: saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca siyāti adhippāyo. Ettha ca saṅgāhakattaṃ tāva mā hotu, asaṅgāhakattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:49_5: pana kasmā paṭikkhipīyatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “tasmā”tiādi. Tattha tasmāti
tika-abh05t0:49_6: vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena parāmasati. Attato aññassa, attani antogadhato aññassa,
tika-abh05t0:49_7: attekadesasabhāgato aññassa satipi asaṅgāhakatteti yojanā. Taṃ panetaṃ “rūpakkhandho
tika-abh05t0:49_8: rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hotī”tiādinā vutte tayo pakāre sandhāya
tika-abh05t0:49_9: vuttaṃ. Saṅgāhakattameva etesaṃ natthīti etesaṃ attā, attani antogadho, attekadesasabhāgo
tika-abh05t0:49_10: cāti vuttānaṃ saṅgāhakabhāvo eva natthi sabhāgābhāvato. Tena vuttaṃ “na hi so eva
tika-abh05t0:49_11: tassa sabhāgo”tiādi. Yenāti saṅgāhakattena. Evarūpānanti yathāvuttānaṃ tippakārānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:50_1: dhammāyatanassa saṅgāhakattaṃ ekadesena samudāyassa saṅgahitabhāvanti attho, samudāyassa
tika-abh05t0:50_2: rūpakkhandhassa ekadesassa cakkhāyatanassa sotāyatanassa ca saṅgāhakattaṃ samudāyena
tika-abh05t0:50_3: ekadesassa saṅgahitabhāvanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ na dasseti, atha kiṃ dassetīti
tika-abh05t0:50_7: karaṇavacanaṃ, na kattuattheti katvā āha “saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakanirapekkhāna”nti. Tenevāha
tika-abh05t0:50_9: Nanu ca dutiyādīsu gaṇanādīnipi vijjantīti? Saccaṃ vijjanti, tāni pana visesanabhūtāni
tika-abh05t0:50_10: appadhānānīti visesitabbabhūtānaṃ padhānānaṃ vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ. “Cakkhāyatanena ye
tika-abh05t0:50_11: dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”tiādinā kattuādayo niddiṭṭhāti āha “kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:51_0: Tathā tathāti tena tena rūpakkhandhādippakārena. Taṃtaṃkhandhādibhāvābhāvo sabhāgavisabhāgatāti
tika-abh05t0:51_2: attho. Yathāniddhāritadhammadassaneti “ye dhammā, te dhammā”ti niddhāritappakāradhammanirūpane.
tika-abh05t0:51_5: attho. Tadabhāvoti tassa samānakkhandhādibhāvassa abhāvo aññakkhandhādibhāvo. Ayanti
tika-abh05t0:51_6: yvāyaṃ paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbatāsaṅkhāto dutiyādinayesu yathāvuttānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:52_1: saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhassa asaṅgāhakattassa abhāvato. Na hi sakkā “samudayasaccena ye
tika-abh05t0:52_2: dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”tiādi vattuṃ.
tika-abh05t0:52_4: na uddhaṭānīti yojanā. Evantiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. Na
tika-abh05t0:53_0: “Khandhapadenā”ti idaṃ karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, na kattuattheti āha “khandhapadasaṅgahenāti
tika-abh05t0:53_1: attho”ti. Tenevassa kattuatthataṃ paṭisedhetuṃ “na saṅgāhakenā”ti vuttaṃ. Karaṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:53_2: pana katturahitaṃ natthīti āha “kenaci saṅgāhakenāti idaṃ pana ānetvā vattabba”nti.
tika-abh05t0:53_3: Saṅgāhakesu na yujjati na saṅgahetabbesūti adhippāyo. Rūpakkhandhadhammā hi “ye dhammā
tika-abh05t0:53_4: khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti vuttāti. Samudāye vuttavidhi tadavayavepi sambhavatīti
tika-abh05t0:53_5: codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpento “etena nayenā”tiādimāha. Paṭiyogīnivattanaṃ eva-saddena karīyatīti
tika-abh05t0:53_6: āha “na hi aññamattanivāraṇaṃ eva-saddassa attho”ti. Tenāha “saṅgāhakato aññanivāraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:53_7: eva-saddassa attho”ti. So ca…pe… pekkhanti iminā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti.
tika-abh05t0:53_9: ettha cakkhāyatanaṃ saṅgāhakanti yathādhippetassa atthassa asambhavo evāti idāni
tika-abh05t0:54_1: āyatanadhātuvisesanatthaṃ. Na so eva tassa, samudāyo vā tadekadesānaṃ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako
tika-abh05t0:54_2: ca hotīti vuttovāyamatthoti āha “rūpakkhandho…pe… na hotī”ti. Iminā pariyāyenāti
tika-abh05t0:54_3: yasmā vuttappakāraṃ saṅgāhakattaṃ natthi “yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakaṃ siyā”ti iminā
tika-abh05t0:54_4: pariyāyena. Asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vutto aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “so ca…pe… natthī”ti. Saṅgahitatāyāti
tika-abh05t0:54_5: nippariyāyena saṅgahitabhāvena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti na yujjatīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:54_6: Sā saṅgahitatāti attanā attano, attekadesānaṃ vā saṅgahitatā. Tenāti rūpakkhandhena.
tika-abh05t0:54_7: Tesanti rūpakkhandhatadekadesānaṃ. Atthi ca vippayuttatā vedanākkhandhādīhi. Cakkhāyatanādīhi
tika-abh05t0:54_8: viyāti visadisudāharaṇaṃ. Etehi rūpavedanākkhandhādīhi aññehi ca evarūpehi. Etāni
tika-abh05t0:55_0: Teneva tassa saṅgahitattābhāvadassanena heṭṭhā dassitena. Etthāti etasmiṃ vāre. Aggahaṇeti
tika-abh05t0:55_1: akathane, adesanāyanti attho. Samudayasaccādīsūti samudayasaccasukhindriyādīsu yujjeyya
tika-abh05t0:55_2: taṃ kāraṇaṃ. Kasmā? Tehi samudayasaccādīhi khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahite dhammajāte
tika-abh05t0:55_3: sati tassa āyatanasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitattassa abhāvato. Rūpakkhandhādīhīti rūpakkhandhavedanākkhandhādīhi.
tika-abh05t0:55_4: Saṅgahitameva natthi, kasmā? “So eva tassa saṅgāhako na hotī”ti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh05t0:55_5: Yadipi rūpakkhandhādinā rūpakkhandhādikassa attano…pe… natthīti sambandho. Aññassa
tika-abh05t0:55_6: pana vedanākkhandhādikassa rūpakkhandhādinā saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṃ atthīti
tika-abh05t0:55_7: yojanā. Ubhayābhāvoti saṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattābhāvo. Ettha etasmiṃ vāre. Dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīnanti
tika-abh05t0:55_9: yojanā. Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā “satī”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Ādi-saddena paṭhamena dhammadhātusaḷāyatanādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:55_10: sukhindriyādīnañca, dutiyena ekakkhandhassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sukhindriyañhi vedanākkhandhasseva
tika-abh05t0:55_11: saṅgāhakaṃ. Tesanti khandhacatukkakhandhadukādīnaṃ asaṅgahitatā na natthi atthevāti
tika-abh05t0:55_12: tassā abhāvo anekantiko. Pubbe vuttanayenāti “rūpakkhandhādīhi panā”tiādinā vuttanayena.
tika-abh05t0:56_0: Tatthevāti tasmiṃyeva pubbe vutte sanidassanasappaṭighapade. Nivattetvā gaṇhantoti
tika-abh05t0:56_1: pubbe vuttaṃ paṭinivattetvā gaṇhanto paccāmasanto. Tadavattabbatāti tesaṃ saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakasaṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:56_2: avattabbatā. Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato eva…pe… na saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti yasmā nesaṃ asaṅgāhakattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:56_3: viya saṅgāhakattampi natthi, tato eva saṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattampīti dasseti.
tika-abh05t0:59_0: 179. Rūpakkhandhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-abh05t0:59_1: ekadesasabhāgatā samudāyasabhāgatā na hoti, tasmā. Tenāti rūpakkhandhena. Tānīti
tika-abh05t0:59_2: vedanādikkhandhattayanibbānāni. Yathā ca ekadesavisabhāgatāya na saṅgahitatā, evaṃ
tika-abh05t0:59_3: ekadesasabhāgatāya asaṅgahitatāpi natthīti dassento “na kevala”ntiādimāha. Saṅgahitāneva
tika-abh05t0:59_4: na na hontīti yojanā. Teti vedanādikkhandhattayanibbānasukhumarūpadhammā. Tehīti
tika-abh05t0:59_5: viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi. Na kathañci sammissāti kenacipi pakārena na sammissāti
tika-abh05t0:59_6: asammissatāya saṅgahitattābhāvaṃ sādheti. Rūpakkhandhena viya…pe… na hotīti yathā
tika-abh05t0:59_7: rūpakkhandhena sabhāgatābhāvato nibbānaṃ na kenacipi saṅgahaṇena saṅgahitaṃ, evaṃ
tika-abh05t0:59_8: viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi taṃ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṃ na hotīti khandhasaṅgahābhāvo
tika-abh05t0:60_1: “rūpakkhandhena viññāṇakkhandhena cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t0:60_2: āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti sakkā vattuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “saṅgāhakattābhāvato
tika-abh05t0:60_3: evā”ti. Tathā “abyākatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena
tika-abh05t0:60_4: saṅgahitā”tiādi na sakkā vattuṃ tādisassa dhammassa abhāvatoti āha “sanibbāna…pe…
tika-abh05t0:60_5: bhāvatovā”ti. Aggahaṇaṃ veditabbanti yojanā. Tenāha “na hī”tiādi. Kañcīti kañci dhammajātaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:60_6: Teti abyākatadhammādayo. Attanoti abyākatadhammādiṃ sandhāyāha. Ekadesoti rūpakkhandhādi.
tika-abh05t0:61_0: Visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā khandhasaṅgahena dhammāyatanena na koci dhammo
tika-abh05t0:61_1: saṅgahito atthīti yojanā. Etassāti “dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā”ti etassa padassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena
tika-abh05t0:64_1: asaṅgahaṇapubbaṃ saṅgahaṇañca vuccamānaṃ saṅgahaṇāsaṅgahaṇānaṃ pavattivisesena vuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:64_2: hotīti āha “saṅgahaṇā…pe… uddiṭṭhā”ti. Saṅgahābhāvakato asaṅgaho saṅgahahetuko saṅgahassa
tika-abh05t0:64_3: pavattivisesoyeva nāma hotīti āha “saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe”ti. Kenaci samudayasaccādinā
tika-abh05t0:64_4: tīhipi saṅgahehi saṅgahitena saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannena dhammavisesena puna tatheva
tika-abh05t0:64_5: saṅgahito so eva samudayasaccādiko dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito. Saṅgāhakattābhāvasabbhāvā
tika-abh05t0:64_6: saṅgāhakabhāvena na uddhaṭā, na asaṅgāhakattā eva. Yathā hi tīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā,
tika-abh05t0:64_7: evaṃ dvīhi, ekenapi saṅgahena na saṅgāhakā idha na uddhaṭā. Tehi saṅgahitāti tehi
tika-abh05t0:64_8: tīhi saṅgahehi saṅgahitā dhammā. Yassāti yassa attano saṅgāhakassa.
tika-abh05t0:65_0: Sakalavācakenāti anavasesaṃ khandhādiatthaṃ vadantena. Tena khandhādipadenāti “teneva
tika-abh05t0:65_1: saṅgahaṃ gaccheyyā”ti ettha tena khandhādipadenāti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ pana ayojetvā
tika-abh05t0:65_2: “yaṃ attano saṅgāhakaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya, taṃ aññaṃ saṅgahitaṃ
tika-abh05t0:65_3: nāma natthī”ti evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmāti ce? Na hi yena samudayasaccādinā yaṃ
tika-abh05t0:65_4: saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṃ dhammajātaṃ khandhādisaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṃ, teneva samudayasaccādinā
tika-abh05t0:65_5: tassa tadavasiṭṭhassa saṅkhārakkhandhadhammassa, na ca tasseva kevalassa samudayasaccādikassa
tika-abh05t0:65_6: saṅgaho pucchito vissajjitoti yojanā, atha kho tena saṅkhārakkhandhadhammena phassādinā.
tika-abh05t0:65_7: Saṅgahitassāti saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhassāti attho. Tasmā attano saṅgāhakaṃ sakalakkhaṇādiṃ
tika-abh05t0:65_8: saṅgaṇhitvā puna tena khandhādipadena yaṃ saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya, taṃ tādisaṃ natthīti
tika-abh05t0:65_9: attho veditabbo. Vedanā saddo ca khandho āyatanañcāti vedanā visuṃ khandho, saddo
tika-abh05t0:65_10: ca visuṃ āyatananti attho. Aññena khandhantarādinā. Asammissanti abyākatadukkhasaccādi
tika-abh05t0:65_11: viya amissitaṃ. Na hi…pe… etthāti saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhena dhammena yo dhammo saṅgahito,
tika-abh05t0:65_12: tassa saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhoyeva yo saṅgaho, so na ettha vāre pucchito vissajjito ca.
tika-abh05t0:65_13: Saṅgahovāti kevalo saṅgaho, na kattāpekkhoti attho. Na saṅgāhakenāti idaṃ yathāvuttena
tika-abh05t0:65_14: atthena nivattitassa dassanaṃ. Na hītiādi taṃsamatthanaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:68_1: pañcamanayo, tasmā yo ettha kenaci asaṅgahitena dhammavisesena puna asaṅgahito dhammaviseso
tika-abh05t0:68_2: asaṅgahitena asaṅgahito asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo ca. Tameva tāva
tika-abh05t0:68_3: yathāniddhāritaṃ dassento “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā khandha…pe… asaṅgahitā, tehi
tika-abh05t0:68_4: dhammehi ye dhammā khandha…pe… asaṅgahitāti āhā”ti catutthanaye vuttanayānusārena.
tika-abh05t0:68_6: sasukhumarūpaṃ, tena sukhumarūpena saddhiṃ gahitaṃ viññāṇaṃ, tena sahitadhammasamudāyā
tika-abh05t0:68_7: sasukhuma…pe… dāyā. Ke pana teti āha “dukkhasaccā”tiādi. Kesañcīti nibbānacakkhāyatanādīnaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:68_8: Tīhipi saṅgahehi. Paripuṇṇasaṅgahehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakā.
tika-abh05t0:68_10: rūpakkhandhādayo. Tabbipariyāyenāti vuttavipariyāyena, tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahetabbassa
tika-abh05t0:69_0: Asaṅgāhakesu nibbānaṃ antogadhaṃ, tasmā taṃ anidassanaappaṭighehi asaṅgahetabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:69_1: na hotīti attho. Tenāha “na ca tadeva tassa asaṅgāhaka”nti. “Vedanākkhandhena ye
tika-abh05t0:69_2: dhammā”tiādayo nava pañhā dutiyapañhādayo, te paṭhamapañhena saddhiṃ dasa, nāmarūpapañhādayo
tika-abh05t0:69_3: pana catuvīsatīti āha “sabbepi catuttiṃsa hontī”ti. Rūpakkhandhādivisesakapadanti
tika-abh05t0:69_5: ca pucchanatthanti attho. “Rūpakkhandhenā”tiādi sabbampi vā viññāpetuṃ icchitabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:69_6: vacanaṃ pañhabhāvato pucchā. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pañhā panettha…pe… catuttiṃsa
tika-abh05t0:69_7: hontī”ti. Te hi lakkhaṇato dassitāti te niddhāritadhammā teneva asaṅgahitāsaṅgahitatāya
tika-abh05t0:70_0: Tadevāti eva-saddenāti “tadevā”ti ettha eva-saddena. “Yaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ padaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:70_1: taṃ khandhādīhi asaṅgahita”nti ettha “khandhādīhevā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ nippayojanaṃ pakārantarassa
tika-abh05t0:70_2: abhāvato. “Tīhi asaṅgaho”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā “asaṅgahitamevā”ti saṅgahitatānivattanassa
tika-abh05t0:70_3: anadhippetattā. Tadevāti pana icchitaṃ uddhaṭasseva asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāvassa
tika-abh05t0:70_4: avadhāretabbattāti dassento “na kadācī”tiādimāha. Tattha aññassāti anuddhaṭassa.
tika-abh05t0:70_5: Aniyatataṃ dassetīti idaṃ avadhāraṇaphaladassanaṃ. Niyamatoti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti
tika-abh05t0:70_6: idampi eva-kārena siddhamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ vuttaṃ. Yato hi eva-kāro, tato
tika-abh05t0:70_7: aññattha niyamoti. Evaṃpakāramevāti pucchāya uddhaṭappakārameva, yaṃ pakāraṃ pucchāya
tika-abh05t0:70_8: uddhaṭaṃ, taṃpakāramevāti attho. Tassāti asaṅgahitassa. Aññassāti pucchāya anuddhaṭappakārassa.
tika-abh05t0:70_9: Etena yo pucchāya uddhaṭo tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahito, tasseva idha pucchitabbavissajjitabbabhāvo,
tika-abh05t0:70_10: na aññassāti dasseti. Tenāha “pucchāya uddhaṭañhī”tiādi. Āyatanadhātusaṅgahavasena
tika-abh05t0:70_11: cettha rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ aññasahitatā, viññāṇakkhandhādīnaṃ asahitatā ca veditabbā.
tika-abh05t0:71_0: Avasesā vedanādayo tayo khandhā nibbānañca sakalena rūpakkhandhena tesaṃ saṅgaho
tika-abh05t0:71_1: natthīti “saṅgahitā”ti na sakkā vattuṃ, ekadesena pana saṅgaho atthīti “asaṅgahitā
tika-abh05t0:71_2: na hontīti evaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti āha. “Rūpadhammāvā”ti niyamanaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭabhāvāpekkhanti
tika-abh05t0:71_3: dassento “pucchāya…pe… adhippāyo”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ “anuddhaṭā vedanādayopi hi asaṅgahitā
tika-abh05t0:71_4: evā”ti. Etthāti etasmiṃ pañcamanayaniddese. Paṭhame nayeti paṭhame atthavikappe.
tika-abh05t0:71_5: Tathā dutiyeti etthāpi. Rūpaviññāṇehīti asukhumarūpadhammehi viññāṇena cāti ayamettha
tika-abh05t0:71_6: adhippāyoti dassento “oḷārika…pe… attho”ti āha. Kathaṃ pana rūpadhammāti vutte oḷārikarūpasseva
tika-abh05t0:71_7: gahaṇanti āha “rūpekadeso hi ettha rūpaggahaṇena gahito”ti.
tika-abh05t0:72_1: pucchitabbavissajjetabbabhāvena vuttampi kāmaṃ vedanādīheva catūhi asaṅgahitaṃ, taṃ
tika-abh05t0:72_2: pana na cakkhāyatanamevāti dassetuṃ “cakkhāyatanena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yehi dhammehīti
tika-abh05t0:72_3: khandhādīsu yehi. Sabbaṃ dhammajātaṃ teva rūpādike dhamme udāneti pāḷiyaṃ. Kasmā
tika-abh05t0:72_4: panetaṃ udānetīti āha “sadisavissajjanā”tiādi. Paṭhamena udānena. Dveti “bāhirā upādā
tika-abh05t0:72_5: dve”ti ettha vuttaṃ dve-saddaṃ sandhāyāha. Tassa asaṅgahitassa. Yathādassitassāti
tika-abh05t0:75_1: bhājitaṃ, saṃvaṇṇetabbatāya ca padhānabhūtaṃ paccāmaṭṭhaṃ, na rūpakkhandhādipadanti
tika-abh05t0:75_2: dassento “yaṃ labbhati…pe… veditabba”nti vatvā puna “rūpakkhandhādīsu hī”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:75_3: tamatthaṃ vivarati. Tattha na labbhatīti “sampayuttaṃ vippayutta”nti vā gahetuṃ na
tika-abh05t0:75_4: labbhati, alabbhamānampi pucchāya gahitaṃ paṭikkhepena vissajjetuṃ. Paṭikkhepopi
tika-abh05t0:75_5: hi pucchāya vissajjanameva. Tathā hi yamake “yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, tassa
tika-abh05t0:75_6: vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā”ti pucchāya “natthī”ti vissajjitaṃ. Tena panettha rūpadhammesu
tika-abh05t0:75_7: sampayogaṭṭho na labbhatīti ayamattho dassito hoti. Alabbhamānampi sampayogapadaṃ
tika-abh05t0:75_8: gahitanti sambandho. Sabbatthāti rūpakkhandhavedanākkhandhādīsu. Etesanti rūpanibbānānaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:75_9: Visabhāgatāti ataṃsabhāgatā. Ekuppādādibhāvo hi sampayoge sabhāgatā, na saṅgahe viya
tika-abh05t0:75_10: samānasabhāgatā, tasmā ekuppādādibhāvarahitānaṃ rūpanibbānānaṃ sā ekuppādāditā visabhāgatā
tika-abh05t0:75_11: vuttā. Tadabhāvatoti tassā visabhāgatāya ekuppādāditāya abhāvato. Vippayogopi nivārito
tika-abh05t0:75_12: eva hoti, visabhāgo bhāvo vippayogoti vuttovāyamatthoti. “Catūsu hī”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:75_13: pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Tattha tesaṃ tehīti ca arūpakkhandhe eva parāmasati. Visabhāgatā
tika-abh05t0:75_14: ca hoti rūpanibbānesu avijjamānattāti attho. Tenāha “na ca rūpekadesassā”tiādi. Tenevāti
tika-abh05t0:76_0: Tīhi viññāṇadhātūhīti ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūhi vippayutte anārammaṇamissake rūpadhammamissake
tika-abh05t0:76_1: dhamme dīpeti rūpabhavoti yojanā. Pañcahīti cakkhuviññāṇādīhi pañcahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
tika-abh05t0:76_2: Ekāya manodhātuyā. Na sampayutteti na sampayutte eva. Tathā hi “vippayutte ahonte
tika-abh05t0:76_3: sattahipi sampayutte sattapi vā tā”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāti vippayuttatāpaṭikkhepena. Tāhīti
tika-abh05t0:76_4: sattaviññāṇadhātūhi. Sampayutte dīpentīti sampayutte dīpentiyeva, na sampayutte evāti
tika-abh05t0:76_5: evamavadhāraṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Sampayutte vedanādike. Sampayuttavippayuttabhāvehi
tika-abh05t0:76_6: navattabbaṃ, taṃyeva viññāṇadhātusattakaṃ. Sampayuttabhāvena navattabbāni sampayuttanavattabbāni,
tika-abh05t0:77_0: Yadi evanti yadi anārammaṇamissānaṃ dhammānaṃ vippayogo natthi. Anārammaṇamissobhayadhammāti
tika-abh05t0:77_2: eva, na arūpakkhandhamattena. Arūpakkhandheyeva pana sandhāya “tehi dhammehi ye dhammā
tika-abh05t0:77_3: vippayuttā”ti vuttanti nāyaṃ dosoti dasseti. Tadekadesāti “anārammaṇamissā”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:77_4: vuttadhammasamudāyassa ekadesā. Tadekadesaññasamudāyāti tasseva yathāvuttassa samudāyassa
tika-abh05t0:77_5: ekadesā hutvā aññesaṃ avayavānaṃ rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ samudāyabhūtā. Vibhāgābhāvatoti
tika-abh05t0:77_6: bhedābhāvato. Bhedoti cettha accantabhedo adhippeto. Na hi samudāyāvayavānaṃ sāmaññavisesānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:77_7: viya accantabhedo atthi bhedābhedayuttattā. Tesaṃ accantabhedameva hi sandhāya “samudāyantogadhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:77_8: ekadesānaṃ na vibhāgo atthī”ti saṅgahepi vuttaṃ. Tenāti avibhāgasabbhāvato sabhāgavisabhāgattābhāvena.
tika-abh05t0:77_9: Tesanti anārammaṇamissakasabbaviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ. Te ca akusalābyākatā. Tesanti kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:77_10: Tasmāti yasmā vibhattasabhāvānaṃ na tesaṃ samudāyekadesādibhāvo, tasmā. Yasmā pana
tika-abh05t0:77_11: kusalādayo eva khandhādayoti khandhādiāmasanena samudāyekadesādibhāvo āpanno evāti
tika-abh05t0:77_12: vuttanayena vippayogābhāvo hoti, tasmā taṃ pariharanto “khandhādīni anāmasitvā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t0:77_13: Tesanti kusalādīnaṃ. Aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā “kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t0:78_0: Chattiṃsāya piṭṭhidukapadesu vīsati dukapadāni imasmiṃ naye labbhanti, avasiṭṭhāni
tika-abh05t0:78_1: soḷasevāti āha “soḷasāti vattabba”nti. Tato eva “tevīsapadasata”nti ettha “tevīsa”nti
tika-abh05t0:78_2: idañca “ekavīsa”nti vattabbanti yojanā. Sabbatthāti sabbapañhesu. Ekakālekasantānānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:78_4: āha “kālasantāna…pe… dhātūna”nti. Ekadesasammissāti cittiddhipādādinā attano ekadeseneva
tika-abh05t0:78_5: khandhantarādīhi sammissā iddhipādādayo, anārammaṇehi rūpanibbānehi ca asammissā.
tika-abh05t0:78_8: vibhattā eva samudayasaccādayo sampayogīvippayogībhāvena, rūpakkhandhādayo vippayogībhāvena
tika-abh05t0:78_9: gahitāti yojanā. Tehi samudayasaccādīhi. Te saññākkhandhādayo. Kehici sahuppajjanārahehi
tika-abh05t0:78_10: ekadesantarehi vibhattehi. Na hi saṅkhārakkhandhādipariyāpannattepi samudayasaccādayo
tika-abh05t0:78_11: maggasaccādīhi sampayogaṃ labhanti. Tesanti vedanākkhandhasaññākkhandhādīnaṃ. Ekuppādā…pe…
tika-abh05t0:78_12: visabhāgatā cāti ekuppādāditāsaṅkhātā yathārahaṃ sabhāgatā visabhāgatā ca. Tena yathāvuttakāraṇena
tika-abh05t0:79_0: Bhinnakālānaṃ samudāyīnaṃ samudāyā bhinnakālasamudāyā. Vattamānā ca ekasmiṃ santāne
tika-abh05t0:79_1: ekekadhammā vattanti. Tasmāti yasmā etadeva, tasmā. Tesaṃ vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ vibhajitabbassa
tika-abh05t0:79_2: ekadesabhūtassa abhāvato. Sukhindriyādīni vedanākkhandhekadesabhūtānipi. Tena vibhāgākaraṇena.
tika-abh05t0:79_3: Yadi samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viññāṇakkhandhassa
tika-abh05t0:79_4: vibhāgaṃ na karonti, atha kasmā “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe… manoviññāṇadhātu soḷasahi
tika-abh05t0:79_5: dhātūhi vippayuttā”ti vuttanti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “khandhāyatana…pe… vippayuttāti
tika-abh05t0:79_6: vutta”nti. Evamevanti yathā dhātuvibhāgena vibhattassa viññāṇassa, evamevaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:80_0: 235. Taṃsampayogībhāvanti tehi khandhehi sampayogībhāvaṃ. Yathā hi samānakālasantānehi
tika-abh05t0:80_2: bhinnasantānehi bhinnakālehi ca tehi tassa vippayuttatāti āha “evaṃ taṃvippayogībhāvaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t0:80_3: na vutta”nti. Visabhāgatānibandhassa vibhāgassa abhāvena avibhāgehi tehi tīhi khandhehi.
tika-abh05t0:80_4: Vibhāge hītiādinā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Vibhāgarahitehīti samānakālasantānehi
tika-abh05t0:80_5: ekacittuppādagatattā avibhattehi vedanākkhandhādīhi na yuttaṃ vippayuttanti vattuṃ.
tika-abh05t0:80_6: Tenāha “vijjamānehi…pe… bhāvato”ti. Tattha vijjamānassa samānassa samānajātikassāti
tika-abh05t0:80_7: adhippāyo. Na hi vijjamānaṃ rūpārūpaṃ aññamaññassa visabhāgaṃ na hoti. Anuppannā
tika-abh05t0:80_8: dhammā viyāti idaṃ visadisudāharaṇadassanaṃ. Yathā “anuppannā dhammā”ti anāgatakālaṃ
tika-abh05t0:80_9: vuccatīti āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ, evaṃ yaṃ āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṃ na hotīti attho. Uddharitabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:80_10: desanāya desetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Vijjamānasseva vijjamānena sampayogo, sampayogārahasseva
tika-abh05t0:81_1: Avijjamānassa…pe… sampayogo natthīti etena pārisesato vijjamānassa ca vijjamānena
tika-abh05t0:81_2: sampayogo dassito. Avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahiteti yathāgahitesu dhammesu tehi
tika-abh05t0:81_3: vippayogīnaṃ avijjamānabhāvadīpake tesaṃyeva visese “arūpabhavo ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi
tika-abh05t0:81_4: soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto”tiādinā gahite teneva ruppanādinā bhedena tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ
tika-abh05t0:81_5: visabhāgatāpi gahitā evāti vippayogo hotīti yojanā. Bhede pana aggahite tena tena
tika-abh05t0:81_6: gahaṇenāti yathāvutte avijjamānatādīpake visese, visabhāge vā aggahite “vedanā, saññā,
tika-abh05t0:81_7: saṅkhārakkhandho tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:81_8: tena tena gahaṇena sabhāgatādīpanena visabhāgatāya aggahitattā sabhāgatāva hoti.
tika-abh05t0:81_9: Tathā ca sati sabhāgatte kā panettha sabhāgatāti āha “vijjamānatāya…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:81_10: Tassāti sabhāgatāya. Tasmāti visabhāgatāya alabbhamānattā, sabhāgatāya ca labbhamānattā.
tika-abh05t0:82_0: 262. Vitakko viyāti savitakkasavicāresu cittuppādesu vitakko viya. So hi vitakkarahitattā
tika-abh05t0:82_1: avitakko vicāramatto ca. Tenāha “koṭṭhāsantaracittuppādesu alīnā”ti. Tato eva so
tika-abh05t0:82_2: appadhāno, dutiyajhānadhammā evettha padhānāti āha “ye padhānā”ti. Tenevāti savitakkasavicāresu
tika-abh05t0:82_3: cittuppādesu vitakkassa avitakkavicāramattaggahaṇena idha aggahitattā, vitakkattike
tika-abh05t0:82_5: Samudayasaccena samānagatikā sadisappavattikā. Itīti iminā kāraṇena. Te avitakkavicāramattā
tika-abh05t0:82_6: dhammā na gahitā, samudayasaccaṃ viya na desanāruḷhā. Na savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikāti
tika-abh05t0:82_7: yojanā. Yadi hi te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikā siyuṃ, “avitakkavicāramattehi
tika-abh05t0:82_8: dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā na kehici
tika-abh05t0:82_9: khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi, ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā”ti vattabbā siyuṃ. Yasmā
tika-abh05t0:82_10: pana te samudayasaccena samānagatikā. Yathā hi ye samudayasaccena sampayuttehi vippayuttā,
tika-abh05t0:82_11: tesaṃ kehici vippayogaṃ vattuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ tehipi. Tathā hi vakkhati “samudayasaccādīnī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:82_12: Dasamo…pe… vuttoti ettha dasamanaye tehi avitakkavicāramattehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:82_13: soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo vutto, osānanaye tehi vippayuttānaṃ aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi
tika-abh05t0:82_14: saṅgaho ca vuttoti tasmā na te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikāti dasseti.
tika-abh05t0:83_0: Vitakkasahitesūti sahavitakkesu. Tesūti avitakkavicāramattesu saha vitakkena dutiyajjhānadhammesu,
tika-abh05t0:83_1: “avitakkavicāramattā”ti gahitesu vuttesūti attho. Sabbepi teti dutiyajjhānadhammā
tika-abh05t0:83_2: vitakko cāti sabbepi te dhammā sakkā vattuṃ. Tathā hi sampayogavippayogapadaniddese
tika-abh05t0:83_3: “avitakkavicāramattā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā”ti
tika-abh05t0:83_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha ekena khandhenāti saṅkhārakkhandhena. So hi samudāyoti “avitakkavicāramattā
tika-abh05t0:83_5: dhammā”ti vuttadhammasamudāyo. Nanu vitakkopettha dhammasaṅgahaṃ gato, so ca vicārato
tika-abh05t0:83_6: aññenapi sampayuttoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “na hi tadekadesassa…pe… hotī”ti. Yathātiādinā
tika-abh05t0:83_7: tamevatthaṃ iddhipādanidassanena vibhāveti. Tassattho – yathā iddhipādasamudāyassa
tika-abh05t0:83_8: ekadesabhūtānaṃ chandiddhipādādīnaṃ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo vutto, taṃsamudāyassa
tika-abh05t0:83_9: na hoti, evaṃ idhāpi vitakkassa aññehi sampayogo avitakkavicāramattassa samudāyassa na hotīti.
tika-abh05t0:84_0: Yadi evaṃ “iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto”tiādi na vattabbanti ce? No na vattabbanti
tika-abh05t0:84_1: dassento “yathā panā”tiādimāha. Tattha tesūti iddhipādesu. Samudāyassāti iddhipādasamudāyassa.
tika-abh05t0:84_2: Tehi vedanākkhandhādīhi sampayuttatā vuttā “iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t0:84_3: Tenāti vicārena. Na hītiādinā yathādhigatadhammānaṃ sampayuttatāya navattabbābhāvaṃ
tika-abh05t0:84_4: udāharaṇadassanavasena vibhāveti. Keci vicikicchā taṃsahagatā ca mohavajjā mohena
tika-abh05t0:84_5: sampayuttā, keci asampayuttā. Mohenāti vicikicchāsahagatamohameva sandhāya vadati.
tika-abh05t0:84_6: Iti iminā kāraṇena na samudāyo tena mohena sampayutto. Añño koci dhammo hetubhāvo
tika-abh05t0:84_7: nāpi atthi, yena hetunā so dassanenapahātabbahetukoti vutto samudāyo. Evanti iminā
tika-abh05t0:84_8: nayena “bhāvanā…pe… yopi sampayuttā”ti navattabbatāya nidassetabbāti attho. Evanti
tika-abh05t0:84_9: yathā dassanenapahātabbahetukasamudāyassa sampayuttatā na vattabbā, evaṃ yena dhammena
tika-abh05t0:84_10: avitakka…pe… siyā, taṃ na natthi. Tasmāti yasmā avitakkavicāramattesu kocipi vicārena
tika-abh05t0:84_11: asampayutto natthi, tasmā. Teti avitakkavicāramattā dhammā. Ekadhammepi…pe… kato
tika-abh05t0:87_0: 306. Tehi samudayasaccādīhi khandhattayakhandhekadesādike sampayutte satipi, sampayuttehi
tika-abh05t0:87_1: ca vippayutte rūpanibbānādike tadaññadhamme satipi vippayogābhāvato. Saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:87_2: vitthārena dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tato lobhasahagatacittuppādato aññadhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:87_3: avasiṭṭhānaṃ kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo na hi atthi
tika-abh05t0:87_4: khandhapañcakādīnaṃ saṅgaṇhanato tesaṃ. Te eva cittuppādāti te lobhasahagatacittuppādā
tika-abh05t0:87_5: eva. Tadaññadhammānanti tadaññadhammānampīti pi-saddalopo daṭṭhabbo. Tathāti iminā
tika-abh05t0:87_6: na ca te eva dhammā aḍḍhadutiyāyatanadhātuyo, atha kho te ca tato aññe cāti imamatthaṃ upasaṃharati.
tika-abh05t0:88_0: Nanu tadaññabhāvato eva tehi itaresaṃ vippayogo siddhoti āha “na cā”tiādi. Tadaññasamudāyehīti
tika-abh05t0:88_1: tato lobhasahagatacittuppādato aññasamudāyehi aññe lobhasahagatā dhammā vippayuttā
tika-abh05t0:88_2: na honti. Kasmā? Samudāye…pe… vippayogābhāvato. Tassattho – samudāyena lobhasahagatatadaññadhammarāsinā
tika-abh05t0:88_3: ekadesānaṃ lobhasahagatadhammānaṃ vippayogābhāvato, tathā ye ekadesā hutvā aññesaṃ
tika-abh05t0:88_4: avayavānaṃ samudāyabhūtā, tesañca samudāyena vippayogābhāvatoti. Anena samudāyena
tika-abh05t0:88_5: avayavassa samudāyassa avayavena ca tassa na vippayogo, avayavasseva pana avayavenāti
tika-abh05t0:88_6: dasseti. Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ samudayasacce vutto vidhi, eseva maggasaccasukhindriyādīsu
tika-abh05t0:88_7: arūpakkhandhekadesattā tesanti dasseti. Niravasesesūti abahikatavitakkesu. Vitakko
tika-abh05t0:88_8: hi samudāyato abahikato. “So hi samudāyo”tiādiko vuttanayo labbhatīti āha “aggahaṇe
tika-abh05t0:89_0: Aññesupi samudayasaccādīsu vissajjanassa…pe… daṭṭhabbaṃ, yato samudayasaccādi idha
tika-abh05t0:89_1: na gahitanti adhippāyo. Sampayuttādhikārato “aññenā”ti padaṃ sampayuttato aññaṃ vadatīti
tika-abh05t0:89_2: āha “asampayuttena asammissanti attho”ti. Idāni byatirekenapi tamatthaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
tika-abh05t0:89_4: vuttalakkhaṇena. Cittanti “cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā”ti pañhaṃ upalakkheti. Sahayuttapadehi
tika-abh05t0:89_5: sattāti “cetasikehi dhammehi ye dhammā”tiādinā cittena sahayutte dhamme dīpentehi
tika-abh05t0:89_6: padehi āgatā satta pañhā. Tiṇṇaṃ tikapadānamaggahaṇena ūnoti katvā. Ye sandhāya “tike
tika-abh05t0:89_7: tayo”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana vedanāpītittikesu pacchimaṃ, vitakkattike paṭhamanti padattayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:90_0: 309. Uddhaṭapadena pakāsiyamānā atthā abhedopacārena “uddhaṭapada”nti vuttāti āha
tika-abh05t0:90_1: “uddhaṭapadena sampayuttehī”ti. Tena ca yathāvuttena uddhaṭapadena. Manena yuttāti
tika-abh05t0:90_2: ettha mananamattattā manodhātu “mano”ti vuttāti āha “manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:93_0: 317. Rūpakkhandhena vippayuttā nāma cattāro arūpino khandhā, tesaṃ aññehi sampayogo
tika-abh05t0:93_1: nāma natthi tādisassa aññassa sampayogino abhāvato. Samudāyassa ca ekadesena sampayogo
tika-abh05t0:93_2: natthīti vuttovāyamattho. Vedanākkhandhādīhi vippayuttaṃ rūpaṃ nibbānañca, tassa
tika-abh05t0:93_3: kenaci sampayogo natthevāti āha “rūpakkhandhādīhi…pe… natthī”ti. Tenāti “rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh05t0:96_0: 319. “Samāsapadaṃ ida”nti vatvā ayaṃ nāma samāsoti dassento “yassa khandhādino”tiādimāha,
tika-abh05t0:96_1: yassa vedanākkhandhādinoti attho. Yaṃ idha sampayuttaṃ vuttanti imasmiṃ navamanaye
tika-abh05t0:96_2: yaṃ dhammajātaṃ sampayuttanti vuttaṃ. Rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu abbhantarabāhiramātikādhammesūti
tika-abh05t0:96_3: niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Tañhi dhammajātaṃ attanā sampayuttena vedanākkhandhādinā sayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:96_4: sampayuttanti niddhāritaṃ. Ayogoti asampayogo. Vakkhati dasamanaye. Tattha hi “rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh05t0:96_5: vedanādayo vippayuttā, tehi rūpakkhandho vippayutto”ti vatvā nibbānaṃ kathanti codanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:96_7: ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta”nti ettha hi yathā sukhumarūpaṃ viya sarūpato anuddhaṭampi
tika-abh05t0:96_8: nibbānaṃ kehicītipadena gahitameva hotīti edisesu ṭhānesu nibbānaṃ sukhumarūpagatikanti
tika-abh05t0:96_9: viññāyati, evamidhāpi “rūpamissakehi vā”ti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi
tika-abh05t0:96_10: asampayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Avikalacatukkhandhasaṅgāhakehi padehi sahavattino
tika-abh05t0:96_11: aññassa sampayogino abhāvato atītānāgatehi ca sampayogo natthevāti tassa ayujjamānataṃ
tika-abh05t0:96_12: dassento “vattamānānameva…pe… arūpabhavādīhīti attho”ti āha. Itareti ye sampayogaṃ
tika-abh05t0:96_13: labhanti, ke pana te rūpena asammissā arūpekadesabhūtā. Tenāha “vedanākkhandhādayo”ti.
tika-abh05t0:99_0: 353. Ye vippayuttena vippayuttabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ aggahitā, tesu keci vippayuttassa
tika-abh05t0:99_1: dhammantarassa abhāvato keci khandhādīhi vippayogasseva asambhavatoti imamatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:99_3: iminā bhinnakālatādivisesavato arūpakkhandhassa vippayuttassa dhammantarassa abhāvamāha,
tika-abh05t0:99_4: anārammaṇamissakabhāvatoti iminā pana sabbassapi. Kāmabhavo upapattibhavo saññībhavo
tika-abh05t0:99_5: pañcavokārabhavoti ime cattāro mahābhavā. Vippayogābhāvatoti vippayogāsambhavato.
tika-abh05t0:99_6: Na hi ye dukkhasaccādīhi vippayuttā, tehi vippayuttānaṃ tesaṃyeva dukkhasaccādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:102_1: “Etena saha sambandho”ti iminā padānaṃ sambandhadassanamukhena “samudayasaccena ye
tika-abh05t0:102_2: dhammā sampayuttā”ti pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā kehicītipadassatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:102_3: kātuṃ “kehicīti etassa panā”tiādimāha. Atthaṃ dassetuṃ āhāti sambandho. Visesetvāti
tika-abh05t0:102_5: visesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, yato te samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti vuttā.
tika-abh05t0:102_6: Sayaṃ attanā sampayutto na hotīti vuttaṃ “attavajjehī”ti. Tena vuttaṃ “cittaṃ na
tika-abh05t0:102_7: vattabbaṃ cittena sampayuttantipi, cittena vippayuttantipī”ti. Sampayogārahehīti
tika-abh05t0:102_8: visesanaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ nibbānanti dve sandhāya kataṃ, na taṇhādike.
tika-abh05t0:105_0: 417. Navamanaye sampayogavisiṭṭhā sampayuttā uddhaṭā, dvādasamanaye ca sampayogavisiṭṭhā
tika-abh05t0:105_1: saṅgahitāsaṅgahitāti ubhayatthāpi sampayogavisiṭṭhāva gahitāti āha “dvādasama…pe… labbhantī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:108_0: 448. Yehīti rūpakkhandhadhammāyatanādīhi. Tīhipi khandhāyatanādisaṅgahehi. Puna yehīti
tika-abh05t0:108_1: arūpabhavādīhi. Oḷārikāyatanāneva honti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehipi asaṅgahitattā. Teti
tika-abh05t0:108_3: asaṅgāhakatte tehi asaṅgahitānaṃ sampayogo na sambhavatīti vedanākkhandhādayo idha
tika-abh05t0:108_4: terasamanaye vissajjanaṃ na ruhanti nārohanti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vedanākkhandhena
tika-abh05t0:108_5: hi khandhādivasena rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti, tesañca sampayogo nāma natthī”ti
tika-abh05t0:109_0: Teti “dukkhasaccādī”ti ādi-saddena vuttadhammā. Asabba…pe… siyuṃ avitakkāvicārādidhammā
tika-abh05t0:109_1: viya. Na tesaṃ vippayogo natthi tabbinimuttassa cittuppādassa sambhavato. Vedanākkhandhena
tika-abh05t0:109_2: asaṅgahitānaṃ anārammaṇamissakattā na “vippayogassa atthitāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā cāha
tika-abh05t0:113_1: Tenāha “pariyosāne naye”ti. Vissajjetabbadhammavivittā pucchā moghapucchā, sā tathābhūtāpi
tika-abh05t0:113_2: vissajjetabbadhammābhāvassa ñāpikā hotīti āha “tesaṃ pucchāya moghattā te na labbhantī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:113_3: Moghā pucchā etassāti moghapucchako. Aṭṭhamo nayo tattha sabbapucchānaṃ moghattā.
tika-abh05t0:113_4: Tena ca sahāti tena aṭṭhamanayena saddhiṃ imasmiṃ osānanaye aṭṭhamanaye ca osānanaye
tika-abh05t0:113_5: ca ete dhammāyatanādayo sabbappakārena na labbhanti. Vippayogassapi abhāvāti tattha kāraṇamāha.
tika-abh05t0:118_0: 1. “Dhātukathaṃ desayitvā anantaraṃ tassa āha puggalapaññatti”nti vutte tattha kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:118_1: samudāgamato paṭṭhāya vibhāvento “dhammasaṅgahe”tiādimāha. Tattha yadipi dhammasaṅgahe
tika-abh05t0:118_2: phassādīnaṃ pathavīādīnañca dhammānaṃ nānānayavicitto anupadavibhāgopi kato, na saṅgaho
tika-abh05t0:118_3: eva, so pana tesaṃ kusalattikādihetudukāditikadukehi saṅgahasandassanatthoti vuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:118_4: “dhammasaṅgahe tikadukādivasena saṅgahitānaṃ dhammāna”nti. Teneva hi taṃ pakaraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:118_5: “dhammasaṅgaho”ti samaññaṃ labhi. Kāmañca dhammasaṅgahepi “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye
tika-abh05t0:118_6: cattāro khandhā hontī”tiādinā khandhādivibhāgo dassito, so pana na tathā sātisayo,
tika-abh05t0:118_7: yathā vibhaṅgapakaraṇeti sātisayaṃ taṃ gahetvā āha “vibhaṅge khandhādivibhāgaṃ dassetvā”ti,
tika-abh05t0:118_8: yato taṃ “vibhaṅgo”tveva paññāyittha. Dhātukathāyāti ādhāre bhummaṃ, tathā “dhammasaṅgahe
tika-abh05t0:118_10: taṃsamudāyabhūtāni pakaraṇāni yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti. Karaṇavacanaṃ vā etaṃ, dhātukathāya
tika-abh05t0:119_0: Ettha ca abhiññeyyadhamme desento desanākusalo bhagavā tikadukavasena tāva nesaṃ
tika-abh05t0:119_1: saṅgahaṃ dassento dhammasaṅgaṇiṃ desetvā saṅgahapubbakattā vibhāgassa tadanantaraṃ
tika-abh05t0:119_2: khandhādivasena vibhāgaṃ dassento vibhaṅgaṃ desesi. Puna yathāvuttavibhāgasaṅgahayutte
tika-abh05t0:119_3: dhamme saṅgahāsaṅgahādinayappabhedato dassento dhātukathaṃ desesi tassā abbhantarabāhiramātikāsarīrakattā.
tika-abh05t0:119_4: Na hi sakkā khandhādike kusalādike ca vinā saṅgahāsaṅgahādinayaṃ netunti. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:119_5: “tathāsaṅgahitavibhattāna”nti. Evaṃ saṅgahato vibhāgato pabhedato ca dhammānaṃ desanā
tika-abh05t0:119_6: yassā paññattiyā vasena hoti, yo cāyaṃ yathāvuttadhammupādāno puggalavohāro, tassa
tika-abh05t0:119_7: ca samayavimuttādivasena vibhāgo, taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvetuṃ puggalapaññatti desitāti
tika-abh05t0:120_1: satto poso”tiādinā khandhe upādāya. Paññāpanaṃ yāya tajjāupādādibhedāya paññattiyā
tika-abh05t0:120_2: hoti, taṃ paññattiṃ. Pabhedatoti khandhādisamayavimuttādivibhāgato. Yāya paññattiyā
tika-abh05t0:120_3: sabhāvato upādāya ca paññāpananti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “tattha ye dhamme”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t0:120_4: Tattha asabhāvapaññattiyāpi mūlabhūtaṃ upādānaṃ sabhāvadhammo eva, kevalaṃ pana tesaṃ
tika-abh05t0:120_5: pavattiākārabhedasannissayato visesoti dassento “ye dhamme…pe… hotī”ti āha. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:120_6: pubbāpariyabhāvena pavattamāneti iminā pabandhasannissayataṃ dassento santānapaññattiṃ
tika-abh05t0:120_7: vadati, asabhāvasamūhavasenāti iminā sesapaññattiṃ. Tisso hi paññattiyo santānapaññatti
tika-abh05t0:120_8: samūhapaññatti avatthāvisesapaññattīti. Tattha pabandho santāno. Samudāyo samūho.
tika-abh05t0:120_9: Uppādādiko daharabhāvādiko ca avatthāviseso. Tesu asabhāvaggahaṇena vinā pabandhasamūhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:121_0: Tesanti pubbe yaṃ-saddena parāmaṭṭhānaṃ indriyabaddhadhammānaṃ. Tenevāha “aññesañca
tika-abh05t0:121_3: pāṭho. Tattha samūhasabhāvoti sabhāvasantānaṃ avatthāvisesavidhuraṃ samūhavasena
tika-abh05t0:121_4: lakkhaṇamevāha. Tathā hi khandhapaññattiyāpi sabhāvapaññattitā vuttā. Tāyāti āyatanapaññattiādippabhedāya
tika-abh05t0:121_5: sabhāvapaññattiyā. Vibhattā sabhāvapaññattīti “phasso phusanā”tiādinā vibhattā phassādisabhāvapaññatti.
tika-abh05t0:121_6: Sabbāpīti pi-saddena sabhāvadhammesu sāmaññavasena pavattaṃ kusalādipaññattiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh05t0:121_7: Rūpādidhammānaṃ samūho santānena pavattamāno avatthāvisesasahito ekattaggahaṇanibandhano
tika-abh05t0:121_8: sattoti voharīyatīti so sabhāvadhammo nāma pana na hotīti āha “puggalapaññatti pana
tika-abh05t0:121_9: asabhāvapaññattī”ti. Tāyāti puggalapaññattiyā. Yasmā pana dhammānaṃ pabandho samūho
tika-abh05t0:121_10: ca dhammasannissitoti vattabbataṃ arahati, tasmā “pariññeyyādisabhāvadhamme upādāya
tika-abh05t0:122_1: vuttā. Sabbā paññattiyoti upādāyapaññattikiccapaññattiādayo sabbā paññattiyo. Yadi
tika-abh05t0:122_2: sabbā paññattiyo idha dassitā honti, kathaṃ “puggalapaññattī”ti nāmaṃ jātanti āha
tika-abh05t0:122_3: “khandhādipaññattīsū”tiādi. Aññatthāti dhammasaṅgahādīsu. Ye dhammeti ye khandhādidhamme.
tika-abh05t0:122_4: Paññattiyā vatthubhāvenāti paññāpanassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvena. Adhiṭṭhānañhi paññāpetabbadhammā
tika-abh05t0:122_5: paññāpanassa. Evañca katvā khandhādīhi saddhiṃ puggalo gahito. Ye dhammeti vā ye
tika-abh05t0:122_6: paññattidhamme. Paññāpetukāmoti nikkhipitukāmo vatthubhedato asaṅkarato ṭhapetukāmo.
tika-abh05t0:122_7: Paññattiparicchedanti ca vatthubhedabhinnaṃ paññattibhūtaṃ paricchedaṃ. Evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t0:123_0: Sāmaññappabhedapaññāpanāti sāmaññabhūtānaṃ visesabhūtānañca atthānaṃ paññāpanā. Tesanti
tika-abh05t0:123_1: attha-saddāpekkhāya pulliṅganiddeso. Tatthāti paññāpanāya atthadassanabhūtesu dassanādīsu.
tika-abh05t0:123_4: saññuppādānamevāti āha “bodhanameva nikkhipanā”ti. Bodhanañhi bodhaneyyasantāne bodhetabbassa
tika-abh05t0:123_6: vatvā sādhanantarāmasanena atthantaraparikappāsaṅkā siyāti taṃ nivāretuṃ “yo panāyaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t0:123_7: veditabbo”ti āha. Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti taṃtaṃpaññāpetabbadhammānaṃ. Dassanabhūtāya
tika-abh05t0:123_8: nāmapaññattiyā diṭṭhatāya, ṭhapanabhūtāya ṭhapitatāya. Taṃnimittatanti tassa dassanassa
tika-abh05t0:123_9: ṭhapanassa ca nimittakāraṇataṃ. Nimittañhi kattubhāvena voharīyati yathā “bhikkhā
tika-abh05t0:124_0: Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatatanti vijjamānatādivisesavacanena saha pāṭhānāruḷhataṃ. Vijjamānassa
tika-abh05t0:124_1: satoti vijjamānassa samānassāti imamatthaṃ dassento “vijjamānabhūtassāti attho”ti
tika-abh05t0:124_2: āha. Tathāti saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānassa anupalabbhamānassa. Taṃ pana
tika-abh05t0:124_3: anupalabbhamānataṃ tathā-saddena byatirekavasena dīpitaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yathā
tika-abh05t0:124_5: gahaṇaṃ. Tenākārenāti tena rūpavedanādiākārena avijjamānassa. Aññenākārenāti tato
tika-abh05t0:124_6: rūpavedanādito aññena tabbinimuttena paññāpetabbapaññāpanākārena vijjamānassa. Paññattiduke
tika-abh05t0:124_8: ettha mattaggahaṇaṃ tassa paññattivatthussa na kevalaṃ vijjamānasabhāvatānivattanatthameva,
tika-abh05t0:124_9: atha kho viparītaggāhanivattanatthampīti dassento “anabhinivesena cittenā”ti āha.
tika-abh05t0:124_11: Sace taṃ koci atthīti paṭijāneyya, ayāthāvagahitassa taṃ vācāvatthumattamevassāti
tika-abh05t0:124_12: dassento āha “sābhinivesena…pe… vutta”nti. Uddese niddese ca sattavantaṃ padhānabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:124_13: āgamanaṃ sandhāyāha “sarūpato tissannaṃ āgatata”nti. Guṇabhāvena pana uddhaṃsotapaññāvimuttapāsāṇalekhādiggahaṇesu
tika-abh05t0:124_14: itarāpi tisso paññattiyo imasmiṃ pakaraṇe āgatā eva.
tika-abh05t0:125_1: avilomanena. Ācariyavādāti cettha attanomatiyo veditabbā, aññattha pana aṭṭhakathā
tika-abh05t0:125_2: ca. Yathā ca avirodho hoti, taṃ dassento “tasmā”tiādimāha. Tattha avijjamānattā paññāpetabbamattatthena
tika-abh05t0:125_3: paññattīti etena “avijjamānā paññatti avijjamānapaññattī”ti imaṃ samāsavikappamāha.
tika-abh05t0:125_4: Avijjamānapaññattīti ettha hi dve samāsā avijjamānassa, avijjamānā vā paññattīti
tika-abh05t0:125_5: avijjamānapaññatti. Tesu purimena nāmapaññatti vuttā, dutiyena upādāpaññattiādibhedā
tika-abh05t0:125_6: itarāpi. Sasabhāvaṃ vedanādikaṃ. Tajjaparamatthanāmalābhatoti tajjassa tadanurūpassa
tika-abh05t0:125_7: paramatthassa anvatthassa nāmassa labhanato, anubhavanādisabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ paramatthikassa
tika-abh05t0:125_8: vedanādināmassa labhanattāti attho. Etena visesanivattiattho matta-saddo, tena cāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:125_9: viseso nivattitoti dasseti. Parato labhitabbanti paraṃ upādāya laddhabbaṃ yathā rūpādike
tika-abh05t0:125_10: upādāya sattoti nissabhāvasamūhasantānādi paññattivatthu. Ekattenāti anaññattena.
tika-abh05t0:125_11: Anupalabbhasabhāvatā ñāṇena aggahetabbasabhāvatā, yato te navattabbāti vuccanti.
tika-abh05t0:126_0: Sasūkasālirāsiādiākārena saṃkucitaggo vāsavavāsudevādīnaṃ viya moliviseso kirīṭaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:126_1: so pana makuṭavisesopi hotiyevāti āha “kirīṭaṃ makuṭa”nti. Sabbasamorodhoti sabbāsaṃ
tika-abh05t0:126_3: idaṃ lakkhaṇavacanaṃ. Na hi sabbāpi upanidhāpaññattisaṅkhāvasena pavattā, nāpi sabbā
tika-abh05t0:126_4: saṅkhātabbappadhānā. Dutiyaṃ tatiyantiādikaṃ pana upanidhāpaññattiyā, dve tīṇītiādikaṃ
tika-abh05t0:126_5: upanikkhittapaññattiyā ekadesaṃ upalakkhaṇavasena dassento tassa ca saṅkhyeyyappadhānatāyāha
tika-abh05t0:126_7: dīpeti. So ca saṅkhāvisayo padhānovāti dutiyādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ saṅkhātabbappadhānatā
tika-abh05t0:126_8: vuttā. Yāva hi dasasaṅkhā saṅkhyeyyappadhānāti. Tathā dve tīṇītiādīnampi paññattīnaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:126_9: Saṅkhātabbo pana attho koci vijjamāno, koci avijjamāno, koci saha visuñca tadubhayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:127_1: ca. Sattarathādibhedā upādāpaññatti, dīgharassādibhedā upanidhāpaññatti ca avijjamānapaññatti.
tika-abh05t0:127_4: bhajantīti āha “yathāyogaṃ taṃ taṃ paññatti”nti. Tena vuttaṃ “dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t0:127_6: Tattha tañca saṅkhānanti yaṃ “paṭhamaṃ eka”ntiādikaṃ saṅkhānaṃ, tañca saṅkhāmukhena
tika-abh05t0:127_7: gahetabbarūpaṃ. Ca-saddena saṅkhyeyyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tampi hi paññāpetabbaṃ paññattīti.
tika-abh05t0:127_8: Tassā pana paramatthato abhāvo vuttoyeva. Kiñci natthīti paramatthato kiñci natthi.
tika-abh05t0:127_9: Tathāti iminā avijjamānenaavijjamānabhāvanti etaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Tenāha “na hi…pe… vijjamāno”ti.
tika-abh05t0:128_0: Okāseti avīciparanimmitavasavattīparicchinne padese. So hi kāmādhiṭṭhānato “kāmo”ti
tika-abh05t0:128_1: vuccati. Kammanibbattakkhandhesūti iminā uttarapadalopena kāmabhavaṃ “kāmo”ti vadati.
tika-abh05t0:128_2: Bhaṇanaṃ saddo cetanā vā, taṃsamaṅgitāya tabbisiṭṭhe puggale bhāṇakoti paññattīti
tika-abh05t0:128_4: rūpasaṅkhātena saṇṭhānaṃ gayhatīti tassa tena abhedopacāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ “rūpāyatanasaṅkhātena
tika-abh05t0:128_5: saṇṭhānenā”ti. Yaṃ abhedopacāraṃ bhindituṃ ajānantā nikāyantariyā rūpāyatanaṃ saṇṭhānasabhāvaṃ
tika-abh05t0:128_6: paṭijānanti. “Kiso puggalo, thūlo puggalo, kiso daṇḍo, thūlo daṇḍo”tiādinā puggalādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:128_7: paññāpanā tathātathāsanniviṭṭhe rūpasaṅkhāte kisādisaṇṭhānapaññatti, na rūpāyatanamatteti
tika-abh05t0:128_8: āha “saṇṭhānanti vā rūpāyatane aggahite”ti. Paccattadhammanāmavasenāti “pathavī phasso”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:128_9: dhammānaṃ taṃtaṃnāmavasena. Kiccapaññattiādivibhāgena pavatto ayampi ācariyavādo
tika-abh05t0:128_10: “kiccapaññatti ekaccā bhūmipaññatti paccattapaññatti asaṅkhatapaññatti ca vijjamānapaññatti,
tika-abh05t0:128_11: liṅgapaññatti ekaccā paccattapaññatti ca avijjamānapaññatti, ekaccā kiccapaññatti
tika-abh05t0:128_12: vijjamānenaavijjamānapaññatti, ekaccā bhūmisaṇṭhānapaññatti vijjamānena vā avijjamānena
tika-abh05t0:128_15: Upādāpaññattiādibhāvo cettha kiccapaññattiādīnaṃ kiccapaññattiādibhāvo ca tāsaṃ yathārahaṃ vibhāvetabbo.
tika-abh05t0:129_1: saṃkhipanavasena, “yāvatā rūpakkhandho”tiādinā khandhānaṃ tato sāmaññato pakārehi
tika-abh05t0:129_2: bhindanavasena ca. Ayaṃ atthoti ayaṃ paññattisaṅkhāto attho. Sāmaññato vā hi dhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:129_3: paññāpanaṃ hoti visesato vā. Viseso cettha attano sāmaññāpekkhāya veditabbo, visesāpekkhāya
tika-abh05t0:129_4: pana sopi sāmaññaṃ sampajjatīti “kittāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti pucchāya
tika-abh05t0:129_6: khandhapaññattī”ti ānetvā yojetabbanti āha “yāvatā…pe… paññattī”ti. “Yāvatā pañcakkhandhā,
tika-abh05t0:129_7: ettāvatā khandhānaṃ khandhapaññatti. Yāvatā rūpakkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho, ettāvatā
tika-abh05t0:129_8: khandhānaṃ khandhapaññattī”ti evamettha pāḷiyojanā kātabbā. Evañhi saṅkhepato pabhedato
tika-abh05t0:129_9: ca khandhapaññatti vissajjitā hoti. Tathā hi imasseva atthassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttabhāvaṃ
tika-abh05t0:129_10: dassento “yattakena…pe… ādikenā”ti āha. Tatthāti tasmiṃ vissajjanassa atthavacane,
tika-abh05t0:129_11: tasmiṃ vā vissajjanapāṭhe tadatthavacane ca. Pabhedanidassanamattanti pabhedassa
tika-abh05t0:129_12: udāharaṇamattaṃ. Avuttopi sabbo bhūtupādiko, sukhādiko ca pabhedo. Taṃ pana bhūmimukhena
tika-abh05t0:130_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatanayena pāḷiyā atthayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ pakārantarena
tika-abh05t0:130_1: dassetuṃ “ayaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ayaṃ vāti vuccamānaṃ sandhāyāha. Etthāti etasmiṃ
tika-abh05t0:130_2: khandhapaññattivissajjane. Idanti idaṃ padaṃ. Yattako…pe… khandhapaññattiyā pabhedoti
tika-abh05t0:130_3: iminā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca khandhānaṃ pabhedaṃ pati paññattivibhāgoti dassitaṃ
tika-abh05t0:130_4: hoti. Tenāha “vatthubhedena…pe… dassetī”ti. Pakaraṇantareti vibhaṅgapakaraṇe. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:130_5: hi sātisayaṃ khandhānaṃ vibhāgapaññatti vuttā. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sammāsambuddhena
tika-abh05t0:130_6: hi…pe… kathitā”ti. Ettha ca paṭhamanaye samukhena, dutiye vatthumukhena paññattiyā
tika-abh05t0:131_0: Esa nayoti iminā khandhapaññattiyā vuttamatthaṃ āyatanapaññattiyādīsu atidisati.
tika-abh05t0:131_3: imassa attho “yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato dvādasāyatanānī”ti etena dassito,
tika-abh05t0:131_6: saṅgahito hotīti “tatrāpi dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ vā ettha pāḷiyā
tika-abh05t0:131_7: atthayojanā – “yāvatā”ti idaṃ sabbehi padehi yojetvā “yattakāni dvādasāyatanāni…pe…
tika-abh05t0:131_8: yattako dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ, tappabhedānañca cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pabhedo, tattako
tika-abh05t0:131_9: āyatanānaṃ āyatanapaññattiyā pabhedo”ti pakaraṇantare vuttena vatthupabhedena āyatanapaññattiyā
tika-abh05t0:132_1: indriyānaṃ indriyapaññattī”ti ayaṃ pāḷipadeso niddesopi samāno pakaraṇantare vatthubhedena
tika-abh05t0:132_2: vuttaṃ khandhādipaññattippabhedaṃ upādāya uddesoyeva hotīti āha “uddesamattenevāti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t0:136_0: 1. Paccanīkadhammānaṃ jhāpanaṭṭhena jhānaṃ, tato suṭṭhu vimuccanaṭṭhena vimokkhoti
tika-abh05t0:136_1: nippariyāyena jhānaṅgāneva vimokkhoti aṭṭhakathāadhippāyo. Ṭīkākārena pana “abhibhāyatanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:136_2: viya sasampayuttaṃ jhānaṃ vimokkho”ti maññamānena “adhippāyenāhā”ti vuttaṃ. Jhānadhammā
tika-abh05t0:136_3: hi sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃyeva paṭipakkhato vimuccanti, na vinā, tathā abhirativasena
tika-abh05t0:136_4: ārammaṇe nirāsaṅkappavattipīti adhippāyo. Yathā vā jhānaṅgānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayabhāvato
tika-abh05t0:136_5: saviseso jhānapariyāyo, evaṃ vimokkhakiccayogato tesaṃ saviseso vimokkhapariyāyo,
tika-abh05t0:136_6: tadupacārena sampayuttānaṃ veditabbo. Paṭhamaṃ samaṅgibhāvatthanti paṭilābhaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh05t0:136_7: “Phusitvā viharatīti paṭilabhitvā iriyatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yena hi saddhiṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t0:136_8: paṭiladdhā nāma hontī”ti tehi sādhetabbasahajātādipaccayalābhoyevettha paṭilābho
tika-abh05t0:136_9: daṭṭhabbo. Yathā phasso yattha uppanno, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusatīti vuccati, evaṃ sampayuttadhammepi
tika-abh05t0:136_10: taṃsabhāvattāti āha “samphassena phusanattha”nti. Tassa “vivaratī”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-abh05t0:136_12: Itare kāraṇattheti “upacārena…pe… phusatiyevā”ti vutte kāraṇatthadīpake atthe. Phusati
tika-abh05t0:136_13: phalaṃ adhigacchati etāyāti kāraṇabhāvassa phusanāpariyāyo veditabbo.
tika-abh05t0:137_0: Paṭhamatthamevāti samaṅgibhāvatthameva. Tāni aṅgānīti iminā jhānakoṭṭhāsabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:137_2: saṅgahitānī”ti. Evaṃ satīti sukhasaṅkhātajhānaṅgato vedanāsomanassindriyānaṃ sesitabbabhāve
tika-abh05t0:137_3: sati. Evañhi nesaṃ phassakatā itarassa phassitabbatāva siyā. Tenāha “sukhassa phusitabbattā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:137_5: sātavisesasaṅkhātena sampayuttehi anuvattanīyabhāvena ca. Upanijjhāyanabhāvopi yathāvuttavedayitādhipateyyaṭṭhavisiṭṭho
tika-abh05t0:137_6: oḷārikassa ārammaṇassa nijjhāyanabhāvo. Abhinnasabhāvopi hi dhammo purimavisiṭṭhapaccayavisesasambhavena
tika-abh05t0:137_7: visesena bhinnākāro hutvā visiṭṭhaphalabhāvaṃ āpajjati. Yathekaṃyeva kammaṃ cakkhādinibbattihetubhūtaṃ
tika-abh05t0:137_8: kammaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “vedayitā…pe… vuttattā”ti. Aṅgānīti nāyaṃ tapparabhāvena bahuvacananiddeso
tika-abh05t0:137_9: anantabhāvato, kevalañca aṅgānaṃ bahuttā bahuvacanaṃ, tena kiṃ siddhaṃ? Paccekampi
tika-abh05t0:137_10: yojanā siddhā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “paccekampi yojanā kātabbā”ti. Yadi “sukhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti
tika-abh05t0:137_11: yojanāyaṃ sesā tayo khandhā honti, sesā tayo, cattāro ca khandhā hontīti vattabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:137_12: siyāti? Na, catūsu tiṇṇaṃ antogadhattā. Tenāha “sabbayojanā…pe… vutta”nti.
tika-abh05t0:138_0: 2. Asamayavimokkhenāti heṭṭhāmaggavimokkhena. So hi lokiyavimokkho viya adhigamavaḷañjanatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:138_1: pakappetabbasamayavisesābhāvato evaṃ vutto. Aggamaggavimokkho pana ekaccāsavavimuttivacanato
tika-abh05t0:138_2: idha nādhippeto. Tenāha “ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”ti. Ekaccehi āsavehi vimuttoti
tika-abh05t0:138_3: diṭṭhāsavādīhi samucchedavimuttiyā vimutto. Asamaya…pe… lābhenāti yathāvuttaasamayavimokkhassa
tika-abh05t0:138_4: upanissayabhūtassa adhigamena. Tato eva sātisayena, ekaccehi kāmāsavehi vimutto vikkhambhanavasenāti
tika-abh05t0:138_5: attho. So eva ekaccasamayavimokkhalābhī yathāvutto samayavimutto asamayavimokkhavisesassa
tika-abh05t0:138_7: Tena sātisayena samayavimokkhena. Tathāvimuttova hotīti ettha iti-saddo hetuattho.
tika-abh05t0:138_8: Yasmā tathāvimutto hoti, tasmā samayavimuttapaññattiṃ laddhuṃ arahatīti pariññātatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:138_9: hetunā patiṭṭhāpeti. Byatirekamukhenapi tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “puthujjano panā”tiādi
tika-abh05t0:138_10: vuttaṃ. Tattha samudācārabhāvatoti samudācārassa sambhavato. Soti jhānalābhī puthujjano.
tika-abh05t0:139_0: Yadi punarāvattakadhammatāya puthujjano samayavimuttoti na vutto, tadabhāvato kasmā
tika-abh05t0:139_1: arahā tathā na vuttoti āha “arahato panā”tiādi. Tadakāraṇabhāvanti tesaṃ vimokkhānaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:139_2: tassa vā samayavimuttibhāvassa akāraṇabhāvaṃ. Sabboti sukkhavipassakopi samathayānikopi
tika-abh05t0:139_3: aṭṭhavimokkhalābhīpi. Bahiabbhantarabhāvā apekkhāsiddhā, vattu adhippāyavasena gahetabbarūpā
tika-abh05t0:140_0: 3. Rūpato aññaṃ na rūpanti tattha rūpapaṭibhāgaṃ kasiṇarūpādi rūpa-saddena gahitanti
tika-abh05t0:140_2: gahitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭipakkhabhūtehi kilesacorehi amūsitabbaṃ jhānameva cittamañjūsaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:140_3: Samādhinti vā samādhisīsena jhānameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:141_0: 4. Attano anurūpena pamādenāti ettha anāgāmino adhikusalesu dhammesu asakkaccaasātaccakiriyādinā.
tika-abh05t0:141_1: Khīṇāsavassa pana tādisena pamādapatirūpakena, tādisāya vā asakkaccakiriyāya. Sā
tika-abh05t0:141_2: cassa ussukkābhāvato veditabbā. Paṭippassaddhasabbussukkā hi te uttamapurisā. Samayena
tika-abh05t0:141_3: samayanti samaye samaye. Bhummatthe hi etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ upayogavacanañca. Anipphattitoti
tika-abh05t0:141_4: samāpajjituṃ asakkuṇeyyato. Assāti “tesañhī”tiādinā vuttassa imassa aṭṭhakathāvacanassa.
tika-abh05t0:142_1: Tattha idhāti “parihānadhammo aparihānadhammo”ti etasmiṃ padadvaye. Tatthāti “kuppadhammo
tika-abh05t0:142_2: akuppadhammo”ti padadvaye. Sati vacananānatte attheva vacanatthanānattanti āha “vacanatthanānattamattena
tika-abh05t0:142_3: vā”ti. Vacanatthaggahaṇamukhena gahetabbassa pana vibhāvanatthassa natthettha nānattaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:143_0: 7-8. Samāpatticetanāti yāya cetanāya samāpattiṃ nibbatteti samāpajjati ca. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:143_1: “tadāyūhanā”ti. Ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā satīti katvā āha “anurakkhaṇā…pe… satī”ti. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:143_2: “ekārakkho satārakkhena cetasā viharatī”ti. Tathā hi sā “kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:144: 11. Aggamaggaṭṭhopi itaramaggaṭṭhā viya anupacchinnabhayattā bhayūparatavohāraṃ labhatīti āha “arahattamaggaṭṭho ca…pe… bhayūparato”ti.
tika-abh05t0:145: 12. Kecīti tihetukapaṭisandhike mandabuddhike sandhāyāha. Tena vuttaṃ “duppaññāti iminā gayhantī”ti. Dubbalā paññā yesaṃ te duppaññāti.
tika-abh05t0:146: 14. Aniyatadhammasamannāgatasseva paccayavisesena niyatadhammapaṭilābhoti āha “yattha…pe… hontī”ti. Tadabhāvāti niyatāniyatavomissāya pavattiyā abhāvā.
tika-abh05t0:147_0: 16. Pariyādiyitabbānīti pariyādakena maggena khepetabbāni. Taṇhādīnaṃ palibudhanādikiriyāya
tika-abh05t0:147_1: matthakappattiyā sīsabhāvo veditabbo, nibbānassa pana visaṅkhārabhāvato saṅkhārasīsatā.
tika-abh05t0:147_3: vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ paññattimattassa sīsabhāvānupapattito taduddhañca saṅkhārappavattisabbhāvato.
tika-abh05t0:147_4: Saha viyāti ekajjhaṃ viya. Etena sama-saddassa atthamāha. Sahattho hesa sama-saddo.
tika-abh05t0:148_0: Idhāti imissā puggalapaññattipāḷiyā, imissā vā tadaṭṭhakathāya. Kilesapavattasīsānanti
tika-abh05t0:148_1: kilesasīsapavattasīsānaṃ. Tesu hi gahitesu itarampi pariyādiyitabbaṃ kilesabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:148_2: pariyādiyitabbatāsāmaññena ca gahitameva hotīti kilesavaṭṭapariyādānena maggassa
tika-abh05t0:148_3: itaravaṭṭānampi pariyādiyanaṃ. Vaṭṭupacchedakena maggeneva hi jīvitindriyampi anavasesato
tika-abh05t0:148_4: nirujjhatīti. Kasmā panettha pavattasīsaṃ visuṃ gahitanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “pavattasīsampī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:148_5: Odhiso ca anodhiso ca kilesapariyādāne sati sijjhamānā paccavekkhaṇavārā tena nipphādetabbāti
tika-abh05t0:148_6: vuttā. Tenevāha “kilesapariyādānasseva vārā”ti. Idāni tamatthaṃ āgamena sādhento
tika-abh05t0:148_8: paccavekkhaṇavārassa cuticittena paricchinnattā vuttaṃ, tasmā cuticittena paricchedakena
tika-abh05t0:149: 17. Tiṭṭheyyāti na upagaccheyya. Ṭhānañhi gatinivatti. Tena vuttaṃ “nappavatteyyā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:151_0: 20. Aggavijjā yassa anadhigatavijjādvayassa hoti, so ce pacchā vijjādvayaṃ adhigacchati,
tika-abh05t0:151_1: tassa paṭhamaṃ adhigatavijjādvayassa viya atevijjatābhāvā yadipi nippariyāyatā tevijjatā,
tika-abh05t0:151_2: paṭhamaṃ adhigatavijjādvayassa pana sā savisesāti dassento “yāya katakiccatā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t0:151_3: Tattha aggavijjāti āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ, aggamaggañāṇameva vā veditabbaṃ. Sā ca tevijjatāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:153_1: dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇena upapattito yuttito samannāgato.
tika-abh05t0:153_2: Eseva nayoti yathā catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato nirodhato ca vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:153_3: pattānaṃ vasena pañca ubhatobhāgavimuttā vuttā, tathā sekkhabhāvaṃ pattānaṃ vasena
tika-abh05t0:154_0: Dassanakāraṇāti iminā “disvā”ti ettha tvā-saddo hetuatthoti dasseti yathā “sīhaṃ
tika-abh05t0:154_1: disvā bhayaṃ hotī”tiādīsu. Dassane sati parikkhayo, nāsatīti āha “dassanāyattaparikkhayattā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:154_2: Purimakiriyāti āsavānaṃ khayakiriyāya purimakiriyā. Samānakālattepi hi kāraṇakiriyā
tika-abh05t0:154_3: phalakiriyāya purimasiddhā viya voharīyati. Tato nāmakāyato muccanato. Yato hi yena
tika-abh05t0:154_4: muccitabbaṃ, taṃ nissito hotīti vuttaṃ “nāmanissitako”ti. Tassāti kāyadvayavimuttiyā
tika-abh05t0:154_5: ubhatobhāgavimuttabhāvassa. Arūpaloke hi ṭhitārahantavasenāyamattho vutto. Tenāha “sutte hī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:155_0: Dvīhi bhāgehīti vikkhambhanasamucchedabhāgehi. Dve vāreti kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanasamucchindanavasena
tika-abh05t0:155_1: dvikkhattuṃ. Kilesehi vimuttoti idaṃ paṭhamatatiyavādānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, itaraṃ dutiyavādassa.
tika-abh05t0:155_2: Arūpajjhānaṃ yadipi rūpasaññādīhi vimuttaṃ taṃsamatikkamādinā pattabbattā, pavattinivārakehi
tika-abh05t0:155_4: vimutta”nti āha. Yañcāpi arūpajjhānaṃ rūpaloke vivekaṭṭhatāvasenapi rūpakāyato vimuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:155_5: taṃ pana rūpapaṭibandhachandarāgavikkhambhaneneva hotīti vikkhambhanameva padhānanti
tika-abh05t0:155_6: vuttaṃ “rūpataṇhāvikkhambhanena rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā”ti. Ekadesena ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:156: 25. “Sattisayo”ti viya samudāye pavatto vohāro avayavepi dissatīti dassento āha “aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena…pe… vuccatī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:157_0: 26. Phuṭṭhānanti phassitānaṃ, adhigatānanti attho. Antoti antasadiso phassanāya parakālo.
tika-abh05t0:157_1: Tadanantaro hi tappariyosāno viya hotīti. Kālavisayo cāyaṃ anta-saddo, na pana kālattho.
tika-abh05t0:157_3: pakāsito viya hoti vibandhavikkhambhanena ālocane pakāsane samatthassa ñāṇacakkhuno
tika-abh05t0:157_4: adhiṭṭhānasamuppādanato. Na tu vimuttoti vimuttoti na vuccateva.
