tika-abh05t0:158_0: 28. Imaṃ pana nayanti “apica tesa”ntiādinā āgatavidhiṃ. Yena visesenāti yena kāraṇavisesena.
tika-abh05t0:158_1: Soti diṭṭhippattasaddhāvimuttānaṃ yathāvutto paññāya viseso. Paṭikkhepo kato kāraṇassa
tika-abh05t0:158_2: avibhāvitattā. Ubhatobhāgavimutto viya, paññāvimutto viya vā sabbathā avimuttassa
tika-abh05t0:158_3: sāvasesavimuttiyampi diṭṭhippattassa viya paññāya sātisayāya abhāvato saddhāmattena
tika-abh05t0:158_4: vimuttabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. Saddhāya adhimuttoti idaṃ āgamanavasena saddhāya adhikabhāvaṃ
tika-abh05t0:158_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ, maggādhigamato panassa paccakkhameva ñāṇadassanaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:159_0: 31. “Sototi ariyamaggassa nāma”nti nippariyāyena taṃsamaṅgī sotāpannoti adhippāyena
tika-abh05t0:159_1: codako “api-saddo kasmā vutto”ti codanaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā “nanū”tiādinā attano adhippāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:159_2: vivarati. Itaro “nāpanna”ntiādinā pariharati. Samannāgato eva nāma lokuttaradhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:159_3: akuppasabhāvattā. Itarehīti dutiyamaggaṭṭhādīhi. So evāti paṭhamaphalaṭṭho eva. Idhāti
tika-abh05t0:159_4: imasmiṃ sattakkhattuparamaniddese. Sotaṃ vā ariyamaggaṃ ādito panno adhigatoti sotāpannoti
tika-abh05t0:159_5: vuccamāne dutiyamaggaṭṭhādīnaṃ nattheva sotāpannabhāvāpatti. Sutte pana sotaṃ ariyamaggaṃ
tika-abh05t0:159_6: ādito mariyādaṃ amuñcitvāva panno paṭipajjatīti katvā maggasamaṅgī “sotāpanno”ti
tika-abh05t0:159_7: vutto. Pariyāyena itaropi tassa aparihānadhammattā sotāpannoti veditabbaṃ. Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇāya
tika-abh05t0:159_8: samudayasaccaṃ viya dukkhasaccampi paccavekkhitaṃ hoti saccadvayapariyāpannattā kilesānanti
tika-abh05t0:161_0: 33. Sajjhānako aparihīnajjhāno kālakato brahmalokūpago hutvā vaṭṭajjhāsayo ce, uparūpari
tika-abh05t0:161_1: nibbattitvā nibbāyatīti āha “anāgāmisabhāgo”ti. Yato so jhānānāgāmīti vuccati. Tenāha “anāvattidhammo”ti.
tika-abh05t0:162: 36. Parayoge tvā-saddo tadanto hutvā “parasaddayoge”ti vutto, appatvāti vuttaṃ hotīti “appattaṃ hutvā”ti iminā vuccati.
tika-abh05t0:163: 37. Tenāti “upahaccā”ti padena. Nanu ca vemajjhātikkamo “atikkamitvā vemajjha”nti iminā pakāsito hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:164_0: 40. Taṇhāvaṭṭasotā taṇhāvaṭṭabandhā. Tassāti sotassa. Sambandhe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:164_1: Uddhaṃsotassa uparibhavūpagatā ekaṃsikāti āha “yattha vā tattha vā gantvā”ti. Tassāti
tika-abh05t0:164_2: uddhaṃsotassa. Tatthāti avihesu. Lahusālahusagatikāti lahukālahukāyugatikā, lahukālahukañāṇagatikā
tika-abh05t0:164_3: vā. Uppajjitvāva nibbāyanakādīhīti ādi-saddena “ākāsaṃ laṅghitvā nibbāyatī”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:164_4: vuttā tisso upamā saṅgaṇhāti. Antarāupahaccaparinibbāyīhi adhimattatā, uddhaṃsotato
tika-abh05t0:164_5: anadhimattatā ca asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnaṃ na veditabbāti yojanā. Te evāti
tika-abh05t0:164_7: upamāvacanena tato mahantatarehi kasmā vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tato mahanta…pe… dassanattha”nti.
tika-abh05t0:165_0: Tenāti “no cassa, no ca me siyā”ti vacanena. Tenāti vā yathāvuttena tassa atthavacanena.
tika-abh05t0:165_1: Imassa dukkhassāti imassa sampati vattamānassa viññāṇādidukkhassa. Udayadassanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:165_2: ñāṇaṃ. Catūhipīti “no cassā”ti catūhi padehi. Yaṃ atthīti yaṃ paramatthato vijjati.
tika-abh05t0:165_3: Tenāha “bhūtanti sasabhāva”nti, bhūtanti khandhapañcakanti attho. Yathāha “bhūtamidanti,
tika-abh05t0:165_4: bhikkhave, samanupassathā”ti. Vivaṭṭamānaso viviccamānahadayo taṇhādisotato nivattajjhāsayo.
tika-abh05t0:165_5: Upekkhako hotīti cattabhariyo viya puriso bhayaṃ nandiñca pahāya udāsino hoti.
tika-abh05t0:166_0: Avisiṭṭheti hīne. Visiṭṭheti uttame. “Bhave”ti vatvā “sambhave”ti vuccamānaṃ avuttavācakaṃ
tika-abh05t0:166_1: hotīti dassento “paccuppanno”tiādimāha. Bhūtameva vuccatīti yaṃ bhūtanti vuccati,
tika-abh05t0:166_2: tadeva bhavoti ca vuccati, bhavati ahosīti vā. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo. Tadāhāro
tika-abh05t0:166_3: tassa bhavassa paccayo. Anukkamena maggapaññāyāti vipassanānukkamena laddhāya ariyamaggapaññāya. Tenāti sekkhena.
tika-abh05t0:169: 63. Kassacīti kassacipi. Kathañcīti kenaci pakārena, vikkhambhanamattenāpīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ajjhattaggahaṇassāti attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattaggāhassa.
tika-abh05t0:170_0: 83. Purimaggahitanti “karissati me”tiādinā cittena paṭhamaṃ gahitaṃ. Taṃ katanti
tika-abh05t0:170_1: taṃ tādisaṃ upakāraṃ. Puññaphalaṃ upajīvanto kataññupakkhe tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ “puññaphalaṃ anupajīvanto”ti.
tika-abh05t0:171: 90. Guṇapāripūriyā paripuṇṇo yāvadattho idha tittoti āha “niṭṭhitakiccatāya nirussukko”ti.
tika-abh05t0:174_0: 91. Sesasaṃvarabhedenāti kāyikavācasikavītikkamato sesena saṃvaravināsena. So pana
tika-abh05t0:174_1: dvāravasena vuccamāno manodvāriko hotīti āha “manosaṃvarabhedenā”ti. Idāni taṃ pakārabhedena
tika-abh05t0:174_2: dassento “satisaṃvarādibhedena vā”ti āha, muṭṭhasaccādippavattiyāti attho. Yaṃ kiñci
tika-abh05t0:174_3: sabhāvabhūtaṃ caritampi “sīla”nti vuccatīti akusalassapi sīlapariyāyo vutto.
tika-abh05t0:175: 94. Samānavisayānanti paṭhamaphalādiko samāno evarūpo visayo etesanti samānavisayā, tesaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:176: 107. Tadattho tappayojano lokuttarasādhakoti attho. Tassa paramatthasāsanassa. Mūlekadesattāti mūlabhāvena ekadesattā.
tika-abh05t0:178: 123. Sīlassa anuggaṇhanaṃ aparisuddhiyaṃ sodhanaṃ apāripūriyaṃ pūraṇañcāti āha “sodhetabbe ca vaḍḍhetabbe cā”ti. Adhisīlaṃ nissāyāti adhisīlaṃ nissayaṃ katvā uppannapaññāya.
tika-abh05t0:179_0: 124. Gūthasadisattameva dasseti, na gūthakūpasadisattanti adhippāyo. Gūthavaseneva
tika-abh05t0:179_1: hi kūpassapi jigucchanīyatāti. Ayañca attho gūtharāsiyeva gūthakūpoti imasmiṃ pakkhe navattabbo siyā.
tika-abh05t0:180_0: 130. Sarabhaṅgasatthārādayo rūpabhavādikāmādipariññaṃ katvā paññapento lokiyaṃ pariññaṃ
tika-abh05t0:180_1: sammadeva paññapentīti āha “yebhuyyena na sakkontī”ti. Asamatthabhāvaṃ vā sandhāya
tika-abh05t0:180_2: no ca paññāpetuṃ sakkontīti vuttanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:183_0: 133. Parenāti aññena, āṇattenāti attho. Āṇattiyā attanā cāti āṇāpakassa āṇattiyā,
tika-abh05t0:183_1: attanā ca āṇattena kataṃ tañca tassa āṇāpakassa yaṃ vacīpayogena katanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:184: 148. Desanāya karaṇabhūtāya. Dhammānanti desanāya yathābodhetabbānaṃ sīlādidhammānaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:185_0: 152. Anantaranti ñāṇassa upaṭṭhitanti anantaraṃ vuttaṃ. Kiṃ pana tanti āha “vacana”nti.
tika-abh05t0:185_1: Lujjatīti idaṃ yena kāraṇena loka-saddo tadatthe pavatto, taṃ dassetīti āha “kāraṇayutta”nti.
tika-abh05t0:186_0: 156. Sahitāsahitassāti kusalasaddayogena sāmivacanaṃ bhummattheti dassento āha “sahitāsahiteti
tika-abh05t0:186_1: attho”ti. Sahitabhāsanena desakasampatti, sahitāsahitakosallena sāvakasampatti veditabbā.
tika-abh05t0:186_2: Parisasampattipi ñāṇasampannassa dhammakathikassa paṭibhānasampadāya kāraṇaṃ hotīti
tika-abh05t0:187: 157. Kusaladhammehīti samathavipassanādhammehi. Catuttho vutto, yo neva saṅghaṃ nimanteti, na dānaṃ deti.
tika-abh05t0:188_0: 166. Yamidaṃ “kālenā”ti vuttanti “yo tattha avaṇṇo, tampi bhaṇati kālena. Yopi tattha
tika-abh05t0:188_1: vaṇṇo, tampi bhaṇati kālenā”ti yaṃ idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tatra tasmiṃ vacane vākye
tika-abh05t0:188_2: yo puggalo “kālena bhaṇatī”ti vutto, so kīdisoti vicāraṇāya tassa dassanatthaṃ “kālaññū
tika-abh05t0:188_3: hotī”tiādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti dassento saṅgahe āhāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:189: 168. Pubbuppannapaccayavipattīti tasmiṃ attabhāve paṭhamuppannapaccayavipatti. Tesaṃ vipatti pavattappaccayavipattīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:190: 173. Tesanti pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ. Vimuttidassanameva hoti vimuttiatthattā taṃdassanassa.
tika-abh05t0:192_0: 178. Nāmakāyoti nāmasamūho. Idameva ca dvayanti sīlasaṃvarapūraṇaṃ, sājīvāvītikkamanañcāti
tika-abh05t0:192_1: idameva dvayaṃ. Tatoti sājīvāvītikkamanato. Kathāya haliddarāgādisadisatāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:193: 179. Iti-saddenāti “dārumāsako”ti ettha vuttaiti-saddena. Evaṃpakāreti imināpi salākādike saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh05t0:195: 187. Khandhadhammesūti saṅkhatadhammesu. Tadalābhenāti maggaphalālābhena. Atthenāti sīlādiatthena.
tika-abh05t0:198_0: 191. Yathā tesu paṭipajjitabbanti tesu pañcasu puggalesu yathārahaṃ upameyyopamādassanamukhena
tika-abh05t0:198_1: hitūpadesapaṭipattiyā yathā aññehi paṭipajjitabbanti attho. Kiriyāvācī ārambha-saddo
tika-abh05t0:198_2: adhippeto, na “ārambhakattussa kasāvapucchā”tiādīsu viya dhammavācīti āha “ārambhakiriyāvācako
tika-abh05t0:203_0: 202. Idaṃ saccābhisambodhādikaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti phalassa hetunā avinābhāvato. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:203_1: “sāma”ntiādi. Anācariyakena attanā uppāditenāti idaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇe vijjamānaguṇakathanaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:203_2: na tabbidhuradhammantaranivattanaṃ tathārūpassa aññassa abhāvato. Tenassa sācariyakatā,
tika-abh05t0:203_3: parato ca uppatti paṭikkhittāti imamatthamāha “tatthā”tiādinā. Tattha sācariyakattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:203_4: parūpadesahetukatā, parato uppatti upadesena vināpi sannissāya nibbattīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh05t0:206_0: 203. Kusalesu dhammesūti ādhāre bhummaṃ, na visayeti dassento “kusalesu dhammesu
tika-abh05t0:206_1: antogadhā”ti āha. Idāni visayalakkhaṇaṃ etaṃ bhummanti dassento “bodhipakkhiyadhammesu
tika-abh05t0:206_2: vā”tiādimāha. “Tadupakāratāyā”ti idaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sādhetabbesūti imamatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:206_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ummujjanapaññāyāti ummujjāpanapaññāya, ummujjanākārena vā pavattapaññāya.
tika-abh05t0:206_4: Tenevāti ummujjanamattattā eva. Yathā hi ñāṇuppādo saṃkilesapakkhato ummujjanaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:206_5: evaṃ saddhuppādopīti āha “saddhāsaṅkhātameva ummujjana”nti. Cittavāroti cittappabandhavāro.
tika-abh05t0:206_7: vuttaṃ. Kasmā? Tenattabhāvena arahattassa aggahaṇato. Tatiyapuggalādibhāvanti ummujjitvā
tika-abh05t0:209_1: ettha pana-saddo visesatthadīpano. Tena “ajjhattasaṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā”ti idaṃ
tika-abh05t0:214_0: Samudāye ekadesā antogadhāti samudāyo tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvena vutto yathā “rukkhe
tika-abh05t0:214_1: sākhā”ti dasseti “kathāsamudāyassā”tiādinā. Tattha kathānanti tisso kathā vādo jappo
tika-abh05t0:214_2: vitaṇḍāti. Tesu yena pamāṇatakkehi pakkhapaṭipakkhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpanapaṭikkhepā honti,
tika-abh05t0:214_3: so vādo. Ekādhikaraṇā hi aññamaññaviruddhā dhammā pakkhapaṭipakkhā yathā “hoti tathāgato
tika-abh05t0:214_4: paraṃ maraṇā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti. Nānādhikaraṇā pana aññamaññaviruddhāpi
tika-abh05t0:214_5: pakkhapaṭipakkhā nāma na honti yathā “aniccaṃ rūpaṃ, niccaṃ nibbāna”nti. Yena chalajātiniggahaṭṭhānehi
tika-abh05t0:214_6: pakkhapaṭipakkhānaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ paṭikkhepārambho, so jappo. Ārambhamattamevettha,
tika-abh05t0:214_7: na atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṃ ārambhaggahaṇaṃ. Yāya pana chalajātiniggahaṭṭhānehi
tika-abh05t0:214_8: paṭipakkhapaṭikkhepāya vāyamanti, sā vitaṇḍā. Tattha atthavikappupapattiyā vacanavighāto
tika-abh05t0:214_9: chalaṃ yathā “navakambaloyaṃ puriso, rājā no sakkhī”ti evamādi. Dūsanabhāsā jātayo,
tika-abh05t0:214_10: uttarapatirūpakāti attho. Niggahaṭṭhānāni parato āvi bhavissanti. Evaṃ vādajappavitaṇḍappabhedāsu
tika-abh05t0:214_11: tīsu kathāsu idha vādakathā “kathā”ti adhippetā. Sā ca kho aviparītadhammatāya patiṭṭhāpanavasena,
tika-abh05t0:214_12: na viggāhikakathābhāvenāti veditabbaṃ. Mātikāṭhapanenevāti uddesadesanāya eva. Ṭhapitassāti
tika-abh05t0:214_13: desitassa. Desanā hi desetabbamatthaṃ vineyyasantānesu ṭhapanato nikkhipanato ṭhapanaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:217_0: Parinibbānameva …pe… vuttaṃ. Abhinnasabhāvampi hi atthaṃ tadaññadhammato visesāvabodhanatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:217_1: aññaṃ viya katvā voharanti yathā “attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhammā”ti. Sāti asaṅkhatā
tika-abh05t0:217_2: dhātu. Karaṇabhāvena vuttā yathāvuttassa upasamassa sādhakatamabhāvaṃ sandhāya. Dhammavādī…pe…
tika-abh05t0:217_3: dubbalatā vuttā tathārūpāya paññāya bhāve tādisānaṃ pakkhabhāvābhāvato. Laddhiyāti
tika-abh05t0:217_5: Suttantehīti devatāsaṃyuttādīhi. Liṅgākappabhedaṃ parato sayameva vakkhati.
tika-abh05t0:218_0: Bhinditvā mūlasaṅgahanti mūlasaṅgītiṃ vināsetvā, bhedaṃ vā katvā yathā sā ṭhitā,
tika-abh05t0:218_1: tato aññathā katvā. Saṅgahitato vā aññatrāti mūlasaṅgītiyā saṅgahitato aññatra. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:218_2: “asaṅgahitaṃ sutta”nti. Nītatthaṃ yathārutavasena viññeyyatthattā. Neyyatthaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatādivasena
tika-abh05t0:218_3: niddhāretabbatthattā. Tīhi ṭhānehīti “sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti evaṃ
tika-abh05t0:218_4: vuttehi tīhi kāraṇehi. Aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitanti ekaṃ pabbajjāsaṅkhātaṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ
tika-abh05t0:218_5: sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ. Aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsūti sabbassapi brahmacariyavāsassa vasena
tika-abh05t0:218_6: “natthi devesu brahmacariyavāso”tiādikaṃ aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. Suttañca aññaṃ
tika-abh05t0:218_7: sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ tato aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu, tassa atthañca aññaṃ
tika-abh05t0:218_8: ṭhapayiṃsūti evamettha yojanā veditabbā. Suññatādīti ādi-saddena aniccatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh05t0:219_0: Gambhīraṃ ekadesaṃ mahāpadesaparivārādiṃ. Ekacce sakalaṃ abhidhammaṃ vissajjiṃsu
tika-abh05t0:219_1: chaḍḍayiṃsu seyyathāpi suttantikā. Te hi taṃ na jinavacananti vadanti. Kathāvatthussa
tika-abh05t0:219_2: savivādattetiādi heṭṭhā nidānaṭṭhakathāya āgatanayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Keci pana puggalapaññattiyāpi
tika-abh05t0:219_3: savivādattaṃ maññanti. “Tatiyasaṅgītito pubbe pavattamānānaṃ vasenā”ti idaṃ kasmā
tika-abh05t0:219_4: vuttaṃ, nanu tatiyasaṅgītito pubbepi taṃ mātikārūpena pavattateva? Niddesaṃ vā sandhāya
tika-abh05t0:219_5: tathā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Aññānīti aññākārāni abhidhammapakaraṇādīni akariṃsu, pavattantānipi
tika-abh05t0:219_6: tāni aññathā katvā paṭhiṃsūti attho. Mañjusirīti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi taṃ nāmaṃ
tika-abh05t0:219_7: piṭakattayaṃ anuvattantehi bhikkhūhi gayhati? Itarehi gayhamānampi vā sāsanikapariññehi
tika-abh05t0:219_8: na sāsanāvacaraṃ gayhatīti katvā vuttaṃ. Nikāyanāmanti mahāsaṅghikādinikāyanāmaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:220: Saṅkantikānaṃ bhedo suttavādīti saṅkantikānaṃ anantare eko nikāyabhedo suttavādī nāma bhijjittha. Sahāti ekajjhaṃ katvā, gaṇiyamānāti attho.
tika-abh05t0:221_0: Uppanne vāde sandhāyāti tatiyasaṅgītikāle uppanne vāde sandhāya. Uppajjanaketi tato
tika-abh05t0:221_1: paṭṭhāya yāva saddhammantaradhānā etthantare uppajjanake. Suttasahassāharaṇañcettha
tika-abh05t0:221_3: vuccati samudāyavohārassa avayavesupi dissanato yathā “paṭo daḍḍho, samuddo diṭṭho”ti
tika-abh05t0:221_4: ca. Te panettha suttapadesā “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādinā āgatā veditabbā.
tika-abh05t0:227_0: 1. Sambarādīhi pakappitavijjā, tathābhisaṅkhatāni osadhāni ca “māyā”ti vuccanti,
tika-abh05t0:227_1: idha pana māyāya āhitavisesā abhūtaññeyyākārā adhippetāti dassento “māyāya amaṇiādayo
tika-abh05t0:227_2: maṇiādiākārena dissamānā māyāti vuttā”ti āha. Saccaññeva saccikaṃ, so eva attho aviparītassa
tika-abh05t0:227_3: ñāṇassa visayabhāvaṭṭhenāti saccikaṭṭho. Tenāha “bhūtaṭṭho”ti. Aviparītabhāvato eva
tika-abh05t0:227_4: paramo padhāno atthoti paramattho, ñāṇassa paccakkhabhūto dhammānaṃ aniddisitabbasabhāvo.
tika-abh05t0:228_0: Atthīti vacanasāmaññenāti “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādīsu “atthī”ti pavattavacanasāmaññena.
tika-abh05t0:228_1: Atthavikappupapattiyā vacanavighāto chalanti vadanti. Patiṭṭhaṃ pacchindantoti hetuṃ
tika-abh05t0:228_2: dūsento, ahetuṃ karontoti attho. Hetu hi paṭiññāya patiṭṭhāpanato patiṭṭhā, taṃ pana
tika-abh05t0:228_3: hetuṃ atthamattato dassento “yadi saccikaṭṭhenā”tiādimāha. Payogato pana dūsanena
tika-abh05t0:228_4: saddhiṃ parato āvi bhavissati. Okāsaṃ adadamānoti yathānurūpaṃ yuttiṃ vattuṃ avasaraṃ
tika-abh05t0:228_5: adento. Atha vā patiṭṭhaṃ pacchindanto, paṭiññaṃ eva parivattentoti attho. Upalabbhati
tika-abh05t0:228_6: puggaloti hi sakavādiṃ uddissa paravādino paṭiññāva na yuttā appasiddhattā visesitabbassa.
tika-abh05t0:228_7: Tenevāha “anupalabbhaneyyato na tava vādo tiṭṭhatīti nivattento”ti. Rūpañca upalabbhati…pe…
tika-abh05t0:228_8: dassetīti etena paravādinā adhippetahetuno viparītatthasādhakattaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh05t0:229_0: Upalabbhamānaṃ nāma hotīti ākārato taṃākāravantānaṃ anaññattāti adhippāyo. Aññathāti
tika-abh05t0:229_1: ākāra, ākāravantānaṃ bhede. Etissāti “tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamaṭṭhenā”ti
tika-abh05t0:229_2: evaṃ vuttāya dutiyapucchāya. Esa visesoti yo yathāvutto dvinnaṃ pucchānaṃ visayassa
tika-abh05t0:229_3: sabhāvākārabhedo, esa dvinnaṃ pucchānaṃ viseso. Sabhāvadhammānaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇena
tika-abh05t0:229_4: abhinnānampi salakkhaṇato bhedoyevāti aññadhammassa aññenākārena na kadācipi upalabbho
tika-abh05t0:229_5: bhaveyya. Yadi siyā, aññattameva na siyāti ruppanādisapaccayādiākārena anupalabbhamānopi
tika-abh05t0:229_6: puggalo attano bhūtasabhāvaṭṭhena upalabbhatevāti vadantaṃ paravādinaṃ pati “yo saccikaṭṭho”tiādi
tika-abh05t0:229_7: codanā anokāsāti dassento āha “yathā pana…pe… niggaho ca na kātabbo”ti. Tattha niggahoti
tika-abh05t0:229_8: “ājānāhi niggaha”nti evaṃ vuttaniggaho, parājayāropanena paravādino niggaṇhananti attho.
tika-abh05t0:230_0: Svāyaṃ pana yasmā tassa vādāparādhahetuko, tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dosāparādhapariyāyehi
tika-abh05t0:230_1: vibhāvito. Avajānanañhettha niggahaṭṭhānaṃ. Tathā hi paṭiññāhāni, paṭiññāntaraṃ,
tika-abh05t0:230_2: paṭiññāvirodho, paṭiññāsaññāso, hetvantaraṃ, atthantaraṃ, niratthakaṃ, aviññātatthaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:230_3: asambandhatthaṃ, appattakālaṃ, ūnaṃ, adhikaṃ, punaruttaṃ, ananubhāsanaṃ, aviññātaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:230_4: appaṭibhā, vikkhepo, matānuññā, anuyuñjitabbassa upekkhanaṃ, ananuyuñjitabbassa anuyogo,
tika-abh05t0:230_5: apasiddhantaraṃ, hetvābhāsā cāti dvāvīsati niggahaṭṭhānāni ñāyavādino vadanti.
tika-abh05t0:231_2: paṭiññāsaññāso. Avisesavutte hetumhi paṭisiddhe visesahetukathanaṃ hetvantaraṃ. Adhikatatthānupayogiatthakathanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:231_3: atthantaraṃ. Mātikāpāṭho viya atthahīnaṃ niratthakaṃ. Tikkhattuṃ vuttampi sakkhipaṭivādīhi
tika-abh05t0:231_4: aviditaṃ aviññātatthaṃ. Pubbāparavasena sambandharahitaṃ asambandhatthaṃ. Avayavavipallāsavacanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:231_5: appattakālaṃ. Avayavavikalaṃ ūnaṃ. Adhikahetūdāharaṇaṃ adhikaṃ. Ṭhapetvā anuvādaṃ
tika-abh05t0:231_6: saddatthānaṃ punappunaṃ vacanaṃ atthāpannavacanañca punaruttaṃ. Parisāya viditassa
tika-abh05t0:231_7: tīhi vuttassa apaccudāhāro ananubhāsanaṃ. Yaṃ vādinā vuttaṃ parisāya viññātaṃ paṭivādinā
tika-abh05t0:231_8: duviññātaṃ, taṃ aviññātaṃ. Taṃvādinā vattabbe vutte paravādino paṭivacanassa anupaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:231_9: appaṭibhā. Kiccantarappasaṅgena kathāvicchindanaṃ vikkhepo. Attano dosānujānanena
tika-abh05t0:231_10: parapakkhassa dosappasañjanaṃ paramatānujānanaṃ matānuññā. Niggahappattassa niggaṇhanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:231_11: anuyuñjitabbassa upekkhanaṃ. Sampattaniggahassa aniggahaṭṭhāne ca niggaṇhanaṃ anuyuñjitabbassa
tika-abh05t0:231_12: anuyogo. Ekaṃ siddhantamanujānitvā aniyamato tadaññasiddhantakathāppasañjanaṃ apasiddhantaraṃ.
tika-abh05t0:231_13: Asiddhā anekantikā viruddhā ca hetvābhāsā, hetupatirūpakāti attho. Tesañca kathanaṃ niggahaṭṭhānanti.
tika-abh05t0:232_0: Imesu dvāvīsatiyā niggahaṭṭhānesu idaṃ paṭiññāya apanayanato sayameva paccakkhānato
tika-abh05t0:232_1: paṭiññāsaññāso nāma niggahaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenevāha “avajānaneneva niggahaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:232_2: Asiddhattāti etena paccakkhato anumānato ca puggalassa anupalabbhamāha. Na hi so
tika-abh05t0:232_3: paccakkhato upalabbhati. Yadi upalabbheyya, vivādo eva na siyā, anumānampi tādisaṃ
tika-abh05t0:232_4: natthi, yena puggalaṃ anumineyyuṃ. Tathā hi taṃ sāsaniko puggalavādī vadeyya “puggalo
tika-abh05t0:232_5: upalabbhati, atthi puggalo”ti bhagavatā vuttattā rūpavedanādi viya. Yañhi bhagavatā
tika-abh05t0:232_6: “atthī”ti yadi vuttaṃ, taṃ paramatthato atthi yathā taṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā
tika-abh05t0:232_7: viññāṇaṃ. Yaṃ pana paramatthato natthi, na taṃ bhagavatā “atthī”ti vuttaṃ yathā taṃ
tika-abh05t0:232_8: pakativādiādīnaṃ pakatiādīti, taṃ micchā. Ettha hi yadi vohārato puggalassa atthibhāvo
tika-abh05t0:232_9: adhippeto, siddhaṃ sādhanaṃ, atha paramatthato, asiddho hetu tathā avuttattā. Viruddho
tika-abh05t0:233_0: Yaṃ pana bāhirakā puthu aññatitthiyā vadanti. Attheva ca paramatthato attā ñāṇābhidhānassa
tika-abh05t0:233_1: pavattiyā nimittabhāvato rūpādi viya. Atha vā attātirittapadatthantaro rūpakkhandho
tika-abh05t0:233_2: khandhasabhāvattā yathā taṃ itarakkhandhā. Yañhettha padatthantaraṃ, so puggaloti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:234_0: Ettha ca purimassa hetuno paññattiyā anekantikatā asiddhatā ca. Na hi asato sakavādinaṃ
tika-abh05t0:234_1: pati paramatthato ñāṇābhidhānappavattiyā nimittabhāvo sijjhati. Vohārato ce, tadasiddhasādhanatā
tika-abh05t0:234_2: rūpādisabhāvavinimuttarūpopi puggalo na hotīti evamādiviruddhatthatā. Pacchimassa
tika-abh05t0:234_3: pana hetuno sādhetabbatthasāmaññapariggahe siddhasādhanatā, rūpakkhandhato padatthantarato
tika-abh05t0:234_4: paramatthantarabhūtavedanādisambhavassa icchitattā ca. Tabbisesapariggahe ca sakavādinaṃ
tika-abh05t0:234_6: rūpakkhandho na hoti itarakkhandhā viyāti viruddhatthatā ca.
tika-abh05t0:235_0: Yaṃ pana kāṇādā “sukhādīnaṃ nissayabhāvato”ti anumānaṃ vadanti, te idaṃ vattabbā
tika-abh05t0:235_1: – kiṃ sukhādīnaṃ attani paṭibaddhaṃ yato sukhādinissayatāya attā anumīyati. Yadi
tika-abh05t0:235_2: uppādo, evaṃ sante sabbepi sukhādayo ekato eva bhaveyyuṃ kāraṇassa sannihitabhāvato
tika-abh05t0:235_3: aññanirapekkhato ca. Atha aññampi kiñci indriyādikāraṇantaramapekkhitabbaṃ, tadeva
tika-abh05t0:235_4: hotu kāraṇaṃ, kimaññena adiṭṭhasāmatthiyena parikappitena payojanaṃ. Atha pana tesaṃ
tika-abh05t0:235_5: attādhīnā vuttīti vadeyyuṃ, evampi na sijjhati udāharaṇābhāvato. Na hi rūpādivinimutto
tika-abh05t0:235_6: tādiso koci sabhāvadhammo sukhādisannissayabhūto atthi, yato attano attatthasiddhiyā
tika-abh05t0:235_7: udāharaṇaṃ apadiseyyuṃ. Iminā nayena asamāsapadābhidheyyattātiādīnampi ayuttattā
tika-abh05t0:235_8: nivāretabbā. Tathā “aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā”ti iminā ca pakatiaṇuādīnampi
tika-abh05t0:235_9: bāhiraparikappitānaṃ asiddhatā vuttāvāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ pana tesaṃ asiddhīti?
tika-abh05t0:235_10: Pamāṇena anupalabbhanato. Na hi paccakkhato pakati siddhā kapilassapi isino tassa
tika-abh05t0:236_0: Yaṃ pana “atthi padhānaṃ bhedānaṃ anvayadassanato sakalakalāpamattaṃ viyā”ti te anumānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:236_1: vadanti. Iminā hi bhedānaṃ satvādīnaṃ vijjamānapadhānatā paṭiññātā. Ettha ca vuccate
tika-abh05t0:236_2: – sakalādīnaṃ padhānaṃ tabbibhāgehi kiṃ aññattaṃ, udāhu anaññanti, kiñcettha yadi
tika-abh05t0:236_3: aññattaṃ, sabbo loko padhānamayoti samayavirodho siyā, saṇṭhānabhedena aññattha paṭijānanato
tika-abh05t0:236_4: na dosoti ce? Taṃ na, valayakaṭakādisaṇṭhānabhedepi kanakābhedadassanato. Na hi saṇṭhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:236_5: vatthubhedanimittaṃ tassa anupādānattā. Yaṃ yassa bhedanimittaṃ, na taṃ tassa anupādānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:236_6: yathā suvaṇṇamattikādighaṭādīnaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭo mattikāghaṭo koseyyapaṭo kappāsapaṭoti
tika-abh05t0:236_7: ca sādhetabbadhammarahitañca udāharaṇaṃ. Na hi padhānekakāraṇapubbakattaṃ sakalādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:236_8: pakativādino siddhaṃ, nāpi kāpilānaṃ kathañci aññattānujānanato. Anaññatte pana udāharaṇābhāvo.
tika-abh05t0:236_9: Na hi tadeva sādhetabbaṃ tadeva ca udāharaṇaṃ yuttaṃ, anvayadassanampi asiddhaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:236_10: Na hi tadeva tena anvitaṃ yujjati. Padhānena anvayadassanampi asiddhaṃ paravādinoti
tika-abh05t0:236_11: guṇassa padhānassa ananujānanato. Atha yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ padhānaṃ “padhīyati ettha
tika-abh05t0:236_12: phala”nti, evampi asiddhameva kāraṇe phalassa atthibhāvānanujānanato, hetuno ca asiddhanissayatāparābhimatabhedānanujānanato.
tika-abh05t0:236_13: Atha visesena kāraṇāyattavuttitā phalassa sādhīyati, na kiñci viruddhaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:237_0: Apica pakativādino “satvarajatamasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ guṇānaṃ samabhāvo pakati, sā
tika-abh05t0:237_1: ca niccā satvādivisamasabhāvato aniccato mahatādivikārato anaññā”ti paṭijānanti.
tika-abh05t0:237_2: Sā tesaṃ vuttappakārā pakati na sijjhati tato viruddhasabhāvato vikārato anaññattā.
tika-abh05t0:237_3: Na hi assassa visāṇaṃ dīghaṃ, tañca rassato govisāṇato anaññanti vuccamānaṃ sijjhati.
tika-abh05t0:237_4: Kiñca bhiyyo? Tiṇṇaṃ ekabhāvābhāvato. Satvādiguṇattayato hi pakatiyā anaññattaṃ icchantānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:237_5: tesaṃ satvādīnampi pakatiyā anaññattaṃ āpajjati, na ca yuttaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekabhāvoti.
tika-abh05t0:237_6: Evampi pakati na sijjhati. Kathaṃ? Anekadosāpattito. Yadi hi byattasabhāvato vikārato
tika-abh05t0:237_7: abyattasabhāvā pakati anaññā, evaṃ sante hetumantatā aniccatā abyāpitā sakiriyatā
tika-abh05t0:237_8: anekatā nissitatā liṅgatā sāvayavatā paratantratāti evamādayo aneke dosā pakatiyā
tika-abh05t0:237_9: āpajjanti, na jātivikārato anaññā paṭijānitabbā. Tathā ca sati samayavirodhoti kappanāmattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:238_0: Pakatiyā ca asiddhāya taṃnimittakabhāvena vuccamānā mahatādayopi asiddhā eva. Yathā
tika-abh05t0:238_2: Etesu hi issaro tāva na sijjhati upakārassa adassanato. Sattānañhi jātiyaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:238_3: bījakhettabhāvena kammassa hīnatādivibhāgakaraṇena, tato parañca utuāhārānaṃ brūhanupatthambhanena,
tika-abh05t0:238_4: indriyānaṃ dassanādikiccasādhanena upakāro dissati, na, evamissarassa. Hīnatādivibhāgakaraṇamissarassāti
tika-abh05t0:238_5: ce? Taṃ na, asiddhattā. Yathāvutto upakāraviseso issaranimmito, na kammunāti sādhanīyametaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:238_6: Itaratrāpi samānametanti ce? Na, kammato phalaniyamasiddhattā. Sati hi katūpacite
tika-abh05t0:238_7: kammasmiṃ tattha yaṃ akusalaṃ, tato hīnatā, yaṃ kusalaṃ, tato paṇītatāti siddhametaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:238_8: Issaravādināpi hi na sakkā kammaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ.
tika-abh05t0:239_0: Apicetassa lokavicittassa issaranimmānabhāve bahū dosā sambhavanti. Kathaṃ? Yadi
tika-abh05t0:239_1: sabbamidaṃ lokavicittaṃ issaranimmitaṃ, saheva vacanena pavattitabbaṃ, na kamena.
tika-abh05t0:239_2: Na hi sannihitakāraṇānaṃ phalānaṃ kamena uppatti yuttā, kāraṇantarāpekkhāya issarassa
tika-abh05t0:239_3: sāmatthiyahāni. Cakkhādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīsu kāraṇabhāvo na yutto. Karotīti hi kāraṇanti.
tika-abh05t0:239_4: Issaro eva ca kārakoti sabbakāraṇānaṃ kāraṇabhāvahāni. Yehi puthuvisesehi issaro
tika-abh05t0:239_5: pasīdeyya, tesañca sayaṃkāratā āpajjati, tathā sabbesaṃ hetukānaṃ kāraṇabhāvo. Yañjetaṃ
tika-abh05t0:239_6: nimmānaṃ, tañcassa attadatthaṃ vā siyā, paratthaṃ vā siyā. Attadatthatāyaṃ attano
tika-abh05t0:239_7: issarabhāvahāni akatakiccatāya isitāvasitābhāvato. Tena vā nimmitena yaṃ attano kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:239_8: taṃ kasmā sayameva na karoti. Paratthatāyaṃ pana paro nāmettha loko evāti kimatthiyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:239_9: tassa nirayādirogādivisādinimmānaṃ. Yā cassa issaratā, sā sayaṃkatā vā siyā paraṃkatā
tika-abh05t0:239_10: vā ahetukā vā. Tattha sayaṃkatā ce, tato pubbe anissarabhāvāpatti. Paraṃkatā ce,
tika-abh05t0:239_11: pacchāpi anissarabhāvāpatti sauttaratā ca siyā. Ahetukā ce, na kassaci anissaratāti
tika-abh05t0:240_0: Yathā ca issaro, evaṃ pajāpati puriso ca. Nāmamattameva hettha viseso. Tehi vādīhi
tika-abh05t0:240_1: pakappitaṃ yadidaṃ “pajāpati puriso”ti. Taṃnimittakaṃ pana lokappavattiṃ icchantānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:240_2: pajāpativāde purisavāde ca issaravāde viya dosā asiddhi ca vidhātabbā. Yathā cete
tika-abh05t0:240_3: issarādayo, evaṃ kālopi asiddho lakkhaṇābhāvato. Paramatthato hi vijjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:240_4: sabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ upalabbhati. Yathā pathaviyā kathinatā, na evaṃ kālassa,
tika-abh05t0:240_5: tasmā natthi paramatthato kāloti. Kālavādī panāha “vattanālakkhaṇo kālo”ti. So vattabbo
tika-abh05t0:240_6: “kā panāyaṃ vattanā”ti. So āha “samayamuhuttādīnaṃ pavattī”ti. Tampi na, rūpādīhi
tika-abh05t0:240_7: atthantarabhāvena aniddhāritattā. Paramatthato hi aniddhāritasabhāvassa vattanālakkhaṇatāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:241_0: Yaṃ pana vadanti kāṇādā “aparasmiṃ aparaṃ yugapadi ciraṃ khippamiti kālaliṅgānīti
tika-abh05t0:241_1: liṅgasabbhāvato atthi kālo”ti, taṃ ayuttaṃ liṅgino anupalabbhamānattā. Siddhasambandhesu
tika-abh05t0:241_2: hi liṅgesu liṅgamattaggahaṇena liṅgini avabodho bhaveyya. Na ca kenaci aviparītacetasā
tika-abh05t0:241_3: tena liṅgena saha kadāci kālasaṅkhāto liṅgī gahitapubboti. Ato na yuttaṃ “liṅgasabbhāvato
tika-abh05t0:241_4: atthi kālo”ti. “Aparasmiṃ apara”ntiādikassa visesassa nimittabhāvato yuttanti ce?
tika-abh05t0:241_5: Na, paṭhamajātatādinimittakattā tassa. Na ca paṭhamajātatādi nāma koci dhammo atthi
tika-abh05t0:241_6: aññatra samaññāmattatoti nattheva paramatthato kālo. Kiñca bhiyyo, bahūnaṃ ekabhāvāpattito.
tika-abh05t0:241_7: Atītādivibhāgena hi lokasamaññāvasena bahū kālabhedā. Tvañcetaṃ ekaṃ vadasīti bahūnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:241_8: ekabhāvābhāvato nattheva paramatthato kālo. Tathā ekassa anekabhāvāpattito. Yo hi
tika-abh05t0:241_9: ayaṃ ajja vattamānakālo, so hiyyo anāgato ahosi, sve atīto bhavissati. Hiyyo ca vattamāno
tika-abh05t0:241_10: ajja atīto ahosi, tathā sve vattamānopi aparajja. Na cekasabhāvassa anekasabhāvatā
tika-abh05t0:241_11: yuttāti asiddho paramatthato kālo. Dhammappavattiṃ pana upādāya kappanāmattasiddhāya
tika-abh05t0:242_0: Sabhāvaniyatiyadicchādayopi asiddhā. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Lakkhaṇābhāvā. Na hi sabhāvato niyatiyadicchā
tika-abh05t0:242_1: sambhavati. Aññathā evaṃvidho koci bhāvo atthi ce, tesaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātena lakkhaṇena
tika-abh05t0:242_2: bhavitabbaṃ, patiṭṭhāpakahetunā ca na catthi. Kevalaṃ panete vādā vimaddiyamānā ahetuvāde
tika-abh05t0:242_3: eva tiṭṭhanti, na cāhetukaṃ lokavicittaṃ visesābhāvappasaṅgato. Ahetukabhāve hi pavattiyā
tika-abh05t0:242_4: yvāyaṃ narasuranirayatiracchānādīsu indriyādīnaṃ viseso, tassa abhāvo āpajjati, na
tika-abh05t0:242_5: cāyaṃ paṇḍitehi icchito. Kiñca? Diṭṭhabhāvato. Diṭṭhā hi cakkhādito cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:242_6: bījādito aṅkurādīnaṃ pavatti, tasmāpi hetutovāyaṃ pavatti. Tathā pure pacchā ca abhāvato.
tika-abh05t0:242_7: Yato yato hi paccayasāmaggito yaṃ yaṃ phalaṃ nibbattati, tato pubbe pacchā ca na
tika-abh05t0:242_8: tassa nibbatti sambhavati, kiñca bahunā. Yadi ahetuto pavatti siyā, ahetukā pavattīti
tika-abh05t0:242_9: imāpi vācā yathāsakapaccayasamavāyato pure pacchā ca bhaveyyuṃ, na ca bhavanti aladdhappaccayattā,
tika-abh05t0:242_10: majjhe eva ca bhavanti laddhappaccayattā. Evaṃ sabbepi saṅkhatā dhammāti na sijjhati
tika-abh05t0:242_11: ahetuvādo. Tasmiñca asiddhe pavattiyā ahetubhāvo viya ahetupariyāyavisesabhūtā sabhāvaniyatiyadicchādayopi
tika-abh05t0:243_0: Yaṃ pana kāṇādā “paramāṇavo niccā, tehi dviaṇukādiphalaṃ nibbattati, tañca aniccaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:243_1: tassa vasenetaṃ lokavicitta”nti vadanti, tampi micchāparikappamattaṃ. Na hi paramāṇavo
tika-abh05t0:243_2: nāma santi aññatra bhūtasaṅghātā. So pana aniccova, na ca niccato aniccassa nibbatti
tika-abh05t0:243_3: yuttā tassa kāraṇabhāvānupapattito tathā adassanato ca. Yadi ca so kassaci kāraṇabhāvaṃ
tika-abh05t0:243_4: gaccheyya, anicco eva siyā vikārāpattito. Na cāyaṃ sambhavo atthi, yaṃ vikāraṃ anāpajjantameva
tika-abh05t0:243_5: kāraṇaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteyyāti. Vikārañce āpajjati, kutassa niccatāvakāso, tasmā vuttappakārā
tika-abh05t0:243_6: paramāṇavo sattā aniccā, aññepi niccādibhāvena bāhirakehi parikappitā asiddhā evāti
tika-abh05t0:243_7: veditabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “dhammappabhedato pana aññassa saccikaṭṭhassa asiddhattā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:244_0: Etthāha “yadi paramatthato puggalo na upalabbhati, evaṃ pana puggale anupalabbhamāne
tika-abh05t0:244_1: atha kasmā bhagavā ‘atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno’ti, ‘cattārome, bhikkhave,
tika-abh05t0:244_2: puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi’nti ca tattha tattha puggalassa atthibhāvaṃ pavedesī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:244_3: Vineyyajjhāsayavasena. Tathā tathā vinetabbānañhi puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vineyyadamanakusalo
tika-abh05t0:244_4: satthā dhammaṃ desento lokasamaññānurūpaṃ tattha tattha puggalaggahaṇaṃ karoti, na
tika-abh05t0:245_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti hirottappadīpanatthaṃ, kammassakatādīpanatthaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:245_3: hirīyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṃ āpajjati, paṭisattu
tika-abh05t0:245_4: vā hoti “kimidaṃ khandhā dhātū āyatanāni hirīyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti. “Itthī hirīyati
tika-abh05t0:245_5: ottappati, puriso, khattiyo, brāhmaṇo”ti pana vutte jānāti, na sammohaṃ āpajjati,
tika-abh05t0:245_6: na paṭisattu hoti, tasmā bhagavā hirottappadīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti. “Khandhā
tika-abh05t0:245_7: kammassakā, dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā kammassakatādīpanatthampi
tika-abh05t0:245_8: puggalakathaṃ katheti. “Veḷuvanādayo mahāvihārā khandhehi kārāpitā, dhātūhi, āyatanehī”ti
tika-abh05t0:245_9: vuttepi eseva nayo. Tathā “khandhā mātaraṃ jīvitā voropenti, pitaraṃ, arahantaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:245_10: ruhiruppādakammaṃ, saṅghabhedakammaṃ karonti, dhātuyo, āyatanānī”ti vuttepi, “khandhā
tika-abh05t0:245_11: mettāyanti, dhātuyo, āyatanānī”ti vuttepi, “khandhā pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranti, dhātuyo,
tika-abh05t0:245_12: āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo. Tasmā bhagavā paccattapurisakāradīpanatthaṃ ānantariyadīpanatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:245_14: dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti, dhātuyo, āyatanānī”ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti, sammohaṃ āpajjati,
tika-abh05t0:245_15: paṭisattu vā hoti “kimidaṃ khandhā dhātū āyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā”ti. “Puggalo
tika-abh05t0:245_16: paṭiggaṇhātī”ti pana vutte jānāti, na sammohaṃ āpajjati, na paṭisattu hoti, tasmā
tika-abh05t0:245_17: bhagavā dakkhiṇāvisuddhidīpanatthaṃ puggalakathaṃ katheti. Lokasammutiñca buddhā
tika-abh05t0:245_18: bhagavanto nappajahanti lokasamaññāya lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti, tasmā
tika-abh05t0:245_19: bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṃ kathetīti imehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi
tika-abh05t0:245_20: bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti, na paramatthato puggalassa atthibhāvatoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:246_1: asiddhattā rūpādidhammappabhedākāreneva puggalassa upaladdhiyā bhavitabbanti attho.
tika-abh05t0:246_2: Tena “kiṃ tava puggalo upalabbhamāno ruppanākārena upalabbhati, udāhu anubhavanasañjānanābhisaṅkharaṇavijānanesu
tika-abh05t0:246_3: aññatarākārenā”ti dasseti tabbinimuttassa sabhāvadhammassa loke abhāvato. Avisesavisesehi
tika-abh05t0:246_5: pakkhā anulomapaṭilomanayesu labbhanti, ādito pana paṭhamaṃ ṭhapetvā pavatto paṭhamanayo,
tika-abh05t0:246_6: itaro dutiyanti imaṃ nesaṃ visesaṃ dassento “anujānanā…pe… veditabbo”ti āha. Yathādhikatāya
tika-abh05t0:246_7: laddhiyā anulomanato cettha paṭhamo nayo anulomapakkho, tabbilomanato itaro paṭilomapakkhoti
tika-abh05t0:247_0: Tena vata reti ettha tenāti kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yena puggalūpalabbho patiṭṭhapīyati, tena
tika-abh05t0:247_1: hetunā. Svāyaṃ hetu sāsanikassa bāhirakassa ca vasena heṭṭhā dassito eva. Hetupatirūpake
tika-abh05t0:247_2: cāyaṃ hetusamaññā paramatthassa adhippetattā. Heṭṭhā “ājānāhi niggaha”nti niggahassa
tika-abh05t0:247_3: saññāpanamattaṃ kataṃ, taṃ idāni “yaṃ tattha vadesī”tiādinā nigamanarūpena micchābhāvadassanena
tika-abh05t0:247_4: ca vibhāviyamānaṃ pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato āropitaṃ patiṭṭhāpitaṃ hotīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:248_0: Ettha ca “puggalo upalabbhatī”ti paṭiññāvayavo sarūpeneva dassito. “Tenā”ti iminā
tika-abh05t0:248_1: sāmaññato hetāvayavo dassito. Yvāyaṃ yasmā paṭiññādhammo hutvā sadisapakkhe vijjamāno,
tika-abh05t0:248_2: visadisapakkhe avijjamānoyeva hetu lakkhaṇūpapanno nāma hoti, na itaro, tasmā yattha
tika-abh05t0:248_3: so vijjati na vijjati ca, so sadisāsadisabhāvabhinno duvidho diṭṭhantāvayavo. Yathā
tika-abh05t0:248_4: rūpādi upalabbhati, tathā puggalo. Yathā ca sasavisāṇaṃ na upalabbhati, na tathā
tika-abh05t0:248_5: puggaloti upanayo. Svāyaṃ “vattabbe kho puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti
tika-abh05t0:248_6: imāya pāḷiyā dīpito, yo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ saddhiṃ hetudāharaṇehi “pāpanā”ti vutto. Nigamanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:248_7: pāḷiyaṃ sarūpeneva āgataṃ, yā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ropanā”ti vuttāti. Evaṃ porāṇena ñāyakkamena
tika-abh05t0:249_0: Idāni vattanena parapakkhupalakkhite hetudāharaṇe anvayabyatirekadassanavasena niddhāretvā
tika-abh05t0:249_1: sādhanapayogo yojetabbo. Kāraṇaṃ vattabbanti kimettha vattabbaṃ. Hetudāharaṇehiyeva
tika-abh05t0:249_2: hi saparapakkhānaṃ sādhanaṃ dūsanaṃ vā, na paṭiññāya, tassā sādhetabbādibhāvato.
tika-abh05t0:249_3: Taṃ pana dvayaṃ “tena vata re”tiādipāḷiyā vibhāvitaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pāpanāropanāsīsena
tika-abh05t0:249_4: dassitaṃ. Paṭiññāṭhapanā pana tesaṃ visayadassanaṃ kathāyaṃ taṃmūlatāyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:249_5: Tenāha “yaṃ pana vakkhatī”tiādi. Teneva ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “idaṃ anuloma…pe… ekaṃ catukkaṃ
tika-abh05t0:249_6: veditabba”nti vakkhati. Tathā cāha “yathā pana tatthā”tiādi. Niggahova visuṃ vutto,
tika-abh05t0:249_7: na paṭikammanti adhippāyo. Visuṃ vuttoti ca pāpanāropanāhi asammissaṃ katvā visuṃ
tika-abh05t0:249_8: aṅgabhāvena vutto, na tadaññataro viya tadantogadhabhāvena vutto, nāpi ṭhapanā viya
tika-abh05t0:249_9: agaṇanupagabhāvenāti attho. Ye panāti padakāre sandhāyāha. Dutiye…pe… āpajjati tattha
tika-abh05t0:249_10: niggahassa ayathābhūtattā paṭikammassa ca yathābhūtabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:250_0: 2. Paramatthato puggalaṃ nānujānāti, vohārato pana anujānātīti sakavādimataṃ jānantenapi
tika-abh05t0:250_1: paravādinā chalavasena vibhāgaṃ akatvā “puggalo nupalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti
tika-abh05t0:250_2: pucchāya katāya sakavādī tattha ayaṃ puggalavādī, imassa laddhi paṭikkhipitabbāti
tika-abh05t0:250_3: paramatthasaccaṃ sandhāyāha “āmantā”ti. “Na upalabbhatī”ti hi vuttaṃ hoti. Puna itaro
tika-abh05t0:250_4: sammutisaccaṃ sandhāya “yo saccikaṭṭho”tiādimāha. Tassattho – yo lokavohārasiddho
tika-abh05t0:250_5: saccikaṭṭho, tato eva kenaci apaṭikkhipitabbato paramatthato tato so puggalo nupalabbhatīti.
tika-abh05t0:250_6: Puna sakavādī pubbe paramatthasaccavasena puggale paṭikkhitte idāni sammutisaccavasenāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:250_7: pucchāti mantvā taṃ appaṭikkhipanto “na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti āha. Tenāha “attanā adhippetaṃ
tika-abh05t0:250_8: saccikaṭṭhamevāti sammutisaccaṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyo”ti. Evamavaṭṭhite “yadi paravādinā…pe…
tika-abh05t0:250_9: nārabhitabbā”ti idaṃ na vattabbaṃ paṭhamapucchāya paramatthasaccassa saccikaṭṭhoti
tika-abh05t0:250_10: adhippetattā. “Atha sakavādinā…pe… āpajjatī”ti idampi na vattabbaṃ dutiyapucchāya
tika-abh05t0:251_0: Yadi ubhayaṃ adhippetanti idaṃ yadi paṭhamapucchaṃ sandhāya, tadayuttaṃ tassā paramatthasaccasseva
tika-abh05t0:251_1: vasena pavattattā. Atha dutiyapucchaṃ sandhāya, tassā sammutisaccavasena paṭhamatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:251_2: vatvā puna missakavasena vattuṃ “sammutisaccaparamatthasaccāni vā ekato katvāpi evamāhā”ti
tika-abh05t0:251_3: vuttattā tampi na vattabbameva. Dvepi saccānīti sammutiparamatthasaccāni. Tesu paramatthasaccasseva
tika-abh05t0:251_4: nippariyāyena saccikaṭṭhaparamatthabhāvo, itarassa upacārena. Tathā ca vuttaṃ “māyā
tika-abh05t0:251_5: marīci…pe… uttamaṭṭho”ti. Tasmā sammutisaccavasena upaladdhiṃ icchantenapi paramatthasaccavasena
tika-abh05t0:251_7: padhāne kiccasiddhī”ti eteneva “na ca saccikaṭṭhekadesena anuyogo”tiādi nivattitañca
tika-abh05t0:251_8: hoti saccikaṭṭhekadesabhāvasseva asiddhattā. Nāssa paramatthasaccatā anuyuñjitabbāti
tika-abh05t0:251_9: assa saccikaṭṭhassa paramatthasaccatā paravādinā na anuyuñjitabbā “puggalo nupalabbhati
tika-abh05t0:251_11: adhippāyo. Voharitasaccikaṭṭhassa attanā adhippetasaccikaṭṭhatāpi yuttā tassa tena
tika-abh05t0:251_12: adhippetattā. Svāyamattho heṭṭhā dassitoyeva. Vuttanayova dosoti “dvepi saccānī”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:251_13: anantarameva vuttaṃ sandhāyāha. Tassa pana adosabhāvo dassitoyeva. Atha na iti atha
tika-abh05t0:251_14: na bhūtasabhāvatthena upalabbheyyāti yojanā. Vattabboti yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ “yo
tika-abh05t0:251_15: lokavohārasiddho”tiādinā vuttameva, tasmā ettha “paramatthato puggalaṃ nānujānātī”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:252_0: Anuññeyyametaṃ siyāti etaṃ anupalabbhanaṃ paṭhamapucchāyaṃ viya dutiyapucchāyampi
tika-abh05t0:252_1: anujānitabbaṃ siyā. Na vā kiñci vattabbanti atha vā kiñci na vattabbaṃ ṭhapanīyattā
tika-abh05t0:252_2: pañhassa. Tathā hissa ṭhapanīyākāraṃ dassento “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Ettha ca kāmaṃ
tika-abh05t0:252_3: saccadvayākārena puggalo nupalabbhati, sammutiyākārena pana nupalabbhatīti upalabbhanabhāvassa
tika-abh05t0:252_4: vasena paṭikkhepo katoti ayamettha adhippāyo daṭṭhabbo. Anuññātaṃ paṭikkhittañcāti
tika-abh05t0:252_5: paṭhamapucchāyaṃ anuññātaṃ, dutiyapucchāyaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ. Etaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāyāti
tika-abh05t0:252_6: etaṃ ekaṃyeva vatthuṃ uddissa anujānanapaṭikkhipanākāraṃ chalavacanaṃ nissāya. Tvaṃ
tika-abh05t0:252_7: niggahetabboti yojanā. Sambhavantassa sāmaññenāti niggahaṭṭhānabhāvena sambhavantassa
tika-abh05t0:252_8: anulomanayena anujānanapaṭikkhepassa samānabhāvena. Asambhavantassa kappananti paccanīkanayena
tika-abh05t0:252_9: tassa niggahaṭṭhānabhāvena asambhavantassa tathā kappanaṃ saṃvidhānaṃ chalavādo bhavituṃ
tika-abh05t0:252_10: arahati. “Atthavikappupapattiyā vacanavighāto chala”nti vuttovāyamattho. Tenāti yathāvuttakappanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:252_11: chalavādoti vuttattā. Vacanasāmaññamattaṃ kappitaṃ chalaṃ vadati etenāti chalavādo.
tika-abh05t0:252_12: Tena vuttaṃ “chalavādassa kāraṇattā chalavādo”ti. Vacanasāmaññamattaṃ atthabhūtaṃ
tika-abh05t0:252_13: tadatthaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāya. “Vicāretabba”nti vuttaṃ, kimettha vicāretabbaṃ. Yadipi
tika-abh05t0:252_14: pakkhassa ṭhapanāmūlakaṃ anujānanāvajānanānaṃ micchābhāvadassanaṃ tabbisayattā, pāpanāropanāhi
tika-abh05t0:252_15: eva pana so vibhāvīyati, na ṭhapanāyāti pākaṭoyamattho.
tika-abh05t0:253_0: 4-5. Tenāti sakavādinā. Tena niyāmenāti yena niyāmena sakavādinā catūhi pāpanāropanāhissa
tika-abh05t0:253_1: niggaho kato, tena niyāmena nayena. So niggaho dukkaṭo aniggahoyevāti dassento āha
tika-abh05t0:253_2: “aniggahabhāvassa vā upagamitattā”ti, pāpitattāti attho. Evamevāti yathā “tayā mama
tika-abh05t0:253_3: kato niggaho”tiādinā aniggahabhāvūpanayo vutto, evameva. Etassāti “tena hī”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:256_0: 7-10. Aññenāti sammutisaccabhūtena. Parassāti sakavādino. So hi paravādinā paro nāma
tika-abh05t0:256_2: viya hi abhinnavisayameva viruddhaṃ nāma siyā, na itaranti adhippāyo. Tamevatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:256_3: vibhāvetuṃ “na hi…pe… āpajjatī”ti āha. Yadi evaṃ kathamidaṃ niggahaṭṭhānaṃ jātanti
tika-abh05t0:256_4: āha “attano panā”tiādi. Tena paṭiññāntaraṃ nāma aññamevetaṃ niggahaṭṭhānanti dasseti.
tika-abh05t0:261_0: 11. Sāmaññena vuttaṃ visesaniviṭṭhaṃ hotīti āha “sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ sarīreti ayamattho”ti.
tika-abh05t0:261_1: Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhatīti visesatthinā viseso anupayujjitabboti. Etenāti
tika-abh05t0:264_0: 12. Majjhimajātikāleti paccuppannattabhāvakāle. Attabhāvo hi idha “jātī”ti adhippeto.
tika-abh05t0:264_1: Tato atīto purimajātikālo, anāgato pacchimajātikālo. Imesu tīsūti sabbattha, sabbadā,
tika-abh05t0:264_2: sabbesūti imesu tīsu nayesu. Pāṭhassa saṃkhittatā suviññeyyāti taṃ ṭhapetvā atthassa
tika-abh05t0:264_3: sadisataṃ vibhāvento “idhāpi hi…pe… yojetabba”nti āha. Etthāpi “na kenaci sabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:264_4: puggalo upalabbhatī”ti ayamattho vutto hoti. Na hi kenaci sabhāvena upalabbhamānassa
tika-abh05t0:267: 13. Tatiyanaye na sabbekadhammavinimuttaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:270_0: 14. Anulomapañcakassātiādimhi aṭṭhakathāvacane. Puna tatthāti yathāvutte aṭṭhakathāvacane,
tika-abh05t0:270_1: tesu vā anulomapañcakapaccanīkesu. Sabbattha puggalo nupalabbhatītiādikassa pāṭhappadesassa
tika-abh05t0:270_2: attho “sarīraṃ sandhāyā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbo attho. Paṭikammādipāḷinti
tika-abh05t0:270_4: tīsu vādamukhesu. Paccanīkassa pāḷi vuttāti sambandho. Tanti pāḷiṃ. Saṅkhipitvā āgatattā
tika-abh05t0:270_5: sarūpena avutte. Suddhika…pe… vuttaṃ hoti tattha “sabbatthā”tiādinā sarīrādino parāmasanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:270_6: natthi, idha atthīti ayameva viseso, aññaṃ samānanti.
tika-abh05t0:273_0: 17-27. Saccikaṭṭhassa, saccikaṭṭhe vā saṃsandanaṃ saccikaṭṭhasaṃsandananti samāsadvayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:273_2: saccikaṭṭhasabhāvassa paramatthato vijjamānasabhāvassa puggalassa. Rūpādīhi saddhiṃ
tika-abh05t0:273_3: saṃsandananti saccikaṭṭhatāsāmaññena rūpādīhi samīkaraṇaṃ. Saccikaṭṭheti saccikaṭṭhahetu,
tika-abh05t0:273_4: tattha vā taṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā. “Tulyayoge samuccayo”ti samuccayatthattā eva ca-kārassa
tika-abh05t0:273_5: saccikaṭṭhena upaladdhisāmaññena idha rūpamāhaṭanti tassa udāhaṭabhāvo yuttoti “yathārūpa”nti
tika-abh05t0:273_6: nidassanavasena attho vutto, aññathā idha rūpassa āharaṇameva kimatthiyaṃ. Evaṃ sesadhammesupi.
tika-abh05t0:273_7: Yā panettha aññattapucchā, sāpi nidassanatthaṃ upabrūheti aññattanibandhanattā tassa.
tika-abh05t0:273_8: Opammasaṃsandane pana nidassanattho gāhīyatīti imasmiṃ suddhikasaṃsandane kevalaṃ
tika-abh05t0:273_9: samuccayavaseneva atthadassanaṃ yuttanti adhippāyo. Rūpādīni upādāpaññattimattattā
tika-abh05t0:273_10: puggalassa so tehi añño, anañño cāti na vattabboti ayaṃ sāsanakkamoti āha “rūpādīhi…pe…
tika-abh05t0:273_11: samayo”ti. Anuññāyamāneti tasmiṃ samaye sutte ca appaṭikkhipiyamāne. Ayañca attho
tika-abh05t0:274_0: “Ājānāhi niggaha”nti pāṭho diṭṭho bhavissati, aññathā “paṭilomapañcakāni dassitāni,
tika-abh05t0:274_1: paṭikammacatukkādīni saṃkhittānī”ti na sakkā vattunti adhippāyo. Codanāya vinā paravādino
tika-abh05t0:274_3: tassa paṭijānāpanaṃ. Tena phalavohārena kāraṇaṃ vuttanti dasseti. Abyākatattāti abyākaraṇīyattā,
tika-abh05t0:274_4: bhagavatā vā na byākatattā. Yadi ṭhapanīyattā paṭikkhipitabbanti imasmiṃ paccanīkanaye
tika-abh05t0:274_5: ṭhapanīyattā pañhassa sakavādinā paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Parenapīti paravādināpi ṭhapanīyattā
tika-abh05t0:274_6: laddhimeva nissāya anulomanaye paṭikkhepo katoti ayamettha suddhikasaṃsandanāya adhippāyo
tika-abh05t0:274_7: yutto anulomepi rūpādīhi aññattacodanāyameva paravādinā paṭikkhepassa katattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:277_0: 28-36. Upaladdhisāmaññena aññattapucchā cāti iminā dvayampi uddharati upaladdhisāmaññena
tika-abh05t0:277_1: aññattapucchā, upaladdhisāmaññena pucchā cāti. Tattha pacchimaṃ sandhāyāha “dvinnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:277_2: samānatā”tiādi. Tassattho – dvinnaṃ rūpavedanānaṃ viya rūpapuggalānaṃ saccikaṭṭhena
tika-abh05t0:277_3: samānatā tesaṃ aññattassa kāraṇaṃ yuttaṃ na hoti. Atha kho…pe… upalabbhanīyatāti
tika-abh05t0:277_4: idañca saṃsandanaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Ayaṃ hettha adhippāyo – yadi saccikaṭṭhasāmaññena
tika-abh05t0:277_5: rūpapuggalānaṃ upaladdhisāmaññaṃ icchitaṃ, teneva nesaṃ aññattampi icchitabbaṃ. Atha
tika-abh05t0:277_6: paramatthavohārabhedato tesaṃ aññattaṃ na icchitaṃ, tato eva upaladdhisāmaññampi na icchitabbanti.
tika-abh05t0:278: 37-45. Upaladdhīti puggalassa upaladdhi vijjamānatā. “Paṭikammapañcaka”nti viññāyatīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:281_0: 46-52. Ekadhammatopīti sattapaññāsāya saccikaṭṭhesu ekadhammatopi. Etena tato sabbatopi
tika-abh05t0:281_1: puggalassa aññattānanujānanaṃ dasseti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sakalaṃ paramatthasaccaṃ
tika-abh05t0:281_3: abhāvato. Yasmā pana samudāyāvayavā bhinnasabhāvā, tasmā “samudāyato…pe… niggahāraho
tika-abh05t0:281_4: siyā”ti paravādino āsaṅkamāha. Etaṃ vacanokāsanti yadipi sattapaññāsadhammasamudāyato
tika-abh05t0:281_5: puggalassa aññattaṃ na icchati tabbinimuttassa saccikaṭṭhassa abhāvato, tadekadesato
tika-abh05t0:281_6: panassa anaññattampi na icchateva. Na hi samudāyo avayavo hotīti. Tasmā “taṃ paṭikkhipato
tika-abh05t0:281_7: kiṃ niggahaṭṭhānanti vattuṃ mā labbhethā”ti dassetuṃ “ayañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Rūpādidhammappabhedavibhāgamukheneva
tika-abh05t0:281_8: anavasesato puggaloti gahaṇākāradassanavasena pavatto paṭhamavikappo, dutiyo pana
tika-abh05t0:281_9: avibhāgato paramatthasaccabhāvasāmaññenāti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vikappānaṃ viseso.
tika-abh05t0:282_0: Sabhāvavinibbhogatoti sabhāvena vinibbhujjitabbato. Sabhāvabhinno hi dhammo tadaññadhammato
tika-abh05t0:282_1: vinibbhogaṃ labhati. Tenāha “rūpato aññasabhāgattā”ti. Rūpavajjeti rūpadhammavajje.
tika-abh05t0:282_2: Tīsupīti “rūpasmiṃ puggalo, aññatra rūpā, puggalasmiṃ rūpa”nti imesu evaṃ pavattesu
tika-abh05t0:282_3: tīsupi anuyogesu. Sāsaniko evāyaṃ puggalavādīti katvā āha “na hi so sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ
tika-abh05t0:282_4: icchatī”ti. “Rūpavā”ti iminā rūpena sakiñcanatāva ñāpīyati, na rūpāyattavuttitāti
tika-abh05t0:282_5: āha “aññatra rūpāti ettha ca rūpavā puggaloti ayamattho saṅgahito”ti.
tika-abh05t0:286: 54. Lakkhaṇayuttikathāyaṃ “chalavasena pana vattabbaṃ ājānāhi niggaha”nti pāṭho gahetabbo.
tika-abh05t0:289_0: 55-59. Padadvayassa atthato ekatteti padadvayassa ekattatthe satīti attho. Parikappavacanañhetaṃ
tika-abh05t0:289_1: dosadassanatthaṃ “evaṃ sante ayaṃ doso”ti. Tayidaṃ ekattaṃ upalabbhati evāti pacchimapadāvadhāraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:289_2: veditabbaṃ. “Kehici puggalo kehici na puggalo”ti byabhicāradassanato parena na sampaṭicchitanti
tika-abh05t0:289_3: katvā tameva asampaṭicchitattaṃ vibhāvento “puggalassa hī”tiādimāha. Tattha avibhajitabbatanti
tika-abh05t0:289_4: “upalabbhati cā”ti evaṃ avibhajitabbataṃ. Vibhajitabbatanti “puggalo ca tadaññañca
tika-abh05t0:289_5: upalabbhatī”ti evaṃ vibhajitabbataṃ. Etena “puggalo upalabbhati evā”ti pacchimapadāvadhāraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:289_6: veditabbaṃ, na “puggalo eva upalabbhatī”ti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Taṃ vibhāganti yathāvuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:289_7: vibhajitabbāvibhajitabbaṃ vibhāgaṃ vadato sakavādino, aññassa vā kassaci. Etassāti
tika-abh05t0:289_8: paravādino. Yathāvuttavibhāganti “puggalo upalabbhati…pe… kehici na puggalo”ti evaṃ
tika-abh05t0:289_9: pāḷiyaṃ vuttappakāraṃ vibhāgaṃ. Yathāāpāditenāti “puggalo upalabbhatīti padadvayassa
tika-abh05t0:289_10: atthato ekatte”tiādinā āpāditappakārena. Na bhavitabbanti yadipi tena puggalo upalabbhati
tika-abh05t0:289_11: eva vuccati, upalabbhatīti pana puggalo eva na vuccati, atha kho aññopi, tasmā yathāvuttena
tika-abh05t0:289_12: pasaṅgena na bhavitabbaṃ. Tenāha “maggitabbo ettha adhippāyo”ti.
tika-abh05t0:290: 60. Atthato puggalo natthīti vuttaṃ hoti attasuññatādassanena anattalakkhaṇassa vihitattā.
tika-abh05t0:293_0: 61-66. Rūpakāyāvirahaṃ sandhāya āha, na rūpataṇhāsabbhāvaṃ. Tathā sati anekantikattā
tika-abh05t0:293_1: paṭikkhipitabbameva siyā, na anujānitabbanti. “Atthitāyā”ti āhāti sambandho. Kāmībhāvassa
tika-abh05t0:293_2: anekantikattā kassaci kāmadhātūpapannassa kāmadhātuyā āyattattābhāvato ca kadāci
tika-abh05t0:294_0: 67. Kāyānupassanāyāti kāyānupassanādesanāya. Sā hi kāyakāyānupassīnaṃ vibhāgaggahaṇassa
tika-abh05t0:294_1: kāraṇabhūtā, kāyānupassanā eva vā. Evaṃladdhikattāti añño kāyo añño puggaloti evaṃladdhikattā.
tika-abh05t0:294_2: Āhacca bhāsitanti ṭhānakaraṇāni āhantvā kathitaṃ, bhagavatā sāmaṃ desitanti attho.
tika-abh05t0:297_0: 69-72. Yānissa suttāni nissāya laddhi uppannā, tesaṃ dassanato parato “tena hi puggalo
tika-abh05t0:297_1: sandhāvatī”tiādinā pāḷi āgatā, purato pana “na vattabbaṃ puggalo sandhāvatī”tiādinā,
tika-abh05t0:297_2: tasmā vuttaṃ “dassento…pe… bhavitabba”nti. Dassetvāti vā vattabbanti “yānissa…pe…
tika-abh05t0:297_3: tāni dassetvā ‘tena hi puggalo sandhāvatī’tiādimāhā”ti vattabbanti attho. Dassentoti
tika-abh05t0:297_4: vā idaṃ dassanakiriyāya na vattamānatāmattavacanaṃ, atha kho tassā lakkhaṇatthavacanaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:298_0: 91. So vattabboti so jīvasarīrānaṃ anaññatāpajjanākāro vattabbo, natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:298_1: “Rūpī attā”ti imissā laddhiyā vasena “yena rūpasaṅkhātena attano sabhāvabhūtena sarīrena
tika-abh05t0:298_2: saddhiṃ gacchatī”ti evaṃ pana atthe sati so ākāro vutto eva hoti, tathā ca sati “rūpaṃ
tika-abh05t0:298_3: puggaloti ananuññātattā”ti evampi vattuṃ na sakkā. Yasmā pana “idha sarīranikkhepā”ti
tika-abh05t0:298_4: anantaraṃ vakkhati, tasmā “so vattabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Nirayūpagassa puggalassa antarābhavaṃ
tika-abh05t0:298_5: na icchatīti idaṃ purātanānaṃ antarābhavavādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. Adhunātanā pana “uddhaṃpādo
tika-abh05t0:298_6: tu nārako”ti vadantā tassapi antarābhavaṃ icchanteva, keci pana asaññūpagānaṃ. Arūpūpagānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:298_7: pana sabbepi na icchanti. Tattha ye “saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti
tika-abh05t0:298_8: suttassa atthaṃ micchā gahetvā cutūpapātakālesu asaññīnaṃ saññā atthīti antarābhavatova
tika-abh05t0:298_9: asaññūpapattiṃ icchanti, tadaññesaṃ vasena “savedano…pe… paṭikkhipatī”ti dassento
tika-abh05t0:298_10: “ye panā”tiādimāha. Ke panevaṃ icchanti? Sabbatthivādīsu ekacce.
tika-abh05t0:299_0: 92. Nevasaññānāsaññāyataneti nevasaññānāsaññāyatane bhave, acittuppāde vā saññā atthīti
tika-abh05t0:299_1: icchantīti na vattabbanti sambandho. Yato so saññābhavena asaṅgahito, bhavantarabhāvena ca saṅgahito.
tika-abh05t0:300_0: 93. Indhanupādāno aggi viya indhanena rūpādiupādāno puggalo rūpādinā vinā natthīti
tika-abh05t0:300_1: ettha ayamadhippāyavibhāvanā – yathā na vinā indhanena aggi paññāpīyati, na ca taṃ
tika-abh05t0:300_2: aññaṃ indhanato sakkā paṭijānituṃ, nāpi anaññaṃ. Yadi hi aññaṃ siyā, na uṇhaṃ indhanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:300_3: siyā, atha anaññaṃ, nidahitabbaṃyeva dāhakaṃ siyā, evaṃ na vinā rūpādīhi puggalo
tika-abh05t0:300_4: paññāpīyati, na ca tehi añño, nāpi anañño sassatucchedabhāvappasaṅgatoti paravādino
tika-abh05t0:300_5: adhippāyo. Tattha yadi aggindhanopamā lokavohārena vuttā, apaḷittaṃ kaṭṭhādiindhanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:300_6: nidahitabbañca, paḷittaṃ bhāsuruṇhaṃ aggidāhakañca, tañca ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ pabandhavasena
tika-abh05t0:300_7: pavattaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ. Yadi evaṃ puggalo rūpādīhi añño anicco
tika-abh05t0:300_8: ca āpanno, atha paramatthato ca, tasmiṃyeva kaṭṭhādisaññite rūpasaṅkhātapaḷitte yaṃ
tika-abh05t0:300_9: usumaṃ so aggi taṃsahajātāni tīṇibhūtāni indhanaṃ. Evampi siddhaṃ lakkhaṇabhedato
tika-abh05t0:300_10: aggindhanānaṃ aññattanti aggi viya indhanato rūpādīhi añño puggalo anicco ca āpajjatīti.
tika-abh05t0:303_0: 97. Nīlaguṇayogato nīlo, nīlo eva nīlako, tassa, ayaṃ panassa nīlapaññatti nīlarūpupādānāti
tika-abh05t0:303_1: āha “nīlaṃ…pe… paññattī”ti. Evaṃ pana pāṭhe ṭhite nīlaṃ upādāya nīloti kathamayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:303_2: paduddhāroti āha “nīlaṃ rūpaṃ…pe… ettha yo puṭṭho nīlaṃ upādāya nīlo”ti. Etthāti
tika-abh05t0:303_3: etasmiṃ vacane. Tadādīsūti “pītaṃ rūpaṃ upādāyā”tiādikaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ādi-saddena
tika-abh05t0:304: 98. Vuttanti “maggakusalo”tiādīsu chekaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kusalapaññattiṃ kusalavohāraṃ.
tika-abh05t0:305: 112. Pubbapakkhaṃ dassetvā uttaramāhāti paravādī pubbapakkhaṃ dassetvā sakavādissa uttaramāha.
tika-abh05t0:306_0: 115. “Rūpaṃ rūpavā”tiādinayappavattaṃ paravādivādaṃ bhindituṃ “yathā na nigaḷo negaḷiko”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:306_1: sakavādivādo āraddhoti āha “yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavāti uttarapakkhe vuttaṃ vacanaṃ uddharitvā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:307: 118. Viññāṇanissayabhāvūpagamananti cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayabhāvūpagamanaṃ. Tayidaṃ visesanaṃ cakkhussāti imināva siddhanti na kataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:310: 123. Kammānanti kusalākusalakammānaṃ. Taggahaṇeneva hi taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇīye kiriyānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Nipphādakappayojakabhāvenāti kārakakārāpakabhāvena.
tika-abh05t0:311_0: 125. Kammakārakassa puggalassa yo añño puggalo kārako. Tenapīti kārakakārakenapi.
tika-abh05t0:311_1: Tassāti kārakakārakassa. Aññanti aññaṃ kammaṃ. Evanti iminā vuttappakārena. Tehi
tika-abh05t0:311_2: tehi kārakehi puggalā viya aññāni kammāni karīyantīti dasseti. Tenāha “kammavaṭṭassa
tika-abh05t0:311_3: anupacchedaṃ vadantī”ti. Evaṃ sante puggalassa kārako, kammassa kārakoti ayaṃ vibhāgo
tika-abh05t0:311_4: idha anāmaṭṭho hoti, tathā ca sati kārakaparamparāya vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti āha “puggalassa…pe…
tika-abh05t0:311_5: vicāretabbameta”nti. Tassa kārakanti puggalassa kārakaṃ. Idañcāti na kevalaṃ puggalakārakassa
tika-abh05t0:311_6: kammakārakatāpattiyeva doso, atha kho idaṃ kammakārakatāya kārakaparamparāpajjanampi
tika-abh05t0:311_7: vicāretabbaṃ, na yujjatīti attho. Puggalānañhi paṭipāṭiyā kārakabhāvo kārakaparamparā.
tika-abh05t0:313_0: 176. Siyā añño, siyā anañño, siyā na vattabbo “aññoti vā anaññoti vā”ti, evaṃ pavattanigaṇṭhavādasadisattā
tika-abh05t0:313_1: so eva eko neva so hoti, na aññoti laddhimattaṃ. Tenāha “idaṃ pana natthevā”ti. Parassa
tika-abh05t0:313_2: icchāvasenevāti paravādino laddhivaseneva. Ekaṃ anicchantassāti ekaṃ “so karoti,
tika-abh05t0:313_3: so paṭisaṃvedetī”ti gahaṇaṃ sassatadiṭṭhibhayena paṭikkhipantassa itaraṃ ucchedaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:313_4: āpannaṃ. Tañca paṭikkhipantassa aññaṃ missakaṃ niccāniccaggahaṇaṃ, vikkhepaggahaṇañca
tika-abh05t0:313_5: āpannaṃ. Kārakavedakicchāya ṭhatvāti sveva kārako vedako cāti imasmiṃ ādāye ṭhatvā.
tika-abh05t0:313_6: Taṃtaṃanicchāyāti tassa tassa vādassa asampaṭicchanena. Āpannavasenapīti āpannagāhavasenapi
tika-abh05t0:313_7: ayaṃ anuyogo vuttoti yojanā. Sabbesaṃ āpannattāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbesaṃ vikappānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:313_8: anukkamena āpannattā nāyamanuyogo katoti yojanā. Ekekassevāti tesu visuṃ visuṃ ekekasseva
tika-abh05t0:313_9: āpannattā. Tantivasena pana te vikappā ekajjhaṃ dassetvāti adhippāyo. Ekato yojetabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:317_0: 193. Vikubbatīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā. Tena “dibbāya sotadhātuyā
tika-abh05t0:317_1: saddaṃ suṇātī”tiādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Abhiññānuyogo daṭṭhabboti yojanā. Tadabhiññāvatoti
tika-abh05t0:317_2: āsavakkhayābhiññāvato. Arahato sādhananti arahato saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena puggalattābhāvasādhanaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:317_3: Tabbhāvassāti arahattassa. Arahattadhārānañhi khandhā nāma puggalattaṃ tassapi hotīti.
tika-abh05t0:320_1: Sabhāvassāti ca sabhāvadhammassa. Laddhiṃ nigūhitvāti puggalo neva saṅkhato, nāsaṅkhatoti
tika-abh05t0:323: 218. Pajānanaṃ nāma na hoti nibbidādīnaṃ appaccayattā. Paricchedanasamatthatañca dassetīti sambandho.
tika-abh05t0:324_0: 228. Saharūpabhāvo rūpena samaṅgitā, vinārūpabhāvo tato vinissaṭatāti tadubhayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:324_1: rūpassa abbhantaragamanaṃ bahinikkhamanañca hoti. Tasmā taṃ dvayaṃ saharūpabhāvavinārūpabhāvānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:325_0: 237. Oḷārikoti thūlo. Āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā, attabhāvo. So eva yathāsakaṃ
tika-abh05t0:325_1: kammunā paṭilabhitabbato paṭilābho. Padadvayenapi kāmāvacarattabhāvo kathito. Manomayo
tika-abh05t0:325_2: attapaṭilābho rūpāvacarattabhāvo. So hi jhānamanena nibbattattā manomayo. Arūpo attapaṭilābhoti
tika-abh05t0:325_3: arūpāvacarattabhāvo. So hi rūpena amissitattā arūpoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-abh05t0:325_4: “Attā”ti pana jīve lokavohāro niruḷho, asatipi jīve tathāniruḷhaṃ lokavohāraṃ gahetvā
tika-abh05t0:325_5: sammāsambuddhāpi voharantīti dassento “iti imā lokassa samaññā, yāhi tathāgato voharatī”ti
tika-abh05t0:325_6: vatvā idāni yathā voharanti, taṃ pakāraṃ vibhāvento “aparāmasa”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh05t0:326_2: Ito purimāti tattha tattha sakavādipaṭikkhepādivibhāvanavasena pavattā ito atthasaṃvaṇṇanato
tika-abh05t0:326_3: purimā. Imināti vā “yathā rūpādayo dhammā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavacanena. Yathā
tika-abh05t0:326_4: cāti ettha ca-saddo samuccayattho. Tena samaññānatidhāvanaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:326_5: hoti – yathā parāmāso ca na hoti janapadaniruttiyā abhinivisitabbato, yathā ca samaññātidhāvanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:326_6: na hoti, evaṃ ito purimā ca atthavaṇṇanā yojetabbā. Samaññātidhāvane hi sati sabbalokavohārūpacchedo siyāti.
tika-abh05t0:327_0: Tasmā saccanti yasmā tattha paramatthākāraṃ anāropetvā samaññaṃ nātidhāvanto kevalaṃ
tika-abh05t0:327_1: lokasammutiyāva voharati, tasmā saccaṃ paresaṃ avisaṃvādanato. Tathakāraṇanti tatho
tika-abh05t0:327_2: avitatho dhammasabhāvo kāraṇaṃ pavattihetu etassāti tathakāraṇaṃ, paramatthavacanaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:332_0: 239. Idaṃ suttanti idaṃ lakkhaṇamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā samayavimuttassa
tika-abh05t0:332_1: bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī”ti idampi hi suttaṃ anāgāmiādīnaṃyeva parihāninissayo,
tika-abh05t0:332_2: na arahato. Samayavimuttoti aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino sekkhassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-abh05t0:333_0: “Katamo ca puggalo samayavimutto? Idhekacco puggalo kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:333_1: aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā
tika-abh05t0:334_0: “Parihānidhammo”ti ca puthujjano ca ekacco ca sekkho adhippeto, na arahāti. Tasmāti
tika-abh05t0:334_1: yasmā yathādassitāni suttāni anāgāmiādīnaṃ parihāniladdhiyā nissayo, na arahato,
tika-abh05t0:334_2: tasmā. Taṃ nissāya taṃ apekkhitvā yasmā “arahatopī”ti ettha arahatopi parihāni, ko
tika-abh05t0:334_3: pana vādo anāgāmiādīnanti ayamattho labbhati, tasmā pi-saddasampiṇḍitamatthaṃ dassento
tika-abh05t0:334_4: “arahatopi…pe… yojetabba”nti āha. Yasmā vā kāmañcettha dutiyasuttaṃ sekkhavasena
tika-abh05t0:334_5: āgataṃ, paṭhamatatiyasuttāni pana asekkhavasenapi āgatānīti tesaṃ laddhi, tasmā “arahatopī”ti
tika-abh05t0:335_0: Tatiyasminti “sabbesaññeva arahantānaṃ parihānī”ti etasmiṃ pañhe. So hi “sabbeva
tika-abh05t0:335_1: arahanto”tiādinā āgatesu tatiyo pañho. Tesanti mudindriyānaṃ. Tatiyasmimpīti pi-saddo
tika-abh05t0:335_2: vuttatthasamuccayo. Tena paṭhamapañhaṃ samuccinoti “tatthapi tikkhindriyā adhippetā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:336_0: Soyeva na parihāyatīti sotāpannoyeva sotāpannabhāvato na parihāyatīti attho. Na cettha
tika-abh05t0:336_1: sakadāgāmibhāvāpattiyā sotāpannabhāvāpagamo parihāni hoti visesādhigamabhāvato. Pattavisesato
tika-abh05t0:336_2: hi parihānīti. Itareti sakadāgāmiādikā. Uparimaggatthāyāti uparimaggattayapaṭilābhatthāya
tika-abh05t0:339_0: 241. Tatoti arahattato. Tatthāti dassanamaggaphale. Vāyāmenāti vipassanussāhanena.
tika-abh05t0:339_2: pāpuṇāti, tato parihīno puna vāyamanto tadanantaraṃ na arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti kā ettha
tika-abh05t0:339_3: yuttīti adhippāyo. Paravādī nāma yuttampi vadati ayuttampīti kiṃ tassa vāde yuttigavesanāyāti
tika-abh05t0:339_4: pana daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aparihānasabhāvo bhāvanāmaggo ariyamaggattā dassanādassanamaggo
tika-abh05t0:339_5: viya. Na cettha asiddhatāsaṅkā lokuttaramaggassa parassapi ariyamaggabhāvassa siddhattā,
tika-abh05t0:339_6: nāpi lokiyamaggena anekantikatā ariyasaddena visesitattā. Tathā na viruddhatā dutiyamaggādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:342: 265. Puggalapaññattiaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “patti, phusanā”ti ca paccakkhato adhigamo adhippetoti vuttaṃ “pattabbaṃ vadatīti āha phusanāraha”nti.
tika-abh05t0:343: 267. Katasanniṭṭhānassāti imasmiṃ sattāhe māse utumhi antovasse vā aññaṃ ārādhessāmīti katanicchayassa.
tika-abh05t0:348_0: 269. Heṭṭhāpīti paranimmitavasavattidevehi heṭṭhāpi. Maggabhāvanampi na icchantīti
tika-abh05t0:348_1: viññāyati “idha brahmacariyavāso”ti iminā “dvepi brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti
tika-abh05t0:349_0: 270. Tassevāti paravādino eva. Puggalavasenāti “gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devāna”nti
tika-abh05t0:349_1: evaṃ puggalavasena. Tassāti paravādino. Paṭikkhepo na yuttoti evaṃ puggalavasena
tika-abh05t0:349_2: atthayojanā na yuttāti adhippāyo. Puggalādhiṭṭhānena pana katāpi atthavaṇṇanā okāsavasena
tika-abh05t0:349_3: paricchijjatīti nāyaṃ doso. Tassāyaṃ adhippāyoti ayaṃ “gihīnañcevā”tiādinā vutto
tika-abh05t0:349_4: tassa paravādino yadi adhippāyo, evaṃ saññāya paravādino sakavādinā samānādāyoti
tika-abh05t0:349_5: na niggahāraho siyā. Tenāha “saka…pe… tabbo”ti. Paṭhamaṃ pana anujānitvā pacchā paṭikkhepeneva
tika-abh05t0:349_6: niggahetabbatā veditabbā. Keci “yattha natthi pabbajjā, natthi tattha brahmacariyavāsoti
tika-abh05t0:349_7: pucchāya ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ maggappaṭivedhaṃ sandhāya paravādino paṭikkhepo. Yadipi
tika-abh05t0:349_8: so devānaṃ maggappaṭilābhaṃ na icchati, sambhavantaṃ pana sabbaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:349_9: ‘gihīna’micceva avatvā ‘ekaccānañca devāna’nti vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ
tika-abh05t0:352_1: maggoti vutto. Yathāha “rūpupapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti. Idanti idaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:352_3: tabbhāvadīpakena “idha bhāvitamaggo”tiādikena kathaṃ sametīti codetvā yathā sameti,
tika-abh05t0:352_4: taṃ dassetuṃ “pubbe panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “pubbe”ti iminā “idha bhāvitamaggo”tiādikaṃ
tika-abh05t0:352_5: vadanti, idhāpi pana “rūpāvacaramaggenā”tiādikaṃ. Tattha anāgāmī evāti anāgāmiphalaṭṭho
tika-abh05t0:352_6: eva. Jhānānāgāmīti asamucchinnajjhattasaṃyojanopi rūpabhave uppajjitvā anāvattidhammamaggaṃ
tika-abh05t0:352_7: bhāvetvā tattheva parinibbāyanato. Adhippāyoti yathāvutto dvinnaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:353_0: Idhāti kāmaloke. Tatthāti brahmaloke. Ettha ca paravādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “tīhi, bhikkhave,
tika-abh05t0:353_1: ṭhānehī”ti suttaṃ kiṃ yathārutavasena gahetabbatthaṃ, udāhu sandhāyabhāsitanti? Tattha
tika-abh05t0:353_3: vattuṃ na sakkā “deve ca tāvatiṃse”ti vuttattā. Yathā hi tassa “seyyathāpi devehi
tika-abh05t0:353_4: tāvatiṃsehi saddhiṃ mantetvā”tiādīsu viya sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya kāmāvacaradevesu
tika-abh05t0:353_5: tāvatiṃsadevā pākaṭā paññātāti tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ, na teyeva adhippetāti suttapadassa
tika-abh05t0:353_7: mahānisaṃsatāya sāsane pabbajjā “idha brahmacariyavāso”ti imasmiṃ sutte adhippetā.
tika-abh05t0:353_8: Sā hi uttarakurukānaṃ devānañca anokāsabhāvato dukkarā dullabhā ca. Tattha sūriyaparivattādīhipi
tika-abh05t0:353_9: devesu maggapaṭilābhāya atthitā vibhāvetabbā, uttarakurukānaṃ pana visesānadhigamabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:357_0: 274. Odhisoti bhāgaso, bhāgenāti attho. Bhāgo nāma yasmā ekadeso hoti, tasmā “ekadesena
tika-abh05t0:357_1: ekadesenā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha yadi catunnaṃ maggānaṃ vasena samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa
tika-abh05t0:357_2: catubhāgehi pahānaṃ “odhiso pahāna”nti adhippetaṃ, icchitamevetaṃ sakavādissa “tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:357_3: saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”ti ca ādivacanato. Yasmā pana maggo
tika-abh05t0:357_4: catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena kiccakaro, na ekābhisamayavasenāti paravādino
tika-abh05t0:357_5: laddhi, tasmā yathā “maggo kālena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, kālena samudayaṃ pajahatī”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:357_6: nānakkhaṇavasena saccesu pavattatīti icchito, evaṃ paccekampi nānakkhaṇavasena pavatteyya.
tika-abh05t0:357_7: Tathā sati dukkhādīnaṃ ekadesaekadesameva parijānāti pajahatīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:357_8: “sotāpatti…pe… ekadese pajahatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sati hi nānābhisamaye paṭhamamaggādīhi
tika-abh05t0:357_10: ekadesasotāpattimaggaṭṭhāditā, tato eva ekadesasotāpannāditā ca āpajjati anantaraphalattā
tika-abh05t0:357_11: lokuttarakusalānaṃ, na ca taṃ yuttaṃ. Na hi kālabhedena vinā so eva sotāpanno, asotāpanno
tika-abh05t0:357_12: cāti sakkā viññātuṃ. Tenāha “ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:358_0: Apicāyaṃ nānābhisamayavādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “maggañāṇaṃ saccāni paṭivijjhantaṃ kiṃ
tika-abh05t0:358_1: ārammaṇato paṭivijjhati, udāhu kiccato”ti. Yadi ārammaṇatoti vadeyya, tassa vipassanāñāṇassa
tika-abh05t0:358_2: viya dukkhasamudayānaṃ accantaparicchedasamucchedā na yuttā tato anissaṭattā, tathā
tika-abh05t0:358_3: maggadassanaṃ. Na hi sayameva attānaṃ ārabbha pavattatīti yuttaṃ, maggantaraparikappanāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:358_4: anavaṭṭhānaṃ āpajjatīti, tasmā tīṇi saccāni kiccato, nirodhaṃ kiccato ārammaṇato
tika-abh05t0:358_5: ca paṭivijjhatīti evamasammohato paṭivijjhantassa maggañāṇassa nattheva nānābhisamayo.
tika-abh05t0:358_6: Vuttañhetaṃ “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passatī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:358_7: Na cetaṃ kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Yo nu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi
tika-abh05t0:358_8: so passati, dukkhanirodhampi…pe… dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadampi so passatī”ti ekasaccadassanasamaṅgino
tika-abh05t0:358_10: ābhatattā paccekañca saccattayadassanassa yojitattā. Aññathā purimadiṭṭhassa puna
tika-abh05t0:358_11: adassanato samudayādidassane dukkhādidassanamayojanīyaṃ siyā. Na hi lokuttaramaggo
tika-abh05t0:358_12: lokiyamaggo viya katakāribhāvena pavattati samucchedakattā. Tathā yojane ca sabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:358_13: dassanaṃ dassanantaraparanti dassanānuparamo siyā. Evaṃ āgamato yuttito ca nānābhisamayassa
tika-abh05t0:358_14: asambhavato paccekaṃ maggānaṃ odhiso pahānaṃ natthīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:362_0: 280. Yadipi pāḷiyaṃ “tayo magge bhāvetī”ti vuttaṃ, maggabhāvanā pana yāvadeva kilesasamucchindanatthāti
tika-abh05t0:362_1: ñatvā “kiccasabbhāvanti tīhi pahātabbassa pahīnata”nti āha. Tattha tīhīti heṭṭhimehi
tika-abh05t0:362_2: tīhi ariyamaggehi pahātabbassa ajjhattasaṃyojanassa pahīnataṃ samucchindananti attho.
tika-abh05t0:362_3: Taṃ pana kiccanti adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanesu maggassa pahānābhisamayakiccaṃ. Teneva maggenāti
tika-abh05t0:362_4: anāgāmimaggeneva. Etaṃ na sametīti evaṃ magguppādato pageva kāmarāgabyāpādā pahīyantīti
tika-abh05t0:362_5: laddhikittanaṃ iminā maggassa kiccasabbhāvakathanena na sameti na yujjati. Tasmāti
tika-abh05t0:362_6: iminā yathāvuttameva virodhaṃ paccāmasati. Pahīnānanti vikkhambhitānaṃ. Yo hi jhānalābhī
tika-abh05t0:362_7: jhānena yathāvikkhambhite kilese maggena samucchindati, so idhādhippeto. Tenāha “dassanamagge…pe… adhippāyo”ti.
tika-abh05t0:366_0: 282. Sabbaṃ atthīti ettha yasmā paccuppannaṃ viya atītānāgatampi dharamānasabhāvanti
tika-abh05t0:366_1: paravādino laddhi, tasmā sabbanti kālavibhāgato atītādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ. So pana “yampi
tika-abh05t0:366_2: natthi, tampi atthī”ti kālavimuttassa vasena anuyogo, taṃ atippasaṅgadassanavasena
tika-abh05t0:366_3: paravādipaṭiññāya dosāropanaṃ. Nayadassanaṃ vā atītānāgatānaṃ natthibhāvassa. Atthīti
tika-abh05t0:366_4: pana ayaṃ atthibhāvo yasmā desakālākāradhammehi vinā na hoti, tasmā taṃ tāva tehi
tika-abh05t0:366_5: saddhiṃ yojetvā anuyogaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbattha sabbamatthī”tiādinā pāḷi pavattā. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:366_6: yadipi sabbatthāti idaṃ sāmaññavacanaṃ, taṃ pana yasmā visesaniviṭṭhaṃ hoti, parato
tika-abh05t0:366_7: ca sabbesūti dhammā vibhāgato vuccanti, tasmā oḷārikassa pākaṭassa rūpadhammasamudāyassa
tika-abh05t0:366_8: vasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbatthāti sabbasmiṃ sarīre”ti vuttaṃ, nidassanamattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:366_9: vā etaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā ca kāṇādakāpilehi paṭiññāyamānā ākāsakālādisattapakatipurisā
tika-abh05t0:366_10: viya paravādinā paṭiññāyamānaṃ sabbaṃ sabbabyāpīti āpannameva hotīti. “Sabbattha
tika-abh05t0:366_11: sarīre”ti ca “tile tela”nti viya byāpane bhummanti sarīrapariyāpannena sabbena bhavitabbanti
tika-abh05t0:367_0: Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbamatthīti yojanā. Etasmiṃ pakkheyevassa aññavādo paridīpito siyā
tika-abh05t0:367_1: “yaṃ atthi, attheva taṃ, yaṃ natthi, nattheva taṃ, asato natthi sambhavo, sato natthi
tika-abh05t0:367_2: vināso”ti. Evaṃ sabbenākārena sabbaṃ sabbesu dhammesu sabbaṃ atthīti atthoti sambandho.
tika-abh05t0:367_3: Imehi pana pakkhehi “sabbaṃ sabbasabhāvaṃ, anekasattinicitābhāvā asato natthi sambhavo”ti
tika-abh05t0:367_4: vādo paridīpito siyā. Yogarahitanti kenaci yuttāyuttalakkhaṇasaṃyogarahitaṃ. Taṃ
tika-abh05t0:367_5: pana ekasabhāvanti saṃyogarahitaṃ nāma atthato ekasabhāvaṃ, ekadhammoti attho. Etena
tika-abh05t0:367_6: devavādīnaṃ brahmadassanaṃ atthevātivādo paridīpito siyā. Atthīti pucchatīti yadi
tika-abh05t0:367_7: sabbamatthīti tava vādo, yathāvuttāya mama diṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhibhāvo atthīti ekantena
tika-abh05t0:367_8: tayā sampaṭicchitabbo, tasmā “kiṃ so atthī”ti pucchatīti attho.
tika-abh05t0:370_0: 285. Atītā …pe… karitvāti etthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – atītaṃ anāgatanti rūpassa imaṃ
tika-abh05t0:370_1: visesaṃ, evaṃ visesaṃ vā rūpaṃ aggahetvā paccuppannatāvisesavisiṭṭharūpameva appiyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:370_2: paccuppannarūpabhāvānaṃ samānādhikaraṇattā etasmiṃyeva visaye appetabbaṃ, vacīgocaraṃ
tika-abh05t0:370_3: pāpetabbaṃ satipi nesaṃ visesanavisesitabbatāsaṅkhāte vibhāge tathāpi avibhajitabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:370_4: katvāti. Yasmā pana pāḷiyaṃ “paccuppannanti vā rūpanti vā”ti paccuppannarūpasaddehi
tika-abh05t0:370_5: tadatthassa vattabbākāro itisaddehi dassito, tasmā “paccuppannasaddena…pe… vuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:370_6: hotī”ti āha. Rūpapaññattīti rūpāyatanapaññatti. Sā hi sabhāvadhammupādānā tajjāpaññatti.
tika-abh05t0:370_9: samūhaṃ upādāya. Upādānupādānampi hi upādānamevāti. Tasmāti samūhupādāyādhīnatāya
tika-abh05t0:370_11: Na hi odātatāvigamena avatthaṃ hoti. Na pana yuttā rūpabhāvassa vigamāvattabbatāti
tika-abh05t0:370_12: yojanā. Rūpabhāvoti ca rūpāyatanasabhāvo cakkhuviññāṇassa gocarabhāvo. Na hi tassa
tika-abh05t0:373_0: 288. Anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vāti ettha vā-saddo aniyamattho yathā “khadire vā bandhitabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:373_1: palāse vā”ti. Tasmā “hutvā hotī”ti ettha hoti-saddo anāgatapaccuppannesu yaṃ kiñci
tika-abh05t0:373_2: padhānaṃ katvā sambandhaṃ labhatīti dassento “anāgataṃ…pe… daṭṭhabba”nti āha. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:373_3: paccuppannaṃ hontanti paccuppannaṃ jāyamānaṃ paccuppannabhāvaṃ labhantaṃ. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:373_4: “taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti laddhivasenā”ti. Tampi hutvā hotīti yaṃ anāgataṃ
tika-abh05t0:373_5: hutvā paccuppannabhāvappattiyā “hutvā hotī”ti vuttaṃ, kiṃ tadapi puna hutvā hotīti
tika-abh05t0:374_0: Vacanaṃ arahatīti iminā vacanamatte na koci dosoti dasseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadipi
tika-abh05t0:374_1: tassa puna hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvāhotibhāvo natthi, punappunaṃ ñāpetabbatāya pana
tika-abh05t0:374_2: dutiyaṃ tato parampi tathā vattabbataṃ arahatīti “āmantā”ti paṭijānātīti. Dhammeti
tika-abh05t0:375_0: Paṭikkhittanayenāti “hutvā hoti, hutvā hotī”ti ettha pubbe yadetaṃ tayā “anāgataṃ
tika-abh05t0:375_1: hutvā paccuppannaṃ hotī”ti vadatā “taṃyeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti laddhivasena
tika-abh05t0:375_2: “anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā hutvā hotī”ti vuttaṃ, “kiṃ te tampi hutvā hotī”ti pucchite
tika-abh05t0:375_3: yo paravādinā hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvāabhāvato “na hevā”ti paṭikkhepo kato, tena
tika-abh05t0:375_4: paṭikkhittanayena. Svāyaṃ yadeva rūpādi anāgataṃ, tadeva paccuppannanti satipi atthābhede
tika-abh05t0:375_5: anāgatapaccuppannanti pana attheva kālabhedoti taṃkālabhedavirodhāya paṭikkhepo pavattoti
tika-abh05t0:375_6: āha “paṭikkhittanayenāti kālanānattenā”ti. Tena hi so ayañca paṭikkhepo nīto pavattitoti.
tika-abh05t0:375_7: Paṭiññātanayenāti idampi yathāvuttapaṭikkhepānantaraṃ yaṃ paṭiññātaṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh05t0:375_8: Yathā hi sā paṭiññā atthābhedena nītā pavattitā, tathāyampi. Tenevāha “atthānānattenā”ti,
tika-abh05t0:375_9: anāgatādippabhedāya kālapaññattiyā upādānabhūtassa atthassa abhedenāti attho. Yathā
tika-abh05t0:375_11: tathā tattha vuccamānā hutvāhotibhāvā yathākkamaṃ purimapacchimesu pavattitā purimapacchimakiriyāti
tika-abh05t0:375_12: katvāti imamatthaṃ dassento “atthānānattaṃ…pe… paṭijānātī”ti vatvā puna “atthānānattameva
tika-abh05t0:375_13: hī”tiādinā tameva atthaṃ samattheti. Yathā pana “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”nti paṭijānantassa
tika-abh05t0:375_14: jīvova sarīraṃ, sarīrameva jīvoti jīvasarīrānaṃ anaññattaṃ āpajjati, evaṃ “taññeva
tika-abh05t0:375_15: anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti ca paṭijānantassa anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ anaññattaṃ āpannanti
tika-abh05t0:375_17: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “evaṃ sante anāgatampi hutvāhoti nāma, paccuppannampi hutvāhotiyeva nāmā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:376_0: Anuññātapañhassāti “taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti? Āmantā”ti evaṃ atthānānattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:376_1: sandhāya anuññātassa atthassa. Ñātuṃ icchito hi attho pañho. Doso vuttoti anāgataṃ
tika-abh05t0:376_2: hutvā paccuppannabhūtassa puna anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannabhāvāpattisaṅkhāto doso
tika-abh05t0:376_3: vutto purimanaye. Pacchimanaye pana anāgatapaccuppannesu ekekassa hutvāhotibhāvāpattisaṅkhāto
tika-abh05t0:376_4: doso vuttoti attho. Paṭikkhittapañhanti “taṃyeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti? Na
tika-abh05t0:376_5: hevaṃ vattabbe”ti evaṃ kālanānattaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhittapañhaṃ. Tenāti anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:376_6: hotihutvābhāvapaṭikkhepena. Codetīti anāgataṃ tena hoti nāma, paccuppannaṃ tena hutvā
tika-abh05t0:376_7: nāma, ubhayampi anaññattā ubhayasabhāvanti codeti. Etthāti “hutvā hotī”ti etasmiṃ
tika-abh05t0:376_8: pañhe kathaṃ hoti dosoti codetīti. “Tassevā”ti pariharati. Kathaṃ katvā codanā, kathañca
tika-abh05t0:376_9: katvā parihāro? Anujānanapaṭikkhepānaṃ bhinnavisayatāya codanā, atthābhedakālabhedavisayattā
tika-abh05t0:376_10: abhinnādhāratāya tesaṃ parihāro. Tassevāti hi paravādino evāti attho.
tika-abh05t0:377_0: Tadubhayaṃ gahetvāti “taṃ anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti ubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā.
tika-abh05t0:377_1: Ekekanti tesu ekekaṃ. Ekekamevāti ubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ aggahetvā ekekameva visuṃ visuṃ
tika-abh05t0:377_2: imasmiṃ pakkhe tathā na yuttanti attho. Esa nayoti atidesaṃ katvā saṃkhittattā taṃ
tika-abh05t0:377_3: dubbiññeyyanti “anāgatassa hī”tiādinā vivarati. Paṭijānitabbaṃ siyā anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:377_4: yathākkamaṃ hotihutvābhāvatoti adhippāyo. “Yadetaṃ tayā”tiādinā pavatto saṃvaṇṇanānayo
tika-abh05t0:377_5: purimanayo, tattha hi “yadi te anāgataṃ hutvā”tiādinā hutvāhotibhāvo codito. “Aparo
tika-abh05t0:377_6: nayo”tiādiko dutiyanayo. Tattha hi “anāgatassa…pe… hutvāhotiyeva nāmā”ti anāgatādīsu
tika-abh05t0:380_0: 290. Kathaṃ vuccatīti kasmā vuttaṃ. Tenāti hi iminā dutiyapucchāya “atītaṃ ñāṇa”nti
tika-abh05t0:380_1: idaṃ paccāmaṭṭhaṃ, tañca paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, atītadhammārammaṇatāya atītanti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:380_2: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “puna puṭṭho atītārammaṇaṃ paccuppannaṃ ñāṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh05t0:383_1: daṭṭhabbo”ti āha. Tattha anānattanti aviseso. Evamādikoti ādi-saddena katakiccatābhāvo
tika-abh05t0:386_0: 295. Yo atītasaddābhidheyyo attho, so atthisaddābhidheyyoti dvepi samānādhikaraṇatthāti
tika-abh05t0:386_1: katvā vuttaṃ “atītaatthisaddānaṃ ekatthattā”ti, na, atītasaddābhidheyyasseva atthisaddābhidheyyattā.
tika-abh05t0:386_2: Tenāha “atthisaddatthassa ca nvātītabhāvato”ti. Tena kiṃ siddhanti āha “atītaṃ nvātītaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:386_3: nvātītañca atītaṃ hotī”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadi tava matena atītaṃ atthi, atthi
tika-abh05t0:386_4: ca nvātītanti atītañca no atītaṃ siyā, tathā atthi no atītaṃ atītañca no atītaṃ atītaṃ
tika-abh05t0:386_5: siyāti, yathā “atītaṃ atthī”ti ettha atītameva atthīti nāyaṃ niyamo gahetabbo anatītassapi
tika-abh05t0:386_6: atthibhāvassa icchitattā. Tenevāha “atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātīta”nti. Yena hi
tika-abh05t0:386_7: ākārena atītassa atthibhāvo paravādinā icchito, tenākārena anatītassa anāgatassa
tika-abh05t0:386_8: paccuppannassa ca so icchito. Kena pana ākārena icchitoti? Saṅkhatākārena. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:386_9: “tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atīta”nti. Tasmā atītaṃ atthiyevāti evamettha niyamo
tika-abh05t0:386_10: gahetabbo. Atthibhāve hi atītaṃ niyamitaṃ, na atīte atthibhāvo niyamito, “na pana
tika-abh05t0:386_11: nibbānaṃ atthī”ti ettha pana nibbānameva atthīti ayampi niyamo sambhavatīti so eva
tika-abh05t0:386_12: gahetabbo. Yadipi hi nibbānaṃ paramatthato atthibhāvaṃ upādāya uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:386_13: labbhati tadaññassapi abhāvato, tathāpi asaṅkhatākārena aññassa anupalabbhanato tathā
tika-abh05t0:386_14: nibbānameva atthīti purimapadāvadhāraṇe atthe gayhamāne “atthi siyā nibbānaṃ, siyā
tika-abh05t0:386_15: no nibbāna”nti codanā anokāsā. Atītādīsu pana purimapadāvadhāraṇaṃ paravādinā na
tika-abh05t0:386_16: gahitanti natthettha atippasaṅgo. Aggahaṇañcassa pāḷito eva viññāyati. Evamettha
tika-abh05t0:386_17: atītādīnaṃ atthitaṃ vadantassa paravādissevāyaṃ iṭṭhavighātadosāpatti, na pana nibbānassa
tika-abh05t0:386_18: atthitaṃ vadantassa sakavādissāti. Paṭipādanā patiṭṭhāpanā veditabbā.
tika-abh05t0:387_0: Etthāha “atītaṃ atthī”tiādinā kiṃ panāyaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ paramatthato atthibhāvo
tika-abh05t0:387_1: adhippeto, udāhu na paramatthato. Kiñcettha – yadi tāva paramatthato, sabbakālaṃ
tika-abh05t0:387_2: atthibhāvato saṅkhārānaṃ sassatabhāvo āpajjati, na ca taṃ yuttaṃ āgamavirodhato yuttivirodhato
tika-abh05t0:387_3: ca. Atha na paramatthato, “sabbamatthī”tiādikā codanā niratthikā siyā, na niratthikā.
tika-abh05t0:387_4: So hi paravādī “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgata”ntiādinā atītānāgatānampi khandhabhāvassa
tika-abh05t0:387_5: vuttattā asati ca atīte kusalākusalassa kammassa āyatiṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ bhaveyya, tattha
tika-abh05t0:387_6: ca pubbenivāsañāṇādi anāgate ca anāgataṃsañāṇādi kathaṃ pavatteyya, tasmā attheva
tika-abh05t0:387_7: paramatthato atītānāgatanti yaṃ paṭijānāti, taṃ sandhāya ayaṃ katāti. Ekantena cetaṃ
tika-abh05t0:387_8: sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Yepi “sabbaṃ atthī”ti vadanti atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppannañca, te sabbatthivādāti.
tika-abh05t0:388_0: Catubbidhā cete te sabbatthivādā. Tattha keci bhāvaññattikā. Te hi “yathā suvaṇṇabhājanassa
tika-abh05t0:388_1: bhinditvā aññathā kariyamānassa saṇṭhānasseva aññathattaṃ, na vaṇṇādīnaṃ, yathā ca
tika-abh05t0:388_2: khīraṃ dadhibhāvena pariṇamantaṃ rasavīriyavipāke pariccajati, na vaṇṇaṃ, evaṃ dhammāpi
tika-abh05t0:388_3: anāgataddhuno paccuppannaddhaṃ saṅkamantā anāgatabhāvameva jahanti, na attano sabhāvaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:388_4: Tathā paccuppannaddhuno atītaddhaṃ saṅkame”ti vadanti. Keci lakkhaṇaññattikā, te
tika-abh05t0:388_5: pana “tīsu addhāsu pavattamāno dhammo atīto atītalakkhaṇayutto, itaralakkhaṇehi ayutto.
tika-abh05t0:388_6: Tathā anāgato paccuppanno ca. Yathā puriso ekissā itthiyā ratto aññāsu aratto”ti
tika-abh05t0:388_7: vadanti. Aññe avatthaññattikā, te “tīsu addhāsu pavattamāno dhammo taṃ taṃ avatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:388_8: patvā añño aññaṃ niddisīyati avatthantarato, na sabhāvato. Yathā ekaṃ akkhaṃ ekaṅge
