tika-abh05t0:918_1: kusalādidhammesu ca. Aviparītato gahitesu dhammesu mūlayamakādivasena pavattiyamānā
tika-abh05t0:918_2: desanā veneyyānaṃ nānappakārakosallāvahā pariññākiccasādhanī ca hoti, na viparītatoti
tika-abh05t0:918_5: “ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te kusalamūlā”tiādinā dhamme, “yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati,
tika-abh05t0:918_6: tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjatī”tiādinā puggalaṃ “yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati, tattha
tika-abh05t0:918_7: vedanākkhandho uppajjatī”tiādinā okāsaṃ nissāya ārabbha pavattānaṃ. Ādi-saddena puggalokāsauppādanirodhatadubhayapariññādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:918_9: yathāpucchitassa atthassa nicchayakaraṇaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ, tadabhāvato saṃsayanaṃ saṃsayo.
tika-abh05t0:919_0: Kāmañcettha dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ saṃsayapubbakaṃ sanniṭṭhānanti paṭhamaṃ saṃsayo
tika-abh05t0:919_1: vattabbo, desentassa pana bhagavato sanniṭṭhānapubbako saṃsayoti dassanatthaṃ ayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:919_2: padānukkamo kato. Sabbañhi pariññeyyaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhitassa
tika-abh05t0:919_3: dhammasāmino na katthaci saṃsayo, vissajjetukāmatāya pana vineyyajjhāsayagataṃ saṃsayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:919_4: dassento saṃsayitavasena pucchaṃ karotīti evaṃ vissajjanapucchanavasena na sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayā
tika-abh05t0:919_5: labbhantīti ayamattho dassito, nicchitasaṃsayadhammavaseneva panettha sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayā
tika-abh05t0:919_6: veditabbā. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kusalesu kusalā nu kho, na nu kho kusalāti sandehābhāvato”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:919_7: Teneva ca “sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayāna”nti, “sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayavasenā”ti ca paṭhamaṃ sanniṭṭhānaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh05t0:920_0: Tanti yamakapakaraṇaṃ. Tassa ye samayādayo vattabbā, te kathāvatthupakaraṇadesanānantaro
tika-abh05t0:920_3: cāti imamatthaṃ dassento “samayadesadesanāvasenā”tiādimāha. Nimittañhetaṃ idha saṃvaṇṇanāya,
tika-abh05t0:920_4: yadidaṃ kamānuppatti āgatabhāravāhitā ca paṇḍitānaṃ paṇḍitakiccabhāvato. Tattha anuppattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:921_0: Tatthāti tasmiṃ samayādidassane. Yamanaṃ uparamananti yamo maraṇanti āha “jātiyā
tika-abh05t0:921_1: sati maraṇaṃ hotīti…pe… visayo”ti. Tattha yathā “jātiyā sati maraṇaṃ hotī”ti jāti
tika-abh05t0:921_2: yamassa visayo, evaṃ “upādānakkhandhesu santesu maraṇaṃ hotī”ti upādānakkhandhā yamassa
tika-abh05t0:921_3: visayoti yojetabbaṃ. Te hi maraṇadhamminoti. Anuppattamaraṇaṃyeva kibbisakārinaṃ
tika-abh05t0:921_4: puggalaṃ yamapurisā vividhā kammakāraṇā karonti, na appattamaraṇanti maraṇaṃ yamassa
tika-abh05t0:921_5: visayo vutto. Āṇāpavattiṭṭhānanti idaṃ visaya-saddassa atthavacanaṃ. Desaṃ vāti kāmādidhātuttayadesaṃ
tika-abh05t0:921_6: sandhāyāha. Dhātuttayissaro hi maccurājā. Pañcānantariyāni aññasatthāruddeso ca,
tika-abh05t0:921_7: tena vā saddhiṃ pañca verāni cha abhabbaṭṭhānāni. Āvattāti padakkhiṇāvattā. Tanuruhāti lomā.
tika-abh05t0:925_0: 1. Yamakasamūhassāti mūlayamakādikassa yamakasamūhassa. Mūlayamakādayo hi pakaraṇāpekkhāya
tika-abh05t0:925_1: avayavabhūtāpi niccāvayavāpekkhāya yamakasamūhoti vutto. Tenāha “taṃsamūhassa ca
tika-abh05t0:926_1: tathā paṭhamapucchāya vuttānaṃ kusalamūlasaṅkhātānaṃ visesānaṃ atthayamakabhāvassa
tika-abh05t0:926_2: vuttattāti yojanā. Yathā hi paṭhamapucchāya visesavantabhāvena vuttāyeva kusaladhammā
tika-abh05t0:926_3: dutiyapucchāyaṃ visesabhāvena vuttā, evaṃ paṭhamapucchāyaṃ visesabhāvena vuttāyeva
tika-abh05t0:926_5: hi dhammānaṃ visesavisesavantatāvibhāgā hontīti. Kusalamūlakusalavisesehi saṃsayitapadasaṅgahitehi
tika-abh05t0:926_6: kusalakusalamūlānaṃ visesavantānanti adhippāyo. Ettha ca visesavantāpekkhavisesavasena
tika-abh05t0:926_7: paṭhamo atthavikappo vutto, dutiyo pana visesāpekkhavisesavantavasenāti ayametesaṃ
tika-abh05t0:927_0: Tattha ñātuṃ icchitānanti pucchāya visayabhūtānanti attho. Visesānanti kusalakusalamūlavisesānaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:927_3: etasmiṃ mūlayamake. Padhānabhāvoti paṭhamavikappe tāva saṃsayitappadhānattā pucchāya
tika-abh05t0:927_4: visesānaṃ padhānabhāvo veditabbo. Te hi saṃsayitānaṃ visesavantoti. Dutiyavikappe
tika-abh05t0:927_5: pana visesā nāma visesavantādhīnāti visesavantānaṃ tattha padhānabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t0:927_6: Dvinnaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ padhānabhāvo na yujjati. Sati hi appadhāne padhānaṃ nāma siyā.
tika-abh05t0:927_7: Tenāha “ekekāya pucchāya ekeko eva attho saṅgahito hotī”ti. Evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:927_8: aññathā vinicchitavisesitabbabhāvehi idha padhānabhāvo na yujjatevāti. Na dhammavācakoti
tika-abh05t0:927_9: na sabhāvadhammavācako. Sabhāvadhammopi hi atthoti vuccati “gambhīrapaññaṃ nipuṇatthadassi”ntiādīsu.
tika-abh05t0:928_0: Tīṇipi padānīti ettha pi-saddo samuccayattho, samuccayo ca tulyayoge siyā. Kiṃ nāma-padena
tika-abh05t0:928_2: saṅgāhakatta”nti. Tattha saṅgāhakattamattanti matta-saddo visesanivattiatthoti. Tena
tika-abh05t0:928_3: nivattitaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “na niravasesasaṅgāhakatta”nti vuttaṃ. Na hi rūpaṃ nāma-padena
tika-abh05t0:928_4: saṅgayhati. Kusalādiyeva nāmanti niyamo daṭṭhabbo, na nāmaṃyeva kusalādīti imameva
tika-abh05t0:928_5: ca niyamaṃ sandhāyāha “kusalādīnaṃ saṅgāhakattamattameva sandhāya vutta”nti. Yadipi
tika-abh05t0:928_6: nāma-padaṃ na niravasesakusalādisaṅgāhakaṃ, kusalādisaṅgāhakaṃ pana hoti, tadatthameva
tika-abh05t0:928_7: ca taṃ gahitanti nāmassa kusalattikapariyāpannatā vuttāti dassento āha “kusalādi…pe… vutta”nti.
tika-abh05t0:931_0: 52. Dutiyayamaketi ekamūlayamake. Evamidhāpīti yathā ekamūlayamake “ye keci kusalā”icceva
tika-abh05t0:931_1: pucchā āraddhā, evaṃ idhāpi aññamaññamūlayamakepi “ye keci kusalā”icceva pucchā ārabhitabbā
tika-abh05t0:931_2: siyā. Kasmā? Purimayamaka…pe… appavattattāti. Idañca dutiyayamakassa tathā appavattattā
tika-abh05t0:931_3: vuttaṃ, tatiyayamakaṃ pana tatheva pavattaṃ. Kecīti padakārā. Te hi yathā paṭhamadutiyayamakesu
tika-abh05t0:931_4: purimapucchā eva parivattanavasena pacchimapucchā katāti pacchimapucchāya purimapucchā
tika-abh05t0:931_5: samānā ṭhapetvā paṭilomabhāvaṃ, na tathā aññamaññayamake. Tattha hi dvepi pucchā
tika-abh05t0:931_6: aññamaññavisadisā. Yadi tatthāpi dvīhipi pucchāhi sadisāhi bhavitabbaṃ, “ye keci
tika-abh05t0:931_7: kusalā”ti paṭhamapucchā ārabhitabbā, pacchimapucchā vā “sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena
tika-abh05t0:931_8: ekamūlā”ti vattabbā siyā. Evaṃ pana avatvā paṭhamadutiyayamakesu viya purimapacchimapucchā
tika-abh05t0:931_9: sadisā akatvā tatiyayamake tāsaṃ visadisatā “ye keci kusalā”ti anāraddhattā, tasmā
tika-abh05t0:931_10: paṭilomapucchānurūpāya anulomapucchāya bhavitabbanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “ye keci
tika-abh05t0:932_0: Atthavasenāti sambhavantānaṃ nicchitasaṃsayitānaṃ atthānaṃ vasena. Tadanurūpāyāti
tika-abh05t0:932_1: tassā purimapucchāya atthato byañjanato ca anucchavikāya. Purimañhi apekkhitvā pacchimāya
tika-abh05t0:932_2: bhavitabbaṃ. Tenāti tasmā. Yasmā anulome saṃsayacchede jātepi paṭilome saṃsayo uppajjati,
tika-abh05t0:932_3: yadi na uppajjeyya, paṭilomapucchāya payojanameva na siyā, tasmā na pacchimapucchānurūpā
tika-abh05t0:932_4: purimapucchā, atha kho vuttanayena purimapucchānurūpā pacchimapucchā, tāya ca anurūpatāya
tika-abh05t0:932_5: atthādivasena dvinnaṃ padānaṃ sambandhattā atthādiyamakatā vuttā. Desanākkamato cettha
tika-abh05t0:932_6: anulomapaṭilomatā veditabbā “kusalā kusalamūlā”ti vatvā “kusalamūlā kusalā”ti ca
tika-abh05t0:932_7: vuttattā. Sesayamakesupi eseva nayo. Visesavantavisesa, visesavisesavantaggahaṇato
tika-abh05t0:932_8: vā idha anulomapaṭilomatā veditabbā. Paṭhamapucchāyañhi ye dhammā visesavanto, te
tika-abh05t0:932_9: nicchayādhiṭṭhāne katvā dassento “ye keci kusalā dhammā”ti vatvā tesu yasmiṃ viseso
tika-abh05t0:932_10: saṃsayādhiṭṭhāno, taṃdassanatthaṃ “sabbe te kusalamūlā”ti pucchā katā. Dutiyapucchāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:932_11: pana tappaṭilomato yena visesena te visesavanto, taṃ visesaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā dassento
tika-abh05t0:932_12: “ye vā pana kusalamūlā”ti vatvā te visesavante saṃsayādhiṭṭhānabhūte dassetuṃ “sabbe
tika-abh05t0:932_13: te dhammā kusalā”ti pucchā katā. Aniyatavatthukā hi sanniṭṭhānasaṃsayā anekajjhāsayattā sattānaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:933_0: Imināpi byañjanenāti “ye keci kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti imināpi vākyena. Evaṃ na sakkā
tika-abh05t0:933_1: vattunti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ, tamevādhippāyaṃ vivarati “na hī”tiādinā. Tattha tenevāti
tika-abh05t0:933_2: kusalabyañjanatthassa kusalamūlena ekamūlabyañjanatthassa bhinnattā eva. Vissajjananti
tika-abh05t0:933_3: vibhajanaṃ. Itarathāti kusalamūlena ekamūlabyañjanena pucchāya katāya. Tāni vacanānīti
tika-abh05t0:933_5: abyākatadīpanatā daṭṭhabbā. Etthāti “imināpi byañjanena tassevatthassa sambhavato”ti
tika-abh05t0:933_6: etasmiṃ vacane. Ye keci kusalā…pe… sambhavatoti etena kusalānaṃ kusalamūlena ekamūlatāya
tika-abh05t0:933_7: byabhicārābhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenevāha “na hi…pe… santī”ti. Vuttabyañjanatthasseva sambhavatoti
tika-abh05t0:933_8: hi iminā avuttabyañjanatthassa sambhavābhāvavacanena svāyamadhippāyamattho vibhāvito.
tika-abh05t0:933_9: Yathā hi kusalamūlena ekamūlabyañjanattho kusalabyañjanatthaṃ byabhicarati, na evaṃ
tika-abh05t0:933_10: taṃ kusalabyañjanattho. Kathaṃ katvā codanā, kathañca katvā parihāro? Kusalamūlena
tika-abh05t0:933_11: ekamūlā kusalā evāti codanā katā, kusalamūlena ekamūlā eva kusalāti pana parihāro
tika-abh05t0:933_12: pavattoti veditabbaṃ. Dutiyayamake viya apucchitvāti “ye keci kusalā”ti apucchitvā.
tika-abh05t0:933_13: Kusalamūlehīti kusalehi mūlehi. Teti kusalamūlena ekamūlā.
tika-abh05t0:934_0: Ekato uppajjantīti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho pakārattho vā. Tena “kusalamūlāni ekamūlāni
tika-abh05t0:934_1: ceva aññamaññamūlāni cā”tiādipāḷisesaṃ dasseti. Yaṃ sandhāya “heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
tika-abh05t0:934_2: vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha heṭṭhāti anulomapucchāvissajjane.
tika-abh05t0:934_3: Vuttanayenāti “mūlāni yāni ekato uppajjantī”tiādinā vuttanayena. Tampīti “kusalamūlenā”tiādi
tika-abh05t0:934_4: aṭṭhakathāvacanampi. Tathāti tena pakārena, anulomapucchāyaṃ viya vissajjanaṃ kātabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:934_5: bhaveyyāti iminā pakārenāti attho. Yena kāraṇena “na sakkā vattu”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ
tika-abh05t0:934_6: kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ye vā panā”tiādimāha. Tattha “āmantā”icceva vissajjanena bhavitabbanti
tika-abh05t0:934_7: “sabbe te dhammā kusalā”ti pucchāyaṃ viya “sabbe te dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti
tika-abh05t0:934_8: pucchitepi paṭivacanavissajjanameva labbhati, na anulomapucchāyaṃ viya sarūpadassanavissajjanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:934_9: vibhajitvā dassetabbassa abhāvato. Ye hi dhammā kusalamūlena ekamūlā, na te dhammā
tika-abh05t0:934_10: kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlāva. Ye pana kusalamūlena aññamaññamūlā, te kusalamūlena
tika-abh05t0:934_11: ekamūlāva. Tenāha “na hi…pe… vibhāgo kātabbo bhaveyyā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:935_0: Tattha yenāti yena aññamaññamūlesu ekamūlassa abhāvena. Yatthāti yasmiṃ ñāṇasampayuttacittuppāde.
tika-abh05t0:935_1: Aññamaññamūlakattā ekamūlakattā cāti adhippāyo. Dvinnaṃ dvinnañhi ekekena aññamaññamūlakatte
tika-abh05t0:935_2: vutte tesaṃ ekekena ekamūlakattampi vuttameva hoti samānattho ekasaddoti katvā. Tenevāha
tika-abh05t0:935_3: “yattha pana…pe… na ekamūlānī”ti. Tayidaṃ micchā, dvīsupi ekekena itarassa ekamūlakattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:935_4: sambhavati evāti. Tenāha “etassa gahaṇassa nivāraṇattha”ntiādi. “Ye dhammā kusalamūlena
tika-abh05t0:935_5: aññamaññamūlā, te kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti imamatthaṃ vibhāventena idha “āmantā”ti
tika-abh05t0:935_6: padena yattha dve mūlāni uppajjanti, tattha ekekena itarassa ekamūlakattaṃ pakāsitamevāti
tika-abh05t0:935_7: āha “āmantāti imināva vissajjanena taṃgahaṇanivāraṇato”ti. Nicchitattāti ettha ekato
tika-abh05t0:935_8: uppajjamānānaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ tāva mūlānaṃ nicchitaṃ hotu aññamaññekamūlakattaṃ, dvinnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:935_9: pana kathanti āha “aññamaññamūlānaṃ hī”tiādi. Samānamūlatā evāti avadhāraṇena nivattitatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:935_10: dassetuṃ “na aññamaññasamānamūlatā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena aññamaññamūlānaṃ samānamūlatāmattavacanicchāya
tika-abh05t0:935_12: dasseti. Dvinnaṃ mūlānanti dvinnaṃ ekamūlānaṃ ekato uppajjamānānaṃ. Yathā tesaṃ samānamūlatā,
tika-abh05t0:935_13: taṃ dassetuṃ “tesu hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃmūlehi aññehīti itaramūlehi mūladvayato aññehi sahajātadhammehi.
tika-abh05t0:936_0: Idāni yena adhippāyena paṭilome “kusalā”icceva pucchā katā, na “kusalamūlena ekamūlā”ti,
tika-abh05t0:936_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “aññamaññamūlatte pana…pe… katāti daṭṭhabba”nti āha. Na hi kusalamūlena
tika-abh05t0:936_2: aññamaññamūlesu kiñci ekamūlaṃ na hotīti vuttovāyamattho. Mūlayuttatameva vadati,
tika-abh05t0:936_3: na mūlehi ayuttanti adhippāyo. Aññathā pubbenāparaṃ virujjheyya. Tenevāti mūlayuttatāya
tika-abh05t0:936_4: eva vuccamānattā. Ubhayatthāpīti aññamaññamūlā ekamūlāti dvīsupi padesu. “Kusalamūlenā”ti
tika-abh05t0:936_5: vuttaṃ, kusalamūlena sampayuttenāti hi attho. Yadi ubhayampi vacanaṃ mūlayuttatameva
tika-abh05t0:936_6: vadati, atha kasmā anulomapucchāyameva ekamūlaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, na paṭilomapucchāyanti
tika-abh05t0:936_7: ubhayatthāpi taṃ gahetabbaṃ na vā gahetabbaṃ. Evañhi mūlekamūlayamakadesanāhi ayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:936_8: aññamaññayamakadesanā samānarasā siyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:937_0: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ aññamaññayamake. Yadipi ekamūlā aññamaññamūlāti idaṃ padadvayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:937_1: vuttanayena mūlayuttatameva vadati, tathāpi sāmaññavisesalakkhaṇe attheva bhedoti
tika-abh05t0:937_2: dassetuṃ “mūlayogasāmaññe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samūlakānaṃ samānamūlatā ekamūlattanti ekamūlavacanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:937_3: tesu avisesato mūlasabbhāvamattaṃ vadati, na aññamaññamūlasaddo viya mūlesu labbhamānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:937_4: visesaṃ, na ca sāmaññe nicchayo visese saṃsayaṃ vidhamatīti imamatthamāha “mūlayogasāmaññe…pe…
tika-abh05t0:937_5: pavattā”ti iminā. Visese pana nicchayo sāmaññe saṃsayaṃ vidhamanto eva pavattatīti
tika-abh05t0:937_6: āha “mūlayogavisese pana…pe… nicchitameva hotī”ti. Tasmāti vuttasseva tassa hetubhāvena
tika-abh05t0:937_7: parāmasanaṃ, visesanicchayeneva avinābhāvato, sāmaññassa nicchitattā tattha vā saṃsayābhāvatoti
tika-abh05t0:937_8: attho. Tenāha “ekamūlāti pucchaṃ akatvā”ti. Kusalabhāvadīpakaṃ na hotīti kusalabhāvasseva
tika-abh05t0:937_9: dīpakaṃ na hoti tadaññajātikassapi dīpanato. Tenāha “kusalabhāve saṃsayasabbhāvā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:937_11: anuvattamānattāti iminā “sabbe te dhammā kusalā”ti kusalaggahaṇe kāraṇamāha. Ekamūlaggahaṇe
tika-abh05t0:937_12: hi payojanābhāvo dassito, kusalassa vasena cāyaṃ desanāti.
tika-abh05t0:938_0: 53-61. Mūlanaye vutte eva attheti mūlanaye vutte eva kusalādidhamme. Kusalādayo hi
tika-abh05t0:938_1: sabhāvadhammā idha pāḷiatthatāya atthoti vutto. Kusalamūlabhāvena, mūlassa visesanena,
tika-abh05t0:938_2: mūlayogadīpanena ca pakāsetuṃ. Kusalamūlabhūtā mūlā kusalamūlamūlāti samāsayojanā.
tika-abh05t0:938_4: kusalamūlabhāvena mūladhammā visesitā. Mūlaggahaṇena ca mūlavantānaṃ mūlayogo dīpito
tika-abh05t0:938_5: hoti. Samānena mūlena, mūlassa visesanena, mūlayogadīpanena ca pakāsetuṃ “ekamūlamūlā”ti,
tika-abh05t0:938_6: aññamaññassa mūlena mūlabhāvena, mūlassa visesanena, mūlayogadīpanena ca pakāsetuṃ
tika-abh05t0:938_7: “aññamaññamūlamūlā”ti mūlamūlanayo vuttoti yojanā. Tīsupi yamakesu yathāvuttavisesanamevettha
tika-abh05t0:939_0: Mūlayogaṃ dīpetunti mūlayogameva padhānaṃ sātisayañca katvā dīpetunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:939_1: Yathā hi kusalāni mūlāni etesanti kusalamūlakānīti bāhiratthasamāse mūlayogo padhānabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:939_2: vutto hoti, na evaṃ “kusalasaṅkhātā mūlā kusalamūlā”ti kevalaṃ, “kusalamūlamūlā”ti
tika-abh05t0:939_3: savisesanaṃ vā vutte uttarapadatthappadhānasamāse. Tenāha “aññapadattha…pe… dīpetu”nti.
tika-abh05t0:939_5: ka-kārenā”tiādinā mūlakanaye ca vuttappakāro eva. Vacanapariyāyo mūlamūlakanaye ekajjhaṃ katvā yojetabbo.
tika-abh05t0:940_0: 74-85. Na ekamūlabhāvaṃ labhamānehīti abyākatamūlena na ekamūlakaṃ tathāvattabbataṃ
tika-abh05t0:940_2: Yathā hi yathāvuttacittuppādādayo hetupaccayavirahitā ahetukavohāraṃ labhanti, na
tika-abh05t0:940_3: evaṃ sahetukasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Tenāha “ahetukavohārarahitaṃ katvā”ti. Ettha ca “sabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:940_4: rūpaṃ na hetukameva, ahetukamevā”ti vuttattā kiñcāpi sahetukasamuṭṭhānampi rūpaṃ
tika-abh05t0:940_5: ahetukaṃ, “abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo, vipākābyākatā
tika-abh05t0:940_6: kiriyābyākatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena
tika-abh05t0:940_7: paccayo”ti pana vacanato hetupaccayayogena sahetukasamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa ahetukavohārābhāvo
tika-abh05t0:940_8: vutto. Keci pana “abbohārikaṃ katvāti sahetukavohārena abbohārikaṃ katvāti atthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:940_9: vatvā aññathā ‘ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ abyākatamūlena ekamūla’nti na sakkā vattu”nti vadanti.
tika-abh05t0:940_10: Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttameva ahetukavohārābhāvena sahetukatāpariyāyassa atthasiddhattā.
tika-abh05t0:940_11: Apica hetupaccayasabbhāvato tassa sahetukatāpariyāyo labbhateva. Tenāha “na vā sahetukaduke
tika-abh05t0:940_12: viya…pe… abbohārikaṃ kata”nti. Ettha etthāti etasmiṃ ekamūlakaduke. Hetupaccayayogāyogavasenāti
tika-abh05t0:940_13: hetupaccayena yogāyogavasena, hetupaccayassa sabbhāvāsabbhāvavasenāti attho. Sahetukavohārameva
tika-abh05t0:941_0: Apare pana bhaṇanti “sahetukacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ ahetukaṃ abyākatanti iminā vacanena
tika-abh05t0:941_1: saṅgahaṃ gacchantampi samūlakattā ‘abyākatamūlena na ekamūla’nti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh05t0:941_2: satipi samūlakatte nippariyāyena sahetukaṃ na hotīti ‘abyākatamūlena ekamūla’nti
tika-abh05t0:941_3: ca na sakkā vattuṃ, tasmā ‘ahetukaṃ abyākataṃ abyākatamūlena na ekamūlaṃ, sahetukaṃ
tika-abh05t0:941_4: abyākataṃ abyākatamūlena ekamūla’nti dvīsupi padesu anavarodhato abbohārikaṃ katvāti
tika-abh05t0:941_5: vutta”nti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ “sahetukaabyākatasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ abyākatamūlena
tika-abh05t0:941_6: ekamūlaṃ hotī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tassa ekamūlabhāvassa nicchitattā, tasmā vuttanayeneva
tika-abh05t0:942_1: niddhāraṇaṃ nāma hotīti āha “nāmānaṃ niddhāritattā”ti. Tena tesaṃ adhikabhāvamāha
tika-abh05t0:942_2: viññāyamānameva pakaraṇena aparicchinnattā. Yadi evaṃ “ahetukaṃ nāmaṃ sahetukaṃ nāma”nti
tika-abh05t0:942_3: pāṭhantare kasmā nāmaggahaṇaṃ katanti āha “supākaṭabhāvattha”nti, paribyattaṃ katvā
tika-abh05t0:948_0: 2-3. Khandhayamake …pe… pariññā ca vattabbāti idaṃ padhānabhāvena vattabbadassanaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:948_1: Abhiññeyyakathā hi abhidhammo, sā ca yāvadeva pariññattāti pariññāsu ca na vinā tīraṇapariññāya
tika-abh05t0:948_3: khandhānaṃ visuṃ saha ca uppādanirodhalakkhaṇapariggahavasena sātisayaṃ sambhavati,
tika-abh05t0:948_4: nāññathāti imamatthaṃ dassento “chasu kālabhedesu…pe… pariññā ca vattabbā”ti padhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:948_5: vattabbaṃ uddharati. Tattha pana yathā na tīraṇapariññāya vinā pahānapariññā, evaṃ
tika-abh05t0:948_6: tīraṇapariññā vinā ñātapariññāya. Sā ca sutamayañāṇamūlikāti desanākusalo satthā
tika-abh05t0:948_8: pakāsetukāmo “pañcakkhandhā”tiādinā desanaṃ ārabhīti dassento “te pana khandhā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t0:949_0: Tatthāti tesu samudāyāvayavapadesu. Dhammoti ruppanādiko ñeyyadhammo. Samudāyapadassāti
tika-abh05t0:949_1: rūpakkhandhādisamudāyapadassa. Yadipi avayavavinimutto paramatthato samudāyo nāma
tika-abh05t0:949_2: natthi, yathā pana avayavo samudāyo na hoti, evaṃ na samudāyopi avayavoti satipi
tika-abh05t0:949_3: samudāyāvayavānaṃ bhede dvinnaṃ padānaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvato atthevābhedoti padadvayassa
tika-abh05t0:949_4: samānatthatāya siyā āsaṅkāti āha “etasmiṃ saṃsayaṭṭhāne”ti. “Cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:949_5: gacchati, viññāṇakkhandho tajjā manoviññāṇadhātū”tiādīsu ekadeso samudāyapadattho
tika-abh05t0:949_6: vutto, “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ…pe… ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho”tiādīsu pana sakaloti āha “rūpādi…pe…
tika-abh05t0:949_8: vuttā, tato eva samudāyapadānampi avayavapadatthatā. Na hi visesanavisesitabbānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:949_9: atthānaṃ accantaṃ bhedo abhedo vā icchito, atha kho bhedābhedo, tasmā abhedadassanavasena
tika-abh05t0:949_10: paṭhamanayo vutto, bhedadassanavasena dutiyanayo. Yo hi ruppanādisaṅkhāto rāsaṭṭho
tika-abh05t0:949_11: avayavapadehi rūpādisaddehi ca khandhasaddena ca visesanavisesitabbabhāvena bhinditvā
tika-abh05t0:949_12: vutto, svāyaṃ atthato rāsibhāvena apekkhito ruppanādiattho evāti.
tika-abh05t0:950_0: Yathā avayavapadehi vuccamānopi samudāyapadassa attho hoti, evaṃ samudāyapadehi vuccamānopi
tika-abh05t0:950_1: avayavapadassa atthoti “rūpakkhandho rūpañceva rūpakkhandho ca, rūpakkhandho rūpanti?
tika-abh05t0:950_2: Āmantā”tiādinā padasodhanā katāti dassento āha “rūpādiavayavapadehi…pe… padasodhanavāro
tika-abh05t0:950_3: vutto”ti. Tattha ekaccassa avayavapadassa aññattha vuttiyā avayavapadatthassa samudāyapadatthatāya
tika-abh05t0:950_4: siyā anekantikatā, samudāyapadassa pana taṃ natthīti samudāyapadatthassa avayavapadatthatāya
tika-abh05t0:950_5: byabhicārābhāvo “rūpakkhandho rūpanti? Āmantā”ti pāḷiyā pakāsitoti vuttaṃ “rūpādi…pe… dassetu”nti.
tika-abh05t0:951_2: rūpasaṅkhātena avayavapadena visesanabhāvena vuttassa khandhatthassa rūpakkhandhabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:951_3: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “rūpakkhandho rūpanti? Āmantā”ti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ rūpakkhandhapade.
tika-abh05t0:951_4: Padhānabhūtena visesitabbattā khandhāvayavapadena vuttassa ruppanaṭṭhassa kiṃ vedanākkhandhādibhāvo
tika-abh05t0:951_5: hotīti yojanā. Samāne avayavapadābhidheyyabhāve appadhānena padena yo attho viññāyati,
tika-abh05t0:951_6: so kasmā padhānena na viññāyatīti adhippāyo. Khandhāvayavapadena vutto dhammoti rāsaṭṭhamāha.
tika-abh05t0:951_7: Tattha kocīti ruppanaṭṭho. Kenaci samudāyapadenāti rūpakkhandhapadena, na vedanākkhandhādipadena.
tika-abh05t0:951_8: Tenāha “na sabbo sabbenā”ti. Esa nayo vedanākkhandhādīsu. Rūparūpakkhandhādiavayavasamudāyapadasodhanamukhena
tika-abh05t0:951_9: tattha ca catukkhandhavasena pavattā pāḷigati padasodhanamūlacakkavāro. Evañca dassentenāti
tika-abh05t0:951_10: iminā yvāyaṃ rūpādiavayavapadehi rūpakkhandhādisamudāyapadehi ca dassitākāro atthaviseso,
tika-abh05t0:951_11: taṃ paccāmasati. Visesanabhāvo bhedakatāya sāmaññato avacchedakattā, visesitabbabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:951_12: abhedayogena bhedantarato avicchinditabbattā, samānādhikaraṇabhāvo tesaṃ bhedābhedānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:952_0: Tenāti yathāvuttena visesanavisesitabbabhāvena. Etthāti etasmiṃ samānādhikaraṇe.
tika-abh05t0:952_1: Tenāti vā samānādhikaraṇabhāvena. Etthāti rūpakkhandhapade. Yathā nīluppalapade uppalavisesanabhūtaṃ
tika-abh05t0:952_2: nīlaṃ visiṭṭhameva hoti, na yaṃ kiñci, evamidhāpi khandhavisesanabhūtaṃ rūpampi visiṭṭhameva
tika-abh05t0:952_3: siyāti dassento “kiṃ khandhato…pe… hotī”ti āha. Tathā “rūpañca taṃ khandho cā”ti
tika-abh05t0:952_4: samānādhikaraṇabhāveneva yaṃ rūpaṃ, so khandho. Yo khandho, taṃ rūpanti ayampi āpanno
tika-abh05t0:952_5: evāti āha “sabbeva…pe… visesitabbā”ti. Visesanena ca nāma niddhāritarūpena bhavitabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:952_6: avacchedakattā, na aniddhāritarūpenāti āha “kiṃ pana ta”ntiādi, tasseva gahitattā
tika-abh05t0:952_7: na piyarūpasātarūpassāti adhippāyo. Na hi taṃ khandhavisesanabhāvena gahitaṃ, vissajjanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:952_8: kataṃ tassevāti yojanā. Na khandhato aññaṃ rūpaṃ atthīti idaṃ ruppanaṭṭho rūpanti
tika-abh05t0:952_9: katvā vuttaṃ, na hi so khandhavinimutto atthi. Tenevāti yathāvuttarūpassa khandhavinimuttassa
tika-abh05t0:952_10: abhāveneva. “Piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, dassentenappaka”nti ca ādīsu atadatthassa rūpasaddassa
tika-abh05t0:952_11: labbhamānattā “tena rūpasaddenā”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. Vuccamānaṃ bhūtupādāyampi bhedaṃ
tika-abh05t0:952_12: dhammajātaṃ. Suddhenāti kevalena, rūpasaddena vināpīti attho. Tayidaṃ pakaraṇādiavacchinnataṃ
tika-abh05t0:952_13: sandhāya vuttaṃ, samānādhikaraṇataṃ vā. Yo hi rūpasaddena samānādhikaraṇo khandhasaddo,
tika-abh05t0:952_14: tena yathāvuttarūpasaddena viya tadattho vuccateva. Tenāha “khandhā rūpakkhandho”ti.
tika-abh05t0:952_15: Yadipi yathāvuttaṃ rūpaṃ khandho eva ca, khandho pana na rūpamevāti āha “na ca sabbe…pe…
tika-abh05t0:952_16: visesitabbā”ti. Tenevāti arūpasabhāvassa khandhassa atthibhāveneva. Teti khandhā.
tika-abh05t0:952_17: Vibhajitabbāti “khandhā rūpakkhandho”ti padaṃ uddharitvā “rūpakkhandho khandho ceva
tika-abh05t0:952_18: rūpakkhandho ca, avasesā khandhā na rūpakkhandho”tiādinā vibhāgena dassetabbā.
tika-abh05t0:953_0: Khandhānaṃ rūpavisesana…pe… saṃsayo hotīti ettha kiṃ khandhato aññāpi vedanā atthi,
tika-abh05t0:953_1: yato vinivattā vedanā khandhavisesanaṃ hoti, sabbe ca khandhā kiṃ khandhavisesanabhūtāya
tika-abh05t0:953_2: vedanāya visesitabbāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Kecīti anubhavanādippakārā. Kenaci
tika-abh05t0:954_0: Ettha ca rūpādipaṇṇatti khandhapaṇṇatti ca “rūpaṃ khandho, khandhā rūpakkhandho”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:954_1: visuṃ saha ca ruppanādike atthe pavattamānā kadāci avayavabhūte pavattati, kadāci
tika-abh05t0:954_2: samudāyabhūte, tassā pana tathā pavattanākāre niddhārite yasmā rūpādikkhandhā padato
tika-abh05t0:954_3: atthato ca visodhitā nāma honti tabbisayakaṅkhāpanodanato, tasmā “rūpakkhandho rūpañceva
tika-abh05t0:954_4: rūpakkhandho ca, rūpakkhandho rūpanti? Āmantā”tiādinayappavattena paṭhamavārena rūpādiavayavapadehi
tika-abh05t0:954_5: avayavattho viya samudāyatthopi vuccati, tathā samudāyapadehipīti ayamattho dassito.
tika-abh05t0:954_7: visesavācī viya rūpādiavayavapadehi sāmaññabhūtenapi taṃtaṃvisiṭṭhena khandhāvayavapadena
tika-abh05t0:954_8: so so eva samudāyattho vuccati, na sabboti ayamattho dassito. Khandhavinimuttassa
tika-abh05t0:954_9: yathādhippetassa abhāvā yadipi khandhoyeva rūpaṃ, so pana na sabbo rūpaṃ, atha kho
tika-abh05t0:954_10: tadekadeso, tathā vedanādayopīti ayamattho “rūpaṃ khandho, khandhā rūpa”ntiādinayappavattena
tika-abh05t0:954_12: pana catutthavārena “rūpaṃ khandho”ti rūpassa khandhabhāve nicchite khandho nāmāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:954_13: na kevalaṃ rūpameva, atha kho vedanādi cāti vedanādīnampi khandhabhāvappakāsane na
tika-abh05t0:954_14: sabbe khandhā vedanādivisesavanto, kecideva pana tena tena visesena tathā vuccantīti
tika-abh05t0:954_15: ayamattho dassito. Evaṃ dassentī cesā pāḷi khandhānaṃ yathāvuttapaṇṇattisodhanamukhena
tika-abh05t0:954_16: sarūpāvadhāraṇāya saṃvattati, tañca tesaṃ yāvadeva uppādādinicchayatthanti dassento
tika-abh05t0:955_0: Ekadesepi samudāyavohāro dissati yathā paṭo daḍḍho, samuddo diṭṭhoti āha “cakkāvayavabhāvato
tika-abh05t0:955_1: cakkānīti yamakāni vuttānī”ti. Bandhitvāti yamakabhāvena bandhitvā, yamakamūlabhāveneva
tika-abh05t0:955_2: vā. Mūlabhāvena gahaṇaṃ sambandhabhāvo, taṃsambandhatā ca mūlapadādīnaṃ nābhiādisadisatā
tika-abh05t0:955_3: daṭṭhabbā. Apubbassa vattabbassa abhāvato nayidha desanā maṇḍalabhāveneva sambajjhatīti
tika-abh05t0:955_4: āha “na maṇḍalabhāvena sambajjhanato”ti. Yadipi rūpakkhandhamūlake apubbaṃ natthi,
tika-abh05t0:955_5: vedanākkhandhādimūlakesu pana saññādimukhena desanappavattiyaṃ apubbavaseneva gato
tika-abh05t0:955_6: siyā maṇḍalabhāvena sambandho, na tathā pāṭho pavattoti āha “vedanākkhandha…pe… sambandhenā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:955_7: Pacchimassa purimena asambajjhanameva hi heṭṭhimasodhanaṃ. Suddhakkhandhalābhamattameva
tika-abh05t0:955_8: gahetvāti “khandhā rūpa”nti ettha khandhāti khandhasaddena labbhamānaṃ rūpādīhi asammissaṃ
tika-abh05t0:955_9: khandhaṭṭhamattameva uddesavasena gahetvā. Yadipi uddese khandhavisesanaṃ rūpādi
tika-abh05t0:955_10: “khandhā rūpa”nti suddharūpādimattameva gahitaṃ, tathāpi visesarahitassa sāmaññassa
tika-abh05t0:955_11: abhāvato tattha suddharūpādimattatāya aṭṭhatvā. Khandhavisesanabhāvasaṅkhātanti yathādhigataṃ
tika-abh05t0:955_12: khandhānaṃ visesanabhāvena kathitaṃ ruppanādikaṃ visesanatthaṃ dassetuṃ. Kevalameva
tika-abh05t0:955_13: taṃ aggaṇhanto khandhasaddena saha yojetvā…pe… vibhattattā suddhakkhandhavāroti vuttoti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:959_0: 26. Evaṃ vuttanti evaṃ dvārālambanehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammavibhāgavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:959_1: Piyasabhāvaṃ piyajātikaṃ “kathaṃ rūpena kho, āvuso”tiādīsu viya piyasabhāvaṭṭhena
tika-abh05t0:959_2: rūpaṃ, na ruppanaṭṭhenāti vuttaṃ “piyarūpaṃ…pe… rūpaṃ na rūpakkhandho”ti. Ruppanaṭṭhena
tika-abh05t0:959_4: anuppavisati, na rūpakkhandhanti āha “piyasabhāva…pe… na rūpakkhandhoti vutta”nti.
tika-abh05t0:959_5: “Yo pana yattha viseso”ti vutto visesasaddo nānuvattatīti adhippāyenāha “vacanaseso”ti.
tika-abh05t0:959_6: Na hi adhikārato labbhamānassa ajjhāharaṇakiccaṃ atthi. Diṭṭhisaññāti vā paduddhāroyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:959_7: veditabbo. Visesatā panassā “visesaṃ vaṇṇayissāmā”ti paṭiññāya eva pākaṭā. “Avasesā
tika-abh05t0:959_8: saṅkhārā”ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Saṃyojanavasena jānāti abhinivisatīti saññā diṭṭhīti
tika-abh05t0:959_9: āha “diṭṭhi eva saññā”ti. Diṭṭhi cāti ca-saddena avasiṭṭhaṃ papañcaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh05t0:959_10: Tathā hi “papañcasaññāsaṅkhā”ti ettha papañcasūdaniyaṃ vuttaṃ “saññānāmena vā papañcā eva vuttā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:960_0: 28. “Khandhā vedanākkhandho”ti etasmiṃ anulome yathā sarūpadassanena vissajjanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:960_1: labbhati, na evaṃ “na khandhā na vedanākkhandho”ti paṭilome, idha pana paṭivacanena
tika-abh05t0:960_2: vissajjananti tadatthaṃ vivaranto “khandhasaddappavattiyā ca abhāve vedanākkhandhasaddappavattiyā
tika-abh05t0:960_3: ca abhāvo”ti āha. Tena sattāpaṭisedhe ayaṃ na-kāroti dasseti. Saddaggahaṇañcettha
tika-abh05t0:960_4: saddanibandhanattā paññattiyā saddasabhāgataṃ vā sandhāya kataṃ. Paṇṇattisodhanañhetaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:960_6: abhāvaṃ dasseti. Yato vuttaṃ “na aññadhammasabbhāvo evettha pamāṇa”nti. Evañca katvātiādinā
tika-abh05t0:960_7: yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāṭhantarena samattheti. Kāmaṃ katthaci satipi khandhe natthi vedanākkhandho,
tika-abh05t0:960_8: akhandhattasabhāvā pana natthi vedanāti “na khandhā na vedanākkhandhoti? Āmantā”ti
tika-abh05t0:960_9: vuttanti evaṃ vā etaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paññattinibbānasaṅkhātā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:961_0: 39. “Rūpato aññe”ti ettha bhūtupādāya dhammo viya piyasabhāvopi rūpasaddābhidheyyatāsāmaññena
tika-abh05t0:961_1: gahitoti āha “lokuttarā vedanādayo daṭṭhabbā”ti. Appavattimattamevāti khandhasaddappavattiyā
tika-abh05t0:961_2: abhāve rūpasaddappavattiyā ca abhāvoti paṇṇattisodhanamattataṃyeva sandhāya vadati,
tika-abh05t0:961_3: tathā cāha “evañca katvā”tiādi. Tenetaṃ dasseti – yathā cakkhuto aññassa sabbassapi
tika-abh05t0:961_4: sabhāvadhammassa āyatanaggahaṇena gahitattā tadubhayavinimuttaṃ kiñci natthīti kevalaṃ
tika-abh05t0:961_5: paññattisodhanatthaṃ tameva abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “cakkhuñca āyatane ca ṭhapetvā avasesā
tika-abh05t0:961_6: na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatana”nti vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi tadatthameva ubhayavinimuttassa
tika-abh05t0:961_7: abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpañca khandhe ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva rūpaṃ na ca khandhā”ti
tika-abh05t0:961_8: vuttanti. Visamopaññāso. “Cakkhuñca āyatane ca ṭhapetvā”ti ettha hi avasesaggahaṇena
tika-abh05t0:961_9: gayhamānaṃ kiñci natthīti sakkā vattuṃ āyatanavinimuttassa sabhāvadhammassa abhāvā.
tika-abh05t0:961_10: Tenāha “yadi siyā”ti. “Rūpañca khandhe ca ṭhapetvā”ti ettha pana na tathā sakkā vattuṃ
tika-abh05t0:961_11: khandhavinimuttassa sabhāvadhammassa atthibhāvato. Yadi pana tādisaṃ khandhagataṃ
tika-abh05t0:961_12: dhammajātaṃ natthīti evamidaṃ vuttaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati yuttametaṃ siyā. Tathā hi “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:961_13: panā”tiādinā paññattiggahaṇameva uddharīyati. Taṇhāvatthu ca na siyā avasesaggahaṇena
tika-abh05t0:961_14: gayhamānanti ānetvā sambandho. Khandho ca siyāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:964_0: 50-205. Missakakālabhedesu yamakesu padānaṃ bhinnakālattā siyā atthavisesoti āha
tika-abh05t0:964_2: vivarati. Tenāti atthavisesābhāvena. Etthāti etasmiṃ pavattivārapāṭhe, etissaṃ vā
tika-abh05t0:964_3: pavattivāravaṇṇanāyaṃ. Cha eva vuttā, na navāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “atītenā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:964_4: Ete pana tayoti attanā visuṃ anantaraṃ dassite sandhāyāha. Yathādassitāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:964_5: niddhāretvā dassitabbākārā paccuppannenātītādayo ye pāḷiyaṃ ujukameva āgatā. “Na
tika-abh05t0:964_6: visuṃ vijjantī”ti vuttamevatthaṃ “tattha tattha hī”tiādinā pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:964_7: paṭilomapucchāhīti “yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho uppajjittha, tassa rūpakkhandho
tika-abh05t0:964_8: uppajjatī”ti evamādikāhi paṭhamapade vuttassa paṭilomavasena pavattāhi. Tenevāti
tika-abh05t0:964_9: nayato yojetuṃ sakkuṇeyyattā eva. Missakakālabhedesu cāti na kevalaṃ amissakakālabhedesuyeva,
tika-abh05t0:964_10: atha kho missakakālabhedesu cāti attho. Na yojanāsukaratāya eva purime ayojanā, atha
tika-abh05t0:965_0: Yena kāraṇenāti yena ekapadadvayasaṅgahitānaṃ khandhānaṃ uppādassa nirodhassa lābhasaṅkhātena
tika-abh05t0:965_1: kāraṇena. Yathākkamaṃ purepañho pacchāpañhoti ca nāmaṃ vuttaṃ. Ca-saddena purepacchāpañhoti
tika-abh05t0:965_2: ca nāmaṃ vuttanti niddhāretvā yojetabbaṃ. Tattha pana “ekapadadvayasaṅgahitāna”nti
tika-abh05t0:965_3: idaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā gahetabbaṃ. Tamevatthampi vivarati “yassa hī”tiādinā. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:965_4: yassāti yassa pañhassa. “Pañho”ti cettha pucchanavasena pavattaṃ vacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:965_6: taṃvissajjanaṃ, taṃ vā yathāvuttaṃ vissajjanaṃ etassāti taṃvissajjano, tassa taṃvissajjanassa.
tika-abh05t0:965_7: Purimakoṭṭhāsenāti purimena uddesapadena. Tena hi vissajjanapadassa samānatthatā
tika-abh05t0:965_8: idha sadisatthatā. Ekena padenāti ekena padhānāppadhānena yamakapadena, na paṭhamapadenevāti
tika-abh05t0:965_9: attho. Uppādanirodhalābhasāmaññamattenāti uppādassa vā nirodhassa vā labbhamānatāya
tika-abh05t0:965_10: samānatāmattena. Sanniṭṭhānapada…pe… yuttanti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yattha rūpakkhandho
tika-abh05t0:965_11: nuppajjatī”tiādinā purepañhassa dassitattā vuttaṃ. Yadipi tattha “uppajjatī”ti vissajjitattā
tika-abh05t0:965_12: vedanākkhandhassa uppādo labbhatīti vuttaṃ, yo pana sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahito rūpakkhandhassa
tika-abh05t0:965_13: anuppādo pāḷiyaṃ anuññātarūpena ṭhito, tassa vasena purepañho yuttoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:966_0: “Yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā”ti ettha rūpakkhandhassa
tika-abh05t0:966_2: padhānabhāvena vutto. Eseva nayo aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesūti āha “sanniṭṭhānatthasseva
tika-abh05t0:966_3: paṭikkhipanaṃ paṭikkhepo”ti. “Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati, tassa vedanākkhandho
tika-abh05t0:966_4: nirujjhatī”ti ettha pana rūpakkhandhassa uppādalakkhaṇaṃ katvā vedanākkhandhassa
tika-abh05t0:966_5: nirodho pucchīyatīti so eva “no”ti paṭisedhīyati. Esa nayo aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesūti
tika-abh05t0:966_7: paṭisedhitamāha. Yadi evaṃ pāḷigatipaṭisedhavissajjanānaṃ ko visesoti āha “tattha uppattī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:967_0: Tadekadesapakkhepavasenāti tesaṃ catunnaṃ pañhānaṃ pañcannañca vissajjanānaṃ ekadesassa
tika-abh05t0:967_1: pakkhipanavasena. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “paṭhame ṭhāne paripuṇṇapañhassa purimakoṭṭhāse
tika-abh05t0:967_2: sarūpadassanenā”tiādi. Yo panettha pañhesu vissajjanesu ca sattavīsatiyā ṭhānesu
tika-abh05t0:967_3: pakkhepaṃ labhati, taṃ dassetuṃ “paripuṇṇapañho evā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pāḷivavatthānadassanāditoti
tika-abh05t0:967_4: ettha ādi-saddena pucchāvibhaṅgo vissajjanāṭhānāni ekasmiṃ pañhe yojanānayoti imesaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t0:968_0: Suddhāvāsānantiādi pāḷiyā padaṃ uddharitvā atthadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. “Yassa yattha
tika-abh05t0:968_1: rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā”ti imassa vissajjanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:968_2: hoti “suddhāvāsānaṃ tesaṃ tatthā”ti. Tattha ekabhūmiyaṃ dutiyā upapatti natthīti
tika-abh05t0:968_3: ekissā bhūmiyā ekassa ariyapuggalassa dutiyavāraṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ natthīti attho.
tika-abh05t0:968_4: Tatiyavārādīsu vattabbameva natthi. Svāyamattho yathā ñāpito hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “paṭisandhito
tika-abh05t0:968_5: pabhuti hi…pe… pavattā”ti vuttaṃ. Tena addhāpaccuppannavasenāyaṃ desanā pavattāti
tika-abh05t0:968_6: dasseti. Ādānanikkhepaparicchinnaṃ kammajasantānaṃ ekattena gahetvā tassa vasena
tika-abh05t0:968_7: uppādanirodhesu vuccamānesu akammajesu kusalādīsu kathanti codanāyaṃ tepi idha taṃnissitā
tika-abh05t0:968_8: eva katāti dassento āha “tasmiñhi…pe… dassitā”ti. Tenevāti kammajasantāneneva. Tasmāti
tika-abh05t0:968_9: ekakammanibbattassa vipākasantānassa ekattena gahitattā. Tassāti kammajasantānassa.
tika-abh05t0:968_10: Pañcasu suddhāvāsesu yathā paccekaṃ “ekissā bhūmiyā dutiyā upapatti natthī”ti yathāvuttapāḷiyā
tika-abh05t0:968_11: viññāyati, evaṃ “suddhāvāsāna”nti avisesavacanato sakalepi suddhāvāse sā natthīti
tika-abh05t0:968_12: tāya kasmā na viññāyatīti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā sayameva pariharituṃ “kasmā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t0:968_13: Tattha suddhāvāsesu heṭṭhābhūmikassa asati indriyaparipāke uparibhūmisamuppatti na
tika-abh05t0:968_14: sakkā paṭisedhetuṃ uddhaṃsotavacanato. Uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotañcāti hi uddhaṃsoto.
tika-abh05t0:968_15: Tenāha “uddhaṃsotapāḷisabbhāvā”ti. Saṃsandetabbāti yathā na virujjhanti, evaṃ netabbā.
tika-abh05t0:969_0: Etena sanniṭṭhānenāti aṅkitokāsabhāvirūpuppādasannissayena nicchayena. Visesitā tathābhāvirūpabhāvino.
tika-abh05t0:969_1: Asaññasattāpīti na kevalaṃ pañcavokārā eva, atha kho asaññasattāpi. Te eva asaññasatte
tika-abh05t0:969_2: eva gahetvā purimakoṭṭhāseti adhippāyo. Tena ye sanniṭṭhānena vajjitāti tena yathāvuttasanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh05t0:969_3: ye virahitā, te tathā na vattabbāti attho. Idāni “te tato”tiādinā dasseti. Tatoti
tika-abh05t0:969_4: asaññābhavato. Pacchimabhavikānanti ettha pacchimabhavaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “kiṃ pañcavokārādī”tiādi
tika-abh05t0:969_5: vuttaṃ. Apacchimabhavikānampi arūpānaṃ arūpabhave yathā rūpakkhandho nuppādi, evaṃ
tika-abh05t0:969_6: tattha pacchimabhavikānaṃ vedanākkhandhopīti āha “etena sanniṭṭhānena saṅgahitattā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:969_7: Tenāha “tesaṃ…pe… āhā”ti. Tattha tesanti pacchimabhavikānaṃ. Tatthāti arūpabhave.
tika-abh05t0:969_9: suddhāvāsānaṃ khandhabhedassa parinibbānapariyāyo oḷārikadosappahānato kilesūpasamasāmaññena vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:970_0: Sabbesañhi tesanti taṃtaṃbhūmiyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ sabbesaṃ suddhāvāsānaṃ. Yathā panātiādinā
tika-abh05t0:970_1: vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Anantā lokadhātuyoti idaṃ okāsassa paricchedābhāvaṃyeva
tika-abh05t0:970_2: dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Puggalavasena samānādhāratāya samānakālattena asambhavanto okāsavasena
tika-abh05t0:970_3: pana sambhavanto saṃkiṇṇā viya hontīti āha “saṃkiṇṇatā hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:973_0: 206-208. Tassāpīti puggalokāsavārassapi. Okāse puggalassevāti yathāgahite okāse yo
tika-abh05t0:973_1: puggalo, tasseva okāsavisiṭṭhapuggalassevāti attho. Yathā pana puggalavāre labbhamāne
tika-abh05t0:973_2: puggalokāsavāropi labbhati, evaṃ okāsavāropi labbheyyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “okāsavāropi
tika-abh05t0:973_3: cā”ti. Tasmāti yasmā vuccamānopi okāso puggalassa visesabhāveneva vucceyya, na visuṃ, tasmā.
tika-abh05t0:974_0: Aññathāti pavattivāre viya ādānanikkhepaparicchinnaṃ kammajasantānaṃ ekattena gahetvā
tika-abh05t0:974_3: ca kataṃ, tasmā pavatte cittakkhaṇavasenevettha tayo addho labbhantīti attho. “Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca
tika-abh05t0:974_4: arahantañcā”ti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ “rūpakkhandhañca na parijānanti vedanākkhandhañca
tika-abh05t0:974_5: na parijānitthā”ti dvīhi padehi yathākkamaṃ sambandho. “Ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā”ti
tika-abh05t0:974_6: pana paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Aggamagga…pe… natthīti iminā arahattamaggañāṇasseva pariññāmatthakappattiyā
tika-abh05t0:974_7: pariññākiccaṃ sātisayaṃ, tadabhāvā na itaresanti dasseti. Yato tasseva vajirūpamatā
tika-abh05t0:974_8: vuttā, sesānañca vijjūpamatā. Tenāti tena yathāvuttena vacanena. Tadavasesasabbapuggaleti
tika-abh05t0:974_9: tato aggamaggasamaṅgito avasesasabbapuggale. Imaṃ pana yathāvuttadosaṃ pariharantā
tika-abh05t0:980_0: 1-9. Vuttanayenāti “avayavapadehi vutto ekadeso sakalo vā samudāyapadānaṃ attho,
tika-abh05t0:980_1: samudāyapadehi pana vutto ekantena avayavapadānaṃ attho”tiādinā vuttena nayena. Etena
tika-abh05t0:980_2: yathāvuttaatthavaṇṇanānayadassanatāya sabbapaṇṇattivārādīsu yathārahaṃ attho netabboti dasseti.
tika-abh05t0:983_0: 10-17. Vāyanaṃ savisayaṃ byāpetvā pavattanaṃ, tayidaṃ yathā gandhāyatane labbhati,
tika-abh05t0:983_1: evaṃ sīlādīsupīti pāḷiyaṃ “sīlagandho”tiādi vuttaṃ “sīlādiyeva gandho”ti katvā. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:983_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sīlagandho…pe… nāmānī”ti. Yasmā pana savisayabyāpanaṃ tattha pasaṭabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:983_3: pākaṭabhāvo vā hoti, tasmā “pasāraṇaṭṭhena pākaṭabhāvaṭṭhena vā”ti vuttaṃ. Attano
tika-abh05t0:983_4: vatthussa sūcanaṃ vā vāyanaṃ. “Devakāyā samāgatā, paṇṇattidhammā”tiādīsu samūhapaññattīsupi
tika-abh05t0:983_5: kāyadhammasaddā āgatāti “sasabhāva”nti viseseti. Kāyavacanena…pe… natthīti idaṃ “na
tika-abh05t0:986_1: “yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjati, tassa saddāyatanaṃ uppajjatī”tiādikaṃ ekekaṃ. Pañcāti
tika-abh05t0:986_2: “yassa saddāyatanaṃ uppajjati, tassa gandhāyatanaṃ uppajjatī”tiādīni pañca. Pucchāmattalābhena
tika-abh05t0:986_3: saṅgahaṃ anujānanto “vissajjanavasena hāpetabbānī”ti āha. “Vakkhati hī”tiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:987_0: Sadisavissajjananti sāmaññavacanaṃ visesaniviṭṭhameva hotīti taṃ visesaṃ dassento
tika-abh05t0:987_1: “puggalavārameva sandhāya vutta”nti vatvā tassā pana sadisavissajjanatāya abyāpitattā
tika-abh05t0:987_2: yattha sadisaṃ, tatthāpi vissajjitanti dassento “okāsavāre pana…pe… vissajjita”nti
tika-abh05t0:987_3: āha. Tattha tanti dutiyaṃ. Puggalavārepīti yattha sadisaṃ vissajjanaṃ, tattha puggalavārepi
tika-abh05t0:987_4: vissajjitaṃ, pageva okāsavāreti adhippāyo. Virattakāmakammanibbattassāti bhāvanābalena
tika-abh05t0:987_5: viratto kāmo etenāti virattakāmaṃ, rūpāvacarakammaṃ, tato nibbattassa. Paṭisandhi
tika-abh05t0:987_6: eva bījaṃ paṭisandhibījaṃ, tassa. “Evaṃsabhāvattā”ti etena ekantato kāmataṇhānidānakammahetukāni
tika-abh05t0:987_7: ghānādīnīti dasseti. Gandhādayo ca na santīti sabbena sabbaṃ tesampi abhāvaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh05t0:987_8: vadati. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-abh05t0:988_0: “Sacca”nti yathāvuttavasena gahetabbaṃ codakena vuttamatthaṃ sampaṭicchitvā puna
tika-abh05t0:988_1: yenādhippāyena tāni yamakāni sadisavissajjanāni, taṃ dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:988_3: aghānakānaṃ upapajjantāna”ntiādinā nayena jivhākāyāyatanayamakāni yathā sadisavissajjanāni,
tika-abh05t0:988_4: tathā idha ghānāyatanamūlakesu ghānāyatanayamakena tāni jivhākāyāyatanayamakāni “yassa
tika-abh05t0:988_5: ghānāyatanaṃ uppajjati, tassa jivhāyatanaṃ uppajjatīti? Āmantā”tiādinā nayena sadisavissajjanānīti.
tika-abh05t0:988_6: Evamettha ubhayesaṃ visuṃ aññamaññaṃ sadisavissajjanatāya idaṃ vuttaṃ, na ekajjhaṃ
tika-abh05t0:988_7: aññamaññaṃ sadisavissajjanatāya. Tenāha “tasmā tattha tattheva sadisavissajjanatā
tika-abh05t0:988_8: pāḷianāruḷhatāya kāraṇa”nti. Evañca sati cakkhāyatanamūlaggahaṇaṃ kimatthiyanti āha
tika-abh05t0:988_10: nidassanabhāveneva, na pana tesaṃ nidassitabbehi sabbathā sadisavissajjanatāyāti
tika-abh05t0:988_11: adhippāyo. “Yebhuyyatāyā”ti vuttaṃ yebhuyyataṃ dassetuṃ “tesu hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:989_1: kattabbanti imamatthaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Sāti dutiyapucchā. Ghānāyatanayamakenāti cakkhāyatanamūlakesu
tika-abh05t0:989_3: sesāni. Sadisavissajjanattā anāruḷhānīti ettha “anāruḷhānī”ti ettakameva tathā-saddena
tika-abh05t0:989_5: idāni “kāraṇasāmaññenā”ti vuttassa sadisavissajjanattassa tattha abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh05t0:989_7: etthāpi “sahacāritāyā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ, tathā “gabbhaseyyakesu ca
tika-abh05t0:989_8: pavattamānāna”nti. Itarāni ghānāyatanamūlakāni jivhākāyāyatanayamakāni dve na vissajjīyanti,
tika-abh05t0:989_9: ghānāyatanamūlakesu ca yamakesu vissajjitesu itaradvayamūlakāni jivhākāyāyatanamūlakāni
tika-abh05t0:989_10: na vissajjīyanti avisesattā appavisesattā cāti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha kāyāyatanayamake
tika-abh05t0:989_11: dutiyapucchāvasena appaviseso, itaravasena aviseso veditabbo. Rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi
tika-abh05t0:989_12: saddhinti idaṃ rūpāyatanamūlakamanāyatanavasena vuttanti āha “rūpāyatana…pe… adhippāyo”ti.
tika-abh05t0:989_15: acittakāna”ntiādinā vuttena nayena. Ādipucchānanti tesaṃyeva yamakānaṃ paṭhamapucchānaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:990_0: Heṭṭhimehīti idaṃ avisesavacanampi yesu sadisavissajjanatā sambhavati, tadapekkhanti
tika-abh05t0:990_2: vissajjanaṃ, yo tattha na sabbena sabbaṃ uddesānurūpaguṇena upalabbhati, tassa akathanampi
tika-abh05t0:990_3: atthato vissajjanameva nāma hotīti āha “avissajjaneneva alabbhamānatādassanena vissajjitāni nāma hontī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:991_0: Cakkhuvikalasotavikalā viya cakkhusotavikalopi labbhatīti so pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pi-saddena
tika-abh05t0:991_1: saṅgahitoti dassento “jaccandhampi…pe… veditabbo”ti āha. Paripuṇṇāyatanameva opapātikaṃ
tika-abh05t0:991_2: sandhāya vuttanti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva-saddoti tassa ṭhānaṃ dassento “vuttamevāti
tika-abh05t0:991_3: attho”ti vatvā tena paripuṇṇāyatanassa tattha aniyatattā aparipuṇṇāyatanassapi saṅgaho
tika-abh05t0:991_4: siddhoti dassento “tena jaccandhabadhirampi sandhāya vuttatā na nivāritā hotī”ti āha.
tika-abh05t0:992_0: 22-254. Tasmiṃ puggalassa anāmaṭṭhattāti kasmā vuttaṃ, yāvatā “rūpībrahmalokaṃ pucchatī”ti
tika-abh05t0:992_2: paṭiññāta”nti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetukāmo “nanū”tiādimāha. Gabbhaseyyakabhāvaṃ
tika-abh05t0:992_3: gantvā parinibbāyissatīti pacchimabhavikaṃ sandhāyāha. Tadavatthassāti pacchimabhavāvatthassa.
tika-abh05t0:993_0: Atha kasmāti etthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yadi “yassa rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjissati, tassa
tika-abh05t0:993_1: cakkhāyatanaṃ uppajjissatī”ti pucchāyaṃ vuttena vidhinā paṭiññātabbaṃ, atha kasmā
tika-abh05t0:993_2: atha kena kāraṇena paṭilome “yassa vā pana rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:993_3: nuppajjissatī”ti pucchāya “āmantā”ti paṭiññātaṃ, nanu idaṃ aññamaññaṃ viruddhanti?
tika-abh05t0:993_4: Nanūtiādināpi codako tameva virodhaṃ vibhāveti. No ca nuppajjissati uppajjissati
tika-abh05t0:993_5: evāti attho. “Tasmiṃ bhave”tiādi tassa parihāro. Tattha tasmiṃ bhaveti yasmiṃ bhave
tika-abh05t0:993_6: “rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissatī”ti vuttaṃ pavattamānattā, tasmiṃ bhave. Anāgatabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:993_7: avacanatoti bhāvībhāvena avattabbato āraddhuppādabhāvena pavattamānattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:993_8: Tenevāha “bhavantare hī”tiādi. Na pana vuccatīti sambandho. Evañca katvātiādinā pāṭhantarena
tika-abh05t0:994_0: Yasmiṃ attabhāve yehi āyatanehi bhavitabbaṃ, taṃtaṃāyatananibbattakakammena avassaṃbhāvīāyatanassa
tika-abh05t0:994_1: sattassa, santānassa vā, “yassa vā pana rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjissati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:994_2: uppajjissatīti? Āmantā, yassa vā pana rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:994_3: nuppajjissatīti? Āmantā”ti ca evaṃ pavattaṃ pucchādvayavissajjanaṃ āyatanapaṭilābhassa
tika-abh05t0:994_4: jātibhāvato suṭṭhu upapannaṃ bhavati. Pacchimabhavikādayoti ettha ādi-saddena arūpe
tika-abh05t0:994_5: uppajjitvā parinibbāyanakā saṅgayhanti. Idampi vissajjanaṃ. Abhinanditabbattāti “āmantā”ti
tika-abh05t0:995_0: Yaṃ pana aghānakānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānanti vuttanti sambandho. Yassa vipāko
tika-abh05t0:995_2: vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ panīdisaṃ kammaṃ atthīti viññāyatīti āha “yassa yatthā”tiādi. Evampi
tika-abh05t0:995_3: gabbhaseyyako eva idha aghānakoti adhippetoti kathamidaṃ viññāyatīti codanāya “na
tika-abh05t0:995_4: hī”tiādiṃ vatvā tamatthaṃ sādhetuṃ “dhammahadayavibhaṅge”tiādi vuttaṃ. Avacanattampi
tika-abh05t0:995_5: hi yathādhammasāsane abhidhamme paṭikkhepoyevāti. Idhāti imasmiṃ āyatanayamake. Yathādassitāsūti
tika-abh05t0:995_6: “yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, yassa yattha
tika-abh05t0:995_7: ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa tattha rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti ca dassitappakārāsu
tika-abh05t0:995_8: pucchāsu. Āmantāti vuttanti atha kasmā na viññāyatīti yojanā. Etāsu pucchāsu kasmā
tika-abh05t0:995_9: paṭivacanena vissajjanaṃ na katanti adhippāyo. Sanniṭṭhānena gahitatthassāti “yassa
tika-abh05t0:995_10: vā pana sotāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati, yassa yattha ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti
tika-abh05t0:995_11: ca evamādikena sanniṭṭhānapadena gahitassa atthassa. Ekadese saṃsayatthassa sambhavenāti
tika-abh05t0:995_13: paṭivacanassa akaraṇato “āmantā”ti paṭivacanavissajjanassa akattabbato atthassa abhinditvā
tika-abh05t0:995_14: ekajjhaṃ katvā avattabbato. Tenāha “bhinditabbehi na paṭivacanavissajjanaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:996_0: Yadi siyāti bhinditvā vattabbepi atthe yadi paṭivacanavissajjanaṃ siyā, paripuṇṇavissajjanameva
tika-abh05t0:996_1: na siyā anokāsabhāvato bhinditabbato cāti attho. Tathā hi “pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:996_2: arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ, ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:996_3: tesaṃ sotāyatanañca nuppajjissati, cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjatī”ti ca, tathā “rūpāvacare
tika-abh05t0:996_4: parinibbantānaṃ, arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha ghānāyatanañca na nirujjhati, rūpāyatanañca
tika-abh05t0:996_5: na nirujjhissatī”ti ca tattha vibhāgavasena pavatto pāṭhaseso. Atha kasmāti yadi
tika-abh05t0:996_6: abhinditabbe paṭivacanavissajjanaṃ, na bhinditabbe, evaṃ sante “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:996_7: uppajjati, tassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjatīti? Āmantā”ti iminā paṭivacanavissajjanena
tika-abh05t0:996_8: gabbhaseyyakānaṃ somanassapaṭisandhi natthīti kasmā na viññāyati, bhinditabbe na
tika-abh05t0:996_9: paṭivacanavissajjanaṃ hotīti sampaṭicchitabbanti? Taṃ na, aññāya pāḷiyā tadatthassa
tika-abh05t0:997_0: “Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, na nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati, nuppajjissatīti?
tika-abh05t0:997_1: Āmantā”ti tasseva cittassa nirodho anāgatabhāvena tassa uppādakkhaṇe yathā vutto,
tika-abh05t0:997_2: evaṃ tasseva kammajasantānassa nirodho tassa uppāde anāgatabhāvena vattabbo. Tenetaṃ
tika-abh05t0:997_3: dasseti “ekacittassa nāma uppādakkhaṇe nirodho anāgatabhāvena vuccati, kimaṅgaṃ pana
tika-abh05t0:997_4: ekasantānassā”ti. Sabbattha sabbasmiṃ anāgatavāre. Upapajjantānaṃ eva vasena so nirodho
tika-abh05t0:997_5: tathā anāgatabhāvena vutto, kasmā panettha nirodho upapannānaṃ vasena na vuttoti
tika-abh05t0:997_6: āha “uppannānaṃ panā”tiādi. Tasseva yathāpavattassa kammajasantānassa eva. Tasmāti
tika-abh05t0:997_7: yasmā uppādakkhaṇato uddhaṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hoti, tasmā. Bhede satipi kālabhedāmasanassa
tika-abh05t0:997_8: kāraṇe satipi. Anāgatakālāmasanavaseneva nirodhasseva vasena vissajjanadvayaṃ upapannameva
tika-abh05t0:997_9: yuttameva hotīti. Aññesaṃ vasena nirodhasseva vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā “arahata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:998_0: Yadi upapattianantaraṃ nirodho āraddho nāma hoti, atha kasmā cutiyā nirodhavacananti
tika-abh05t0:998_1: codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tanniṭṭhānabhāvato pana cutiyā nirodhavacana”nti. Tanniṭṭhānabhāvatoti
tika-abh05t0:998_2: tassa santānassa niṭṭhānabhāvato. Pavattetiādi vuttassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:998_3: tassāti santānassa. Vakkhatītiādipi pavatte nirodhaṃ anādiyitvā cutinirodhasseva
tika-abh05t0:998_4: gahitatāya kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tenāti tena yathāvuttena pāṭhantaravacanena. Etthāti etasmiṃ
tika-abh05t0:998_5: “yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhissatī”tiādike āyatanayamake. Yadi pavatte niruddhassapi
tika-abh05t0:998_6: cutiyā eva nirodho icchito, “sacakkhukāna”ntiādi kathanti āha “sacakkhukānantiādīsu
tika-abh05t0:998_7: ca paṭiladdhacakkhukānantiādinā attho viññāyatī”ti. Teti arūpe pacchimabhavikā. Acakkhukavacanañca sāvasesanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:1002_0: 1-19. Saddadhātusambandhānanti idaṃ yāni cakkhudhātādimūlakesu saddayamakāni, sabbāni
tika-abh05t0:1002_1: ca saddadhātumūlakāni, tāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi tāni cakkhuviññāṇadhātādisambandhāni
tika-abh05t0:1002_2: viya cutipaṭisandhivasena labbhanti, eteneva āyatanayamakepi pavattivāre saddadhātusambandhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1006_2: Tasmiṃ dukkhadukkhe visayabhūte. Esa dukkhasaddo “dukkhaṃ dukkhasacca”nti ettha paṭhamo
tika-abh05t0:1006_3: dukkhasaddo. Tañca dukkhadukkhaṃ. “Dukkhaṃ dukkhasacca”nti ettha dukkhameva dukkhasaccanti
tika-abh05t0:1006_4: nayidaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ, dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccamevāti pana icchitabbanti āha
tika-abh05t0:1006_5: “ekantena dukkhasaccamevā”ti. Saccavibhaṅge vuttesu samudayesu koci phaladhammesu
tika-abh05t0:1006_6: natthīti saccavibhaṅge pañcadhā vuttesu samudayesu ekopi phalasabhāvesu natthi, phalasabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:1006_7: natthīti attho. “Phaladhammo natthī”ti ca pāṭho. Maggasaddo ca phalaṅgesūti sāmaññaphalaṅgesu
tika-abh05t0:1006_9: pavattati kāraṇūpacārenāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “na maggakiccasabbhāvā”tiādi. Tasmāti
tika-abh05t0:1006_10: yasmā saccadesanāya pabhavādisabhāvā eva dhammā samudayādipariyāyena vuttā, na appabhavādisabhāvā,
tika-abh05t0:1006_11: tasmā. Ettha ca tebhūmakadhammānaṃ yathārahaṃ dukkhasamudayasaccantogadhattā asaccasabhāve
tika-abh05t0:1006_12: sabhāvadhamme ca uddharanto phaladhamme eva uddhari. Nanu ca maggasampayuttāpi dhammā
tika-abh05t0:1006_13: asaccasabhāvāti tepi uddharitabbāti? Na, tesaṃ maggagatikattā. “Phaladhammesū”ti
tika-abh05t0:1006_14: ettha dhammaggahaṇena vā phalasampayuttadhammānaṃ viya tesampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1007_0: Padasodhanena…pe… idha gahitāti etena asaccasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ pakaraṇena nivattitataṃ
tika-abh05t0:1007_1: āha. Tesanti dukkhādīnaṃ. Tabbisesanayogavisesanti tena dukkhādivisesanayogena visiṭṭhataṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1007_3: Yathā cetthāti yathā etasmiṃ saccayamake suddhasaccavāre saccavisesanabhūtā eva dukkhādayo
tika-abh05t0:1007_4: gahitā. Evaṃ khandhayamakādīsupīti na suddhasaccavāre eva ayaṃ nayo dassitoti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1007_6: vuttattā vattabbameva natthīti “suddhakkhandhādivāresū”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā cetthāpi
tika-abh05t0:1007_7: suddhavāre eva ayaṃ nayo dassito. Yadi suddhakkhandhādivāresu khandhādivisesanabhūtānameva
tika-abh05t0:1007_8: rūpādīnaṃ gahaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, atha kasmā khandhādivisesanato aññesampi rūpādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1007_9: vasena attho dassitoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādi. Purimo eva attho
tika-abh05t0:1010_0: 27-164. Dukkhapariññā yāva dukkhasamatikkamanatthāti sappadesaṃ pavattāpi sā tadatthāvahā
tika-abh05t0:1010_1: bhaveyyāti kassaci āsaṅkā siyāti dassento āha “ariyattā…pe… katvā vutta”nti. Keci
tika-abh05t0:1010_2: panettha “antimabhave ṭhitattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yujjati upapattiyā dukkhavicārattā,
tika-abh05t0:1010_3: na ca sabbe suddhāvāsā antimabhavikā uddhaṃsotavacanato. “Yassa dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjatī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1010_4: uppādāvatthā. Avisesena dukkhasaccapariyāpannā dhammā sambandhībhāveneva taṃsamaṅgī
tika-abh05t0:1010_5: ca puggalo vuttoti dassento “sabbe upapajjantā”tiādiṃ vatvā svāyamattho yasmā nicchayarūpena
tika-abh05t0:1010_6: gahito, nicchitasseva ca atthassa vibhāgadassanena bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā “tesveva…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1010_7: upapannamevā”ti āha. Tattha tesveva keci dassīyantīti sambandho. Ekakoṭṭhāsuppattisamaṅginoti
tika-abh05t0:1011_0: Ettha cātiādinā “sabbesa”ntiādipāḷiyā piṇḍatthaṃ dasseti. Tattha samudayasaccuppādavomissassa
tika-abh05t0:1011_1: dukkhasaccuppādassāti idaṃ anādare sāmivacanaṃ. Katthaci samudayasaccuppādavomissepi
tika-abh05t0:1011_3: vuttanti yojanā. Keci pana “samudayasaccāvomissassā”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ “taṃrahitassā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1011_4: idaṃ purimapadassa atthavivaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Taṃsahitassāti samudayasaccuppādasahitassa
tika-abh05t0:1011_5: dukkhasaccuppādassa dassanavasena vuttanti yojanā. Tesanti asaññasattānaṃ, pavattiyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1011_6: dukkhasaccassa uppādo “pavatte”tiādinā vuttesu dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesu na gahitoti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1011_7: Paṭisandhiyaṃ pana tesaṃ uppādassa paṭhamakoṭṭhāsena gahitatā dassitā eva. Tathā
tika-abh05t0:1011_8: nirodho cāti yathā asaññasattānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ dukkhasaccassa uppādo paṭhamakoṭṭhāsena
tika-abh05t0:1011_9: gahito, pavattiyaṃ pana so dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi na gahito, tathā tesaṃ dukkhasaccassa
tika-abh05t0:1011_10: nirodhopīti attho. Tathā hi “sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte taṇhāvippayuttacittassa
tika-abh05t0:1011_11: bhaṅgakkhaṇe”tiādinā nirodhavāre pāḷi pavattā. Eseva nayoti yvāyaṃ “ettha cā”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:1011_12: samudayasaccayamake pāḷiyā atthanayo vutto, maggasaccayamakepi eseva nayo, evameva
tika-abh05t0:1011_13: tatthāpi attho netabboti attho. Tathā hi “sabbesaṃ upapajjantāna”ntiādinā tattha pāḷi pavattā.
tika-abh05t0:1012_0: Evañca satīti evaṃ khaṇavasena okāsaggahaṇe satīti yathāvuttamatthaṃ ananujānanavasena
tika-abh05t0:1012_1: paccāmasati. Etassa vissajjaneti etassa yamakapadassa vissajjane. “Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe,
tika-abh05t0:1012_2: arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe, yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti,
tika-abh05t0:1012_3: tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe, asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1012_4: uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha samudayasaccaṃ uppajjissatī”ti purimakoṭṭhāsassa āgatattā
tika-abh05t0:1012_5: virodho natthīti “pacchimakoṭṭhāse”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tasmāti yasmā na upapatticittuppādakkhaṇo
tika-abh05t0:1012_6: bhāvino samudayapaccuppādassa ādhāro, atha kho kāmāvacarādiokāso, tasmā. Puggalokāsavāro
tika-abh05t0:1012_7: hesāti yasmā puggalokāsavāro esa, tasmā “tesaṃ tatthā”ti ettha okāsavasena tattha-saddassa
tika-abh05t0:1012_8: attho veditabbo. Yadi puggalokāsavāre kāmāvacarādiokāsavaseneva attho gahetabbo,
tika-abh05t0:1012_9: na khaṇavasena, atha kasmā “sabbesaṃ upapajjantāna”ntiādinā okāsaṃ anāmasitvā tattha
tika-abh05t0:1012_10: vissajjanaṃ pavattanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha…pe… so evā”ti. Tattha tatthāti
tika-abh05t0:1013_0: Kecīti dhammasirittheraṃ sandhāyāha. So hi “pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1013_1: nuppajjatī”ti ettha cittajarūpameva adhippetaṃ cittapaṭibaddhavuttittāti kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1013_2: vadati. Apare “arūpeti imaṃ purimāpekkhampi hotīti tena pavattaṃ visesetvā arūpabhavavasena
tika-abh05t0:1013_3: ayamattho vutto, tasmā ‘yassa vā pana samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati, tassa dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1013_4: uppajjatīti? No’tiādīsupi evamattho veditabbo”ti vadanti. Puggalo na cittaṃ apekkhitvāva
tika-abh05t0:1013_5: gahitoti idaṃ cittassa anadhikatattā vuttaṃ. Yattha pana samudayasaccassa uppādanicchayo,
tika-abh05t0:1013_6: tattheva tassa anuppādanicchayenapi bhavitabbaṃ cittena ca vinā puggalasseva anupalabbhanatoti
tika-abh05t0:1013_7: “yassa samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjatī”ti ettha samudayasaccādhāraṃ cittaṃ atthato gahitamevāti
tika-abh05t0:1013_8: sakkā viññātuṃ. Apica indriyabaddhepi na sabbo rūpuppādo ekantena cittuppādādhīnoti
tika-abh05t0:1013_9: sakkā vattuṃ cittuppattiyā vināpi tattha rūpuppattidassanato, tasmā cittajarūpameva
tika-abh05t0:1013_10: cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppajjati, na itaraṃ, itaraṃ pana tassa tīsupi khaṇesu uppajjatīti
tika-abh05t0:1013_11: niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. Vibhajitabbā avibhattā nāma natthīti siyāyaṃ pasaṅgo paṭhamavāre,
tika-abh05t0:1013_12: dutiyavāre pana vibhajanā eva sāti nāyaṃ pasaṅgo labbhati, paṭhamavārepi vā nāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1013_13: pasaṅgo. Kasmā? Esā hi yamakassa pakati, yadidaṃ yathālābhavasena yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:1014_0: Dutiye citte vattamāneti ettha “paṭhamaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ, dutiyaṃ citta”nti vadanti. Bhavanikantiyā
tika-abh05t0:1014_1: āvajjanampi vipākappavattito visadisattā “dutiya”nti vattuṃ sakkā, tato paṭṭhāya
tika-abh05t0:1014_2: pubbe tassa tattha samudayasaccaṃ nuppajjitthāti vattabbāti apare. Bhavanikantiyā
tika-abh05t0:1014_3: pana sahajātaṃ paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ idha dutiyaṃ cittanti adhippetaṃ. Tato pubbe pavattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1014_4: sabbaṃ abyākatabhāvena samānajātikattā ekanti katvā tato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā tassa tattha
tika-abh05t0:1014_6: dutiye citte. Tena samānagatikattāti tena yathāvuttadutiyacittena ca taṃsamaṅgino
tika-abh05t0:1014_7: vā dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjittha, no ca samudayasaccanti vattabbabhāvena samānagatikattā.
tika-abh05t0:1014_8: Evañca katvāti tena samānagatikatāya dassitattā eva. Yathāvuttāti dutiyākusalacittato
tika-abh05t0:1014_9: purimasabbacittasamaṅgino aggahitā honti itarabhāvābhāvato. Vuttamevatthaṃ pāṭhantarena
tika-abh05t0:1014_10: samatthetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Teti catuvokārā. Vajjetabbāti “itaresa”nti visesanena
tika-abh05t0:1014_11: nivattetabbā. Pañcavokārā viya yathāvuttā suddhāvāsāti dutiyacittakkhaṇasamaṅgibhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1014_12: vuttappakārā yathā suddhāvāsasaṅkhātā pañcavokārā pubbe vuttā santi, evaṃ catuvokārā
tika-abh05t0:1014_13: pubbe vuttā na hi santīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:1015_0: “Yassa yatthā”ti puggalokāsā ādheyyādhārabhāvena apekkhitāti āha “puggalokāsā aññamaññaparicchinnā
tika-abh05t0:1015_1: gahitā”ti. Kāmāvacare…pe… upapannāti ettha kāmāvacare abhisametāvino rūpāvacaraṃ
tika-abh05t0:1015_2: upapannā, rūpāvacare abhisametāvino arūpāvacaraṃ upapannā, vā-saddena kāmāvacare
tika-abh05t0:1015_3: abhisametāvino arūpāvacaraṃ upapannāti ca yojetabbaṃ. Tatthāti upapannokāse. Abhisamayoti
tika-abh05t0:1015_4: uparimaggābhisamayo yāva upapanno na bhavissati, tāva te tattha upapannapuggalā ettha
tika-abh05t0:1015_5: etasmiṃ “abhisametāvīna”ntiādinā vutte dutiyakoṭṭhāse na gayhanti puggalokāsānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1015_6: aññamaññaṃ paricchinnattā. Yadi evaṃ kiṃ te imasmiṃ yamake asaṅgahitāti āha “te panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:1015_7: Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “samānagatikāti visuṃ na dassitā”ti, taṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “anabhisametāvīna”ntiādi
tika-abh05t0:1015_8: vuttaṃ. Tassattho – “anabhisametāvīna”nti iminā paṭhamapadena gahitā sabbattha magguppattirahe
tika-abh05t0:1015_9: sampattibhave tattha suddhāvāse ye anabhisametāvino, tesu dvippakāresu suddhāvāsā
tika-abh05t0:1015_10: yasmiṃ kāle tattha anabhisametāvinoti gahetabbā, tattha nesaṃ tathā gahetabbakālassa
tika-abh05t0:1016_0: Etenāti etena vacanena. Vodānacittaṃ nāma maggacittānaṃ anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1016_1: idha pana aggamaggacittassa. Tatoti yathāvuttavodānacittato purimataracittasamaṅgino,
tika-abh05t0:1017_0: Paṭisandhicuticittānaṃ bhaṅguppādakkhaṇā pavatte cittassa bhaṅguppādakkhaṇehi dukkhasaccādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1017_1: nuppādādīsu samānagatikāti katvā vuttaṃ “pavatte cittassā”tiādi. Tattha cuticittassapi
tika-abh05t0:1017_2: uppādakkhaṇassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti yojanā. Dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesūti samudayasaccassa
tika-abh05t0:1017_4: Na visesitanti yathāvutte appaṭikkhepe ca satipi visesetvā na vuttanti attho. Ekassapi
tika-abh05t0:1017_5: puggalassa tādisassa maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgino purimakoṭṭhāsasseva
tika-abh05t0:1017_6: abhajanato koṭṭhāsadvayasambhavābhāvatoti attho. Idāni tamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yassa
tika-abh05t0:1017_7: dukkhasacca”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Kesañci puggalānaṃ. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. “Maggassa
tika-abh05t0:1017_8: ca phalassa cā”ti vuttamaggaphalāni dassento “tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ dvinnañca maggāna”nti
tika-abh05t0:1017_9: āha. Tāni pana heṭṭhimāni tīṇi phalāni majjhe ca dve maggā veditabbā. Nirantaraṃ
tika-abh05t0:1017_10: anuppādetvāti paṭipakkhadhammehi avokiṇṇaṃ katvā saha vipassanāya maggaṃ uppādentena
tika-abh05t0:1017_11: yā sātaccakiriyā kātabbā, taṃ akatvāti attho. Tenāha “antarantarā…pe… uppādetvā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1017_12: “Arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe”ti avisesato vutte kathamayaṃ viseso
tika-abh05t0:1017_13: labbhatīti āha “sāmaññavacanenapī”tiādi. Tena apavādavisayapariyāyena upasaggā abhinivisantīti
tika-abh05t0:1020_0: 165-170. Etthevāti imasmiṃ saccayamake eva. Apariññeyyatādassanatthanti ettha a-kāro
tika-abh05t0:1020_1: na pariññeyyābhāvavacano, nāpi pariññeyyapaṭipakkhavacano, atha kho tadaññavacanoti
tika-abh05t0:1020_2: yathārahaṃ saccesu labbhamānānaṃ pahātabbatādīnampi dassane āpanneyeva samayavāro
tika-abh05t0:1020_3: dassanaparo, yesañca na dassanaparo, tesu kesuci saccesu labbhamānānampi kesañci
tika-abh05t0:1020_4: visesānaṃ ayaṃ vāro na dassanaparoti dassento “sacchikaraṇa…pe… dassanatthañcā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1020_5: āha. Samudaye pahānapariññāva vuttā, na tīraṇapariññāti yuttaṃ tāvetaṃ samudayassapi
tika-abh05t0:1020_6: tīretabbasabhāvattā, “dukkhe tīraṇapariññāva vuttā, na pahānapariññā”ti idaṃ pana
tika-abh05t0:1020_7: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu dukkhaṃ appahātabbamevāti? Samudayasaccavibhaṅge vuttānaṃ kesañci
tika-abh05t0:1020_8: samudayakoṭṭhāsānaṃ dukkhasacce saṅgahaṇato dukkhasamudaye vā asaṅkaratova gahetvā
tika-abh05t0:1020_9: bhūtakathanametaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ubhayatthāti dukkhe samudaye ca vuttā. Kasmā? Tesaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1020_10: sādhāraṇāti. Evaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇabhedabhinnaṃ yathāvuttaṃ pariññākiccaṃ pubbabhāge
tika-abh05t0:1020_11: nānakkhaṇe labbhamānampi maggakāle ekakkhaṇe eva labbhati ekañāṇakiccattāti dassetuṃ
tika-abh05t0:1025_0: 1. Satipi kusalamūlādīnampi vibhattabhāve khandhādivibhāgo tato sātisayoti dassento
tika-abh05t0:1025_1: “khandhādayo viya pubbe avibhattā”ti āha. Pakārattho vā ettha ādi-saddo “bhūvādayo”tiādīsu
tika-abh05t0:1025_2: viyāti kusalamūlādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Aviññātattā nisāmentehi. Hetuattho vā
tika-abh05t0:1025_3: ettha luttaniddiṭṭho aviññāpitattāti attho. Yadipi kāyasaṅkhārānaṃ vikappadvayepi
tika-abh05t0:1025_4: hetuphalabhāvoyeva icchito, sāmivacanarūpāvibhūto pana attheva atthabhedoti dassento
tika-abh05t0:1026_0: 2-7. Suddhikaekekapadavasenāti “kāyo saṅkhāro”tiādīsu dvīsu dvīsu padesu aññamaññaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1026_2: attho attheva. Tenevāha “padasodhana…pe… avacanīyattā”ti. Idāni tameva atthābhāvaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1026_3: byatirekavasena dassento “yathā”tiādimāha. Kasmā pana ubhayattha samāne samāsapadabhāve
tika-abh05t0:1026_4: tattha attho labbhati, idha na labbhatīti? Bhinnalakkhaṇattā. Tattha hi rūpakkhandhādipadāni
tika-abh05t0:1026_5: samānādhikaraṇānīti padadvayādhiṭṭhāno eko attho labbhati, idha pana kāyasaṅkhārādipadāni
tika-abh05t0:1026_6: bhinnādhikaraṇānīti tathārūpo attho na labbhatīti. Tenāha “yathādhippetatthābhāvato”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1027_0: Visuṃ adīpetvāti “kāyasaṅkhāro”tiādinā saha vuccamānopi kāyasaṅkhārasaddo visuṃ visuṃ
tika-abh05t0:1027_1: attano atthaṃ ajotetvā ekaṃ atthaṃ yadi dīpetīti parikappavasena vadati. Tena kāyasaṅkhārasaddānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1027_3: vuttaṃ, “saṅkhārasaddo saṅkhārattheva vattamāno”ti pana vattabbaṃ siyā. Evañhi sati
tika-abh05t0:1027_4: khandhatthe vattamāno khandhasaddo viya rūpasaddena kāyasaddena visesitabboti idaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1027_5: vacanaṃ yujjeyya, kāyasaṅkhārasaddānaṃ pana samānādhikaraṇatte na kevalaṃ saṅkhārasaddoyeva
tika-abh05t0:1027_6: saṅkhāratthe vattati, atha kho kāyasaddopīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “kāyasaṅkhārasaddo
tika-abh05t0:1027_7: kāyasaṅkhāratthe vattamāno”ti vuttaṃ siyā, kāyasaddena samānādhikaraṇenāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:1028_0: Imassa vārassāti suddhasaṅkhāravārassa. Padasodhanena dassitānanti ettakeva vuccamāne
tika-abh05t0:1028_1: tattha dassitabhāvasāmaññena suddhakāyādīnampi gahaṇaṃ āpajjeyyāti taṃnivāraṇatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1028_3: Idha panāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Suddhasaṅkhāravāraṃ sandhāya vuttampi suddhasaṅkhāravāramevettha
tika-abh05t0:1028_4: ananujānanto sakalasaṅkhārayamakavisayanti āha “idha pana saṅkhārayamake”ti. Adhippetatthapariccāgoti
tika-abh05t0:1028_7: atthābhāvato idha na gahetabbā, atha kasmā pavattivārameva anārabhitvā aññathā desanā
tika-abh05t0:1031_0: 19. Saṅkhārānaṃ puggalānañca okāsattāti sampayuttānaṃ nissayapaccayatāya, saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1031_1: samāpajjitabbatāya puggalānaṃ jhānassa okāsatā veditabbā, bhūmi pana yadaggena puggalānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1031_2: okāso, tadaggena saṅkhārānampi okāso. “Dutiye jhāne tatiye jhāne”tiādinā jhānaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1031_3: “kāmāvacare rūpāvacare”tiādinā bhūmi ca visuṃ okāsabhāvena gahitā. Itīti hetuattho,
tika-abh05t0:1031_4: yasmā jhānampi okāsabhāvena gahitaṃ, tasmāti attho. Puggalavāre ca okāsavasena puggalaggahaṇeti
tika-abh05t0:1031_5: puggalavāre ca yadā puggalokāsasaṅkhārādīnaṃ okāsabhāvena gayhati, tadā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1031_6: okāsānaṃ vasena gayhanaṃ hotīti yattha so puggalo, yañca tasmiṃ puggale jhānaṃ upalabbhati,
tika-abh05t0:1031_7: tesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhūmijhānasaṅkhātānaṃ okāsānaṃ vasena yathārahaṃ kāyasaṅkhārādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1031_8: gahaṇaṃ kathanaṃ hotīti. Tasmāti yasmā etadeva, tasmā. Dutiyatatiyajjhānokāsavasenāti
tika-abh05t0:1031_10: uppādakkhaṇe”ti evaṃ gahitā puggalā visesetvā dassitā. Kena? Teneva vitakkavicārarahitaassāsapassāsuppādakkhaṇenāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1032_0: Paṭhamakoṭṭhāse jhānokāsavasena puggaladassanaṃ katanti vuttaṃ “puna…pe… dassetī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1032_1: Bhūmiokāsavasena puggalaṃ dassetīti sambandho. Dvippakārānanti jhānabhūmiokāsabhedena
tika-abh05t0:1032_2: duvidhānaṃ. Tesanti puggalānaṃ. “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ kāmāvacarāna”nti ca
tika-abh05t0:1032_4: uppādakkhaṇe”ti idanti vuttaṃ “visesa…pe… khaṇe”ti. Tena visesanena. Kāmāvacarānampīti
tika-abh05t0:1032_5: pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena na kevalaṃ rūpārūpāvacaresu paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannānaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1032_6: atha kho kāmāvacarānampīti vuttamevatthaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Kīdisānaṃ kāmāvacarānanti āha
tika-abh05t0:1032_8: Te hi akāmāvacaratāya viya rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgino vitakkavicāruppattiyāva nivattitā.
tika-abh05t0:1032_9: Ekantikattāti assāsapassāsābhāvassa ekantikattā. Nidassitāti rūpārūpāvacarā nidassanabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1032_10: vuttā, na tabbirahitānaṃ aññesaṃ abhāvatoti adhippāyo. Paṭhamajjhānokāsā assāsapassāsavirahavisiṭṭhāti
tika-abh05t0:1032_11: yojanā. Paṭhamañcettha paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgīnaṃ rūpārūpāvacarānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, dutiyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1032_13: jhānokāsabhūmiokāsavasena puggalavibhāganayo vutto, iminā nayena upāyena. Sabbattha sabbapucchāsu.
tika-abh05t0:1033_0: 21. Etasmiṃ pana atthe satīti yvāyaṃ uppattibhūmiyā jhānaṃ visesetvā attho vutto,
tika-abh05t0:1033_1: etasmiṃ atthe gayhamāne aññatthapi uppattibhūmiyā jhānaṃ visesitabbaṃ bhaveyya, tathā
tika-abh05t0:1033_2: ca aniṭṭhaṃ āpajjatīti dassento “catutthajjhāne”tiādimāha. Kiṃ pana taṃ aniṭṭhanti
tika-abh05t0:1033_3: āha “bhūmīnaṃ okāsabhāvasseva aggahitatāpattito”ti. Yattha yattha hi jhānaṃ gayhati,
tika-abh05t0:1033_4: tattha tattha taṃ uppattibhūmiyā visesitabbaṃ hoti. Tathā sati jhānokāsova gahito
tika-abh05t0:1033_5: siyā, na bhūmiokāso guṇabhūtattā. Kiñca “catutthajjhāne rūpāvacare arūpāvacare”ti
tika-abh05t0:1033_6: ettha rūpārūpabhūmiyā catutthajjhāne visesiyamāne tadekadesova okāsavasena gahito
tika-abh05t0:1033_7: siyā, na sabbaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ. Tenāha “sabbacatutthajjhānassa okāsavasena aggahitatāpattito
tika-abh05t0:1034_0: Nanu ca jhānabhūmiokāse asaṅkarato yojiyamāne na sabbasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānokāse kāyasaṅkhāro
tika-abh05t0:1034_1: vacīsaṅkhāro ca atthi, tathā sabbasmiṃ kāmāvacarokāseti codanuppattiṃ sandhāya tassa
tika-abh05t0:1034_2: parihāraṃ vattuṃ “yadipī”tiādimāha. Tatthāti paṭhamajjhānokāse kāmāvacarokāse ca.
tika-abh05t0:1034_3: Taṃdvayuppattīti tassa kāyavacīsaṅkhāradvayassa uppatti. Okāsadvayassa asaṅkarato
tika-abh05t0:1034_4: gahaṇe ayañca guṇo laddho hotīti āha “visuṃ…pe… na vattabbaṃ hotī”ti. Tattha aṅgamattavasenāti
tika-abh05t0:1034_5: vitakkādijhānaṅgamattavasena. Tattha vattabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva. Vitakkarahitopi
tika-abh05t0:1034_6: vicāro vacīsaṅkhāroyevāti āha “avitakka…pe… gacchatī”ti. Muddhabhūtaṃ dutiyajjhānanti
tika-abh05t0:1034_8: sātisayattā “muddhabhūta”nti vattabbataṃ labhati. Asaññasattā viyāti idaṃ visadisudāharaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1035_0: 37. Āvajjanato pubbe pavattaṃ sabbaṃ cittaṃ paṭisandhicittena samānagatikattā ekaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1035_2: suddhāvāse cittasaṅkhārassa ādidassanatthaṃ. Tathā “vacīsaṅkhārassa ādidassanattha”nti etthāpi.
tika-abh05t0:1040_1: Lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā”ti ca evamādinā kusalamūlakusalādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:1040_2: vuttoti āha “paccayadīpakena mūlayamakenā”ti. “So ‘aniccaṃ rūpaṃ, aniccaṃ rūpa’nti
tika-abh05t0:1040_3: yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Cakkhu aniccaṃ, rūpā aniccā”ti ca ādinā bahulakhandhādimukhena
tika-abh05t0:1040_4: aniccānupassanādayo vihitāti vuttaṃ “khandhādīsu tīraṇabāhullato”ti. Kilesānaṃ samucchindanato
tika-abh05t0:1040_5: paraṃ pahānakiccaṃ natthīti āha “anusayapahānantā pahānapariññā”ti. Yadipi anusayehi
tika-abh05t0:1040_6: sampayogato ārammaṇato vā pahānapariññā nappavattati, anusayābhāve pana tadārambho
tika-abh05t0:1040_7: eva natthīti katvā vuttaṃ “anusayehi pahānapariññaṃ vibhāvetu”nti. Anusayabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1040_8: labbhamānānanti anusayabhāvena vijjamānānaṃ, anusayasabhāvānanti attho. Tīhākārehīti
tika-abh05t0:1040_9: paricchedādīhi tīhi pakārehi. Anusayesu gaṇanasarūpappavattiṭṭhānato abodhitesu puggalokāsādivasena
tika-abh05t0:1040_10: pavattiyamānā tabbisayā desanā na suviññeyyā hotīti dassento āha “tesu tathā…pe… duravabodhattā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1041_0: Ettha purimesūti paduddhāro anantarassa vidhi paṭisedho vāti katvā sānusayavārādiapekkho,
tika-abh05t0:1041_1: na anusayavārādiapekkho anusayavāre pāḷivavatthānassa pageva katattāti dassento “etesu
tika-abh05t0:1041_2: sānusayavārādīsu purimesūti attho”ti āha. Sānusayavārādīsu hi tīsu purimesu okāsavāre
tika-abh05t0:1041_3: yato tatoti desanā pavattā, na anusayavārādīsu. Atthavisesābhāvatoti “kāmadhātuyā
tika-abh05t0:1041_4: cutassā”tiādinā pāḷiāgatapadassa, “kāmadhātuṃ vā pana upapajjantassā”tiādinā yamakabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1041_5: aṭṭhakathāādigatapadassa ca atthavisesābhāvato. Kathamayaṃ yamakadesanā siyā dutiyassa
tika-abh05t0:1041_6: padassa abhāvatoti attho. Yadi nāyaṃ yamakadesanā, atha kasmā idhāgatāti āha “purimavāre
tika-abh05t0:1041_8: Evampi kathamidaṃ anusayayamakaṃ yamakadesanāsabbhāvatoti āha “yamakadesanā…pe… nāmaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1041_9: daṭṭhabba”nti. Atthavasenāti paṭilomatthavasena. Paṭhamapadena hi vuttassa viparivattanavasenapi
tika-abh05t0:1041_10: yamakadesanā hoti “rūpaṃ rūpakkhandho, rūpakkhandho rūpa”ntiādīsu, tattha pana atthaviseso
tika-abh05t0:1041_11: atthi, idha natthi, tasmā na tathā desanā katāti dassento āha “atthavisesābhāvato
tika-abh05t0:1041_12: pana na vuttā”ti. Labbhamānatāvasenāti pucchāya labbhamānatāvasena.
tika-abh05t0:1042_0: Uppattiarahataṃ dassetīti iminā nippariyāyena anusayā anāgatāti dassitaṃ hoti yato
tika-abh05t0:1042_1: te maggavajjhā, na ca atītapaccuppannā uppattirahāti vuccanti uppannattā. Yaṃsabhāvā
tika-abh05t0:1042_2: pana dhammā anāgatā anusayāti vuccanti, taṃsabhāvā eva te atītapaccuppannā vuttā.
tika-abh05t0:1042_3: Na hi dhammānaṃ addhābhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi, tasmā anusayānaṃ atītapaccuppannabhāvā
tika-abh05t0:1042_4: pariyāyato labbhantīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “atītopi hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃpakārāti anusayappakārā,
tika-abh05t0:1042_5: kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanārahāicceva attho. So evaṃpakāro uppajjanavāre uppajjati-saddena
tika-abh05t0:1042_6: gahito uppajjanārahatāya avicchinnabhāvadīpanatthanti adhippāyo. Tenāha “na khandhayamakādīsu
tika-abh05t0:1042_7: viya uppajjamānatā”ti, paccuppannatāti attho. Tenevātiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ
tika-abh05t0:1042_8: karoti. Tattha ninnānākaraṇoti nibbiseso. Uppajjanānusayānaṃ ninnānākaraṇattā eva
tika-abh05t0:1042_9: hi “etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisatī”ti vibhaṅge āgataṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1043_0: Idāni yena pariyāyena atītapaccuppannesu anusayavohāro, taṃ dassetukāmo anāgatampi
tika-abh05t0:1043_1: tehi saddhiṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā dassento “anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ pana…pe… vuccantī”ti āha.
tika-abh05t0:1043_2: Etena bhūtapubbagatiyā atītapaccuppannesu uppattirahatā veditabbāti dasseti. Uppattiarahatā
tika-abh05t0:1043_3: nāma kilesānaṃ maggena asamucchinnatāya veditabbā. Sā ca atītapaccuppannesupi atthevāti
tika-abh05t0:1043_4: pakārantarenapi tesaṃ pariyāyatova anusayabhāvaṃ pakāseti. Tenevāha “maggassa panā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:1043_5: Tādisānanti ye maggabhāvanāya asati uppattirahā, tādisānaṃ. Dhammo eva ca uppajjati,
tika-abh05t0:1043_6: na dhammākāroti adhippāyo. Na hi dhammākārā aniccatādayo uppajjantīti vuccanti. Yadi
tika-abh05t0:1043_7: pana te uppādādisamaṅgino siyuṃ, dhammā eva siyuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “appahīnākāro ca uppajjatīti
tika-abh05t0:1044_0: Vuttampi thāmagamanaṃ aggahetvā appahīnaṭṭhamattameva gahetvā codako codetīti dassento
tika-abh05t0:1044_1: āha “sattānusaya…pe… āpajjatīti ce”ti. Na hi thāmagamane gahite codanāya okāso atthi.
tika-abh05t0:1044_2: Tenāha “nāpajjatī”tiādi. Vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, na kevalamaṭṭhakathāyameva pāṭhagatovāyamattho,
tika-abh05t0:1044_3: tasmā evameva gahetabboti dassento “thāmagato…pe… yutta”nti vatvā kiṃ pana taṃ thāmagamananti
tika-abh05t0:1044_4: parāsaṅkaṃ nivattento “thāmagatanti ca…pe… vuttā”ti āha. Tattha aññehi asādhāraṇoti
tika-abh05t0:1044_5: kilesavatthuādīnaṃ kilesatādisabhāvo viya kāmarāgādito aññattha alabbhamāno tesaṃyeva
tika-abh05t0:1044_6: āveṇiko sabhāvo, yato te bhavabījaṃ bhavamūlanti ca vuccanti. Yasmā ca thāmagamanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1044_7: tesaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo sabhāvo, tasmā anusayananti vuttaṃ hotīti dassento “thāmagatoti
tika-abh05t0:1045_0: “Yassa kāmarāgānusayo anuseti, tassa paṭighānusayo anusetīti? Āmantā”tiādinā anusayavāre
tika-abh05t0:1045_1: vutto eva attho “yassa kāmarāgānusayo uppajjati, tassa paṭighānusayo uppajjatīti?
tika-abh05t0:1045_2: Āmantā”tiādinā vuttoti anusayanākāro eva uppajjanavāre uppajjati-saddena gahitoti
tika-abh05t0:1045_3: “uppajjanavāro anusayavārena ninnānākaraṇo vibhatto”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha vicāraṃ
tika-abh05t0:1045_5: siyāti uppajjanavāre “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ appahīnākāradīpakaṃ siyā. Tathā ca sati
tika-abh05t0:1045_6: yathā “imassa uppādā”ti ettha imassa anirodhāti ayamatthopi ñāyati, evaṃ “uppajjatī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1045_7: vutte atthato “na uppajjatī”ti ayamattho vutto hoti appahīnākārassa uppattirahabhāvassa
tika-abh05t0:1045_8: anuppajjamānasabhāvattāti codanaṃ dassento “uppajjatīti vacanassa avuttatā na sakkā
tika-abh05t0:1045_9: vattunti ce”ti āha. Vacanatthavisesena taṃdvayassa vuttattāti etena dhammanānattābhāvepi
tika-abh05t0:1045_10: padatthanānatthena vārantaradesanā hoti yathā sahajātasaṃsaṭṭhavāresūti dasseti.
tika-abh05t0:1045_11: Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvātiādi tameva vacanatthavisesaṃ vibhāvetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Uppattiyogganti
tika-abh05t0:1045_12: uppattiyā yoggaṃ, uppajjanasabhāgatanti attho. Yato anusayā uppattirahāti vuccanti,
tika-abh05t0:1045_13: ekantena cetadeva sampaṭicchitabbaṃ “yassa kāmarāgānusayo uppajjati, tassa paṭighānusayo
tika-abh05t0:1045_14: uppajjatīti? Āmantā”tiādivacanato. “Anusentīti anusayā”ti ettake vutte sadā vijjamānā
tika-abh05t0:1045_15: nu kho te aparinipphannānusayanaṭṭhena “anusayā”ti vuccantīti ayamattho āpajjatīti
tika-abh05t0:1045_16: taṃnisedhanatthaṃ “anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantī”ti vuttaṃ. Uppattiarahabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1045_17: thāmagatatā anusayaṭṭhoti yaṃ tesaṃ uppattiyogavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sammadeva vuttanti
tika-abh05t0:1045_19: dasseti. Tampi suvuttameva iminā tantippamāṇenāti idampi “abhidhamme tāvā”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:1045_20: āgataṃ tividhameva tantiṃ sandhāyāhāti dassento āha “tantittayenapi hi cittasampayuttatā dīpitā hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1048_0: 2. Evaṃ satīti vedanānaṃ visesitabbabhāve kāmadhātuyā ca visesanabhāve sati. Kāmādhātuyā
tika-abh05t0:1048_1: anusayanaṭṭhānatā na vuttā hoti appadhānabhāvato, padhānāppadhānesu padhāne kiccadassanato,
tika-abh05t0:1048_2: visesanabhāvena caritabbatāya cāti adhippāyo. Hotu ko dosoti kadāci vadeyyāti āsaṅkamāno
tika-abh05t0:1048_3: āha “dvīsu panā”tiādi. Dvīsūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ, tathā “tīsu dhātūsū”ti etthāpi.
tika-abh05t0:1048_4: Tasmāti yasmā dhātuādibhedena tividhaṃ anusayaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha ca rūpārūpadhātūnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1048_5: bhavarāgassa anusayaṭṭhānatā vuttāti kāmadhātuyā kāmarāgassa anusayaṭṭhānatā ekantena
tika-abh05t0:1048_6: vattabbā, tasmā. Tīsu dhātūsu tīsu vedanāsūti ca niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ, kāmadhātuyā
tika-abh05t0:1049_0: Dvīsvevāti dvīsu sukhopekkhāsu eva. Sabbāsu dvīsūti yāsu kāsuci dvīsu. Tenāti “kāmarāgo
tika-abh05t0:1049_1: dvīsu vedanāsu anusetī”ti vacanasāmatthiyaladdhena visesanicchayeneva. Bhavarāgānusayaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1049_2: rūpārūpadhātuyo tadanurūpā ca vedanā. Na hi dvīsu vedanāsu kāmarāgānusayova anusetīti
tika-abh05t0:1049_3: avadhāraṇaṃ icchitaṃ, dvīsu eva pana vedanāsūti icchitaṃ. Tenevāha “dvīsveva anuseti,
tika-abh05t0:1049_4: na tīsū”ti. Aṭṭhānañca anusayānaṃ, kiṃ taṃ apariyāpannaṃ sakkāye? Sabbo lokuttaro
tika-abh05t0:1049_5: dhammo. Ca-saddena paṭighānusayaṭṭhānaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tena vuttaṃ “yathā cā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:1050_0: Aññesu dvīhi vedanāhi vippayuttesu. Piyarūpasātarūpesūti piyāyitabbamadhurasabhāvesu.
tika-abh05t0:1050_1: Visesanañcetaṃ rūpādīnaṃ sabbadvārasabbapurisesu iṭṭhabhāvassa aniyatatāya kataṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1050_2: Sātasantasukhagiddhiyāti sātasukhe santasukhe ca gijjhanākārena abhikaṅkhanākārena.
tika-abh05t0:1050_3: Tattha sātasukhaṃ kāyikaṃ, santasukhaṃ cetasikaṃ. Sātasukhaṃ vā kāyikasukhaṃ, santasukhaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1050_4: upekkhāsukhaṃ. Tathā cāhu “upekkhā pana santattā, sukhamicceva bhāsitā”ti. Parittaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1050_5: vā oḷārikaṃ sukhaṃ sātasukhaṃ, anoḷārikaṃ santasukhaṃ. Parittaggahaṇañcettha kāmarāgānusayassa
tika-abh05t0:1050_6: adhippetattā. Aññatthāti vedanāhi aññattha. Soti kāmarāgānusayo. Vedanāsu anugato
tika-abh05t0:1050_7: hutvā setīti vedanāpekkho eva hutvā pavattati yathā puttāpekkhāya dhātiyā anuggaṇhanappavatti,
tika-abh05t0:1050_8: sayanasaṅkhātā pavatti ca kāmarāgassa nikāmanameva. Tenāha “sukhamicceva abhilapatī”ti.
