tika-abh05t0:1050_9: Yathā tassa, evaṃ paṭighānusayādīnampi vuttaniyāmena yathāsakaṃ kiccakaraṇameva dukkhavedanādīsu
tika-abh05t0:1050_10: anusayanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “evaṃ paṭighānusayo cā”tiādi. Tīsu vedanāsu anusayanavacanenāti
tika-abh05t0:1050_11: tīsu vedanāsu yathārahaṃ anusayanavacanena. Iṭṭhādibhāvena gahitesūti iṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇapakatiyā
tika-abh05t0:1050_12: vasena iṭṭhādibhāvena gahitesu viparītasaññāya vasena aniṭṭhādīsu iṭṭhādibhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1050_13: gahitesūti yojanā. Na hi iṭṭhādibhāvena gahaṇaṃ viparītasaññā.
tika-abh05t0:1051_0: Tatthāti iṭṭhārammaṇādīsu. Etthāti anusayane. Kāmassādādivatthubhūtānaṃ kāmabhavādīnanti
tika-abh05t0:1051_2: Tatthāti vedanāttayadhātuttayesu. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. Dukkhapaṭighāto dukkhe
tika-abh05t0:1051_3: anabhirati. Yattha tatthāti dukkhavedanāya taṃsampayuttesu aniṭṭharūpādīsu vāti yattha
tika-abh05t0:1051_4: tattha. Mahaggatā upādinnakkhandhā rūpārūpabhavā, anupādinnakkhandhā rūpārūpāvacaradhammā.
tika-abh05t0:1051_5: Tatthāti yathāvuttesu mahaggatadhammesu bhavarāgoicceva veditabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “rūpadhātuyā
tika-abh05t0:1051_6: arūpadhātuyā ettha kāmarāgānusayo nānusetī”ti. Diṭṭhānusayādīnanti ādi-saddena vicikicchānusayaavijjānusayādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t0:1052_0: Dhātuttayavedanāttayavinimuttaṃ diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ na vuttanti suvuttametaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1052_2: vissajjitattā. Kāmarāgo pana yattha nānuseti, taṃ dukkhavedanārūpārūpadhātuvinimuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1052_3: diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ atthīti dassetuṃ “nanu cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:1052_4: tadanusayanaṭṭhānatoti tassa kāmarāgānusayassa anusayanaṭṭhānato. Aññā nekkhammassitasomanassupekkhāsaṅkhātā.
tika-abh05t0:1052_5: Ayamettha saṅkhepattho – nekkhammassitadomanasse viya paṭighānusayo nekkhammassitasomanassupekkhāsu
tika-abh05t0:1052_6: kāmarāgānusayo nānusetīti “yattha kāmarāgānusayo nānuseti, tattha diṭṭhānusayo nānusetī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1052_7: sakkā vattunti tasmā taṃ uddharitvā na vuttanti. Hontūti tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ atthitaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1052_8: paṭijānitvā uddharitvā avacanassa kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “na pana…pe… taṃ na vutta”nti.
tika-abh05t0:1052_9: Tadanusayanaṭṭhānanti tesaṃ diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā satipi
tika-abh05t0:1052_10: kāmarāgānusayanaṭṭhānato aññasmiṃ diṭṭhānusayādīnaṃ anusayanaṭṭhāne taṃ pana dhātuttayavedanāttayavinimuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1052_11: natthi vedanādvayabhāvato, tasmā. Taṃ vedanādvayaṃ na vuttaṃ visuṃ na uddhaṭanti
tika-abh05t0:1052_12: attho. Tasmāti yasmā “yattha kāmarāgādayo nānusenti, tattha diṭṭhivicikicchā nānusentī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1052_13: ayamattho “āmantā”ti iminā paṭivacanavissajjanena avibhāgato vuttoti “yattha kāmarāgādayo
tika-abh05t0:1052_14: anusenti, tattha diṭṭhivicikicchā anusentī”ti ayampi attho avibhāgatova labbhati,
tika-abh05t0:1052_15: tasmā. Avibhāgato ca dukkhaṃ paṭighassa anusayanaṭṭhānanti dīpitaṃ hoti. Tenāha “avisesena…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1052_16: veditabba”nti. Tattha avisesenāti gehassitaṃ nekkhammassitanti visesaṃ akatvā. Samudāyavasena
tika-abh05t0:1052_17: gahetvāti yathāvuttaavayavānaṃ samūhavasena dukkhantveva gahetvā. “Avisesena samudāyavasena
tika-abh05t0:1052_18: gahetvā”ti imamatthaṃ tathā-saddena anukaḍḍhati “dvīsu vedanāsū”ti etthāpi gehassitādivibhāgassa anicchitattā.
tika-abh05t0:1053_0: Yadi evaṃ “paṭighaṃ tena pajahati, na tattha paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti idaṃ suttapadaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1053_1: kathanti codanaṃ sandhāya “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ domanasse, taṃsampayutte
tika-abh05t0:1053_2: vā paṭighe. Nekkhammassitaṃ domanassantiādinā neyyatthamidaṃ suttaṃ, na nītatthanti
tika-abh05t0:1053_3: dasseti. Yathā pana suttaṃ udāhaṭaṃ, tathā idha kasmā na vuttanti āha “paṭighuppattirahaṭṭhānatāyā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:1053_4: Evampi suttābhidhammapāṭhānaṃ kathamavirodhoti āha nippariyāyadesanā hesā, sā pana
tika-abh05t0:1053_5: pariyāyadesanāti. Evañca katvāti pariyāyadesanattā eva. Rāgānusayoti kāmarāgānusayo
tika-abh05t0:1053_6: adhippeto. Yato “anāgāmimaggena samugghātanaṃ sandhāyā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā tassa na
tika-abh05t0:1053_7: mahaggatadhammā anusayanaṭṭhānanti taṃ paṭhamajjhānañca anāmasitvā “na hi lokiyā…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1053_8: nānusetīti sakkā vattu”nti vuttaṃ. Avatthubhāvatoti sabhāveneva anuppattiṭṭhānattā.
tika-abh05t0:1053_9: Idhāti imasmiṃ anusayayamake. Vuttanayenāti “nekkhammassitaṃ domanassaṃ uppādetvā”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:1053_10: vuttena nayena. Taṃpaṭipakkhabhāvatoti tesaṃ paṭighādīnaṃ paṭipakkhassa maggassa
tika-abh05t0:1053_11: sabbhāvato. Na kevalaṃ maggasabbhāvato, atha kho balavavipassanāsabbhāvatopīti dassento
tika-abh05t0:1054_0: Idāni yadetaṃ tattha tattha “anusayanaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ gahetabbadhammavasena
tika-abh05t0:1054_1: vā siyā gahaṇavisesena vāti dve vikappā, tesu paṭhamaṃ sandhāyāha “ārammaṇe anusayanaṭṭhāne
tika-abh05t0:1054_2: satī”ti. Rūpādiārammaṇe anusayānaṃ anusayanaṭṭhānanti gayhamāne yamatthaṃ sandhāya
tika-abh05t0:1054_3: “na sakkā vattu”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “dukkhāya hī”tiādimāha. Yadi siyāti yadi
tika-abh05t0:1054_5: dhammesū”ti kāmarāgassa ṭhānaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, na ca vuttaṃ. Atha panātiādi dutiyavikappaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1054_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ajjhāsayavasena taṃninnatāyāti asatipi ārammaṇakaraṇe yattha kāmarāgādayo
tika-abh05t0:1054_7: ajjhāsayato ninnā, taṃ tesaṃ anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “anugato hutvā setī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1054_8: Atha pana vuttanti sambandho. Yathātiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa udāharaṇavasena nirūpanaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1054_9: Dukkhe paṭihaññanavaseneva pavattati, nārammaṇakaraṇavasenāti adhippāyo. Dukkhameva
tika-abh05t0:1054_10: tassa anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti ajjhāsayassa tattha ninnattā dukkhameva tassa paṭighassa
tika-abh05t0:1054_11: anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ, nālambitaṃ rūpādi sukhavedanā cāti adhippāyo. Evanti yathā
tika-abh05t0:1054_12: aññārammaṇassapi paṭighassa ajjhāsayato dukkhaninnatāya dukkhameva anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1054_13: vuttaṃ, evaṃ. Dukkhādīsu…pe… vuttanti “dukkhena sukhaṃ adhigantabbaṃ. Natthi dinna”nti
tika-abh05t0:1054_14: ca ādinā kāyakilamanadukkhe dānānubhāvādike ca micchābhinivesanavasena uppajjamānena
tika-abh05t0:1054_15: diṭṭhānusayena sampayutto aññārammaṇopi lobho “evaṃ sukhaṃ bhavissatī”ti ajjhāsayato
tika-abh05t0:1054_17: lobhassa anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ, na yathāvuttaṃ dukkhādi, tasmā bhavarāga…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1054_18: na virujjhati. Ekasmiṃyeva cātiādi dutiyavikappaṃyeva upabrūhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh05t0:1054_19: rāgassa sukhajjhāsayatā taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa vasena veditabbā, tanninnabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1054_20: vā cakkhussa visamajjhāsayatā viya. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tesaṃ rāgapaṭighānaṃ nānānusayaṭṭhānatā
tika-abh05t0:1055_0: Evañca katvāti asatipi gahetabbabhede gahaṇavisesena anusayanaṭṭhānassa bhinnattā
tika-abh05t0:1055_1: eva. “Yattha…pe… no”ti vuttaṃ, aññathā virujjheyya. Gahetabbabhedena hi rāgapaṭighānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1055_2: anusayanaṭṭhānabhede gayhamāne vipākamatte ṭhātabbaṃ siyā, na ca taṃ yuttaṃ, napi
tika-abh05t0:1055_3: sabbesaṃ purisadvārānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ niyatanti. Yadipi yathāvuttalobhassa vuttanayena
tika-abh05t0:1055_4: kāmarāgānusayatā sambhavati, yathā pana sukhupekkhāsu iṭṭhārammaṇe ca uppajjantena
tika-abh05t0:1055_5: domanassena saha pavatto doso dubbalabhāvena paṭighānusayo na hoti, evaṃ yathāvuttalobhopi
tika-abh05t0:1055_6: kāmarāgānusayo na hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na
tika-abh05t0:1055_7: paṭighānusayoti ettha na-kāro paṭisedhanattho, na aññattho, itarattha pana sambhavo
tika-abh05t0:1055_8: eva natthīti dassento “yaṃ paneta”ntiādimāha. Tattha “na hi domanassassa paṭighānusayabhāvāsaṅkā
tika-abh05t0:1055_9: atthī”ti iminā na-kārassa aññatthatābhāvadassanamukhena abhāvatthataṃ samattheti.
tika-abh05t0:1056_0: Desanā saṃkiṇṇā viya bhaveyyāti ettha desanāsaṅkaraṃ dassetuṃ “bhavarāgassapi…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1056_1: bhaveyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tassattho – yathā kāmarāgassa kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-abh05t0:1056_2: uppatti vuttā “kāmarāgo kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu anusetī”ti, evaṃ yadi “bhavarāgo
tika-abh05t0:1056_3: kāmadhātuyā dvīsu vedanāsu anusetī”ti vucceyya, bhavarāgassapi…pe… bhaveyya. Tato
tika-abh05t0:1056_4: ca kāmarāgena saddhiṃ bhavarāgassa desanā saṃkiṇṇā bhaveyya, kāmarāgato ca bhavarāgassa
tika-abh05t0:1056_5: viseso dassetabbo. So ca sahajātānusayavasena na sakkā dassetunti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-abh05t0:1056_6: dassetabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “tasmā ārammaṇa…pe… adhippāyo”ti. Tattha ārammaṇavisesenāti
tika-abh05t0:1056_8: visesadassanatthaṃ. Evaṃ desanā katāti “rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā ettha bhavarāgānusayo
tika-abh05t0:1056_9: anusetī”ti evaṃ visaye bhummaṃ katvā desanā katā. Tenāha “sahajātavedanāvisesābhāvato”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1060: 3. Pavattāvirāmavasenāti anusayappavattiyā avirāmavasena, avicchedavasenāti attho. Kathaṃ pana kusalābyākatacittakkhaṇe anusayānaṃ pavattīti āha “maggeneva…pe… pubbe”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1061_0: 20. Cittacetasikānañca ṭhānaṃ nāma cittuppādoti āha “ekasmiṃ cittuppāde”ti. Tesaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1061_1: tesaṃ puggalānanti puthujjanādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ. Pakatiyā sabhāvena. Sabhāvasiddhā
tika-abh05t0:1061_2: hi dukkhāya vedanāya kāmarāgassa ananusayanaṭṭhānatā. Evaṃ sesesupi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1061_3: Vakkhati hi “pakatiyā dukkhādīnaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ ananusayanaṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-abh05t0:1061_4: Pahānenāti tassa tassa anusayassa samucchindanena. Tiṇṇaṃ puggalānanti puthujjanasotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1061_5: Dvinnaṃ puggalānanti anāgāmiarahantānaṃ. Etthāti etasmiṃ puggalokāsavāre. Purimanayeti
tika-abh05t0:1061_6: “tiṇṇaṃ puggalāna”ntiādike purimasmiṃ vissajjananaye. Okāsanti uppattiṭṭhānaṃ, idha
tika-abh05t0:1061_7: pana dukkhavedanā veditabbā. Pacchimanayeti “dvinnaṃ puggalāna”ntiādike vissajjananaye.
tika-abh05t0:1064_1: kāmarāgaṃ pajahati, kāmarāgaṃ parijānātī”tiādīsu anusayasamaṅgibhāvena pahānapariññākiriyāya
tika-abh05t0:1064_2: kattubhāvena ca puggalo vutto, na dhammo. Bhavavisesena vāti kevalena bhavavisesena
tika-abh05t0:1064_3: vā. Itaresūti paṭighānusayādīsu. Bhavānusayavisesena vāti kāmabhavādibhavavisiṭṭhānusayavisesena
tika-abh05t0:1064_4: vā. Sānusayatāniranusayatādikāti ettha ādi-saddena pahānāpahānapariññāpariññā saṅgayhanti.
tika-abh05t0:1064_5: Nanu ca bhavavisese kesañci anusayānaṃ appahānanti? Na taṃ anusayakataṃ, atha kho
tika-abh05t0:1064_6: paccayavekallato anokāsatāya cāti nāyaṃ virodho. Dvīsu vedanāsūti sukhaupekkhāsu
tika-abh05t0:1064_7: vedanāsu dukkhāya vedanāya kāmarāgānusayena niranusayoti yojetabbaṃ. Idampi natthi
tika-abh05t0:1064_8: puggalavasena vuccamānattā. Tenāha “na hi puggalassa…pe… anusayāna”nti. Yadipi puggalassa
tika-abh05t0:1064_9: anusayanokāso anokāso, tassa pana sānusayatādihetu hotīti dassento “anusayassa panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t0:1064_10: Niranusayatādīnanti ādi-saddena appahānāpariññā saṅgaṇhāti. Parijānanaṃ samatikkamananti
tika-abh05t0:1065_3: tato mānānusayaṃ pajahatī”ti pāḷipadaṃ āharitvā yojetabbaṃ, na pajahatīti ettha pana
tika-abh05t0:1065_4: “dukkhāya vedanāya tato kāmarāgānusayaṃ nappajahatī”ti. Evamādīsūti ādi-saddena pariññāvārampi
tika-abh05t0:1066_0: Catutthapañhavissajjanenāti “yato vā pana mānānusayena sānusayo, tato kāmarāgānusayena
tika-abh05t0:1066_1: sānusayo”ti etassa pañhassa vissajjanena. Tattha hi “rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:1066_2: sarūpato anusayanaṭṭhānāni dassitāni. Tadattheti taṃ anusayanaṭṭhānadassanaṃ attho
tika-abh05t0:1066_3: etassāti tadattho, tasmiṃ tadatthe. “Anusayassa uppattiṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ ayaṃ vāro
tika-abh05t0:1066_4: āraddho”tiādinā “yato”ti etena anusayanaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetvā. Pamādalikhitaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1066_5: viya dissati uppanna-saddena vattamānuppanne vuccamāne. Yathā pana uppajjanavāre
tika-abh05t0:1066_6: uppajjati-saddena uppattiyogadīpakattā uppattirahā vuccanti, evamidhāpi uppattiarahe
tika-abh05t0:1066_7: vuccamāne na koci virodho. Yaṃ pana vakkhati “na hi apariyāpannānaṃ anusayuppattirahaṭṭhānatā”ti,
tika-abh05t0:1066_8: sopi na doso. Yattha yattha hi anusayā uppattirahā, tadeva ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “sabbatthā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1066_9: vuttanti. Tatheva dissatīti taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ viya dissatīti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1067_0: Yato uppannena bhavitabbanti yato anusayanaṭṭhānato kāmagārānusayena uppannena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1067_1: tena kāmarāgānusayena uppattirahaṭṭhāne nissakkavacanaṃ kataṃ “yato”ti. Tathāti ettha
tika-abh05t0:1067_2: tathā-saddo yathā “yato uppannenā”ti ettha uppattirahaṭṭhānato anusayassa uppattirahatā
tika-abh05t0:1067_3: vuttā, tathā “uppajjanakenā”ti etthāpi sā eva vuccatīti dīpetīti āha “sabbadhammesu…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1067_4: āpannenā”ti. Tattha “uppajjanako”ti vutte anuppajjanako na hotīti ayamattho viññāyati,
tika-abh05t0:1067_5: tathā ca sati tena anuppatti nicchitāti uppannasabhāvatā ca pakāsitā hotīti. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:1067_6: “sabbadhammesu…pe… apanetī”ti. “Yo yato kāmarāgānusayena niranusayo, so tato mānānusayena
tika-abh05t0:1067_7: niranusayo”ti pucchāya “yato tato”ti āgatattā vissajjane “sabbatthā”ti padassa nissakkavaseneva
tika-abh05t0:1067_8: sakkā yojetunti dassento “sabbatthāti…pe… na na sambhavatī”ti āha. Bhummato aññatthāpi
tika-abh05t0:1067_9: saddavidū icchanti, yato sabbesaṃ pādakaṃ “sabbatthapādaka”nti vuccati, idha pana
tika-abh05t0:1070_0: 132-197. Appajahanasabbhāvāti appahānassa, appahīyamānassa vā sabbhāvā. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-abh05t0:1070_1: yo kāmarāgānusayaṃ pajahati, na so mānānusayaṃ niravasesato pajahati, yo ca mānānusayaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1070_2: niravasesato pajahati, na so kāmarāgānusayaṃ pajahati pageva pahīnattā, tasmā “yo
tika-abh05t0:1070_3: vā pana mānānusayaṃ pajahati, so kāmarāgānusayaṃ pajahatīti? No”ti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1070_4: Yadi evaṃ paṭhamapucchāyaṃ kathanti āha “yasmā pana…pe… vutta”nti. Tattha pahānakaraṇamattamevāti
tika-abh05t0:1070_5: pahānakiriyāsambhavamattameva, na niravasesappahānanti adhippāyo. Te ṭhapetvāti diṭṭhivicikicchānusayādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1070_6: niravasesapajahanake aṭṭhamakādike ṭhapetvā. Avasesāti tassa tassa anusayassa niravasesappajahanakehi
tika-abh05t0:1070_7: avasiṭṭhā. Tesu yesaṃ ekacce anusayā pahīnā, tepi appajahanasabbhāveneva nappajahantīti
tika-abh05t0:1070_8: vuttā. Na ca yathāvijjamānenāti maggakiccabhāvena vijjamānappakārena pahānena vajjitā
tika-abh05t0:1071_2: Tesanti vuttappakārānaṃ dvinnaṃ anusayānaṃ. Ubhayāppajahanassāti kāmarāgavicikicchānusayāppajahanassa.
tika-abh05t0:1071_3: Kāraṇaṃ na hotīti yesaṃ vicikicchānusayo pahīno, tesaṃ tassa pahīnatā, yesaṃ yathāvuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1071_4: ubhayappahīnaṃ, tesaṃ tadappajahanassa kāraṇaṃ na hotīti attho. Tenāha “tesaṃ pahīnattā
tika-abh05t0:1071_5: ‘nappajahantī’ti na sakkā vattu”nti. Atha pana na tattha kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, yena kāraṇavacanena
tika-abh05t0:1071_6: yathāvuttadosāpatti siyā, kevalaṃ pana sanniṭṭhānena tesaṃ puggalānaṃ gahitatādassanatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1071_7: vuttaṃ “kāmarāgānusayañca nappajahantī”ti, evampi pucchitassa saṃsayatthassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1071_8: vattabbaṃ. Tathā ca sati “sesapuggalā tassa anusayassa pahīnattā nappajahantī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1071_9: kāraṇaṃ vattabbamevāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “na vattabba”ntiādi. Tattha na vattabbanti
tika-abh05t0:1071_10: vuttanayena kāraṇaṃ na vattabbaṃ kāraṇabhāvasseva abhāvato. “Ubhayāppajahanassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1071_11: na hotī”ti vuttaṃ, yathā pana vattabbaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “yo kāmarāgānusayaṃ…pe… vattabbattā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1071_12: āha. Tena pahīnāppahīnavasena kāraṇaṃ na vattabbaṃ, pahīnānaṃyeva pana vasena vattabbanti
tika-abh05t0:1071_13: dasseti. Saṃsayatthasaṅgahiteti saṃsayatthena padena saṅgahite. Sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahitaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1074_0: 264-274. Phalaṭṭhavaseneva desanā āraddhā, na maggaṭṭhavasena, kuto puthujjanavasena.
tika-abh05t0:1074_1: Kasmā? Phalakkhaṇe hi anusayā pahīnāti vuccanti, maggakkhaṇe pana pahīyantīti. Tenevāha
tika-abh05t0:1074_2: “maggasamaṅgīnaṃ aggahitataṃ dīpetī”ti. Paṭilome hi puthujjanavasenapi desanā gahitā
tika-abh05t0:1074_3: “yassa diṭṭhānusayo appahīno, tassa vicikicchānusayo appahīnoti? Āmantā”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t0:1074_5: Maggasamaṅgīnanti maggaṭṭhānaṃ. Ettha ca anusayānaṃ accantapaṭipakkhatāggahaṇena
tika-abh05t0:1074_6: uppattirahataṃ paṭikkhipati. Na hi te accantapaṭipakkhasamuppattito parato uppattirahā
tika-abh05t0:1074_7: honti. Maggasamaṅgitāggahaṇena anuppattirahatāpāditataṃ paṭikkhipati. Na hi maggakkhaṇe
tika-abh05t0:1074_8: te anuppattirahataṃ āpāditā nāma honti, atha kho āpādīyantīti. Ekacittakkhaṇikatāggahaṇena
tika-abh05t0:1074_9: santānabyāpāraṃ. Tenāha “na kocī”tiādi. Tattha teti maggasamaṅgino. Na kevalaṃ pahīnavāreyeva,
tika-abh05t0:1074_10: atha kho aññesupīti dassento “anusaya…pe… gahitā”ti āha.
tika-abh05t0:1075_1: attano okāse eva anuppattidhammataṃ āpādito”ti āha. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “cakkhuṃ loke
tika-abh05t0:1075_2: piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisatī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1075_3: vatvā puna vuttaṃ “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati,
tika-abh05t0:1075_4: ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī”ti. Tasmāti yasmā tadokāsattameva kāmadhātuādiokāsattameva
tika-abh05t0:1075_5: anusayānaṃ dīpenti pahīnāppahīnavacanāni, tasmā. Anokāse tadubhayāvattabbatā vuttāti
tika-abh05t0:1075_6: yasmā kāmarāgapaṭighānusayānaṃ dvinnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānaṃ, so eva pahānokāsoti svāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1075_7: tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ anokāso, tasmiṃ anokāse tadubhayassa pahānāppahānassa navattabbatā
tika-abh05t0:1075_8: vuttā. Kāmarāgānusayokāse hi paṭighānusayassa appahīnattā so “tattha pahīno”ti na
tika-abh05t0:1075_9: vattabbo, aṭṭhitattā pana “tattha appahīno”ti ca, tasmā anokāse tadubhayāvattabbatā
tika-abh05t0:1075_10: vuttāti. Tena saddhiṃ samānokāseti tena kāmarāgena saddhiṃ samānokāse. “Sādhāraṇaṭṭhāne”ti
tika-abh05t0:1075_11: vutte kāmadhātuyaṃ sukhupekkhāsu pahīno nāma hoti, na samānakāle pahīno tatiyacatutthamaggavajjhattā
tika-abh05t0:1078_1: āha. Idhāpi yuttāti pubbe vuttamevatthaṃ parāmasati. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kāraṇalābhe
tika-abh05t0:1078_2: uppattiarahataṃ dassetī”ti. Cha paṭisedhavacanānīti tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ cutūpapātavisiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1078_3: paṭisedhanavasena vuttavacanāni, tato eva dhātuvisesaniddhāraṇāni na honti. Paṭisedhoti
tika-abh05t0:1078_4: hi idha sattāpaṭisedho vuttoti adhippāyena vadati. Aññatthe pana na-kāre nāyaṃ doso.
tika-abh05t0:1078_5: Imaṃ nāma dhātuṃ. Taṃmūlikāsūti paṭisedhamūlikāsu. Evañhīti “na kāmadhātuyā cutassa
tika-abh05t0:1078_6: kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassā”tiādinā paṭhamayojanāya sati. Nakāmadhātuādīsu upapattikittaneneva
tika-abh05t0:1078_7: nakāmadhātuādiggahaṇenapi dhātuvisesasseva gahitatāya atthato viññāyamānattā. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:1078_8: “na kāmadhātu…pe… viññāyatī”ti. Bhañjitabbāti vibhajitabbā. Vibhāgo panettha duvidho
tika-abh05t0:1078_9: icchitoti āha “dvidhā kātabbāti attho”ti. Pucchā ca vissajjanāni ca pucchāvissajjanāni.
tika-abh05t0:1078_10: Yathā avutte bhaṅgābhāvassa aviññātattā “anusayā bhaṅgā natthī”ti vattabbaṃ, tathā
tika-abh05t0:1078_11: tayidaṃ “kati anusayā bhaṅgā”ti etadapekkhanti tadapi vattabbaṃ. Pucchāpekkhañhi vissajjananti.
tika-abh05t0:1083_0: 1-62. Sarāgādīti ettha ādi-saddena “yassa sarāgaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, na nirujjhatī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1083_1: ārabhitvā yāva “yassa avimuttaṃ citta”nti vāro, tāva saṅgaṇhāti. Kusalādīti pana
tika-abh05t0:1083_2: ādi-saddena “yassa kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, na nirujjhatī”ti ārabhitvā yāva “yassa
tika-abh05t0:1083_3: saraṇaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, na nirujjhatī”ti vāro, tāva saṅgaṇhāti, tasmā sarāgādikusalādīhīti
tika-abh05t0:1083_4: sarāgādīhi avimuttantehi, kusalādīhi araṇantehi padehi missakā vārā. Suddhikāti kevalā
tika-abh05t0:1083_5: yathāvuttasarāgādīhi kusalādīhi ca amissakā. Tayo tayoti puggaladhammavasena tayo
tika-abh05t0:1083_6: tayo mahāvārā. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ soḷasa puggalavārāti āha “tattha tattha pana vutte
tika-abh05t0:1083_7: sampiṇḍetvā”ti. Tattha tattha soḷasavidhe sarāgādimissakacitte vutte puggale eva
tika-abh05t0:1083_9: etthāpi eseva nayo. Na nirantaraṃ vutteti dhamme puggaladhamme ca anāmasitvā soḷasasupi
tika-abh05t0:1083_10: ṭhānesu nirantaraṃ puggale eva vutte sampiṇḍetvā soḷasa puggalavārā na vuttāti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1084_0: Saṃsaggavasenāti saṃsajjanavasena desanāya vimissanavasena. Aññathā hi uppādanirodhā
tika-abh05t0:1084_1: paccuppannānāgatakālā ca kathaṃ saṃsajjīyanti. Sesānampi vārānanti uppāduppannavārādīnaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1084_2: Taṃtaṃnāmatāti yathā “yassa cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ uppanna”ntiādinā uppādauppannabhāvāmasanato
tika-abh05t0:1084_3: uppādauppannavāroti nāmaṃ pāḷito eva viññāyati, evaṃ sesavārānampīti āha “taṃtaṃnāmatā
tika-abh05t0:1087_0: 63. Tathārūpassevāti pacchimacittasamaṅgino eva. Tañca cittanti tañca yathāvuttakkhaṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1088_1: nāma, tadeva uppādakkhaṇe uppādaṃ pattattā uppajjittha, anatītattā uppajjati nāmā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1088_2: vuttaṃ, etaṃ ubhayampi. Evaṃ na sakkā vattunti iminā vuttappakārena na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1088_3: pakārantarena pana sakkā vattunti adhippāyo. Tattha “na hī”tiādinā paṭhamapakkhaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1088_4: vibhāveti. Vibhajitabbaṃ siyāti “bhaṅgakkhaṇe taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca uppajjati,
tika-abh05t0:1088_5: uppādakkhaṇe taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppajjati cā”ti vibhajitabbaṃ siyā, na ca
tika-abh05t0:1088_6: vibhattaṃ. “Āmantā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā khaṇapaccuppanne citte vuttanayena ubhayassapi
tika-abh05t0:1088_7: labbhamānattā, na ca vuttaṃ. Idāni yena pakārena sakkā vattuṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “cittassa
tika-abh05t0:1088_8: bhaṅgakkhaṇe”tiādimāha. Puggalo vutto, puggalavāro hesoti adhippāyo. Tassāti puggalassa.
tika-abh05t0:1088_9: Na ca kiñci cittaṃ uppajjati cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgibhāvato. Taṃ pana cittaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1088_10: uppajjati, yaṃ cittasamaṅgī so puggaloti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Yadi anekacittavasenāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1088_11: yamakadesanā pavattāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “cittanti hi…pe… tiṭṭhatī”ti. Sanniṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh05t0:1088_12: niyamo veditabbo, aññathā “no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”tiādinā paṭisedho na yujjeyyāti
tika-abh05t0:1088_13: adhippāyo. Tādisanti tathārūpaṃ, yadavattho uppannauppajjamānatādipariyāyehi vattabbo
tika-abh05t0:1089_1: atikkantakālavārassa puggalavārattā. Puggalo pucchitoti “yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1089_2: tassa citta”nti cittasamaṅgipuggalo pucchitoti puggalasseva vissajjanena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1089_3: itarathā aññaṃ pucchitaṃ aññaṃ vissajjitaṃ siyā. Na koci puggalo na gahito sabbasattānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1089_4: anibbattacittatābhāvato. Te ca pana sabbe puggalā. Nirujjhamānakkhaṇātītacittāti
tika-abh05t0:1089_5: nirujjhamānakkhaṇā hutvā atītacittā. Tathā dutiyatatiyāti yathā paṭhamapañho anavasesapuggalavisayattā
tika-abh05t0:1089_6: paṭivacanena vissajjetabbo siyā, tathā tato eva dutiyatatiyapañhā “āmantā”icceva
tika-abh05t0:1089_7: vissajjetabbā siyunti attho. Catuttho pana pañho evaṃ vibhajitvā puggalavaseneva
tika-abh05t0:1089_8: vissajjetabboti dassento “pacchimacittassā”tiādiṃ vatvā tathā avacane kāraṇaṃ dassento
tika-abh05t0:1089_10: iminā vattamānassa cittassa vasena puggalo uppādakkhaṇātītacitto, “atītaṃ cittaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1089_11: uppādakkhaṇañca vītikkantanti bhaṅgakkhaṇañca vītikkanta”nti iminā pana atītassa
tika-abh05t0:1090_0: Tatthāti tesu dvīsu puggalesu. Purimassāti paṭhamaṃ vuttassa sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahitassa
tika-abh05t0:1090_1: cittaṃ na bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ. “No ca bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ vītikkanta”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1090_2: Pacchimassa vītikkantaṃ cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇanti sambandho. “Bhaṅgakkhaṇañca vītikkanta”nti
tika-abh05t0:1090_3: hi vuttaṃ. Evamādiko puggalavibhāgoti dutiyapañhādīsu vuttaṃ sandhāyāha. Tassa cittassa
tika-abh05t0:1090_5: ca yathārahaṃ vītikkamassa avītikkamassa ca dassanavasena dassito hoti puggalavibhāgoti
tika-abh05t0:1090_6: yojanā. Idhāti imasmiṃ atikkantakālavāre. Puggalavisiṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ pucchitaṃ “yassa
tika-abh05t0:1090_7: cittaṃ tassa citta”nti vuttattā. Yadipi puggalappadhānā pucchā puggalavārattā. Athāpi
tika-abh05t0:1090_8: cittappadhānā puggalaṃ visesanabhāvena gahetvā cittassa visesitattā. Ubhayathāpi
tika-abh05t0:1090_9: dutiyapucchāya “āmantā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā anavasesapuggalavisayattā. Tathā pana avatvā
tika-abh05t0:1090_10: “atītaṃ citta”nti vuttaṃ, kasmā nirodhakkhaṇa…pe… dassanatthanti daṭṭhabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t0:1090_11: Esa nayo “na nirujjhamāna”nti etthāpīti nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ nirodhakkhaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1090_12: vītikkantakālaṃ kiṃ tassa cittaṃ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1091_0: 114-116. Sarāgapacchimacittassāti sarāgacittesu pacchimassa cittassa, ekassa puggalassa
tika-abh05t0:1091_1: rāgasampayuttacittesu yaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ cittaṃ, tassa. So pana puggalo anāgāmī veditabbo.
tika-abh05t0:1091_2: Na nirujjhati nirodhāsamaṅgitāya. Nirujjhissati idāni nirodhaṃ pāpuṇissati. Appaṭisandhikattā
tika-abh05t0:1091_3: pana tato aññaṃ nuppajjissati. Itaresanti yathāvuttasarāgapacchimacittasamaṅgiṃ vītarāgacittasamaṅgiñca
tika-abh05t0:1097_0: 1-16. Yathā mūlayamake kusalādidhammā desitāti kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā kusalakusalamūlādivibhāgato
tika-abh05t0:1097_1: mūlayamake yamakavasena yathā desitā. Aññathāti kusalakusalamūlādivibhāgato aññathā,
tika-abh05t0:1100_0: 33-34. Taṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpaṃ aggahetvā. Kecīti dhammasirittheraṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh05t0:1100_1: So hi “cittasamuṭṭhānarūpavasena vutta”nti aṭṭhakathaṃ āharitvā “imasmiṃ pañhe kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpañca
tika-abh05t0:1100_2: labbhatī”ti avoca. Tathā ca vatvā paṭilomapāḷiṃ dassetvā “cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva
tika-abh05t0:1100_3: idhādhippetaṃ. Kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpe na vidhānaṃ, nāpi paṭisedho”ti āha. Tathāti
tika-abh05t0:1100_4: yathā vuttappakāre pāṭhe cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva adhippetaṃ, tathā etthāpīti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1100_5: Noti vuttanti vadantīti sambandho. Taṃ panetanti yathā uddhaṭassa pāṭhassa atthavacanaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1100_6: evaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmāti āha “cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe…pe… paṭisedhasiddhito”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1101_0: Ye ca vadantīti ettha ye cāti vajirabuddhittheraṃ sandhāyāha. So hi “sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe”tiādinā
tika-abh05t0:1101_1: paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ āharitvā “yathā tattha satipi kammajādirūpe ṭhapetvā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpanti
tika-abh05t0:1101_2: cittapaṭibaddhattā cittajarūpameva ṭhapetabbabhāvena uddhaṭaṃ, evamidhāpi cittajarūpameva
tika-abh05t0:1101_3: kathita”nti vadati. Tañca nesaṃ vacanaṃ tathā na hoti, yathā tehi udāhaṭaṃ, visamoyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1101_4: upaññāsoti attho. Yathā ca taṃ tathā na hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “yesañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1101_5: Tesanti kammajādīnaṃ. Tassāti maggassa. Teti abyākatā, ye uppādanirodhavanto. Avijjamānesu
tika-abh05t0:1102_0: Sanniṭṭhānena gahitesu puggalesu. Tesu hi keci akusalābyākatacittānaṃ uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgino,
tika-abh05t0:1102_1: keci abyākatacittassa, keci kusalābyākatacittassa, tesu purimā dve paṭhamakoṭṭhāsena
tika-abh05t0:1102_2: saṅgahitā tassa kusaluppattipaṭisedhaparattā, te pana bhavavasena vibhajitvā vattabbāti
tika-abh05t0:1103_0: 79. Tatoti ekāvajjanavīthito. Purimatarajavanavīthi yāya vuṭṭhānagāminī saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t0:1103_1: tattha uppannassapi cittassa. Kusalānāgatabhāvapariyosānenāti kusaladhammānaṃ anāgatabhāvassa
tika-abh05t0:1103_2: pariyosānabhūtena aggamaggānantarapaccayattena dīpitaṃ hoti samānalakkhaṇaṃ sabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1103_3: Kena? Tāya eva samānalakkhaṇatāya. Esa nayoti yathā kusalānuppādo kusalānāgatabhāvassa
tika-abh05t0:1103_4: pariyosānabhūtato vuttaparicchedato orampi labbhatīti so yathāvuttaparicchedo lakkhaṇamattanti
tika-abh05t0:1103_5: svāyaṃ nayo dassito. Esa nayo akusalātītabhāvassa ādimhi “dutiye akusale”ti vuttaṭṭhāne,
tika-abh05t0:1103_6: abyākatātītabhāvassa ādimhi “dutiye citte”ti vuttaṭṭhānepīti yojanā. Idāni “esa nayo”ti
tika-abh05t0:1103_7: yathāvuttamatidesaṃ “yathā hī”tiādinā pākaṭataraṃ karoti. Bhāvanāpahānāni dassitāni
tika-abh05t0:1103_8: honti “aggamaggasamaṅgī kusalañca dhammaṃ bhāveti, akusalañca pajahatī”ti. Idhāti
tika-abh05t0:1103_9: imasmiṃ pavattivāre. Taṃ tanti akusalātītatādi kusalānāgatatādi ca. Tena tenāti “dutiye
tika-abh05t0:1104_0: 100. Paṭisandhicittatoti idaṃ mariyādaggahaṇaṃ, na abhividhiggahaṇaṃ, yato “soḷasama”nti
tika-abh05t0:1104_1: āha. Abhividhiggahaṇameva vā soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukameva rūpanti imasmiṃ pakkhe adhippete
tika-abh05t0:1104_2: paṭikkhittovāyaṃ vādoti dassento “tato parampi vā”ti āha. Ayañca vicāro heṭṭhā dassito
tika-abh05t0:1104_3: eva. Na tato oranti viññāyati tato oraṃ akusalanirodhasamakālaṃ abyākatanirodhassa asambhavato.
tika-abh05t0:1110_0: 1. Indriyayamake vibhaṅge viyāti yathā indriyavibhaṅge purisindriyānantaraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1110_1: uddiṭṭhaṃ, na manindriyānantaraṃ, evaṃ imasmiṃ indriyayamake. Tañca suttadesanānurodhenāti
tika-abh05t0:1110_2: dassento “tīṇimāni…pe… sutte desitakkamenā”ti āha. Soyaṃ yadatthaṃ tassa sutte desitakkamena
tika-abh05t0:1110_3: uddeso, taṃ dassetuṃ “pavattivārehī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā “jīvitindriya”nti
tika-abh05t0:1110_4: idaṃ rūpajīvitindriyassa arūpajīvitindriyassa ca sāmaññato gahaṇaṃ, evaṃ upādinnassa
tika-abh05t0:1110_5: anupādinnassa cāti āha “kammajānaṃ akammajānañca anupālaka”nti. Atha vā sahajadhammānupālakampi
tika-abh05t0:1110_6: jīvitindriyaṃ na kevalaṃ khaṇaṭṭhitiyā eva kāraṇaṃ, atha kho pabandhānupacchedassapi
tika-abh05t0:1110_7: kāraṇameva. Aññathā āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ na sambhaveyya, tasmā “kammajānañca anupālaka”nti
tika-abh05t0:1110_8: avisesato vuttaṃ, cutipaṭisandhīsu ca pavattamānānaṃ kammajānaṃ anupālakaṃ. Itīti
tika-abh05t0:1110_10: pavattivasena ca. Tattha yaṃ upādinnaṃ, taṃ cutipaṭisandhivaseneva, itaraṃ itaravasenapi
tika-abh05t0:1110_11: vattabbaṃ. Yasmā cakkhundriyādīsu purisindriyāvasānesu ekantaupādinnesu ataṃsabhāvattā
tika-abh05t0:1110_12: yaṃ manindriyaṃ mūlameva na hoti, tasmā taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesamūlakāni cakkhundriyādimūlakāni.
tika-abh05t0:1110_13: Āyatanayamake viyāti yathā āyatanayamake paṭisandhivasenāyatanānaṃ uppādo, maraṇavasena
tika-abh05t0:1110_14: ca nirodho vutto, evamidhāpi cutiupapattivaseneva vattabbāni, tasmā ataṃsabhāvattā
tika-abh05t0:1110_15: jīvitindriyaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyādīnaṃ majjhe anuddisitvā ante purisindriyānantaraṃ
tika-abh05t0:1110_16: uddiṭṭhaṃ. Yaṃ pana cakkhundriyādimūlakesu manindriyaṃ sabbapacchā eva gahitaṃ, tattha
tika-abh05t0:1113_0: 94. Koci sabhāvo natthīti koci sabhāvadhammo natthi. Yadi evaṃ “natthī”ti paṭikkhepo
tika-abh05t0:1113_1: eva yuttoti āha “na ca rūpādī”tiādi. “Sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhā”tiādīsu sukhadukkhasaddānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1113_2: sāmaññavacanabhāvepi indriyadesanāyaṃ te visiṭṭhavisayā evāti dassento “sukhassa…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1113_3: gahitoyevā”ti āha. Dukkhassa ca bhedaṃ katvā.
tika-abh05t0:1114_0: 140. Paññindriyāni hontīti āmantāti vuttanti pajānanaṭṭhena adhipateyyaṭṭhena ca
tika-abh05t0:1114_1: paññindriyāni honti, dassanaṭṭhena pana cakkhūni cāti cakkhu, indriyanti pucchāya
tika-abh05t0:1117_0: 186. Aññadhammanissayenāti “yo tesaṃ rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhitī”tiādinā aññadhammanissayena
tika-abh05t0:1117_1: gahetabbaṃ. Pavattiñca gahetvā gatesu vissajjanesu, cutipaṭisandhiyo gahetvā gatesu
tika-abh05t0:1117_2: yojanā na labbhatīti adhippāyo. Alabbhamānā ca sukhadukkhadomanassindriyeheva na
tika-abh05t0:1117_3: labbhati. Taṃmūlakā ca nayāti sukhindriyādimūlakā ca nayā. Tehīti sukhindriyādīhi.
tika-abh05t0:1117_5: yojanā. Taṃmūlakā ca tathāyojanāmūlabhūtā ca nayā jīvitindriyādimūlakā ca nayā. Pākaṭāyevāti
tika-abh05t0:1118_1: nidassananti yojetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “nidassanamattametaṃ, na pana
tika-abh05t0:1118_2: gaṇanaparicchindana”nti āha “na hi catunnaṃyevāti niyamo kato”ti. Taṃsamānalakkhaṇāti
tika-abh05t0:1118_3: tāya sacakkhukapaṭisandhitāya samānalakkhaṇāti parittavipākaggahaṇaṃ. Tattha sasomanassapaṭisandhiyo
tika-abh05t0:1118_4: sandhāya upekkhāpaṭisandhiyo nidassanabhāvena vuttāti keci. Parittavipākapaṭisandhi
tika-abh05t0:1118_5: ca kusalavipākāhetukapaṭisandhi veditabbā. Sāpi hi sacakkhukā siyā. Taṃsamānalakkhaṇāti
tika-abh05t0:1118_6: vā tāya upekkhāsahagatāya samānalakkhaṇā yathāvuttaahetukapaṭisandhi ca pañcamajjhānapaṭisandhi
tika-abh05t0:1118_7: ca. Yadi evaṃ “catunna”nti kasmā gaṇanaparicchedoti āha “kāmāvacare…pe… nidassanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1118_8: kata”nti. Tenāti upekkhāsahagatamahāvipākanidassanena, yehi samānatāya ime nidassanabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1118_9: vuttā, te ekaṃsena taṃsabhāvā evāti ayamettha adhippāyo. Tenāha “yathā sasomanassa…pe… to hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1119_0: Nanu ca gabbhaseyyakesu ayamattho ekaṃsato na labbhatīti āsaṅkaṃ sandhāyāha “gabbhaseyyakānañca…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1119_1: dassitā hotī”ti. Tenāha “sacakkhukāna”ntiādi. Tattha yadi sahetukapaṭisandhikānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1119_2: kāmāvacarānaṃ niyamato sacakkhukādibhāvadassanaṃ gabbhaseyyakavasena labbheyya, yuttametaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1119_3: siyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “gabbhaseyyakepi hī”tiādi. Tathā āyatanayamake dassitanti
tika-abh05t0:1119_4: idaṃ āyatanayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ attanā vuttaṃ “evañca katvā indriyayamake”tiādivacanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1119_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi somanassindriyuppādakakammassa ekantena cakkhundriyuppādanato
tika-abh05t0:1119_6: gabbhepi yāva cakkhundriyuppatti, tāva uppajjamānatāya “abhinanditabbattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1119_7: Sanniṭṭhānena saṅgahitānanti “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ uppajjatī”ti etena sanniṭṭhānena
tika-abh05t0:1119_8: saṅgahitānaṃ. Itthīnaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantīnanti ādīsūti ādi-saddena “itthīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1119_9: acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantīna”ntiādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Te evāti gabbhaseyyakā eva.
tika-abh05t0:1120_1: ahetukapaṭisandhicitte. Samādhileso dubbalasamādhi yo cittaṭṭhitimatto. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-abh05t0:1120_2: cittaṭṭhiti viya dubbalaṃ vīriyaṃ natthi, yo “vīriyaleso”ti vattabbo, tasmā, lesamattassapi
tika-abh05t0:1120_3: vīriyassa abhāvāti attho. Aññesūti ahetukapaṭisandhicittato aññesu. Kesucīti ekaccesu.
tika-abh05t0:1120_5: Samādhivīriyāni indriyappattāni ca na hontīti samādhikiccaṃ paṭikkhipati, na samādhimattaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1120_6: na vīriyalesassa sabbhāvatoti yojetabbaṃ. Tenevāha “visesanañhi visesitabbe pavattatī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1120_7: Yasmiṃ vīriye sati indriyuppatti siyā, tadeva tattha natthīti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1121_0: Apāye opapātikavasenāti idaṃ sugatiyaṃ opapātiko vikalindriyo na hotīti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1121_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tesanti itthipurisindriyasantānānaṃ. Itthipurisindriyānaṃ pana
tika-abh05t0:1121_3: uppādanirodhā abhiṇhasova hontīti. Paṭhamakappikādīnanti ettha ādi-saddena gahitānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1121_5: pana vasena uppādo eva labbhati. “Cutiupapattivaseneva dutiyapucchāsupi sanniṭṭhānehi
tika-abh05t0:1121_6: gahaṇaṃ veditabba”nti idaṃ upādinnaindriyehi niyamitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1122_1: Etena rūpajīvitindriyassa cakkhundriyādisamānagatikataṃ yuttito sādheti. Āgamato
tika-abh05t0:1122_2: pana “vinā somanassenā”tiādinā parato sādhessati. Chedoti nāmaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ sarūpadassaneneva saṃsayachedanato.
tika-abh05t0:1123_0: Tassāti rūpajīvitindriyassa. Te ca asaññasattā. Nanu ca uppādova jīvitindriyassa
tika-abh05t0:1123_1: cutiupapattivasena vattabbo, na anuppādoti āha “anuppādo…pe… na pavatte”ti. Ayañca
tika-abh05t0:1123_2: nayo na kevalaṃ purimakoṭṭhāse eva, atha kho itarakoṭṭhāsepi gahito evāti dassento
tika-abh05t0:1124_0: “Upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti kasmā vuttanti yenādhippāyena codanā katā, tamadhippāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1124_1: vivarituṃ “nanu suddhāvāsa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Na vattabbanti “upapajjantāna”nti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1124_3: na vattabbaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Somanassamanindriyānanti somanassindriyamanindriyānaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1124_4: ayameva vā pāṭho. Tadāti paṭhamassa rūpajīvitindriyassa dharamānakāle. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-abh05t0:1124_6: ekajjhaṃ katvā gayhati, tasmā. Ubhayanti somanassindriyajīvitindriyanti idaṃ ubhayaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1124_7: Uppādakkhaṇena nidassitanti etena “upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti
tika-abh05t0:1124_8: dasseti. Idāni tamevatthaṃ udāharaṇena pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1124_9: Tattha yathā tādisānaṃ anekesaṃ cittānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇe labbhamānaṃ tadekadesena sabbapaṭhamassa
tika-abh05t0:1124_10: upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇena nidassitaṃ, evamidhāpi khaṇadvaye labbhamānaṃ tadekadesena
tika-abh05t0:1125_0: Tesanti jīvitindriyādīnaṃ. Aññatthāti pavatte. Idhāti anāgatakālabhede. Na na sambhavati
tika-abh05t0:1125_1: upapattikkhaṇassa viya tato paraṃ pavattikkhaṇassapi anāgatakālabhāvato. Tasmāti
tika-abh05t0:1125_2: upapattito aññatthāpi yathādhippetauppādasambhavato. Ayañca attho vārantarepi dissatīti
tika-abh05t0:1125_3: dassento āha “evañca katvā”tiādi. Na hītiādinā tamevatthaṃ samattheti. Tattha api
tika-abh05t0:1125_4: pacchima…pe… sandhikassāti api-saddena “ko pana vādo apacchimabhavikassa somanassasahagatapaṭisandhikassā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1125_5: dasseti. Apacchimabhavikassa cutito pacchā “somanassindriyaṃ nirujjhissatī”ti vattabbameva
tika-abh05t0:1125_6: natthīti āha “cutito pubbevā”ti. Ettha hi paṭhamapucchāsu sanniṭṭhānatthotiādīsu
tika-abh05t0:1125_7: ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – ettha “yassa cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjissatī”ti evamādīsu yamakesu
tika-abh05t0:1125_8: yā paṭhamapucchā, tāsu sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahito attho. Pucchitabbatthanissayoti “tassa
tika-abh05t0:1125_9: somanassindriyaṃ uppajjissatī”tiādikassa pucchitabbassa atthassa nissayabhūto mādisova
tika-abh05t0:1125_10: mayā sadiso eva attho upapattiuppādindriyavā upapattikkhaṇe uppādāvatthaindriyasahito,
tika-abh05t0:1125_12: pucchitabbatthassa nissayoti “yassa vā panā”tiādinā paṭinivattitvā pucchitabbassapi
tika-abh05t0:1125_13: saṃsayatthassa nissayoti evaṃ iminā viya ajjhāsayena “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1125_15: atthaṃ niyameti. Tattheva tāsu eva pubbe vuttapaṭhamapucchāsu eva. Pucchitabbaṃ “tassa
tika-abh05t0:1125_16: somanassindriyaṃ uppajjissatī”tiādīsu anāgatabhāvamattena sarūpato gahitaṃ uppādaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1125_18: sarūpato gahitaṃ nirodhaṃ vā nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ vā saṃsayatthaṃ na niyametīti. Evanti
tika-abh05t0:1125_19: vuttappakārena sanniṭṭhānatthassa niyamo hoti, na saṃsayatthassa, tasmā “yassa vā
tika-abh05t0:1125_20: pana…pe… āmantā”ti vuttaṃ. Esa nayoti yvāyaṃ uppādavāre vicāro vutto, nirodhavārepi
tika-abh05t0:1125_21: eseva nayo. Tathā hi “yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa cakkhundriyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1126_0: Evaṃ avuttattāti uppādanirodhānaṃ anāgatānaṃ sarūpena avuttattā. Na hi tattha te
tika-abh05t0:1126_1: sarūpena vuttā, atha kho “nuppajjissatī”ti paṭikkhepamukhena vuttā. Tatthāti anulome.
tika-abh05t0:1126_2: Na evaṃ yojetabbā paṭilome. Tameva ayojetabbataṃ “yathā hī”tiādinā vivarati. Uppādanirodhe
tika-abh05t0:1126_3: atikkamitvā uppādanirodhā sambhavanti yojetuṃ, tathā uppādanirodhe appatvā uppādanirodhā
tika-abh05t0:1126_4: sambhavanti yojetunti yojanā. Idañca dvayaṃ yathānulome sambhavati, na evaṃ paṭilome.
tika-abh05t0:1126_5: Tenāha “na evaṃ…pe… sambhavantī”ti. Tattha kāraṇamāha “abhūtābhāvassa…pe… sambhavānupapattito”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1126_6: Abhūtābhāvassāti abhūtassa abhāvassa, abhūtassa uppādassa nirodhassa ca abhāvassāti
tika-abh05t0:1126_7: adhippāyo. Tenāha “abhūtuppādanirodhābhāvo ca paṭilome pucchito”ti, tasmā “āmantā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1126_8: ca vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ vissajjananti sambandho. Assa visesarahitassa abhūtābhāvassāti
tika-abh05t0:1126_9: imassa yathāvuttassa yathā rūpābhāvo vedanābhāvoti koci abhāvopi visesasahito, na
tika-abh05t0:1127_0: Kālantarayogābhāvatoti kālavisesayogābhāvato. Yādisānanti yāni bhūtāni na vattamānāni
tika-abh05t0:1127_1: sati paccaye uppajjanārahāni, tesaṃ anāgatānanti attho. Uppādanirodhābhāvena pucchitabbassāti
tika-abh05t0:1127_2: “nuppajjissati na nirujjhissatī”ti evaṃ uppādassa nirodhassa ca abhāvena pucchitabbassa
tika-abh05t0:1127_3: atthassa. Sannissayo nissayabhūto sanniṭṭhānena sannicchito sanniṭṭhānapadasaṅgahito.
tika-abh05t0:1127_4: So yathāvutto attho nissayo etesanti tannissayā. Tādisānaṃyeva anāgatānaṃyeva upapatticutiuppādanirodhānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1127_6: jīvitamanindriyādīnampi. Anuppādānirodhā saṃsayapadena pucchitā honti “yassa somanassindriyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1127_7: nuppajjissati, tassa somanassindriyaṃ na nirujjhissatī”ti. “Āmantā”ti vuttaṃ vibhajitvā
tika-abh05t0:1128_0: Ye sopekkhapaṭisandhikā bhavissanti rūpaloke, te saṅgahitāti yojanā. Taṃsamānalakkhaṇatāyāti
tika-abh05t0:1128_1: tena sopekkhapaṭisandhikabhāvena samānalakkhaṇatāya. Taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ dhammayamake
tika-abh05t0:1128_2: tādisasseva vacanassa abhāvato. Tatthapi yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ cittayamake vuttaṃ “na
tika-abh05t0:1131_1: tāni lokiyaabyākatāni upādāya. Taṃsamānagatikānaṃ manindriyādīnaṃ “so vedanākkhandhaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1131_2: parijānātīti? Āmantā”tiādinā vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ viya pariññeyyatā vuttā. Yañhi parijānitabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1131_3: tadeva parijānātītiādinā vuttaṃ. Evamaviparīte atthe siddhepi codako “missakattā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1131_4: ettha labbhamānaṃ lesaṃ gahetvā codeti “yadi pariññeyyamissakattā”tiādinā. Tassattho
tika-abh05t0:1131_5: – yathā idha pariññeyyamissakānaṃ pariññeyyatā vuttā, evamaññatthāpi sā tesaṃ vattabbā,
tika-abh05t0:1131_6: tathā bhāvetabbamissakānaṃ bhāvetabbatāti. Tenāha “kasmā dhammayamake”tiādi. Kusalākusalesu
tika-abh05t0:1131_7: bhāvanāpahānābhiniveso hoti, yena vuttaṃ “so taṃ akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t0:1131_8: Na abyākatabhāvanti ekena yathā phassadvārato viya viññāṇadvārato kusalādīnaṃ uppattipariyāyo,
tika-abh05t0:1131_9: evaṃ vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ viya na abyākatādīnaṃ pariññeyyatāpariyāyoti dasseti.
tika-abh05t0:1132_0: Kusalākusalabhāvena aggahitāti samudayasabhāvena aggahitāti attho. Kusalākusalāpīti
tika-abh05t0:1132_1: kusalākusalabhāvāpi samānā. Bhāvetabbapahātabbabhāvehi vināpi hoti, yo na maggasamudayasaccapakkhiyo.
tika-abh05t0:1132_2: Yathā “aniccaṃ rūpa”nti ettha “aniccameva rūpaṃ, na nicca”nti paṭiyogivinivattanameva
tika-abh05t0:1132_3: eva-kārena karīyati, na tassa dukkhānattatādayo nivāritā honti, evaṃ “pahātabbamevā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1132_4: ettha eva-saddena paṭiyogibhūtaṃ appahātabbameva nivattīyati, na tato aññavisesāti
tika-abh05t0:1132_5: dassento āha “etena pahātabbamevā”tiādi. Bhāvetabbabhāvo eva tassa aññindriyassa
tika-abh05t0:1132_6: gahito ukkaṃsagativijānanato. “Parato likhitabbaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā likhita”nti kasmā
tika-abh05t0:1132_7: vuttaṃ. Dve puggalāti hi ādi anulome āgataṃ uddhaṭaṃ, cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānātītiādi
tika-abh05t0:1132_8: pana paṭilome. Domanassindriyaṃ na pajahanti nāmāti idaṃ “no ca domanassindriyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1132_9: pajahantī”ti pāḷipadassa atthavacanaṃ. Yaṃ pana “cakkhundriyamūlakaṃ atikkamitvā
tika-abh05t0:1132_10: domanassindriyamūlake idaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ, paṭilome āgataṃ sandhāya vuttattā taṃ
tika-abh05t0:1132_11: na yuttaṃ, na taṃ aṭṭhakathācariyā paṭhamaṃ āgataṃ padaṃ laṅghitvā tādisasseva pacchā
tika-abh05t0:1132_12: āgatapadassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ karonti. Padānukkamato eva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā
tika-abh05t0:1132_13: āraddhā, pariyosāpitā ca, tasmā anupaṭipāṭiyāva likhitaṃ, na uppaṭipāṭiyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1133_0: Etthāti etasmiṃ pariññāvāre. Cha puggalāti puthujjanena saddhiṃ yāva anāgāmimaggaṭṭhā
tika-abh05t0:1133_1: cha puggalā. Abhinditvā gahito tattha bhabbābhabbānaṃ kiccavisesassa aggahitattā.
tika-abh05t0:1133_2: Yattha pana sati puthujjanaggahaṇasāmaññe bhabbānaṃ kiccaṃ gahitaṃ, yattha ca abhabbānaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1133_3: tattha te eva bhinditvā vuttā hontīti dassento “ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti,
tika-abh05t0:1133_4: ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissantī”ti ca ādimāha. Arahāti ariyo, ayameva
tika-abh05t0:1133_5: vā pāṭho. Paṭhamamaggaphalasamaṅgīti purimamaggaphalasamaṅgī. Itaroti arahā. Evaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1133_6: puggalabhedaṃ ñatvāti idha puthujjano so ca abhabboti gahito, idha bhabbo idha ariyā,
tika-abh05t0:1133_7: ye ca paṭhamamaggaphalasamaṅgino yāva aggamaggaphalasamaṅginoti evaṃ yathāvuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1133_8: puggalavibhāgaṃ ñatvā. Tattha tatthāti tesaṃ dve puthujjanā aṭṭha ariyāti imesaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1133_9: yathāvuttapuggalānaṃ bhedato abhedato ca gahaṇavasena āgate tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pāṭhapadese.
tika-abh05t0:1133_10: Sanniṭṭhānenāti sanniṭṭhānapadavasena, nicchayavaseneva vā. Niddhāretvāti nīharitvā.
tika-abh05t0:1140_1: ramanti. Tesūti kāmaguṇādīsu. Viharantīti iriyāpathaparivattanādinā vattanti. Paccatthiketi
tika-abh05t0:1140_2: bāhirabbhantarabhede amitte. Issariyaṃ tattha tattha ādhipateyyaṃ. Ṭhānaṃ seṭṭhisenāpatiyuvarājādiṭṭhānantaraṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1140_5: ñāṇappabhāya ca. Ettha ca deva-saddo yathā kīḷāvijigisāvohārajutigatiattho, evaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1141_0: Iddhividhāditāmattena bhagavato abhiññādīnaṃ sāvakehi sādhāraṇatāvacanaṃ, sabhāvato
tika-abh05t0:1141_1: pana sabbepi buddhaguṇā anaññasādhāraṇāyevāti dassento “niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya,
tika-abh05t0:1141_6: pana sikkhāpadapaññattipi saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā vītikkamadhammānurūpā anusāsanīti
tika-abh05t0:1141_7: katvā. Ñāṇagati ñāṇena gantabbassa ñeyyassa avabodho. Samannāgatattāti idaṃ “abhiññākīḷāyā”tiādīsu
tika-abh05t0:1141_8: paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ, tathā sadevakena lokenāti idaṃ “gamanīyato”tiādīsu. Te deveti
tika-abh05t0:1141_9: sammutidevādike deve. Tehi guṇehīti abhiññādiguṇehi. Pūjanīyataro devoti idaṃ pūjanīyapariyāyo
tika-abh05t0:1141_10: ayaṃ ati-saddoti katvā vuttaṃ. Atirekataroti adhikataro. Upapattidevānanti idaṃ tabbahulatāya
tika-abh05t0:1141_11: vuttaṃ. Visuddhidevāpi hi tattha vijjanteva, tesupi vā labbhamānaṃ upapattidevabhāvamattameva
tika-abh05t0:1141_12: gahetvā tathā vuttaṃ. Paṭipakkhānaṃ dussīlyamuṭṭhassaccavikkhepānaṃ, sīlavipattiabhijjhādomanassaavasiṭṭhanīvaraṇānaṃ vā.
tika-abh05t0:1142_0: Isīnaṃ sattamo, isīsu sattamoti duvidhampi atthaṃ yojetvā dassento “catusaccāvabodhagatiyā…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1142_1: vutto”ti āha. Saparasantānesu sīlādiguṇānaṃ esanaṭṭhena vā isayo, buddhādayo ariyā.
tika-abh05t0:1142_2: Isi ca so sattamo cāti isisattamoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. “Nāmarūpanirodha”nti
tika-abh05t0:1142_3: ettha yaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nirodhetabbaṃ, taṃ dassento “yato viññāṇaṃ paccudāvattatī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1142_4: āha. Vaṭṭapariyāpannañhi nāmarūpaṃ nirodhetabbaṃ. Tasmiñhi nirodhite sabbaso nāmarūpaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1142_6: satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1142_7: arahato anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa carimaviññāṇassa nirodhena
tika-abh05t0:1142_8: paññā ca sati ca nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti atthaṃ gacchanti
tika-abh05t0:1142_10: Sabhāvato ca paccayākāro gambhīro. Yathāha “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro”tiādi,
tika-abh05t0:1142_11: “gambhīro cāyaṃ, ānanda, paṭiccasamuppādo gambhīrāvabhāso”ti ca ādi. Tassa cāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1145: Samānaneti samānanayane, samāharaṇe, samānakaraṇe vā aṭṭhakathādhippāyaṃ. Tattha “dve anulomāni dhammānulomañca paccayānulomañcā”tiādinā parato vaṇṇayissanti.
tika-abh05t0:1146_0: Paṭṭhānanāmatthoti “paṭṭhāna”nti imassa nāmassa attho, taṃ pana yasmā avayavadvārena
tika-abh05t0:1146_1: samudāye niruḷhaṃ, tasmā yathā avayavesu patiṭṭhitaṃ, tameva tāva dassetuṃ “tikapaṭṭhānādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1146_2: tikapaṭṭhānādināmattho”ti vuttaṃ. Atha vā avayavānameva paṭṭhānanāmattho niddhāretabbo
tika-abh05t0:1146_3: taṃsamudāyamattattā pakaraṇassa. Na hi samudāyo nāma koci attho atthīti dassetuṃ
tika-abh05t0:1146_4: “paṭṭhānaṃ…pe… nāmattho”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “imassa pakaraṇassa…pe… samodhānatā cettha
tika-abh05t0:1146_6: paṭṭhānakathā vuccamānā sukhaggahaṇā hotīti dassento āha “evañhi…pe… hotī”ti. Tatthāti
tika-abh05t0:1146_8: tikapaṭṭhānādīnaṃ samudāyassa ca sādhāraṇassa. Atthato āpannaṃ nānāvidhabhāvanti
tika-abh05t0:1146_9: pakāraggahaṇeneva pakārānaṃ anekavidhatā ca gahitāva hontīti vuttaṃ. Pakārehi ṭhānanti
tika-abh05t0:1146_10: hi paṭṭhānaṃ, nānāvidho paccayo, taṃ ettha vibhajanavasena atthīti paṭṭhānaṃ, pakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1146_11: tadavayavo ca. Etasmiñca atthanaye saddatopi nānāvidhabhāvasiddhi dassitāti veditabbā.
tika-abh05t0:1146_12: Tattha nānappakārā paccayatā, nānappakārānaṃ paccayatā ca nānappakārapaccayatāti
tika-abh05t0:1146_13: ubhayampi sāmaññaniddesena ekasesanayena vā ekajjhaṃ gahitanti dassento “ekassapi…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1146_14: veditabbā”ti āha. Anekadhammabhāvatoti aneke dhammā etassāti anekadhammo, tabbhāvatoti
tika-abh05t0:1146_15: yojetabbaṃ. Nānappakārapaccayatāti nānappakārapaccayabhāvo, yo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nānappakārapaccayaṭṭho”ti vutto.
tika-abh05t0:1147_0: Kāmaṃ dhammasaṅgahādīsupi attheva paccayadhammavibhāgo, so pana tattha paccayabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:1147_1: na tathā tapparabhāvena vibhatto yathā paṭṭhāneti dassento “etena…pe… dassetī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1147_2: āha. Sātisayavibhāgataṃ imassa pakaraṇassa tathā tadavayavānaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1148_0: Sabbaññutaññāṇassa yathāvuttagamanaṃ yadadhikaraṇaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “etthāti vacanaseso”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1148_1: Gamanadesabhāvatoti pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato. Aññehi gatimantehīti tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇādīhi.
tika-abh05t0:1149_0: Tividhena paricchedena desitesu dhammesu tikavohāroti āha “tikānanti tikavasena vuttadhammāna”nti.
tika-abh05t0:1149_1: Tīṇi parimāṇāni etesanti hi tikā. Samantāti samantato sabbabhāgatoti vuttaṃ hotīti
tika-abh05t0:1149_3: samantato anulomādisabbabhāgato samodhānavasena catuvīsati paṭṭhānāni. Anulomādisabbakoṭṭhāsatoti
tika-abh05t0:1149_6: gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāvuttato aññassa pakārassa asambhavato “anūnehi nayehi pavattānīti
tika-abh05t0:1149_7: vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha. Tāni pana yathāvuttāni samantapaṭṭhānāni. Ayañca atthavaṇṇanā
tika-abh05t0:1149_8: aṭṭhakathāvacanena aññadatthu saṃsandatīti dassento āha “tenevāha…pe… vasenā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1150_0: Hetunoti hetusabhāvassa dhammassa. Satipi hetusabhāvassa ārammaṇapaccayādibhāve savisese
tika-abh05t0:1150_1: tāva paccaye dassentena “adhipatipaccayādibhūtassa cā”ti vuttaṃ. “Hetu hutvā paccayo”ti
tika-abh05t0:1150_2: vutte dhammassa hetusabhāvatā niddhāritā, na paccayavisesoti tassa adhipatipaccayādibhāvo
tika-abh05t0:1150_3: na nivāritoti āha “etenapi so eva doso āpajjatī”ti. Tenāti hetubhāvaggahaṇena. Idhāti
tika-abh05t0:1150_5: balaṃ sattikāraṇabhāvo, yo rasotipi vuccati, svāyaṃ anaññasādhāraṇatāya dhammato
tika-abh05t0:1150_6: anaññopi paccayantarasamavāyeyeva labbhamānattā añño viya katvā vutto. Tassāti hetubhāvasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh05t0:1150_7: sāmatthiyassa. Hetu hutvāti etthāpi hetubhāvavācako hetusaddo, na hetusabhāvadhammavācakoti
tika-abh05t0:1151_0: Evañca katvātiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā samattheti. Yadi evaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1151_1: dhammasseva paccayatāvacanaṃ kathanti āha “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādi. Teneva cettha
tika-abh05t0:1151_2: amhehipi “dhammato anaññopi añño viya katvā”ti ca vuttaṃ. Yadi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yo
tika-abh05t0:1151_3: hi dhammo, mūlaṭṭhena upakārako dhammo”ti ca ādīsu dhammena dhammasattivibhāvanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1151_4: kataṃ, atha kasmā idha hetubhāvena paccayoti dhammasattiyeva vibhāvitāti codanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1151_5: manasi katvā vuttaṃ “idhāpi vā…pe… dassetī”ti. Dhammasattivibhāvanaṃ panettha na
tika-abh05t0:1151_6: sakkā paṭikkhipitunti dassento “na hī”tiādimāha. Attho etassa atthīti attho, atthābhidhāyivacananti
tika-abh05t0:1151_7: vuttaṃ “etīti etassa attho vattatī”ti, tasmā atthoti atthavacananti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh05t0:1151_8: Tenāha “tañca uppattiṭṭhitīnaṃ sādhāraṇavacana”nti. Tañcāti hi “vattatī”ti vacanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1151_9: paccāmaṭṭhaṃ. Atha vā etīti etassa atthoti “etī”ti etassa padassa attho “vattatī”ti
tika-abh05t0:1151_10: ettha vattanakiriyā. Tañcāti tañca vattanaṃ. Etasmiṃ panatthe sādhāraṇavacananti
tika-abh05t0:1151_11: ettha vacana-saddo atthapariyāyo veditabbo “vuccatī”ti katvā. Yadaggena uppattiyā
tika-abh05t0:1151_12: paccayo, tadaggena ṭhitiyāpi paccayoti koci āsaṅkeyyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1151_13: “koci hi…pe… hetuādayo”ti. Ettha ca yathā uppajjanārahānaṃ uppattiyā paccaye satiyeva
tika-abh05t0:1151_14: uppādo, nāsati, evaṃ tiṭṭhantānampi ṭhitipaccayavaseneva ṭhānaṃ yathā jīvitindriyavasena
tika-abh05t0:1151_15: sahajātadhammānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ye pana arūpadhammānaṃ ṭhitiṃ paṭikkhipanti, yaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1152_0: Yathā adhikaraṇasādhano patiṭṭhattho hetu-saddo, evaṃ karaṇasādhano pavattiatthopi
tika-abh05t0:1153_0: Etenāti hetupaccayato aññeneva kusalabhāvasiddhivacanena. Eke ācariyā. Sabhāvatovāti
tika-abh05t0:1153_1: etena yathā aññesaṃ rūpagataṃ obhāsentassa padīpassa rūpagatobhāsakena aññena payojanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1153_2: natthi sayaṃ obhāsanasabhāvattā, evaṃ aññesaṃ kusalādibhāvasādhakānaṃ hetūnaṃ aññena
tika-abh05t0:1153_3: kusalādibhāvasādhakena payojanaṃ natthi sayameva kusalādisabhāvattāti dasseti. Na
tika-abh05t0:1153_5: viyāti imamatthaṃ dasseti “yasmā panā”tiādinā. Sā pana aññapaṭibaddhā kusalāditā.
tika-abh05t0:1154_0: Na koci dhammo na hotīti rūpādibhedena chabbidhesu saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaññattidhammesu
tika-abh05t0:1154_1: kocipi dhammo ārammaṇapaccayo na na hoti, svāyaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo heṭṭhā dhātuvibhaṅgavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoyeva.
tika-abh05t0:1155_1: upanissayaṃ. Citteti cittasīsenāyaṃ niddeso daṭṭhabbo. Na hi cittameva tathābhisaṅkharīyati,
tika-abh05t0:1155_2: atha kho taṃsampayuttadhammāpi. Sādhayamānāti vase vattayamānā. Vasavattanañcettha
tika-abh05t0:1155_3: tadākārānuvidhānaṃ. Chandādīsu hi hīnesu majjhimesu paṇītesu taṃtaṃsampayuttāpi tathā
tika-abh05t0:1155_4: tathā pavattanti. Tenāha “hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanato”ti. Tenāti attano vase vattāpanena,
tika-abh05t0:1155_5: tesaṃ vā vase vattanena. Tehi chandādayo. Adhipatipaccayā honti attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1156_0: Tadanantaruppādaniyamoti tassa tasseva cittassa anantaraṃ uppajjamānataṃ. Taṃtaṃsahakārīpaccayavisiṭṭhassāti
tika-abh05t0:1156_1: tena tena ārammaṇādinā sahakārīkāraṇena taduppādanasamatthatāsaṅkhātaṃ visesaṃ pattassa.
tika-abh05t0:1156_2: Tāyayevāti yā vekhādāne pupphanasamatthatā vekhāpagame laddhokāsā, tāyameva.
tika-abh05t0:1157_0: Upasaggavasenapi atthaviseso hotīti vuttaṃ “saddatthamattato nānākaraṇa”nti. Vacanīyatthatoti
tika-abh05t0:1157_1: bhāvatthato. Bhāvatthopi hi vacanaggahaṇānusārena viññeyyattā “vacanīyo”ti vuccati.
tika-abh05t0:1157_4: Sati hi samakālatte byavadhānāsaṅkā eva na siyā saṇṭhānābhāvato. Idamito heṭṭhā uddhaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1157_5: tiriyanti vibhāgābhāvā attanā ekattamiva upanetvāti yojanā. Saṇṭhānābhāvena hi appaṭighabhāvūpalakkhaṇena
tika-abh05t0:1157_6: vibhāgābhāvaṃ, tena ekattamivūpanayanaṃ suṭṭhu anantarabhāvaṃ sādheti, sahāvaṭṭhānābhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1158_0: Vibhāgato ñāṇena ākarīyatīti ākāro, dhammānaṃ pavattibhedo. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaphalasamāpattīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1158_1: nirodhuppādānantaratāyāti yojanā. Purimacutīti asaññasattuppattito purimacuti. Yadi
tika-abh05t0:1158_2: kālantaratā natthi, kathamidaṃ “sattāhaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā pañca kappasatāni
tika-abh05t0:1158_3: atikkamitvā”ti vacananti āha “na hi tesaṃ…pe… vucceyyā”ti. Nanu tesaṃ antarā rūpasantāno
tika-abh05t0:1158_4: pavattatevāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “na ca…pe… aññasantānattā”ti. Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ aññabhinnasantānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1158_5: viya aññamaññūpakārenapi bhavitabbanti codanāya vuttaṃ “rūpārūpa…pe… hontī”ti. Tenetaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1158_6: dasseti – yadipi rūpārūpadhammā ekasmiṃ puggale vattamānā visesato aññamaññūpakārakabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1158_7: vattanti, aññamaññaṃ pana visadisasabhāvatāya visuṃyeva santānabhāvena pavattanato
tika-abh05t0:1158_8: byavadhāyakā na honti santativasena mithu apariyāpannattā, yato “aññamaññaṃ vippayuttā,
tika-abh05t0:1158_9: visaṃsaṭṭhā”ti ca vuttanti. Upakārako ca nāma accantaṃ bhinnasantānānampi hotiyevāti
tika-abh05t0:1158_10: na tāvatā santānābhedoti bhiyyopi nesaṃ byavadhāyakatābhāvo veditabbo. Yathā samānajātikānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1158_11: cittuppādānaṃ nirantaratā suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena pākaṭā, na tathā asamānajātikānanti
tika-abh05t0:1158_12: adhippāyena “javanānantarassa javanassa viya bhavaṅgānantarassa bhavaṅgassa viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1159_0: Paccayabhāvo cetthāti ettha ca-saddo byatireko. So yena visesenettha uppādakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1159_1: taṃ visesaṃ joteti. Anantarapaccayādīnanti ādi-saddena samanantarapaccayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh05t0:1159_2: Purepacchābhāvā, tadupādikā vā uppādanirodhā pubbantāparantaparicchedo, tena gahitānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1159_3: khaṇattayapariyāpannānanti attho. Tenāha “uppajjatīti vacanaṃ alabhantāna”nti. Uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgī
tika-abh05t0:1159_4: hi “uppajjatī”ti vuccati. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “uppādakkhaṇe uppajjamānaṃ, no ca uppannaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1159_5: bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ no ca uppajjamāna”nti. Soti anantarādipaccayabhāvo. Aparicchedanti
tika-abh05t0:1159_6: kālavasena paricchedarahitaṃ. Yatoti pubbantāparantavasena paricchedābhāvato. Tenevāti
tika-abh05t0:1160_0: Uppattiyā paccayabhāvena pākaṭenāti idaṃ tassa nidassanabhāvanidassanaṃ. Siddhañhi
tika-abh05t0:1160_1: nidassanaṃ. Paccayuppannānanti paccayanibbattānaṃ, attano phalabhūtānanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:1160_2: Sahajātabhāvenāti saha uppannabhāvena. Attanā sahuppannadhammānañhi sahuppannabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1160_3: upakārakatā sahajātapaccayatā. Tena ṭhitikkhaṇepi nesaṃ upakārakatā veditabbā. Evañhi
tika-abh05t0:1160_4: “pakāsassa padīpo viyā”ti nidassanampi suṭṭhu yujjati. Padīpo hi pakāsassa ṭhitiyāpi paccayoti.
tika-abh05t0:1161_0: Aññamaññatāvasenevāti iminā sahajātādibhāvena attano upakārakassa upakārakatāmattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1161_1: na aññamaññapaccayatā, atha kho aññamaññapaccayabhāvavasenāti lakkhaṇasaṅkarābhāvaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1161_2: dasseti, na sahajātādipaccayehi vinā aññamaññapaccayassa pavatti. Tenevāha “na sahajātatādivasenā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1161_3: Yadipi aññamaññapaccayo sahajātādipaccayehi vinā na hoti, sahajātādipaccayā pana
tika-abh05t0:1161_4: tena vināpi hontīti sahajātatādividhureneva pakārena aññamaññapaccayassa pavattīti
tika-abh05t0:1161_5: dassento “sahajātādi…pe… na hotī”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “na ca purejāta…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1161_6: hontī”ti āha. Sahajātatādīti ca ādi-saddena nissayaatthiavigatādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1162_0: Pathavīdhātuyaṃ patiṭṭhāya eva sesadhātuyo upādārūpāni viya yathāsakakiccaṃ karontīti
tika-abh05t0:1162_1: vuttaṃ “adhiṭṭhānākārena pathavīdhātu sesadhātūna”nti. Ettha adhiṭṭhānākārenāti ādhārākārena.
tika-abh05t0:1162_2: Ādhārākāro cettha nesaṃ sātisayaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya veditabbo, yato bhūtāni aniddisitabbaṭṭhānāni
tika-abh05t0:1162_3: vuccanti. Evañca katvā cakkhādīnampi adhiṭṭhānākārena upakārakatā suṭṭhu yujjati.
tika-abh05t0:1162_4: Na hi yathāvuttaṃ tadadhīnavuttiyā visesaṃ muñcitvā añño cakkhādīsu adesakānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1162_5: adhiṭṭhānākāro sambhavati. Yadipi yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ye ye dhammā pavattanti,
tika-abh05t0:1162_6: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ tadadhīnavuttibhāvo, yena pana paccayabhāvavisesena cakkhādīnaṃ paṭumandabhāvesu
tika-abh05t0:1162_7: cakkhuviññāṇādayo tadanuvidhānākāreneva pavattanti, svāyamidaṃ tesaṃ tadadhīnavuttiyā
tika-abh05t0:1162_8: siddho visesoti vutto. Evañhi paccayabhāvasāmaññe satipi ārammaṇapaccayato nissayapaccayassa
tika-abh05t0:1162_9: viseso siddhoti veditabbo. Svāyaṃ dhātuvibhaṅge vibhāvitoyeva. Khandhādayo taṃtaṃnissayānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1163: Yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ nissayoti vadati, na vuttalakkhaṇūpapannameva. Etena paccayaṭṭho idha nissayaṭṭhoti dasseti. Tatthāti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “niddhāretī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1164_0: Suṭṭhukatataṃ dīpeti, kassa? “Attano”ti vuttassa pakatasaddena visesiyamānassa paccayassa.
tika-abh05t0:1164_1: Kena katanti? Attano kāraṇehīti siddhovāyamattho. Tathāti phalassa uppādanasamatthabhāvena.
tika-abh05t0:1164_2: Atha vā tathāti nipphādanavasena upasevanavasena ca. Tattha nipphādanaṃ hetupaccayasamodhānena
tika-abh05t0:1164_3: phalassa nibbattanaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyanti anāmasitvā upasevanameva vibhāvento “upasevito
tika-abh05t0:1164_4: vā”ti āha. Tattha allīyāpanaṃ paribhogavasena veditabbaṃ. Tenāha “upabhogūpasevana”nti.
tika-abh05t0:1164_6: pakatabhāvena. Anāgatānampi…pe… vuttā hoti, pageva atītānaṃ paccuppannānañcāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t0:1164_7: Paccuppannassapi hi “paccuppannaṃ utu bhojanaṃ senāsanaṃ upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādentī”tiādivacanato
tika-abh05t0:1165_0: Yathā ye dhammā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pacchājātapaccayā honti, te tesaṃ ekaṃsena vippayuttaatthiavigatapaccayāpi
tika-abh05t0:1165_1: honti, tathā ye dhammā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ purejātapaccayā honti, te tesaṃ nissayārammaṇapaccayāpi
tika-abh05t0:1165_2: hontīti ubhayesu ubhayesaṃ paccayākārānaṃ lakkhaṇato saṅkarābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “vippayuttākārādīhi
tika-abh05t0:1165_3: visiṭṭhā, nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā”ti ca vuttaṃ. Yathā hi pacchājātapurejātākārā
tika-abh05t0:1165_4: aññamaññavisiṭṭhā, evaṃ pacchājātavippayuttākārādayo purejātanissayākārādayo ca aññamaññavibhattasabhāvā evāti.
tika-abh05t0:1166: Manosañcetanāhāravasena pavattamānehīti iminā cetanāya sampayuttadhammānampi tadanuguṇaṃ attano paccayuppannesu pavattimāha. Tenevāti cetanāhāravasena upakārakattā eva.
tika-abh05t0:1167_0: Payogena karaṇīyassāti etena bhinnajāti yaṃ tādisaṃ payogena kātuṃ na sakkā, taṃ
tika-abh05t0:1167_1: nivatteti. Anekavāraṃ pavattiyā āsevanaṭṭhassa pākaṭabhāvoti katvā vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1167_2: karaṇa”nti. Ekassa pana paccayadhammassa ekavārameva pavatti. Attasadisassāti arūpadhammasārammaṇatāsukkakaṇhādibhāvehi
tika-abh05t0:1167_4: pana paccayabhāvavisesanaṃ, tañca bhinnajātiyatādimeva visadisasabhāvataṃ nivatteti,
tika-abh05t0:1167_5: na bhūmantaratādi. Na hi parittā dhammā mahaggataappamāṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayā
tika-abh05t0:1167_6: na hontīti. Vāsanaṃ vāsaṃ gāhāpanaṃ, idha pana vāsanaṃ viya vāsanaṃ, bhāvananti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1167_7: Ganthādīsūti ganthasippādīsu. Visaye cetaṃ bhummaṃ, na niddhāraṇe. Tena ganthasippādivisayā
tika-abh05t0:1167_8: purimasiddhā ajjhayanādikiriyā “ganthādīsu purimā purimā”ti vuttā, sā pana āsevanākārā
tika-abh05t0:1167_9: idha udāharaṇabhāvena adhippetāti āha “purimā purimā āsevanā viyāti adhippāyo”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1167_10: Niddhāraṇe eva vā etaṃ bhummaṃ. Ganthādivisayā hi āsevanā ganthādīti vuttā yathā
tika-abh05t0:1168_0: Attano viya sampayuttadhammānampi kiccasādhikā cetanā cittassa byāpārabhāvena lakkhīyatīti
tika-abh05t0:1168_1: āha “cittapayogo cetanā”ti. Tāyāti tāya cetanāya. Uppannakiriyatāvisiṭṭheti cittapayogasaṅkhātāya
tika-abh05t0:1168_2: cetanākiriyāya uppattiyā visiṭṭhe visesaṃ āpanne. Yasmiñhi santāne kusalākusalacetanā
tika-abh05t0:1168_3: uppajjati, tattha yathābalaṃ tādisaṃ visesādhānaṃ katvā nirujjhati, yato tattheva
tika-abh05t0:1168_4: avasesapaccayasamavāye tassā phalabhūtāni vipākakaṭattārūpāni nibbattissanti. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:1168_5: “sesapaccaya…pe… na aññathā”ti. Tesanti vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ. Tenāti cittakiriyabhāvena.
tika-abh05t0:1168_6: Kiṃ vattabbanti asahajātānampi bhāvīnaṃ upakārikā cetanā sahajātānaṃ upakārikāti
tika-abh05t0:1169_0: Nirussāhasantabhāvenāti ussāhanaṃ ussāho, natthi etassa ussāhoti nirussāho, so eva
tika-abh05t0:1169_1: santabhāvoti nirussāhasantabhāvo, tena. Ussāhoti ca kiriyamayacittuppādassa pavattiākāro
tika-abh05t0:1169_2: veditabbo, yo byāpāroti ca vuccati, na vīriyussāho. Svāyaṃ yathā asamugghātitānusayānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1169_3: kiriyamayacittuppādesu sātisayo labbhati, na tathā niranusayānaṃ. Tato eva te santasabhāvā
tika-abh05t0:1169_4: vipākuppādanabyāpārarahitāva honti, kiriyamayacittuppādatāya pana saussāhā evāti
tika-abh05t0:1169_8: eva labbhanato. Soti vipākabhāvo. Vipākānaṃ payogena asādhetabbatāyāti “chandavato
tika-abh05t0:1169_9: kiṃ nāmana sijjhatī”tiādinā cittābhisaṅkhārapayogena yathā kusalākusalā nipphādīyanti,
tika-abh05t0:1169_10: evaṃ vipākānaṃ payogena anipphādetabbattā. Payogenāti kammaphaluppattimūlahetubhūtena
tika-abh05t0:1169_11: purimapayogena. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “payogasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccantī”tiādi. Aññathāti
tika-abh05t0:1169_12: payogena vinā. Sesapaccayesūti kammassa vipākuppādane sahakārīkāraṇesu. Kammassa
tika-abh05t0:1169_13: kaṭattāyeva payoge sati asatipīti vuttamevatthaṃ avadhāraṇena dassento vipākānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1169_14: nirussāhataṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. Na kilesavūpasamasantabhāvo yathā taṃ santānesu jhānasamāpattīsūti
tika-abh05t0:1169_15: adhippāyo. Ayañca vipākānaṃ santabhāvo nānumāniko, atha kho paccakkhasiddhoti dassento
tika-abh05t0:1169_17: Tenevāha “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1169_19: Avipākānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ. Vipākānukulaṃ pavattinti santasabhāvaṃ paccayabhāvamāha.
tika-abh05t0:1170_0: Yathāsakaṃ paccayehi nibbattānaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ anubalappadānaṃ upatthambhakattaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1170_1: tayidaṃ āhāresu na niyataṃ tato aññathāpi pavattanato. Tathā sati tadeva tattha kasmā
tika-abh05t0:1170_2: gahitanti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha “satipi…pe… upatthambhakattenā”ti. Tena padhānāppadhānesu
tika-abh05t0:1170_3: padhānena niddeso ñāyagatoti dasseti. Kāmañcettha “rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattenā”ti
tika-abh05t0:1170_4: avisesato vuttaṃ, sāmaññajotanā pana visese avatiṭṭhatīti yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvo
tika-abh05t0:1170_5: niddhāretabbo. Svāyaṃ tesaṃ upatthambhakattassa padhānabhāvavibhāvaneneva āvi bhavatīti
tika-abh05t0:1170_7: sahajātadhammānaṃ sahuppādanabhāvena paccayā hontīti āha “satipi janakatte arūpīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1170_8: āhārāna”nti. Upatthambhakattaṃ hoti uppādato parampi nesaṃ paccayabhāvato. Asatipi
tika-abh05t0:1170_9: janakatte upatthambhiyamānassa rūpassa aññehi yathāsakaṃ paccayehi janitattā. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:1170_11: uppattiyā paccayā honti, tadaggena ṭhitiyāpi paccayā hontiyevāti upatthambhakattaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1170_12: janakattaṃ na byabhicarati, tasmā anupatthambhakassa āhārassa kuto janakatā. Tenāha
tika-abh05t0:1170_13: “asati pana…pe… natthīti upatthambhakattaṃ padhāna”nti. Yasmā janako ajanakopi hutvā
tika-abh05t0:1170_14: āhāro upatthambhako hoti, anupatthambhako pana hutvā janako na hotiyeva, tasmāssa
tika-abh05t0:1170_15: upatthambhakattaṃ padhānanti attho. Idāni janakattampi āhārānaṃ upatthambhanavaseneva
tika-abh05t0:1170_16: hotīti dassento “janayamānopi hī”tiādimāha. Avicchedavasenāti santatiyā ghaṭṭanavasena.
tika-abh05t0:1171_0: Yadi adhipatiyaṭṭho indriyapaccayatā, evaṃ sante adhipatipaccayato indriyapaccayassa
tika-abh05t0:1171_1: kiṃ nānākaraṇanti codanaṃ manasi katvā taṃ tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ dassento “na adhipatipaccayadhammānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1171_2: viyā”tiādimāha. Tattha pavattinivāraketi attano adhipatipaccayapavattiyā nivārake
tika-abh05t0:1171_4: dhoreyyabhāvena abhibhuyya pavattiyā. Garubhāvoti jeṭṭhakabhāvo. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho
tika-abh05t0:1171_5: – yena jeṭṭhakabhāvena chandādayo attano pavattivibandhake tulyayogīdhamme tadaññadhamme
tika-abh05t0:1171_6: viya abhibhuyya pavattanti, na so indriyapaccayatāya adhipatiyaṭṭhoti adhippetoti.
tika-abh05t0:1171_7: Atha ko carahīti āha “atha kho”tiādi. Dassanādikiccesu nimittabhūtesu cakkhuviññāṇādīhi
tika-abh05t0:1171_8: cakkhādīhi paccayehi cakkhādīnaṃ anuvattanīyatāti sambandho. Jīvane anupālane jīvantehi
tika-abh05t0:1171_10: sahajātadhammehi sukhādīnaṃ anuvattanīyatāti yojanā. Taṃtaṃkiccesūti vuttameva dassanādikiccaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1171_11: paccāmasati. Cakkhādayo paccayā etesanti cakkhādipaccayā, cakkhuviññāṇādayo. Tehi
tika-abh05t0:1172_0: Tesu kiccesūti dassanādikiccesu. Cakkhādīnaṃ issariyaṃ adhipatiyaṭṭho, sā indriyapaccayatāti
tika-abh05t0:1172_1: attho. Tappaccayānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tadanuvattanena tesaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ anuvattanena.
tika-abh05t0:1172_2: Tattha dassanādikicce. Pavattīti ca idaṃ tassa adhipatiyaṭṭhassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Anuvattakena
tika-abh05t0:1172_3: hi anuvattanīyo adhipatiyaṭṭho pākaṭo hoti. Yathā cakkhādīnaṃ kiccavasena adhipatiyaṭṭho,
tika-abh05t0:1172_4: na evaṃ bhāvadvayassa. Tassa pana tādisena kāraṇatāmattenāti dassento “itthipurisindriyānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1172_7: gahitānī”ti idaṃ indriyapaccayameva sandhāya vuttaṃ, pacchājātādīhi pana tāni rūpadhammānampi paccayā hontiyeva.
tika-abh05t0:1173_2: Upagantvā nijjhānanti upanikacca nijjhānajjhānārammaṇassa jhānacakkhunā byattataraṃ
tika-abh05t0:1173_3: olokanaṃ atthato cintanameva hotīti vuttaṃ “pekkhanaṃ cintanañcā”ti. Tenevāha “vitakkanādivasenā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1173_4: Vitakkādīnaṃyeva sādhāraṇo, yena teyeva “jhānaṅgānī”ti vuccanti. Sukhadukkhavedanādvayanti
tika-abh05t0:1173_5: sāmaññavacanampi upanijjhāyanaṭṭhassa adhikatattā anupanijjhānasabhāvameva taṃ bodhetīti
tika-abh05t0:1173_7: Tena vuttaṃ “adhippāyo”ti. Ajhānaṅgā upekkhācittekaggatā pañcaviññāṇasahagatā daṭṭhabbā
tika-abh05t0:1173_8: vitakkapacchimakattā jhānaṅgānaṃ. Yadi evanti jhānaṅgavacaneneva ajhānaṅgānaṃ nivattanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1173_9: kataṃ, evaṃ sante. Ekantena na upekkhāya viya anekantena. Anekantikañhi upekkhāya
tika-abh05t0:1173_10: ajhānaṅgattaṃ. Yadi ekantena ajhānaṅgaṃ sukhadukkhindriyaṃ, atha kathaṃ pasaṅgoti
tika-abh05t0:1173_11: āha “jhānaṅgaṭṭhāne niddiṭṭhattā”ti. Atha vā yadi ekantena ajhānaṅgataṃ vedanādvayaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1173_12: kathaṃ jhānaṅgavohāroti āha “jhānaṅgaṭṭhāne niddiṭṭhattā”ti. Satipi…pe… dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1173_13: “ṭhapetvā sukhadukkhindriyadvaya”nti vuttanti yojanā. Yadi evaṃ yathāvuttavedanādvayena
tika-abh05t0:1173_14: saddhiṃ tādisā upekkhācittekaggatā kasmā na ṭhapitāti āha “upekkhā…pe… atthī”ti,
tika-abh05t0:1173_15: pañcaviññāṇasahagatānaṃ jhānapaccayabhāvo pana natthi, na itaresanti adhippāyo. Gahaṇaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1174_0: Yato tato vāti duggatito vā sugatito vā saṃkilesato vā vodānato vā niyyānaṭṭho, svāyaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1174_1: yathākkamaṃ sammā micchā vā hotīti āha “sammā vā micchā vāti attho”ti. Ahetukacittesu
tika-abh05t0:1174_2: na labbhantīti ettha ahetukacittesu eva na labbhantīti evamavadhāraṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh05t0:1174_3: na ahetukacittesu na labbhanti evāti. Tasmā purimasmiñhi avadhāraṇe ahetukacittesu
tika-abh05t0:1174_4: alābho niyatoti so patiyogīsu nivattito hoti. Tenāha “sahetukacittesu alābhābhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1174_5: vutta”nti. Dutiye pana ahetukacittāni alābhe niyatānīti tesu anavasesato alābhena
tika-abh05t0:1174_6: bhavitabbaṃ. Tathā sati yo kesuci ahetukacittesu jhānapaccayo labbhati, sopi nivārito
tika-abh05t0:1174_7: siyā. Tena vuttaṃ “na ahetukacittesū”tiādi. Tattha lābhābhāvadassanatthanti lābhābhāvasseva
tika-abh05t0:1174_8: dassanatthaṃ na vuttanti attho. Tena ekaccālābho apaṭikkhitto hoti. Tenevāha “katthaci
tika-abh05t0:1174_9: kassaci lābho na nivārito”ti. Evaṃ atthe gayhamāneti evaṃ vuttanayena paṭhamapadāvadhāraṇavasena
tika-abh05t0:1174_10: atthe viññāyamāne. Ettakameva viññāyeyyāti ahetukacittesu kesuci cittesu jhānamaggapaccayesu
tika-abh05t0:1174_11: kassaci paccayassa lābho na nivāritoti ettakameva viññāyeyya avisesena vuttattā.
tika-abh05t0:1174_12: Kiṃ panettha upari kātabbanti āha “na savitakka…pe… kata”nti. Yadipi na kataṃ, atthato
tika-abh05t0:1175_1: Tasmāti yasmā ahetukacittesu na labbhanti evāti evaṃ niyame kariyamāne yathāvutto
tika-abh05t0:1175_2: attho sambhavati, tasmā. Ayañca attho pāṭhantarenapi saṃsandatīti dassetuṃ “yena
tika-abh05t0:1175_3: alābhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ alābhanti taṃ dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ pakāsitaṃ alābhaṃ. Esāti
tika-abh05t0:1175_4: esa idha paṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ “ahetukacittesu na labbhantī”ti alābho vutto. Kīdiso
tika-abh05t0:1175_5: pana alābhoti taṃ dassento “yathā hī”tiādimāha. Tattha sahetukesūti sahetukacittesu.
tika-abh05t0:1175_6: Saṅkaḍḍhitvāti avisaṭe katvā. Ekattagatabhāvakaraṇanti ekabhāvāpādanaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana
tika-abh05t0:1175_7: pakaraṇe jhānapaccayo vuttova yathālābhapaccayākāravibhāvane desanāya tapparabhāvato.
tika-abh05t0:1176_0: Samanti avisamaṃ, sammā, saha vā. Pakārehīti ekavatthukatādippakārehi. Yuttatāyāti
tika-abh05t0:1176_1: saṃsaṭṭhatāya. Sā pana saṃsaṭṭhatā yasmā sabhāvato anekesampi sataṃ ekattagamanaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1176_2: viya hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “ekībhāvopagamanena viya upakārakatā”ti. Evaṃ upakārakatā
tika-abh05t0:1176_3: ca tesaṃ bahūnaṃ sahacca ekattakāritāya nidassetabbā.
tika-abh05t0:1177_0: Yuttānampi satanti vuttappakārena saṃsaṭṭhatāya aññamaññasambandhatāya yuttānampi
tika-abh05t0:1177_1: samānānaṃ. Ayañca yuttatā na sampayuttapaccayatāya viya paccayadhammesu paccayuppannadhammesu
tika-abh05t0:1177_2: ca veditabbā, kevalaṃ tattha arūpasabhāvattā ubhayaṃ samadhuraṃ, idha rūpārūpasabhāvattā
tika-abh05t0:1177_3: vidhuranti ayaṃ viseso. Vippayuttabhāvenāti visaṃsaṭṭhabhāvena. Tena vuttaṃ “nānattūpagamenā”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1177_4: Idañhettha vippayuttatāya visesanaṃ yā nānattūpagamanasaṅkhātā vippayuttatā, na sā
tika-abh05t0:1177_5: “ñāṇavippayutta”ntiādīsu viya abhāvamattanti, ayañca upakārakatā vinā saṃsaggena
tika-abh05t0:1177_6: sahāvaṭṭhāyitāya kiccakāritādīhi nidassetabbā. Na hītiādi “yuttāna”nti vuttassa atthassa
tika-abh05t0:1177_7: samatthanaṃ “tādise yoge satiyeva vippayuttapaccayatā”ti. Tenāha “na hī”tiādi. Tassattho
tika-abh05t0:1177_8: – yathā “vatthu khandhānaṃ, sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ, pacchājātā
tika-abh05t0:1177_9: kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato
tika-abh05t0:1177_10: vatthusahajātapacchājātavasena yuttānaṃ atthi vippayuttapaccayatā, na evaṃ ayuttānaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1177_11: vatthusahajāta…pe… atthīti. Yadi evaṃ rūpānaṃ rūpehi kasmā vippayuttapaccayo na vuttoti
tika-abh05t0:1177_12: āha “rūpānaṃ panā”tiādi. Vippayogoyeva natthi sampayogāsaṅkāya abhāvato. Sampayujjamānānañhi
tika-abh05t0:1177_13: arūpānaṃ rūpehi, rūpānañca tehi siyā sampayogāsaṅkā, sampayogalakkhaṇaṃ pana natthīti
tika-abh05t0:1177_14: tesaṃ vippayogo vutto. Tenāha “catūhi sampayogo catūhi vippayogo”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1178_0: Atthi me pāpakammaṃ katanti katabhāvavisiṭṭhā atthitā vuccamānā kiriyāya siddhabhāvameva
tika-abh05t0:1178_1: dīpeti, na sijjhamānatanti āha “nibbattatālakkhaṇaṃ atthibhāva”nti. Atthato pana
tika-abh05t0:1178_2: kammassa anibbattaphalatāya evamettha atthitā veditabbā. Atthi puggaloti panettha
tika-abh05t0:1178_3: tassā paññattiyā gahetabbatā, tadupādānassa vā pabandhāvicchedo labbhatevāti vuttaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1178_5: yāva bhaṅgā labbhamānatā atthibhāvo, tathāpi tassa yathā uppādakkhaṇato ṭhitikkhaṇe
tika-abh05t0:1178_6: sātisayo byāpāro, evaṃ paccayuppannepīti vuttaṃ “satipi janakatte upatthambhakappaṭṭhānā
tika-abh05t0:1178_8: saṅgaṇhāti. Atthibhāveneva na nissayādibhāvenāti “sādhāraṇa”nti vuttaṃ upakārakattaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-abh05t0:1179_0: Phassādīnaṃ anekesaṃ sahabhāvo natthīti idaṃ na ekacittuppādapariyāpanne sandhāya,
tika-abh05t0:1179_1: atha kho nānācittuppādapariyāpanneti dassento “ekasmiṃ phassādisamudāye sati dutiyo
tika-abh05t0:1179_2: na hotī”ti āha. Svāyamattho “sahabhāvo natthī”ti sahabhāvapaṭikkhepeneva viññāyati.
tika-abh05t0:1179_3: Ettāvatā pana anavabujjhantānaṃ vasena vivaritvā vutto. Tenāti anekesaṃ phassādīnaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1179_4: sahabhāvābhāvena. Yadi natthitāmattena upakārakatā natthipaccayatā, anānantarātītavasenapi
tika-abh05t0:1179_5: siyāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “satipī”tiādi. Tānīti purimataracittāni. Dadamānaṃ viyāti
tika-abh05t0:1179_6: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu okāsaṃ detiyeva. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pavattiokāsadānena upakārakatā”ti?
tika-abh05t0:1179_7: Saccametaṃ, evamajjhāsayā viya paccayadhammā abhāvaṃ gacchantīti dassanatthaṃ viya-saddaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1180_0: Natthitāvigamānaṃ satipi paccayassa dhammassa anupaladdhitāsāmaññe natthivigatapaccayesu
tika-abh05t0:1180_1: labbhamānaṃ visesamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Abhāvamattenāti hutvā
tika-abh05t0:1180_2: abhāvamattena. Tenettha nirodhānantaraṃ paccayadhammassa upakārakattaṃ āha, yathā
tika-abh05t0:1180_3: taṃ “okāsadāna”nti vuttaṃ. Sabhāvavigamenāti etena nirodhato parampi yato “vigatatā
tika-abh05t0:1180_4: nirodhappattatā”ti vuttaṃ. Paccayadhamme yāsaṃ natthitāvigatatānaṃ vasena natthivigatapaccayā
tika-abh05t0:1180_5: vuttā, tāsaṃ visese dassite natthivigatapaccayānaṃ viseso dassito hotīti “natthitā
tika-abh05t0:1180_6: ca nirodhānantarasuññatā vigatatā nirodhappattatā”ti vuttaṃ, tattha nirodhānantarā
tika-abh05t0:1180_7: na nirodhasamakālāti adhippāyo. Tathāti iminā yathā paccayadhammāvisesepi natthivigatapaccayabhāvaviseso
tika-abh05t0:1180_8: niddhārito, tathā atthiavigatapaccayabhāvavisesoti imamatthaṃ upasaṃharati. Yathā
tika-abh05t0:1180_9: hi nirodhānantaranirodhappattīhi natthivigatatānaṃ bhedo lakkhito, evaṃ paccayadhammassa
tika-abh05t0:1180_10: dharamānatānirodhānupagamehi atthiavigatatānanti. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ dhammāvisese paccayabhāvaviseso
tika-abh05t0:1180_11: duviññeyyarūpena ṭhito sammā vibhāvissatīti āha “dhammānañhī”tiādi. Tadabhisamayāya
tika-abh05t0:1181_0: Catūsu khandhesu ekassapi asaṅgahitattābhāvato anantarādīhīti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā
tika-abh05t0:1181_1: yojanā. Aññanti sukhumarūpaṃ. Na hi taṃ purejātapaccayo hoti. Nanu ca rūparūpampi
tika-abh05t0:1181_2: purejātapaccayabhāvena kusalattike nāgatanti āha “rūparūpaṃ panā”tiādi. Aññattha
tika-abh05t0:1181_3: āgatamevāti yadipi kusalattike nāgataṃ, sanidassanattikādīsu pana āgatattā na sakkā
tika-abh05t0:1185_0: 1. Hetupaccayena paccayabhāvo hetupaccayoti uddiṭṭho, na hetupaccayadhammoti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1185_1: Soti hetubhāvena paccayo. Ettha ca paṭhamavikappe yo hetupaccayena paccayabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh05t0:1185_2: yo ca dutiyavikappe hetubhāvena paccayo vutto, so yasmā atthato yathāvuttassa paccayadhammassa
tika-abh05t0:1185_3: yathāvuttānaṃ paccayuppannānaṃ hetupaccayabhāvoyeva, tasmā vuttaṃ “ubhayathāpi hetubhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1185_4: upakārakatā hetupaccayoti uddiṭṭhoti dassitaṃ hotī”ti. Yathā cettha, evaṃ “ārammaṇapaccayena
tika-abh05t0:1185_5: paccayabhāvo, ārammaṇabhāvena vā paccayo ārammaṇapaccayo”tiādinā ārammaṇapaccayādīsu
tika-abh05t0:1185_6: attho netabboti dassento “esa nayo sesapaccayesupī”ti āha. Dhammasabhāvo eva, na
tika-abh05t0:1185_7: dhammato aññā dhammasatti nāma atthīti. Upakārakaṃ dhammanti paccayadhammaṃ āha.
tika-abh05t0:1186_0: Paccattaniddiṭṭhoti paccattavasena niddiṭṭho, paṭhamāya vibhattiyā niddiṭṭhoti attho.
tika-abh05t0:1186_1: Tenāti paccayadhammaniddesabhūtena paccattaniddiṭṭhena paṭhamena hetusaddena. Etassāti
tika-abh05t0:1186_2: hetusaddābhidheyyamatthamāha. So hi chabbidho navavidho dvādasavidhoti anekabhedena
tika-abh05t0:1186_3: bhinnopi hetubhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā ekavacanena vutto. Dutiyo hetusaddoti
tika-abh05t0:1186_4: ānetvā yojanā. Hetunā sampayuttānanti adhikatattā vuttaṃ “hetu sampayuttānaṃ paccayo
tika-abh05t0:1186_5: honto hetunā sampayuttānameva paccayo hoti, na vippayuttāna”nti evaṃ padametaṃ. Na
tika-abh05t0:1186_6: hi sabbena sabbaṃ hetuvippayuttadhammānaṃ hetupaccayo na hotīti. Sampayuttasaddassa
tika-abh05t0:1186_7: sambandhīsaddattā “sampayuttasaddassa sāpekkhattā”ti vuttaṃ. Sampayuttoti hi vutte
tika-abh05t0:1186_8: kena sampayuttoti ekantato sambandhiantaraṃ apekkhitabbaṃ. Tenāha “aññassa…pe… viññāyatī”ti.
tika-abh05t0:1186_9: Nāyaṃ ekantoti yvāyaṃ “dutiye hetusadde avijjamāne”tiādinā vutto attho, ayamekanto
tika-abh05t0:1186_10: na hoti, aññāpekkhopi saddo aññassa visesanaṃ hotīti idaṃ na sabbattheva sambhavatīti
tika-abh05t0:1186_12: āha. Tena vuttaṃ “hehupaccayena paccayoti ettheva byāvaṭo”ti. Avisiṭṭhāti na visesitā.
tika-abh05t0:1186_13: Evanti yathā hetusaddena aññattha byāvaṭena sampayuttā na visesiyanti kiccantarapasutattā,
tika-abh05t0:1186_15: sampayuttānaṃ gahaṇaṃ siyā. Tena vuttaṃ “sampayuttasaddenā”tiādi. Āhārindriyāsampayuttassa
tika-abh05t0:1186_16: abhāvatoti āhārehi indriyehi ca nasampayuttassa dhammassa abhāvato. Na hi phassacetanāviññāṇavedanājīvitavirahito
tika-abh05t0:1186_17: cittuppādo atthi. Tenāha “vajjetabbā…pe… taṃ na kata”nti. Vajjetabbaṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1187_0: Evampīti dutiyena hetusaddena gayhamānepi nāpajjati. Yadipi hetavo bahavo, sāmaññaniddeso
tika-abh05t0:1187_1: cāyaṃ, tathāpi sāmaññajotanāya visesaniddiṭṭhattāti adhippāyo. Tena vuttaṃ “paccatta…pe…
tika-abh05t0:1187_2: vuttattā”ti. Vināpi dutiyena hetusaddena hetusampayuttabhāve siddhepīti iminā yaṃ
tika-abh05t0:1187_3: vuttaṃ “nāyamekanto”ti, tameva ulliṅgeti. Na pana hetūnanti idaṃ hetussa paccayabhāvena
tika-abh05t0:1187_4: gahitattā paccayuppannabhāvena gahaṇaṃ na yujjeyyāti āsaṅkamānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh05t0:1187_5: Tenevāha “evampi gahaṇaṃ siyā”ti. Soti dutiyo hetusaddo. Apare pana “hetusampayuttakāna”nti
tika-abh05t0:1187_6: ettha hetūnañca sampayuttakānañcāti samāsaṃ vikappenti. Patiṭṭhāmattādibhāvena nirapekkhāti
tika-abh05t0:1187_8: karonti. Sāpekkhā evāti aññasāpekkhā eva. Āharitabbaisitabbā āhārindriyapaccayehi
tika-abh05t0:1187_9: upakattabbadhammā. Tasmāti yasmā yehi sāpekkhā, te attano paccayuppannadhamme paccayabhāveneva
tika-abh05t0:1187_10: paricchinditvā tiṭṭhanti, tasmā. Tenāha “te vināpi…pe… na kata”nti. Paricchindanti
tika-abh05t0:1187_11: visesenti. Tanti dutiyaṃ āhārindriyaggahaṇaṃ. Tatthāti āhārindriyapaccayaniddese.
